atk-abh03a:10_1: Saṅgaho asaṅgahotiādīnañhi vasena idaṃ pakaraṇaṃ cuddasavidhena vibhattanti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:10_12: ayaṃ cuddasahi padehi nikkhittā nayamātikā nāma.
atk-abh03a:10_13: Ayañhi iminā saṅgahādikena nayena dhātukathā dhammā vibhattāti dassetuṃ ṭhapitattā nayamātikāti vuccati.
atk-abh03a:10_14: Etesaṃ padānaṃ mūlabhūtattā mūlamātikātipi vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-abh03a:12_2: manasikāroti ayaṃ pañcavīsādhikena padasatena nikkhittā abbhantaramātikā nāma.
atk-abh03a:12_3: Ayañhi “sabbāpi dhammasaṅgaṇī dhātukathāya mātikā”ti evaṃ avatvā saṅgahādinā nayena vibhajitabbe khandhādidhamme
atk-abh03a:12_4: sarūpato dassetvā dhātukathāya abbhantareyeva ṭhapitattā abbhantaramātikāti vuccati.
atk-abh03a:12_5: Khandhādipadānaṃ dhammasaṅgaṇīmātikāya asaṅgahitattā pakiṇṇakamātikātipi vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-abh03a:14_4: catūhi vippayogoti ayaṃ catūhi padehi nikkhittā nayamukhamātikā nāma.
atk-abh03a:14_5: Ayañhi sabbesupi pañcakkhandhādīsu ceva kusalattikādīsu ca mātikādhammesu,
atk-abh03a:14_6: tīhi khandhāyatanadhātupadeheva saṅgaho ca asaṅgaho ca yojetabbo.
atk-abh03a:14_7: Tathā catūhi arūpakkhandhehi sampayogo ca vippayogo ca.
atk-abh03a:14_8: Etāni imesaṃ saṅgahāsaṅgahādīnaṃ nayānaṃ mukhānīti dassetuṃ ṭhapitattā nayamukhamātikāti vuccati.
atk-abh03a:16_1: visabhāgoti ayaṃ dvīhi padehi nikkhittā lakkhaṇamātikā nāma.
atk-abh03a:16_4: tathā sampayogavippayoganayo yojetabboti sabhāgavisabhāgalakkhaṇavasena saṅgahādilakkhaṇaṃ dassetuṃ ṭhapitattā lakkhaṇamātikāti vuccati.
atk-abh03a:18_1: Sabbāpi dhammasaṅgaṇī dhātukathāya mātikāti ayaṃ chasaṭṭhi tikapadāni,
atk-abh03a:18_2: dve ca dukapadasatāni saṅkhipitvā nikkhittā bāhiramātikā nāma.
atk-abh03a:18_4: manasikāro”ti evaṃ dhātukathāya abbhantare avatvā “sabbāpi dhammasaṅgaṇī”ti evaṃ dhātukathāya mātikato bahi ṭhapitattā bāhiramātikāti vuccati.
atk-abh03a:19_0: Evaṃ mātikāya pañcadhā ṭhitabhāvaṃ viditvā idāni ‘saṅgaho asaṅgaho’tiādīsu saṅgaho tāva jātisañjātikiriyāgaṇanavasena catubbidho. Tattha –
atk-abh03a:19_9: ime dhammā sīlakkhandhe saṅgahitā”ti ayaṃ jātisaṅgaho nāma.
atk-abh03a:19_10: “Ekajātikā āgacchantū”ti vuttaṭṭhāne viya hi idha sabbepi jātiyā ekasaṅgahaṃ gatā.
atk-abh03a:19_18: ime dhammā samādhikkhandhe saṅgahitā”ti ayaṃ sañjātisaṅgaho nāma.
atk-abh03a:19_19: “Ekaṭṭhāne jātā saṃvaḍḍhā āgacchantū”ti vuttaṭṭhāne viya hi idha sabbepi sañjātiṭhānena nivutthokāsena ekasaṅgahaṃ gatā.
atk-abh03a:19_26: ime dhammā paññākkhandhe saṅgahitā”ti ayaṃ kiriyāsaṅgaho nāma.
atk-abh03a:19_27: Sabbeva hete attano kiriyākaraṇena ekasaṅgahaṃ gatā.
atk-abh03a:24_1: Idāni pañcakkhandhādivasena nikkhittamātikaṃ ‘saṅgaho asaṅgaho’tiādīhi nayamātikāpadehi saddhiṃ yojetvā
atk-abh03a:24_2: dassetuṃ rūpakkhandho katihi khandhehītiādinā nayena niddesavāro āraddho.
atk-abh03a:24_5: tasmā rūpakkhandhādīnaṃ saṅgahaṃ dassetuṃ katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhīti tīṇi khandhāyatanadhātupadāneva uddhaṭāni.
atk-abh03a:24_7: Yasmā ca “sabhāgo visabhāgo”ti evaṃ lakkhaṇamātikā ṭhapitā,
atk-abh03a:24_8: tasmā imassa pañhassa vissajjane rūpakkhandho ekena khandhenātiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:24_11: Yañhi kiñci rūpaṃ rūpakkhandhasabhāgattā rūpakkhandhotveva saṅgahaṃ gacchatīti rūpakkhandheneva gaṇitaṃ,
atk-abh03a:24_14: Sabbopi hi rūpakkhandho dasāyatanāni dhammāyatanekadeso ca hoti,
atk-abh03a:24_17: Ekādasahi dhātūhīti sattaviññāṇadhātuvajjāhi ekādasahi etāsu hi apariyāpannaṃ rūpaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-abh03a:25_0: Asaṅgahanayaniddese katihi asaṅgahitoti saṅkhepeneva pucchā katā.
atk-abh03a:25_1: Vissajjane panassa yasmā rūpakkhandhassa visabhāgā cattāro arūpakkhandhā,
atk-abh03a:25_7: “rūpakkhandho katihi khandhehī”tiādimhi tāva ekamūlake saṅgahanaye sarūpeneva dassitā pañca pucchā,
atk-abh03a:25_15: “pañcakkhandhā katihi khandhehī”ti evaṃ abhedato cāti dvidhā pucchāvissajjanāni katāni.
atk-abh03a:27_1: Āyatanapadaniddesādīsu āyatanapadaniddese tāva cakkhāyatanaṃ ekena khandhenāti ekena rūpakkhandheneva,
atk-abh03a:27_2: ekena cakkhāyataneneva ekāya cakkhudhātuyāva saṅgahitanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh03a:27_4: Asaṅkhataṃ khandhato ṭhapetvāti ettha pana yasmā asaṅkhataṃ dhammāyatanaṃ nāma nibbānaṃ,
atk-abh03a:27_9: Viññāṇakkhandhena pana ṭhapetvā dhammāyatanadhammadhātuyo sesāyatanadhātūhi ca taṃ na saṅgayhati.
atk-abh03a:27_16: Dukamattameva pana pāḷiyaṃ dassetvā “dvādasāyatanānī”ti abhedatova pucchāvissajjanaṃ kataṃ.
atk-abh03a:28_3: Yasmā ca dukatikesu samudayasaccasadisameva maggasaccepi vissajjanaṃ,
atk-abh03a:31_2: “avijjā katihi khandhehī”ti pucchaṃ anārabhitvā avijjā ekena khandhenāti evaṃ vissajjanameva dassitaṃ.
atk-abh03a:31_3: Tattha saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇanti paṭisandhiyaṃ pavatte ca sabbampi vipākaviññāṇaṃ.
atk-abh03a:31_7: Tenevettha saddāyatanampi saṅgahetvā ekādasahāyatanehi saṅgaho dassito.
atk-abh03a:31_9: Aññeneva hi ekena khandhena phasso saṅgahito,
atk-abh03a:31_13: Tattha kammabhavo phassādīhi sadisavisajjanattā tehi saddhiṃ ekato dassito.
atk-abh03a:31_15: Yasmā cete upādinnakadhammāva tasmā “ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:32_8: Ekatalavāsikānañhi sesabrahmānaṃ cakkhusabbhāvato tassārammaṇattā tattha rūpāyatanaṃ uddhaṭaṃ.
atk-abh03a:34_6: Cittaṃ pana cetanānantaraṃ nikkhittampi asadisavissajjanattā pacchā gahitaṃ.
atk-abh03a:34_7: Tattha appamaññādīsu ekena khandhenāti vedanā vedanākkhandhena,
atk-abh03a:34_9: sesā saṅkhārakkhandhena saṅgahitāti evaṃ khandhaviseso veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:36_1: Evaṃ abbhantaramātikāya saṅgahaṃ dassetvā idāni bāhiramātikāya saṅgahaṃ dassetuṃ kusalā dhammātiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh03a:36_3: Sattahi dhātūhīti cakkhusotaghānajivhāviññāṇadhātūhi ceva manodhātudhammadhātumanoviññāṇadhātūhi ca.
atk-abh03a:36_4: Vipākattike aṭṭhahi dhātūhīti kāyaviññāṇadhātuyā saddhiṃ tāhiyeva.
atk-abh03a:36_5: Vipākadhammadhammā pana saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikehi saddhiṃ sadisavissajjanattā ekato gahitā.
atk-abh03a:36_7: evaṃ sabbatikadukapadesu yaṃ yaṃ padaṃ yena yena padena saddhiṃ sadisavissajjanaṃ hoti,
atk-abh03a:36_8: taṃ taṃ uppaṭipāṭiyāpi tena tena saddhiṃ gahetvā vissajjitaṃ.
atk-abh03a:39_1: Idāni saṅgahitena asaṅgahitapadaṃ bhājetuṃ cakkhāyatanenātiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh03a:39_3: imasmiñhi vāre yaṃ khandhapadena saṅgahitaṃ hutvā āyatanadhātupadehi asaṅgahitaṃ,
atk-abh03a:39_4: khandhāyatanapadehi vā saṅgahitaṃ hutvā dhātupadena asaṅgahitaṃ,
atk-abh03a:39_5: tassa khandhādīhi asaṅgahaṃ pucchitvā vissajjanaṃ kataṃ.
atk-abh03a:39_8: So ca aḍḍhekādasahi āyatanadhātūhi asaṅgahito nāma natthi.
atk-abh03a:39_11: Evaṃ asaṅgahitatāya abhāvato etāni aññāni ca evarūpāni manāyatanadhammāyatanādīni padāni imasmiṃ vāre na gahitāni.
atk-abh03a:39_12: Yāni pana padāni rūpekadesaṃ arūpena asammissaṃ,
atk-abh03a:44_2: Pañhavasena hi imasmiṃ vāre āyatanadhātuvaseneva sadisavissajjane vīsati dhamme samodhānetvā eko pañho kato,
atk-abh03a:44_9: sappaṭighehi ca upādādhammehi ca ekoti aṭṭha pañhā katā.
atk-abh03a:44_13: aṭṭhahi dhātūhīti cakkhudhātuādīsu ekekāya saddhiṃ sattahi viññāṇadhātūhi.
atk-abh03a:45_2: Tasmiṃ saṅgahite rūpakkhandhe āyatanasaṅgahena cakkhāyatanamevekaṃ saṅgahitaṃ.
atk-abh03a:45_9: tā cakkhudhātuyā ceva sattahi ca viññāṇadhātūhi asaṅgahitāti.
atk-abh03a:46_2: yasmā yāya kāyaci viññāṇadhātuyā saṅgahito viññāṇakkhandho manāyatanena asaṅgahito nāma natthi,
atk-abh03a:46_4: Ettha pana catūhi khandhehīti rūpādīhi catūhi.
atk-abh03a:46_6: Dvādasahi dhātūhīti yathānurūpā cha viññāṇadhātuyo apanetvā sesāhi dvādasahi.
atk-abh03a:47_3: Itthindriyapurisindriyesu pana dhammāyatanena saddhiṃ dve āyatanāni,
atk-abh03a:47_4: dhammadhātuyā ca saddhiṃ aṭṭha dhātuyo veditabbā.
atk-abh03a:48_3: Tesu hi bhavesu rūpāyatanadhammāyatanavasena dveva āyatanāni tehi saṅgahitāni.
atk-abh03a:48_4: Sesāni nava rūpāyatanāni teheva ca dvīhi,
atk-abh03a:48_5: manāyatanena cāti tīhi asaṅgahitāni nāma honti.
atk-abh03a:48_6: Navahi dhātūhīti rūpadhātudhammadhātūhi saddhiṃ sattahi viññāṇadhātūhi.
atk-abh03a:49_4: Dhātuyopi tesaṃyeva ekekena saddhiṃ satta viññāṇadhātuyo veditabbā.
atk-abh03a:50_4: Anidassanasappaṭighā hi dhammā nāma nava oḷārikāyatanāni.
atk-abh03a:50_8: Dhātusaṅgahenapi tā eva nava dhātuyo saṅgahitā.
atk-abh03a:50_10: Iti yāni tehi asaṅgahitāni dve āyatanāni,
atk-abh03a:50_15: sattahi ca viññāṇadhātūhīti soḷasahi asaṅgahitāti veditabbā.
atk-abh03a:51_3: Aṭṭhahi dhātūhīti rūpadhātuyā saddhiṃ sattahi viññāṇadhātūhi.
atk-abh03a:55_3: imasmiñhi vāre yaṃ khandhapadena asaṅgahitaṃ hutvā āyatanadhātupadehi saṅgahitaṃ,
atk-abh03a:55_4: tassa khandhādīhi saṅgahaṃ pucchitvā vissajjanaṃ kataṃ.
atk-abh03a:55_6: Rūpakkhandhena hi cattāro khandhā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā.
atk-abh03a:55_7: Tesu tena ekadhammopi āyatanadhātusaṅgahena saṅgahito nāma natthi.
atk-abh03a:55_15: Tesu tena ekopi āyatanadhātusaṅgahena saṅgahito nāma natthi.
atk-abh03a:55_16: Evaṃ saṅgahitatāya abhāvato etāni aññāni ca evarūpāni cakkhāyatanādīni padāni imasmiṃ vāre na gahitāni.
atk-abh03a:55_17: Yāni pana padāni viññāṇena vā oḷārikarūpena vā asammissaṃ dhammāyatanekadesaṃ dīpenti,
atk-abh03a:56_0: “Tayo khandhā tathā saccā, indriyāni ca soḷasa;
atk-abh03a:60_0: Etesu pana padesu sadisavissajjanāni padāni ekato katvā sabbepi dvādasa pañhā vuttā.
atk-abh03a:61_1: vedanākkhandhena hi nibbānañca sukhumarūpasaññāsaṅkhārā ca khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā hutvā āyatanadhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā.
atk-abh03a:61_9: Saññākkhandhapakkhe panettha saññaṃ apanetvā vedanāya saddhiṃ tayo khandhā saṅkhārādīsu saṅkhārakkhandhaṃ
atk-abh03a:62_2: Te hi nirodhena khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā hutvā āyatanadhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā.
atk-abh03a:63_2: Rūpārūpajīvitindriyena hi vedanāsaññāviññāṇakkhandhā ca khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā.
atk-abh03a:65_2: Jhānena pana nibbānaṃ sukhumarūpaṃ saññā ca khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā hutvā āyatanadhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā.
atk-abh03a:65_3: Tasmā taṃ sandhāya rūpakkhandhasaññākkhandhānaṃ vasena dve khandhā veditabbā.
atk-abh03a:69_2: Tattha yaṃ khandhādīhi saṅgahitena khandhādivasena saṅgahitaṃ,
atk-abh03a:69_3: puna tasseva khandhādīhi saṅgahaṃ pucchitvā vissajjanaṃ kataṃ.
atk-abh03a:69_4: Taṃ khandhāyatanadhātūsu ekampi sakalakoṭṭhāsaṃ gahetvā ṭhitapadesu na yujjati.
atk-abh03a:69_5: Sakalena hi khandhādipadena aññaṃ khandhādivasena saṅgahitaṃ nāma natthi,
atk-abh03a:69_6: yaṃ attano saṅgāhakaṃ saṅgaṇhitvā puna teneva saṅgahaṃ gaccheyya.
atk-abh03a:69_7: Tasmā tathārūpāni padāni imasmiṃ vāre na gahitāni.
atk-abh03a:69_8: Yāni pana padāni saṅkhārekadesaṃ vā aññena asammissaṃ dīpenti –
atk-abh03a:69_9: vedanekadesaṃ vā sukhumarūpaṃ vā saddekadesaṃ vā,
atk-abh03a:72_3: te dhamme sandhāya sabbattha ekena khandhenātiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:72_5: samudayasaccena hi taṇhāvajjā sesā saṅkhārā khandhādisaṅgahena saṅgahitā.
atk-abh03a:72_7: Sā taṇhā puna saṅkhāreheva khandhādisaṅgahena saṅgahitāti.
atk-abh03a:72_9: Arūpadhammapucchāsu panettha saṅkhārakkhandho vā vedanākkhandho vā eko khandho nāma.
atk-abh03a:75_1: Idāni asaṅgahitena asaṅgahitapadaṃ bhājetuṃ rūpakkhandhenātiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh03a:75_2: Tattha yaṃ khandhādīhi asaṅgahitena khandhādivasena asaṅgahitaṃ,
atk-abh03a:75_3: puna tasseva khandhādīhi asaṅgahaṃ pucchitvā vissajjanaṃ kataṃ.
atk-abh03a:75_4: Taṃ pañcakkhandhaggāhakesu dukkhasaccādīsu viññāṇena saddhiṃ sukhumarūpaggāhakesu anidassanaappaṭighādīsu ca padesu na yujjati.
atk-abh03a:75_5: Tādisena hi padena nibbānaṃ khandhasaṅgahamattaṃ na gaccheyya.
atk-abh03a:75_7: Tasmā tathārūpāni padāni imasmiṃ vāre na gahitāni.
atk-abh03a:75_8: Yāni pana pañcakkhandhe viññāṇañca sukhumarūpena saddhiṃ ekato na dīpenti,
atk-abh03a:79_0: Gocchake sattati dve ca, satta cūḷantare padā.
atk-abh03a:81_0: Aṭṭhāraseva ñātabbā, sesā idha na bhāsitā”ti.
atk-abh03a:82_0: Pañhā panettha sadisavissajjanānaṃ vasena samodhānetvā katihi saddhiṃ sabbepi catuttiṃsa honti.
atk-abh03a:82_3: te dhamme sandhāya ekena khandhenātiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:83_1: rūpakkhandhena hi cattāro khandhā nibbānañca khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā.
atk-abh03a:83_2: Āyatanadhātusaṅgahena pana ṭhapetvā viññāṇaṃ avasesā saṅgahitāti viññāṇameva tīhipi khandhasaṅgahādīhi asaṅgahitaṃ nāma.
atk-abh03a:83_3: Puna tena viññāṇena saddhiṃ nibbānena cattāro khandhā khandhādisaṅgahena asaṅgahitā.
atk-abh03a:83_4: Te sabbepi puna viññāṇeneva khandhādisaṅgahena asaṅgahitāti ekena khandhena,
atk-abh03a:83_6: sattahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā nāma honti. Atha vā –
atk-abh03a:83_7: yadetaṃ rūpakkhandhena viññāṇameva tīhi khandhādisaṅgahehi asaṅgahitaṃ,
atk-abh03a:83_8: tehipi viññāṇadhammehi te rūpadhammāva tīhi saṅgahehi asaṅgahitā.
atk-abh03a:83_9: Puna te rūpadhammā viññāṇeneva tīhi saṅgahehi asaṅgahitā.
atk-abh03a:83_14: Iminā upāyena sabbattha yaṃ pucchāya uddhaṭaṃ padaṃ,
atk-abh03a:83_20: Te ca dve khandhā ekādasāyatanāni sattarasa dhātuyo honti.
atk-abh03a:84_0: 195. Tatiyapañhe – viññāṇaṃ rūpādīhi catūhi asaṅgahitanti tesaṃ vasena khandhādayo veditabbā.
atk-abh03a:85_2: cakkhāyatanaṃ vedanādīhi catūhīti iminā nayena sabbattha khandhādayo veditabbā.
atk-abh03a:85_4: rūpañca dhammāyatananti uddānagāthāya dassitadhammāyeva aññenākārena saṅkhipitvā dassitāti.
atk-abh03a:88_2: Tattha yaṃ labbhati yañca na labbhati taṃ sabbaṃ pucchāya gahitaṃ.
atk-abh03a:88_7: sabhāgo visabhāgoti hi vacanato catūhi arūpakkhandheheva sabhāgānaṃ ekasantānasmiṃ ekakkhaṇe uppannānaṃ
atk-abh03a:88_10: nibbānassa ca rūpena saddhiṃ sampayogo nāma natthi.
atk-abh03a:88_14: evaṃ bhinnasantānehi nānākkhaṇikehi arūpadhammehipi saddhiṃ natthiyeva.
atk-abh03a:88_16: Ayaṃ pana visabhāgatā saṅgahaṭṭhena virujjhanato saṅgahanaye natthi.
atk-abh03a:88_20: Evamettha yassa ekadhammenapi sampayogalakkhaṇaṃ na yujjhati,
atk-abh03a:88_21: tassa pucchāya saṅgahaṃ katvāpi natthīti paṭikkhepo kato.
atk-abh03a:88_24: Yāni pana padāni sattasu viññāṇadhātūsu ekāyapi avippayutte rūpena nibbānena vā missakadhamme dīpenti,
atk-abh03a:88_25: tāni sabbathāpi idha na yujjantīti na gahitāni.
atk-abh03a:92_0: Gocchakesu ca paññāsa, aṭṭha cūḷantare padā.
atk-abh03a:94_0: Tevīsa padasataṃ etaṃ, sampayoge na labbhatī”ti.
atk-abh03a:95_0: Dhammāyatanañhi rūpanibbānamissakattā tasmiṃ apariyāpannena viññāṇenapi na sakkā sampayuttanti vattuṃ.
atk-abh03a:95_4: Evaṃ sabbatthāpi etāni na yujjantīti idha na gahitāni.
atk-abh03a:95_5: Sesāni khandhādīni yujjantīti tāni gahetvā ekekavasena ca samodhānena ca pañhavissajjanaṃ kataṃ.
atk-abh03a:96_5: Evaṃ sabbattha rūpassa vippayoge dhammāyatanadhammadhātūsu arūpaṃ,
atk-abh03a:97_5: Ādipañhasmiñhi sarūpato dassetvā parato pāḷi saṃkhittā.
atk-abh03a:98_1: Soḷasahi dhātūhīti cakkhuviññāṇadhātu tāva attānaṃ ṭhapetvā chahi viññāṇadhātūhi,
atk-abh03a:99_7: Etesu hi taṃ saccadvayaṃ kehici sampayuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:101_2: sabbesampi arūpakkhandhānaṃ arūpāyatanānañca atthitāya na kehicīti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:101_3: Ghānajivhākāyaviññāṇadhātūnaṃ pana natthitāya tīhi dhātūhi vippayuttoti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:103_0: 257. Kusalapañhe – kusalehi catunnampi khandhānaṃ gahitattā sampayogo paṭikkhitto.
atk-abh03a:105_12: pīti ca pītiyā na sampayuttāti saṅkhārakkhandhadhammāyatanadhammadhātūsu kehici sampayuttā nāma.
atk-abh03a:106_3: Kehicīti ye tattha parittārammaṇā na honti, tehi.
atk-abh03a:106_4: Dhammadhātu pana parittārammaṇānaṃ channaṃ cittuppādānaṃ vasena catūhi khandhehi saṅgahitattā paṭhamapaṭikkhepameva bhajati.
atk-abh03a:107_7: Sahetukā ceva na ca hetūpi pītisahagatasadisāva.
atk-abh03a:110_3: imasmiñhi vāre pucchāya uddhaṭapadena ye dhammā sampayuttā,
atk-abh03a:110_5: tesaṃ khandhādīhi vippayogaṃ pucchitvā vissajjanaṃ kataṃ.
atk-abh03a:110_8: Tasmā tañca aññāni ca evarūpāni padāni imasmiṃ vāre na gahitāni.
atk-abh03a:110_9: Yāni pana padāni dhammadhātuyā sampayutte dhamme viññāṇañca aññena asammissaṃ dīpenti,
atk-abh03a:117_3: tāni uppaṭipāṭiyāpi samodhānetvā tattha vedanākkhandhādikā pañhā katā.
atk-abh03a:117_10: te dhammā na kehicīti te pucchāya uddhaṭapadaṃ viññāṇadhātuṃ ṭhapetvā sesā cha viññāṇadhātudhammā, rūpaṃ,
atk-abh03a:117_12: Tehi sabbesaṃ khandhāyatanānaṃ saṅgahitattā na kehici khandhehi āyatanehi vā vippayuttā.
atk-abh03a:117_13: Ekāya dhātuyāti yā yā pucchāya uddhaṭā hoti tāya tāya.
atk-abh03a:118_3: Iminā nayena sabbattha pucchāya uddhaṭapadeneva saddhiṃ vippayuttānaṃ vasena attho veditabboti.
atk-abh03a:121_3: Rūpakkhandhena hi vippayuttā nāma cattāro khandhā,
atk-abh03a:121_9: Iti pucchāya moghattā sabbavissajjanesu natthi natthiicceva vuttanti.
atk-abh03a:124_3: puna tasseva khandhādīhi sampayogaṃ pucchitvā vissajjanaṃ kataṃ.
atk-abh03a:124_4: Taṃ rūpena vā rūpamissakehi vā sabbarūpakkhandhasaṅgāhakehi vā padehi saddhiṃ na yujjati.
atk-abh03a:124_5: Rūpena hi rūpamissakena vā aññesaṃ sampayogo natthi.
atk-abh03a:124_6: Sabbarūpakkhandhasaṅgāhakehi sabbesaṃ sampayogārahānaṃ khandhādīnaṃ gahitattā aññaṃyeva natthi,
atk-abh03a:124_8: Tasmā tathārūpāni padāni idha na gahitāni.
atk-abh03a:124_9: Yāni pana padāni rūpena asammissaṃ arūpekadesaṃ dīpenti,
atk-abh03a:131_0: Sabbapañhesu pana ye dhammā pucchāya uddhaṭā,
atk-abh03a:131_3: Vedanākkhandhena hi itare tayo khandhā sampayuttā,
atk-abh03a:134_2: Tattha ye sampayogavippayogapadaniddese rūpakkhandhādayo dhammā uddhaṭā,
atk-abh03a:134_4: Sadisavissajjanānaṃ pana ekato gahitattā padāni aññāya paṭipāṭiyā āgatāni.
atk-abh03a:137_2: Tattha ye saṅgahitenasaṅgahitapadaniddese samudayasaccādayova dhammā uddhaṭā,
atk-abh03a:137_4: Sadisavissajjanānaṃ pana ekato gahitattā padāni aññāya paṭipāṭiyā āgatāni.
atk-abh03a:137_5: Tattha ye dhammā pucchāya uddhaṭapadena khandhādisaṅgahena saṅgahitā,
atk-abh03a:137_6: tesaṃ yehi sampayogo vā vippayogo vā hoti,
atk-abh03a:138_1: samudayasaccena tāva saṅkhārakkhandhapariyāpannā dhammā khandhādisaṅgahena saṅgahitā.
atk-abh03a:138_5: saṅkhārakkhandhe dhammāyatanadhammadhātūsu ca ṭhapetvā taṇhaṃ sesehi sampayuttattā kehici sampayuttā nāma.
atk-abh03a:141_2: Tattha ye sampayuttenasampayuttapadaniddese vedanākkhandhādayo dhammā uddhaṭā,
atk-abh03a:141_4: Tattha ye dhammā pucchāya uddhaṭapadena sampayuttā,
atk-abh03a:141_5: tesaṃ yehi saṅgaho vā asaṅgaho vā hoti,
atk-abh03a:142_5: sattahi ca viññāṇadhātūhīti aṭṭhahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā,
atk-abh03a:145_2: Tattha ye pañcame asaṅgahitenaasaṅgahitapadaniddese rūpakkhandhena sadisapañhā dhammā,
atk-abh03a:145_5: Sesā pana na ruhantīti na uddhaṭā.
atk-abh03a:145_6: Vedanākkhandhena hi khandhādivasena pana rūpārūpadhammā asaṅgahitā honti.
atk-abh03a:145_10: Tattha ye dhammā pucchāya uddhaṭadhammehi khandhādivasena asaṅgahitā,
atk-abh03a:145_11: te yehi sampayuttā ca vippayuttā ca,
atk-abh03a:146_1: rūpakkhandhena tāva viññāṇameva tīhi saṅgahehi asaṅgahitaṃ.
atk-abh03a:146_7: Taṃ sandhāya te dhammā tīhi khandhehītiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:149_2: Tattha yesaṃ padānaṃ vippayogo na ruhati,
atk-abh03a:149_6: Dhammāyatanassa hi khandhādīsu ekenāpi vippayogo na ruhati.
atk-abh03a:155_0: Cha padāni tato uddhaṃ sabbānipi samāsato;
atk-abh03a:156_0: Padāni ca na labbhanti, cattālīsañca satta cā”ti.
atk-abh03a:157_1: dhammāyatanaṃ dhammadhātūti gāthāpi imamevatthaṃ dīpetuṃ vuttā.
atk-abh03a:157_2: Imāni pana ṭhapetvā sesāni sabbānipi labbhanti.
atk-abh03a:164_0: Ñātuṃ sabbepi nayā, saṅkhepakathāva iti vuttā.
atk-abh03a:165_0: Ekekassa pana sace, padassa vitthārameva bhāseyyaṃ;
atk-abh03a:166_0: Vacanañca ativiya bahuṃ, bhaveyya attho ca aviseso.
atk-abh03a:167_0: Iti ūnabhāṇavāradvayāya, yaṃ tantiyā mayā etaṃ;
atk-abh03a:168_0: Kurunā pattaṃ puññaṃ, sukhāya taṃ hotu lokassāti.
atk-abh03a:178_0: Tasmā naṃ vaṇṇayissāmi, taṃ suṇātha samāhitāti.
atk-abh03a:180_5: Tena ye dhamme idha paññapetukāmo tesaṃ gaṇanavasena saṃkhepato paññattiparicchedaṃ dasseti.
atk-abh03a:180_7: Tattha “ācikkhati deseti paññapeti paṭṭhapetī”ti āgataṭṭhāne paññāpanā dassanā pakāsanā paññatti nāma.
atk-abh03a:180_8: “Supaññattaṃ mañcapīṭha”nti āgataṭṭhāne ṭhapanā nikkhipanā paññatti nāma.
atk-abh03a:180_13: Nāmapaññatti hi te te dhamme dassetipi,
atk-abh03a:181_0: Khandhapaññattītiādi pana saṃkhepato tāsaṃ paññattīnaṃ sarūpadassanaṃ.
atk-abh03a:181_1: Tattha khandhānaṃ ‘khandhā’ti paññāpanā dassanā pakāsanā ṭhapanā nikkhipanā khandhapaññatti nāma.
atk-abh03a:181_6: puggalānaṃ puggalāti paññāpanā dassanā pakāsanā ṭhapanā nikkhipanā puggalapaññatti nāma.
atk-abh03a:182_0: Pāḷimuttakena pana aṭṭhakathānayena aparāpi cha paññattiyo –
atk-abh03a:182_7: Tattha kusalākusalasseva saccikaṭṭhaparamatthavasena vijjamānassa sato sambhūtassa dhammassa paññāpanā vijjamānapaññatti nāma.
atk-abh03a:182_8: Tathā avijjamānassa lokaniruttimattasiddhassa itthipurisādikassa paññāpanā avijjamānapaññatti nāma.
atk-abh03a:182_9: Sabbākārenapi anupalabbhaneyyassa vācāvatthumattasseva pañcamasaccādikassa titthiyānaṃ aṇupakatipurisādikassa vā paññāpanāpi avijjamānapaññattiyeva.
atk-abh03a:182_10: Sā pana sāsanāvacarā na hotīti idha na gahitā.
atk-abh03a:182_11: Iti imesaṃ vijjamānāvijjamānānaṃ vikappanavasena sesā veditabbā.
atk-abh03a:182_13: ‘chaḷabhiñño’tiādīsu hi tisso vijjā cha abhiññā ca vijjamānā,
atk-abh03a:182_16: cha abhiññā assāti chaḷabhiññoti evaṃ vijjamānena avijjamānassa paññāpanato evarūpā vijjamānena avijjamānapaññatti nāma.
atk-abh03a:182_21: purisassa rūpaṃ purisarūpanti evaṃ avijjamānena vijjamānassa paññāpanato evarūpā avijjamānena vijjamānapaññatti nāma.
atk-abh03a:182_26: cakkhussa vā phalabhūto samphasso cakkhusamphassoti evaṃ vijjamānena vijjamānassa paññāpanato evarūpā vijjamānena vijjamānapaññatti nāma.
atk-abh03a:182_30: Tasmā khattiyassa putto khattiyaputtoti evaṃ avijjamānena avijjamānassa paññāpanato evarūpā avijjamānena avijjamānapaññatti nāma.
atk-abh03a:182_31: Tāsu imasmiṃ pakaraṇe purimā tissova paññattiyo labbhanti.
atk-abh03a:182_33: indriyapaññattī”ti imasmiñhi ṭhāne vijjamānasseva paññāpitattā vijjamānapaññatti labbhati.
atk-abh03a:183_0: Aṭṭhakathāmuttakena pana ācariyanayena aparāpi cha paññattiyo –
atk-abh03a:183_7: Tattha yo rūpavedanādīhi ekattena vā aññattena vā rūpavedanādayo viya saccikaṭṭhaparamatthena anupalabbhasabhāvopi
atk-abh03a:183_8: rūpavedanādibhede khandhe upādāya nissāya kāraṇaṃ katvā sammato satto.
atk-abh03a:183_9: Tāni tāni aṅgāni upādāya ratho gehaṃ muṭṭhi uddhananti ca;
atk-abh03a:183_10: te teyeva rūpādayo upādāya ghaṭo paṭo;
atk-abh03a:183_12: taṃ taṃ bhūtanimittañceva bhāvanānisaṃsañca upādāya nissāya kāraṇaṃ katvā sammataṃ tena tenākārena upaṭṭhitaṃ
atk-abh03a:183_13: uggahanimittaṃ paṭibhāganimittanti ayaṃ evarūpā upādāpaññatti nāma.
atk-abh03a:185_0: Tattha dutiyaṃ tatiyantiādikāva tadaññaṃ apekkhitvā vuttatāya tadaññāpekkhūpanidhā nāma.
atk-abh03a:185_2: satthapāṇītiādikā hatthagataṃ upanidhāya vuttatāya hatthagatūpanidhā nāma. Kuṇḍalī, sikharī,
atk-abh03a:185_3: kiriṭītiādikā sampayuttaṃ upanidhāya vuttatāya sampayuttūpanidhā nāma.
atk-abh03a:185_5: sappikumbhotiādikā samāropitaṃ upanidhāya vuttatāya samāropitūpanidhā nāma.
atk-abh03a:185_8: serīsakantiādikā avidūragataṃ upanidhāya vuttatāya avidūragatūpanidhā nāma.
atk-abh03a:185_10: usabhagāmītiādikā paṭibhāgaṃ upanidhāya vuttatāya paṭibhāgūpanidhā nāma.
atk-abh03a:185_12: brāhmaṇagāmotiādikā tabbahulaṃ upanidhāya vuttatāya tabbahulūpanidhā nāma.
atk-abh03a:185_14: vajirakaṭakantiādikā tabbisiṭṭhaṃ upanidhāya vuttatāya tabbisiṭṭhūpanidhā nāma.
atk-abh03a:186_0: Yā pana tesaṃ tesaṃ samodhānamapekkhitvā tidaṇḍaṃ,
atk-abh03a:186_5: Yā purimassa purimassa upanikkhipitvā dve, tīṇi,
atk-abh03a:186_8: Yā taṃ taṃ dhammasabhāvaṃ apekkhitvā pathavī, tejo,
atk-abh03a:187_8: dhammakathikotiādikā kiccavasena paññāpanā kiccapaññatti nāma. Kiso, thūlo,
atk-abh03a:187_10: caturassotiādikā saṇṭhānavasena paññāpanā saṇṭhānapaññatti nāma. Itthī,
atk-abh03a:187_15: mādhurātiādikā bhūmivasena paññāpanā bhūmipaññatti nāma. Tisso, nāgo,
atk-abh03a:187_16: sumanotiādikā paccattanāmakaraṇamattavasena paññāpanā paccattapaññatti nāma. Nirodho,
atk-abh03a:187_18: Tattha ekaccā bhūmipaññatti asaṅkhatapaññatti ca vijjamānapaññattiyeva,
atk-abh03a:188_1: Idāni yāsaṃ paññattīnaṃ uddesavāre saṅkhepato sarūpadassanaṃ kataṃ,
atk-abh03a:188_2: saṅkhepatoyeva tāva tāsaṃ vatthuṃ vibhajitvā dassanavasena tā dassetuṃ kittāvatātiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:188_4: yā ayaṃ khandhānaṃ ‘khandhā’ti paññāpanā, dassanā, ṭhapanā,
atk-abh03a:188_8: yattakena paññāpanena saṅkhepato pañcakkhandhāti vā pabhedato “rūpakkhandho…pe…
atk-abh03a:188_11: sesā catubhūmikāti vā evarūpaṃ paññāpanaṃ hoti;
atk-abh03a:189_1: Tathā yattakena paññāpanena saṅkhepato dvādasāyatanānīti vā,
atk-abh03a:190_1: Yattakena paññāpanena saṅkhepato aṭṭhārasa dhātuyoti vā,
atk-abh03a:190_5: dve dhātuyo catubhūmikāti vā evarūpaṃ paññāpanaṃ hoti;
atk-abh03a:191_1: Yattakena paññāpanena saṅkhepato cattāri saccānīti vā,
atk-abh03a:191_5: dve saccā lokuttarāti vā evarūpaṃ paññāpanaṃ hoti;
atk-abh03a:192_6: tīṇi indriyāni lokuttarānīti vā evarūpaṃ paññāpanaṃ hoti;
atk-abh03a:192_8: Ettāvatā saṅkhepato vatthuṃ vibhajitvā dassanavasena pañca paññattiyo dassitā honti.
atk-abh03a:193_1: Idāni vitthārato vatthuṃ vibhajitvā dassanavasena puggalapaññattiṃ dassetuṃ samayavimutto asamayavimuttotiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:193_4: heṭṭhā vibhaṅgappakaraṇe imāsaṃ pañcannaṃ paññattīnaṃ vatthubhūtā khandhādayo nippadesena kathitāti tena te idha ekadeseneva kathesi.
atk-abh03a:193_7: tasmā taṃ vitthārato kathetukāmo samayavimutto asamayavimuttoti ekakato paṭṭhāya yāva dasakā mātikaṃ ṭhapesīti.
atk-abh03a:197_1: Idāni yathāṭhapitaṃ mātikaṃ ādito paṭṭhāya vibhajitvā dassetuṃ –
atk-abh03a:197_5: Kālena kālanti ettha bhummavasena attho veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:197_12: Katamasmiṃ panesa kāle vimokkhe phusitvā viharatīti?
atk-abh03a:197_13: Samāpattiṃ samāpajjitukāmassa hi kālo nāma atthi,
atk-abh03a:197_17: Sarīraṃ pana paṭijaggitvā vattaṃ katvā vasanaṭṭhānaṃ pavisitvā nisinnassa yāva piṇḍāya gamanakālo nāgacchati,
atk-abh03a:198_0: Piṇḍāya gamanakālaṃ pana sallakkhetvā nikkhantassa cetiyavandanakālo,
atk-abh03a:198_1: bhikkhusaṅghaparivutassa vitakkamāḷake ṭhānakālo piṇḍāya gamanakālo gāme caraṇakālo;
atk-abh03a:198_2: āsanasālāya yāgupānakālo vattakaraṇakāloti ayampi samāpajjanassa akālo nāma.
atk-abh03a:198_3: Āsanasālāya pana vivitte okāse sati yāva bhattakālo nāgacchati,
atk-abh03a:198_9: paripucchādānakāloti ayampi samāpajjanassa akālo nāma. Yo akālo,
atk-abh03a:198_11: Taṃ sabbampi ṭhapetvā avasese kāle kāle,
atk-abh03a:198_12: samaye samaye vuttappakāre aṭṭha vimokkhe sahajātanāmakāyena paṭilabhitvā viharanto,
atk-abh03a:199_0: Apicesa saphassakehi sahajātanāmadhammehi sahajātadhamme phusatiyeva nāma,
atk-abh03a:199_3: Yena hi saddhiṃ ye dhammā sahajātā,
atk-abh03a:199_8: Tatrāssa evaṃ sahajātehi sahajātānaṃ phusanā veditabbā –
atk-abh03a:199_10: Tasmiṃ ṭhapetvā tāni aṅgāni sesā atirekapaṇṇāsadhammā cattāro khandhā nāma honti.
atk-abh03a:199_11: Tena nāmakāyena paṭhamajjhānasamāpattivimokkhaṃ phusitvā paṭilabhitvā viharati.
atk-abh03a:199_17: Tattha ṭhapetvā tāni aṅgāni sesā atirekapaṇṇāsadhammā cattāro khandhā nāma honti.
atk-abh03a:199_18: Tena nāmakāyena nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpattivimokkhaṃ phusitvā paṭilabhitvā viharati.
atk-abh03a:200_2: Ekacce āsavā parikkhīṇā hontīti upaḍḍhupaḍḍhā paṭhamamaggādivajjhā āsavā parikkhīṇā honti.
atk-abh03a:200_3: Ayaṃ vuccati puggalo samayavimuttoti ettha aṭṭhasamāpattilābhī puthujjano tena nāmakāyena phusitvā viharatīti vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-abh03a:200_5: Puthujjanassa ca khīṇā āsavā nāma natthi,
atk-abh03a:200_7: Aṭṭhasamāpattilābhī khīṇāsavopi tena nāmakāyena phusitvā viharatīti vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-abh03a:200_10: Samayavimuttoti pana tiṇṇaṃ sotāpannasakadāgāmianāgāmīnaṃyevetaṃ nāmanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh03a:201_4: Sukkhavipassakā pana sotāpannasakadāgāmianāgāmino aṭṭhasamāpattilābhino ca khīṇāsavā puthujjanā ca imasmiṃ duke na labbhanti,
atk-abh03a:201_6: Tasmā satthā attano buddhasubuddhatāya heṭṭhā gahite ca aggahite ca saṅkaḍḍhitvā saddhiṃ piṭṭhivaṭṭakehi
atk-abh03a:201_8: Tattha ariye vimokkheti kilesehi ārakattā ariyeti saṅkhaṃ gate lokuttaravimokkhe.
atk-abh03a:201_10: bāhirānañhi aṭṭhannaṃ samāpattīnaṃ samāpajjantassa samayopi atthi asamayopi.
atk-abh03a:201_11: Maggavimokkhena vimuccanassa samayo vā asamayo vā natthi.
atk-abh03a:201_14: tassa gacchantassa tiṭṭhantassa nisīdantassa nipajjantassa khādantassa bhuñjantassa maggaphalapaṭivedho nāma na hotīti natthi.
atk-abh03a:201_15: Iti maggavimokkhena vimuccanassa samayo vā asamayo vā natthīti heṭṭhā gahite ca aggahite ca saṅkaḍḍhitvā
atk-abh03a:201_18: Bhajāpiyamāno pana samāpattivikkhambhitānaṃ kilesānaṃ vasena samayavimuttabhāvaṃ bhajeyya.
atk-abh03a:202_5: Tena saddhiṃ pavattānaṃ na vinā rūpārammaṇānaṃ catunnaṃ rūpāvacarajjhānānanti attho.
atk-abh03a:202_8: Arūpena sahagatānaṃ tena saddhiṃ pavattānaṃ na vinā arūpārammaṇānaṃ catunnaṃ arūpāvacarajjhānānanti attho.
atk-abh03a:202_9: Na nikāmalābhīti pañcahākārehi aciṇṇavasitāya icchitākārena aladdhattā na nikāmalābhī.
atk-abh03a:202_12: Yo āgamanamhi kilese vikkhambhento upacāraṃ pāpento appanaṃ pāpento cittamañjūsaṃ labhanto dukkhena kicchena
atk-abh03a:202_13: sasaṅkhārena sappayogena kilamanto taṃ sampadaṃ pāpuṇituṃ sakkoti,
atk-abh03a:202_16: Samāpattiṃ appetvā addhānaṃ pharituṃ na sakkoti.
atk-abh03a:202_17: Ekaṃ dve cittavāre vattetvā sahasāva vuṭṭhātīti attho.
atk-abh03a:203_0: Yatthicchakanti yasmiṃ okāse samāpattiṃ appetvā nisīdituṃ icchati.
atk-abh03a:203_1: Yadicchakanti kasiṇajjhānaṃ vā ānāpānajjhānaṃ vā brahmavihārajjhānaṃ vā asubhajjhānaṃ vāti yaṃ yaṃ samāpattiṃ appetvā nisīdituṃ icchati.
atk-abh03a:203_4: yattha yattha yaṃ yaṃ samāpattiṃ yattakaṃ addhānaṃ samāpajjitumpi vuṭṭhātumpi icchati,
atk-abh03a:203_5: tattha tattha taṃ taṃ samāpattiṃ tattakaṃ addhānaṃ samāpajjitumpi vuṭṭhātumpi na sakkoti.
atk-abh03a:203_6: Candaṃ vā sūriyaṃ vā ulloketvā ‘imasmiṃ cande vā sūriye vā ettakaṃ ṭhānaṃ gate vuṭṭhahissāmī’ti paricchinditvā
atk-abh03a:203_7: jhānaṃ samāpanno yathāparicchedena vuṭṭhātuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-abh03a:204_1: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ evaṃvidho puggalo kuppadhammoti vuccati.
atk-abh03a:204_2: Idaṃ pana aṭṭhasamāpattilābhino puthujjanassa sotāpannassa sakadāgāminoti tiṇṇaṃ puggalānaṃ nāmaṃ.
atk-abh03a:204_3: Etesañhi samādhipāribandhakā vipassanāpāribandhakā ca dhammā na suvikkhambhitā,
atk-abh03a:204_8: Na garukamokkhadhammo panesa appamattakenapi kiccakaraṇīyena vā vattabhedamattakena vā nassati.
atk-abh03a:205_2: Tasmiṃ piṇḍāya gāmaṃ paviṭṭhe dārakā pariveṇe kīḷitvā pakkamiṃsu.
atk-abh03a:205_3: Thero āgantvā ‘pariveṇaṃ sammajjitabba’nti cintetvā asammajjitvā vihāraṃ pavisitvā ‘samāpattiṃ appessāmī’ti nisīdi.
atk-abh03a:205_5: ‘kiṃ nu kho āvaraṇa’nti sīlaṃ āvajjanto appamattakampi vītikkamaṃ adisvā ‘vattabhedo nu kho atthī’ti
atk-abh03a:205_6: olokento pariveṇassa asammaṭṭhabhāvaṃ ñatvā sammajjitvā pavisitvā nisīdanto samāpattiṃ appentova nisīdi.
atk-abh03a:206_2: Akuppadhammoti idaṃ pana aṭṭhasamāpattilābhino anāgāmissa ceva khīṇāsavassa cāti dvinnaṃ puggalānaṃ nāmaṃ.
atk-abh03a:206_3: Tesañhi samādhipāribandhakā vipassanāpāribandhakā ca dhammā suvikkhambhitā suvikkhālitā;
atk-abh03a:206_4: tena tesaṃ bhassasaṅgaṇikārāmādikiccena vā aññena vā yena kenaci attano anurūpena pamādena vītināmentānampi samāpatti na kuppati,
atk-abh03a:206_6: Sukkhavipassakā pana sotāpannasakadāgāmianāgāmikhīṇāsavā imasmiṃ duke na labbhanti;
atk-abh03a:206_8: Tasmā satthā attano buddhasubuddhatāya heṭṭhā gahite ca aggahite ca saṅkaḍḍhitvā imasmimpi duke saddhiṃ
atk-abh03a:206_11: lokuttaradhammassa pana sakiṃ paṭividdhassa kuppanaṃ nassanaṃ nāma natthi,
atk-abh03a:207_2: Kevalañhi idha puggalassa pamādaṃ paṭicca dhammānaṃ parihānampi aparihānampi gahitanti idaṃ pariyāyadesanāmattameva nānaṃ.
atk-abh03a:209_3: Sace anurakkhatīti sace anupakāradhamme pahāya upakāradhamme sevanto samāpajjati.
atk-abh03a:210_0: Ime dvepi samāpattiṃ ṭhapetuṃ thāvaraṃ kātuṃ paṭibalā.
atk-abh03a:210_2: Cetanābhabbo hi upakārānupakāre dhamme na jānāti.
atk-abh03a:210_9: So te sevanto samāpattito na parihāyati.
atk-abh03a:211_0: Yathā hi dve khettapālā eko paṇḍurogena sarogo akkhamo sītādīnaṃ,
atk-abh03a:211_4: Tassa divā sukamorādayo khettaṃ otaritvā sālisīsaṃ khādanti,
atk-abh03a:211_5: rattiṃ migasūkarādayo pavisitvā khalaṃ tacchi taṃ viya chetvā gacchanti.
atk-abh03a:211_6: So attano pamattakāraṇā puna bījamattampi na labhati.
atk-abh03a:211_8: So attano appamattakāraṇā ekakarīsato cattāripi aṭṭhapi sakaṭāni labhati.
atk-abh03a:212_2: Sarogassa attano pamādena puna bījamattassapi alabhanaṃ viya cetanābhabbassa upakārānupakāre dhamme ajānitvā
atk-abh03a:212_3: upakāre pahāya anupakāre sevantassa samāpattiyā parihānaṃ.
atk-abh03a:212_4: Itarassa attano appamādena ekakarīsamattato catuaṭṭhasakaṭauddharaṇaṃ viya anurakkhaṇābhabbassa upakārānupakāre
atk-abh03a:212_5: dhamme jānitvā anupakāre pahāya upakāre sevantassa samāpattiyā aparihānaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh03a:212_6: Evaṃ cetanābhabbato anurakkhaṇābhabbova samāpattiṃ thāvaraṃ kātuṃ balavataroti veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:213_3: Etāni hi phalakkhaṇe pahīnāni nāma honti.
atk-abh03a:213_4: Ayaṃ pana phalakkhaṇepi na hotīti dasseti.
atk-abh03a:213_6: Maggakkhaṇasmiñhi tesaṃ pahānāya paṭipanno nāma hoti.
atk-abh03a:213_8: Ettāvatā vissaṭṭhakammaṭṭhāno thūlabālaputhujjanova idha kathitoti veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:214_2: yesaṃ dhammānanti yesaṃ gotrabhuñāṇena saddhiṃ uppannānaṃ paropaṇṇāsakusaladhammānaṃ.
atk-abh03a:214_4: Avakkanti hotīti okkanti nibbatti pātubhāvo hoti.
atk-abh03a:214_5: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ nibbānārammaṇena ñāṇena sabbaṃ puthujjanasaṅkhaṃ puthujjanagottaṃ puthujjanamaṇḍalaṃ
atk-abh03a:214_6: puthujjanapaññattiṃ atikkamitvā ariyasaṅkhaṃ ariyagottaṃ ariyamaṇḍalaṃ ariyapaññattiṃ okkamanato gotrabhūpuggalo
atk-abh03a:215_3: Sattapi sekkhā puthujjanā ca bhāyitvā pāpato oramanti pāpaṃ na karonti.
atk-abh03a:215_12: tesu dukkhaṃ anubhavanto kathaṃ bhavissasī’ti duggatibhayaṃ bhāyitvā pāpaṃ na karoti.
atk-abh03a:215_16: Tānipi bhāyitvā puthujjano pāpaṃ na karoti.
atk-abh03a:215_17: Sotāpannasakadāgāmianāgāmino pana tayo sekkhā duggatiṃ atītattā sesāni tīṇi bhayāni bhāyitvā pāpaṃ na karonti.
atk-abh03a:215_18: Maggaṭṭhakasekkhā āgamanavasena vā asamucchinnabhayattā vā bhayūparatā nāma honti.
atk-abh03a:215_19: Khīṇāsavo imesu catūsu bhayesu ekampi na bhāyati.
atk-abh03a:215_22: Kiṃ pana so upavādampi na bhāyatīti?
atk-abh03a:216_9: Tesu hi manussā acchandikabhāvaṃ paviṭṭhā nāma.
atk-abh03a:216_14: Okkamitunti etaṃ kusalesu dhammesu sammattasaṅkhātaṃ niyāmaṃ okkamituṃ pavisituṃ tattha patiṭṭhātuṃ abhabbā.
atk-abh03a:217_2: Evamimasmiṃ duke ye ca puggalā pañcānantariyakā,
atk-abh03a:218_4: Sabbepi hete nirayassa atthāya niyatattā niyatā nāma.
atk-abh03a:218_5: Aṭṭha pana ariyapuggalā sammābhāvāya uparūparimaggaphalatthāya ceva anupādāparinibbānatthāya ca niyatattā niyatā nāma.
atk-abh03a:218_7: Yathā ākāse khittadaṇḍo pathaviyaṃ patanto ‘aggena vā majjhena vā mūlena vā patissatī’ti na ñāyati;
atk-abh03a:218_8: evameva ‘asukagatiyā nāma nibbattissantī’ti niyamābhāvā aniyatā nāmāti veditabbā.
atk-abh03a:219_3: Te hi phalatthāya paṭipannattā paṭipannakā nāma.
atk-abh03a:219_5: Phalapaṭilābhato paṭṭhāya hi te phalasamāpattiṃ asamāpannāpi phale ṭhitāyeva nāma.
atk-abh03a:220_5: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ puggalo samasīsī nāma vuccati.
atk-abh03a:220_10: Tattha yo caṅkamantova vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā arahattaṃ patvā caṅkamantova parinibbāti padumatthero viya;
atk-abh03a:220_11: ṭhitakova vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā arahattaṃ patvā ṭhitakova parinibbāti koṭapabbatavihāravāsītissatthero viya;
atk-abh03a:220_12: nisinnova vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā arahattaṃ patvā nisinnova parinibbāti,
atk-abh03a:220_13: nipannova vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā arahattaṃ patvā nipannova parinibbāti –
atk-abh03a:221_0: Yo pana ekaṃ rogaṃ patvā antorogeyeva vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā arahattaṃ patvā teneva rogena parinibbāti –
atk-abh03a:222_17: Avijjāpariyādāyakaṃ cittaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ pariyādātuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-abh03a:222_18: Jīvitindriyapariyādāyakaṃ cittaṃ avijjaṃ pariyādātuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-abh03a:222_21: Yassa cetaṃ sīsadvayaṃ samaṃ pariyādānaṃ gacchati,
atk-abh03a:223_6: arahattamagge cattārīti ekūnavīsatiyā paccavekkhaṇañāṇe patiṭṭhāya bhavaṅgaṃ otaritvā parinibbāyati.
atk-abh03a:223_7: Imāya vārasamatāya idaṃ ubhayasīsapariyādānaṃ samaṃ hoti nāma.
atk-abh03a:224_6: Neva tāvāti yāva esa maggasamaṅgī puggalo sotāpattiphalaṃ na sacchikaroti,
atk-abh03a:224_9: Kappavināso hi nāma mahāvikāro mahāpayogo koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷassa jhāyanavasena mahālokavināso.
atk-abh03a:224_10: Ayampi evaṃ mahāvināso tiṭṭheyya vāti vadati.
atk-abh03a:224_11: Sāsane pana dharamāne ayaṃ kappavināso nāma natthi.
atk-abh03a:224_13: Gatakoṭike hi kāle kappavināso nāma hoti.
atk-abh03a:224_14: Evaṃ santepi satthā antarāyābhāvaṃ dīpetuṃ idaṃ kāraṇaṃ āhari –
atk-abh03a:224_16: maggasamaṅgino pana phalassa antarāyo na sakkā kātu”nti.
atk-abh03a:224_17: Ayaṃ pana puggalo kappaṃ ṭhapento kittakaṃ kālaṃ ṭhapeyyāti?
atk-abh03a:224_25: Imaṃ panatthaṃ bāhirāya āgantukūpamāyapi evaṃ dīpayiṃsu.
atk-abh03a:224_26: Sace hi sotāpattimaggasamaṅgissa matthakūpari yojanikaṃ ekagghanaselaṃ tivaṭṭāya rajjuyā bandhitvā olambeyya,
atk-abh03a:224_29: tasmimpi chinne abbhakūṭaṃ viya ākāse tiṭṭheyya,
atk-abh03a:224_30: na tveva tassa puggalassa maggānantaraphalassa antarāyaṃ kareyyāti.
atk-abh03a:224_33: Na kevalaṃ pana sotāpattimaggaṭṭhova kappaṃ ṭhapeti,
atk-abh03a:224_35: Tena bhagavā heṭṭhā gahitañca aggahitañca sabbaṃ saṅkaḍḍhitvā saddhiṃ piṭṭhivaṭṭakapuggalehi imaṃ tantiṃ āropesi –
atk-abh03a:226_5: Arahatā pana arahattaphalakkhaṇe tisso sikkhā sikkhitā.
atk-abh03a:226_8: Khīṇāsavā aññassa santike sīlādīnaṃ sikkhitattā sikkhitaasekkhā nāma.
atk-abh03a:226_10: Sesapuggalā neva sikkhanti na sikkhitāti nevasekkhānāsekkhā.
atk-abh03a:227_2: paṭhamaṃ pubbenivāsadibbacakkhuñāṇāni nibbattetvā pacchā arahattaṃ pattopi,
atk-abh03a:227_3: paṭhamaṃ arahattaṃ patvā pacchā pubbenivāsadibbacakkhuñāṇanibbattakopi tevijjoyeva nāma.
atk-abh03a:227_4: Suttantakathā pana pariyāyadesanā abhidhammakathā nippariyāyadesanāti imasmiṃ ṭhāne āgamanīyameva dhuraṃ.
atk-abh03a:227_5: Tasmā paṭhamaṃ dve vijjā nibbattetvā pacchā arahattaṃ pattova idha adhippeto.
atk-abh03a:228_2: pubbe ananussutesūti pacchimabhave saccappaṭivedhato pubbe aññassa kassaci santike assutapubbesu.
atk-abh03a:228_3: Tato purimapurimesu pana bhavesu sabbaññubodhisattā buddhasāsane pabbajitvā tīṇi piṭakāni uggahetvā gatapaccāgatavattaṃ
atk-abh03a:228_4: āruyha kammaṭṭhānaṃ anulomaṃ gotrabhuṃ āhacca ṭhapenti.
atk-abh03a:228_6: Tadā hi tathāgato pūritapāramittā aññassa santike sāmaṃ ananussutesu saṅkhatāsaṅkhatadhammesu “idaṃ dukkhaṃ…pe…
atk-abh03a:228_7: ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā”ti attapaccakkhena ñāṇena cattāri saccāni abhisambujjhati.
atk-abh03a:229_1: Sabbaññutaṃ pāpuṇāti balesu ca vasībhāvanti sabbaññutaññāṇañceva balesu ca ciṇṇavasībhāvaṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-abh03a:229_2: Buddhānañhi sabbaññutaññāṇassa ceva dasabalañāṇassa ca adhigamanato paṭṭhāya aññaṃ kātabbaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-abh03a:229_3: Yathā pana ubhatosujātassa khattiyakumārassa abhisekappattito paṭṭhāya ‘idaṃ nāma issariyaṃ anāgata’nti na vattabbaṃ,
atk-abh03a:229_5: Evameva buddhānaṃ arahattamaggassa āgamanato paṭṭhāya ‘ayaṃ nāma guṇo na āgato,
atk-abh03a:229_8: sabbepi sabbaññuguṇā āgatā paṭividdhā paccakkhakatāva honti.
atk-abh03a:229_9: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ evaṃ pāramīpūraṇasiddhānubhāvena ariyamaggena paṭividdhasabbaññuguṇo puggalo sammāsambuddhoti vuccati.
atk-abh03a:230_2: pubbe ananussutesūti pade pubbe vuttanayeneva attho veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:230_3: Paccekabuddhopi hi pacchimabhave anācariyako attukkaṃsikañāṇeneva paṭividdhasacco sabbaññutaññāṇañceva balesu ca ciṇṇavasībhāvaṃ na pāpuṇāti.
atk-abh03a:231_2: aṭṭha vimokkhe kāyena phusitvā viharatīti aṭṭha samāpattiyo sahajātanāmakāyena paṭilabhitvā viharati.
atk-abh03a:231_4: maggapaññāya cattāri saccāni passitvā cattāropi āsavā khīṇā honti.
atk-abh03a:231_5: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ evarūpo puggalo ubhatobhāgavimutto nāmāti vuccati.
atk-abh03a:231_6: Ayañhi dvīhi bhāgehi dve vāre vimuttoti ubhatobhāgavimutto.
atk-abh03a:231_10: maggena samucchedavimokkhena vimuttoti ubhatobhāgehi dve vāre vimutto”ti.
atk-abh03a:236_0: Vatvā suttaṃ āharitvā “nāmakāyato ca rūpakāyato ca suvimuttattā ubhatobhāgavimutto”ti āha.
atk-abh03a:236_2: “samāpattiyā vikkhambhanavimokkhena ekavāraṃ vimutto maggena samucchedavimokkhena ekavāraṃ vimuttoti ubhatobhāgavimutto”ti.
atk-abh03a:236_4: ‘tiṇṇampi vāde kāraṇaṃ dissatī’ti tiṇṇampi vādaṃ tantiṃ katvā ṭhapayiṃsu.
atk-abh03a:237_1: maggena nāmakāyato vimuttoti ubhohi bhāgehi vimuttattā ubhatobhāgavimutto.
atk-abh03a:237_2: So catunnaṃ arūpasamāpattīnaṃ ekekato vuṭṭhāya saṅkhāre sammasitvā arahattaṃ pattānaṃ catunnaṃ,
atk-abh03a:237_3: nirodhā vuṭṭhāya arahattaṃ pattassa anāgāmino ca vasena pañcavidho hoti.
atk-abh03a:237_4: Tattha purimā cattāro samāpattisīsaṃ nirodhaṃ na samāpajjantīti pariyāyena ubhatobhāgavimuttā nāma.
atk-abh03a:237_5: Aṭṭhasamāpattilābhī anāgāmī taṃ samāpajjitvā tato vuṭṭhāya vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pattoti nippariyāyena ubhatobhāgavimuttaseṭṭho nāma.
atk-abh03a:237_6: Nanu ca arūpāvacarajjhānampi upekkhācittekaggatāhi duvaṅgikaṃ rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānampi,
atk-abh03a:237_7: tasmā tampi padaṭṭhānaṃ katvā arahattaṃ pattena ubhatobhāgavimuttena bhavitabbanti?
atk-abh03a:237_12: tasmā tato vuṭṭhāya arahattaṃ patto ubhatobhāgavimutto nāma na hoti.
atk-abh03a:237_13: Arūpāvacaraṃ pana nāmakāyato ca vimuttaṃ rūpakāyato cāti tadeva pādakaṃ katvā arahattaṃ patto ubhatobhāgavimutto hotīti veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:238_3: So sukkhavipassako catūhi jhānehi vuṭṭhāya arahattaṃ pattā cattāro cāti pañcavidho hoti.
atk-abh03a:238_4: Etesu hi ekopi aṭṭhavimokkhalābhī na hoti.
atk-abh03a:238_5: Teneva na heva kho aṭṭha vimokkhetiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:238_6: Arūpāvacarajjhānesu pana ekasmiṃ sati ubhatobhāgavimuttoyeva nāma hotīti.
atk-abh03a:239_3: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ evarūpo puggalo kāyasakkhīti vuccati.
atk-abh03a:239_7: So sotāpattiphalaṭṭhaṃ ādiṃ katvā yāva arahattamaggaṭṭhā chabbidho hoti.
atk-abh03a:240_6: Yathābhūtaṃ pajānātīti ṭhapetvā taṇhaṃ pañcupādānakkhandhe ‘dukkhasacca’nti yāthāvasarasato pajānāti.
atk-abh03a:240_11: Yasmā pana idaṃ dukkhañca samudayo ca nibbānaṃ patvā nirujjhanti vūpasammanti appavattiṃ gacchanti;
atk-abh03a:240_15: tena taṃ ‘ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā’ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti.
atk-abh03a:240_18: Tattha tathāgatappaveditāti mahābodhimaṇḍe nisīdatvā tathāgatena paṭividdhā viditā pākaṭīkatā.
atk-abh03a:240_22: Tesu anena paññā suṭṭhu carāpitā hotīti attho.
atk-abh03a:240_23: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ evarūpo puggalo diṭṭhippattoti vuccati.
atk-abh03a:240_27: Diṭṭhaṃ viditaṃ sacchikataṃ passitaṃ paññāyāti diṭṭhappatto.
atk-abh03a:241_2: no ca kho yathā diṭṭhippattassāti yathā diṭṭhippattassa āsavā parikkhīṇā,
atk-abh03a:241_4: Kiṃ pana nesaṃ kilesappahāne nānattaṃ atthīti? Natthi.
atk-abh03a:241_5: Atha kasmā saddhāvimutto diṭṭhippattaṃ na pāpuṇātīti?
atk-abh03a:241_7: Diṭṭhippato hi āgamanamhi kilese vikkhambhento appadukkhena appakasirena akilamantova vikkhambhetuṃ sakkoti.
atk-abh03a:241_8: Saddhāvimutto pana dukkhena kasirena kilamanto hutvā vikkhambhetuṃ sakkoti,
atk-abh03a:241_11: Diṭṭhippattassa hi upari tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ vipassanāñāṇaṃ tikkhaṃ sūraṃ pasannaṃ hutvā vahati.
atk-abh03a:241_12: Saddhāvimuttassa vipassanāñāṇaṃ no tikkhaṃ sūraṃ pasannaṃ hutvā vahati,
atk-abh03a:242_0: Yathā hi dvīsu taruṇesu sippaṃ dassentesu ekassa hatthe tikhiṇo asi,
atk-abh03a:242_2: Tikhiṇena asinā kadalī chijjamānā saddaṃ na karoti.
atk-abh03a:242_4: Tattha tikhiṇena asinā saddaṃ akarontiyā eva kadaliyā chedanaṃ viya diṭṭhippattassa tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ vipassanāñāṇassa tikhiṇasūravippasannabhāvo.
atk-abh03a:242_5: Kuṇṭhena asinā saddaṃ karontiyāpi kadaliyā chedanaṃ viya saddhāvimuttassa tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ vipassanāñāṇassa atikhiṇaasūraappasannabhāvo veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:242_7: āgamanīyanānatteneva saddhāvimutto diṭṭhippattaṃ na pāpuṇātīti sanniṭṭhānaṃ kataṃ.
atk-abh03a:243_1: “etesu hi saddhāvimuttassa pubbabhāgamaggakkhaṇe saddahantassa viya okappentassa viya adhimuccantassa viya ca kilesakkhayo hoti.
atk-abh03a:243_2: Diṭṭhippattassa pubbabhāgamaggakkhaṇe kilesacchedakañāṇaṃ adandhaṃ tikhiṇaṃ sūraṃ hutvā vahati.
atk-abh03a:243_3: Tasmā yathā nāma atikhiṇena asinā kadaliṃ chindantassa chinnaṭṭhānaṃ na maṭṭhaṃ hoti,
atk-abh03a:243_8: Yathā pana sunisiteneva asinā kadaliṃ chindantassa chinnaṭṭhānaṃ maṭṭhaṃ hoti,
atk-abh03a:243_13: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ evarūpo puggalo saddhāvimuttoti vuccati.
atk-abh03a:244_5: Paññā imaṃ puggalaṃ vahatīti paññāvāhītipi vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-abh03a:244_7: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ evarūpo puggalo dhammānusārīti vuccati.
atk-abh03a:244_8: So hi paññāsaṅkhātena dhammena sarati anussaratīti dhammānusārī.
atk-abh03a:244_10: Phale pana patte diṭṭhippatto nāma hoti.
atk-abh03a:245_3: Saddhā imaṃ puggalaṃ vahatīti saddhāvāhītipi vuttameva.
atk-abh03a:245_5: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ evarūpo puggalo saddhānusārīti vuccati.
atk-abh03a:245_9: Phale pana patte saddhāvimutto nāma hoti.
atk-abh03a:245_18: Eko ca matthakaṃ pāpuṇanto ubhatobhāgavimutto hoti,
atk-abh03a:245_22: sabbe te ime dve dhamme dhuraṃ katvā imesu dvīsu ṭhānesu abhinivisitvā imehi dvīhi ṭhānehi vimuccanti.
atk-abh03a:245_23: Tesu yo bhikkhu aṭṭhasamāpattilābhī paññaṃ dhuraṃ katvā samathavasena abhiniviṭṭho aññataraṃ arūpasamāpattiṃ
atk-abh03a:245_24: padaṭṭhānaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti,
atk-abh03a:245_26: Parato pana chasu ṭhānesu kāyasakkhī nāma.
atk-abh03a:246_0: Aparo paññameva dhuraṃ katvā vipassanāvasena abhiniviṭṭho suddhasaṅkhāre vā rūpāvacarajjhānesu vā aññataraṃ sammasitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti,
atk-abh03a:246_2: Parato pana chasu ṭhānesu diṭṭhippatto nāma.
atk-abh03a:246_6: Aparo aṭṭhasamāpattilābhī saddhaṃ dhuraṃ katvā samādhivasena abhiniviṭṭho aññataraṃ arūpasamāpattiṃ padaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-abh03a:246_12: Tena saddhiṃ purimāni pañca cha honti.
atk-abh03a:246_13: Aparo saddhameva dhuraṃ katvā vipassanāvasena abhiniviṭṭho suddhasaṅkhāre vā rūpāvacarajjhānesu vā aññataraṃ sammasitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-abh03a:246_18: Tena saddhiṃ purimāni cha satta honti.
atk-abh03a:246_19: Ime satta puggalā loke aggadakkhiṇeyyā nāmāti.
atk-abh03a:247_4: tato paraṃ aṭṭhamaṃ bhavaṃ nādiyatīti sattakkhattuparamo.
atk-abh03a:248_14: iminā ariyena aṭṭhaṅgikena maggena samannāgato ayaṃ vuccati sotāpanno,
atk-abh03a:248_15: svāyaṃ āyasmā evaṃnāmo evaṃgotto iti vā”ti.
atk-abh03a:249_1: Idha pana maggena phalassa nāmaṃ dinnanti phalakkhaṇe sotāpanno adhippeto.
atk-abh03a:250_4: Upari tīhi maggehi avassaṃ bujjhissatīti sambodhiparāyaṇo.
atk-abh03a:250_5: Deve ca manusse cāti devalokañca manussalokañca.
atk-abh03a:250_7: Dukkhassantaṃ karotīti vaṭṭadukkhassa pariyantaṃ parivaṭumaṃ karoti.
atk-abh03a:250_8: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ evarūpo puggalo sattakkhattuparamo nāma vuccati.
atk-abh03a:250_9: Ayaṃ pana kālena devalokassa kālena manussalokassa vasena missakabhavena kathitoti veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:251_3: Sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyato hi paṭṭhāya nīce kule upapatti nāma natthi,
atk-abh03a:251_5: Dve vā tīṇi vā kulānīti devamanussavasena dve vā tayo vā bhave.
atk-abh03a:251_9: Yāva chaṭṭhabhavā saṃsarantopi pana kolaṃkolova hoti.
atk-abh03a:252_3: Yassa hi sotāpannassa ekaṃyeva khandhabījaṃ atthi,
atk-abh03a:252_9: Ettakaṃ ṭhānaṃ gato sattakkhattuparamo nāma hoti,
atk-abh03a:252_11: ettakaṃ ekabījīti bhagavatā etesaṃ nāmaṃ gahitaṃ.
atk-abh03a:253_0: Ko pana tesaṃ etaṃ pabhedaṃ niyametīti?
atk-abh03a:253_5: Tattha ‘pubbahetu niyametī’ti vāde ‘paṭhamamaggassa upanissayo kato nāma hoti,
atk-abh03a:253_6: upari tayo maggā nirupanissayā uppannā’ti vacanaṃ āpajjati.
atk-abh03a:253_7: ‘Paṭhamamaggo niyametī’ti vāde upari tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ niratthakatā āpajjati.
atk-abh03a:253_8: ‘Upari tayo maggā niyamentī’ti vāde ‘aṭṭhamamagge anuppanneyeva upari tayo maggā uppannā’ti āpajjati.
atk-abh03a:253_9: ‘Tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ vipassanā niyametī’ti vādo pana yujjati.
atk-abh03a:253_10: Sace hi upari tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ vipassanā balavatī hoti,
atk-abh03a:254_8: nāgadatto devaputtoti ime hi ettakā janā vaṭṭajjhāsayā vaṭṭābhiratā ādito paṭṭhāya cha devaloke sodhetvā akaniṭṭhe ṭhatvā parinibbāyissanti,
atk-abh03a:254_11: yopi manussesuyeva sattakkhattuṃ saṃsaritvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti,
atk-abh03a:254_12: yopi devaloke nibbatto devesuyeva sattakkhattuṃ aparāparaṃ saṃsaritvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti,
atk-abh03a:254_14: Missakabhavavaseneva panettha sattakkhattuparamakolaṃkolā mānusakabhavanibbattakoyeva ca ekabījī gahitoti veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:254_20: ‘ahaṃ lokuttaraṃ dhammaṃ nibbattessāmī’ti evaṃ paññaṃ dhuraṃ katvā sattakkhattuparamādibhāvaṃ pattāpi
atk-abh03a:254_21: paṭipadāvasena dvādasevāti ime catuvīsati sotāpannā ihaṭṭhakanijjhānikavaseneva imasmiṃ ṭhāne kathitāti
atk-abh03a:255_4: Imaṃ lokaṃ āgantvāti iminā pañcasu sakadāgāmīsu cattāro vajjetvā ekova gahito.
atk-abh03a:255_5: Ekacco hi idha sakadāgāmiphalaṃ patvā idheva parinibbāyati,
atk-abh03a:255_10: Yo pana idha patvā devaloke yāvatāyukaṃ vasitvā puna idhūpapajjitvā parinibbāyati –
atk-abh03a:255_12: Sesamettha yaṃ vattabbaṃ siyā taṃ sabbaṃ heṭṭhā dhammasaṅgahaṭṭhakathāyaṃ lokuttarakusalaniddese vuttameva.
atk-abh03a:255_13: Imassa pana sakadāgāmino ekabījinā saddhiṃ kiṃ nānākaraṇanti?
atk-abh03a:256_3: Yassa imāni pañca bandhanāni appahīnāni honti,
atk-abh03a:256_4: so bhavagge nibbattopi gilitabaḷiso maccho viya dīghasuttakena pāde baddhakāko viya tehi bandhanehi ākaḍḍhiyamāno
atk-abh03a:256_5: kāmadhātuyaṃyeva pavattatīti pañca bandhanāni orambhāgiyānīti vuccanti.
atk-abh03a:256_11: Anāvattidhammo tasmā lokāti paṭisandhiggahaṇavasena tasmā lokā idha anāvattanasabhāvo.
atk-abh03a:256_13: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ evaṃvidho puggalo paṭisandhivasena puna anāgamanato anāgāmī nāma vuccati.
atk-abh03a:257_2: upapannaṃ vā samanantarāti upapannasamanantarā vā hutvā.
atk-abh03a:257_3: Appattaṃ vā vemajjhaṃ āyuppamāṇanti āyuppamāṇaṃ vemajjhaṃ appattaṃ vā hutvā ariyamaggaṃ sañjanetīti attho.
atk-abh03a:257_4: Vāsaddavikappato pana vemajjhaṃ pattantipi attho veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:257_6: Upariṭṭhimānaṃ saṃyojanānanti upari pañcannaṃ uddhambhāgiyasaṃyojanānaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ vā kilesānaṃ.
atk-abh03a:257_8: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ evarūpo puggalo āyuvemajjhassa antarāyeva parinibbāyanato antarāparinibbāyīti vuccati.
atk-abh03a:258_2: atikkamitvā vemajjhaṃ āyuppamāṇanti āyuppamāṇaṃ vemajjhaṃ atikkamitvā.
atk-abh03a:258_5: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ evarūpo puggalo avihesu tāva kappasahassappamāṇassa āyuno pañcakappasatasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-abh03a:258_6: vemajjhaṃ atikkamitvā chaṭṭhe vā kappasate sattamaṭṭhamanavamānaṃ vā aññatarasmiṃ dasameyeva vā kappasate
atk-abh03a:258_7: ṭhatvā arahattaṃ patvā kilesaparinibbānena parinibbāyanato upahaccaparinibbāyīti vuccati.
atk-abh03a:259_2: asaṅkhārena appadukkhena adhimattapayogaṃ akatvāva kilesaparinibbānena parinibbānadhammoti asaṅkhāraparinibbāyī.
atk-abh03a:259_3: Sasaṅkhārena dukkhena kasirena adhimattapayogaṃ katvāva kilesaparinibbānena parinibbāyanadhammoti sasaṅkhāraparinibbāyī.
atk-abh03a:260_2: uddhaṃ vāhibhāvena uddhamassa taṇhāsotaṃ vaṭṭasotaṃ vāti uddhaṃsoto.
atk-abh03a:260_3: Uddhaṃ vā gantvā paṭilabhitabbato uddhamassa maggasotanti uddhaṃsoto.
atk-abh03a:260_5: Avihā cuto atappaṃ gacchatītiādīsu avihe kappasahassaṃ vasanto arahattaṃ pattuṃ asakkuṇitvā atappaṃ gacchati.
atk-abh03a:260_6: Tatrāpi dve kappasahassāni vasanto arahattaṃ pattuṃ asakkuṇitvā sudassaṃ gacchati.
atk-abh03a:260_7: Tatrāpi cattāri kappasahassāni vasanto arahattaṃ pattuṃ asakkuṇitvā sudassiṃ gacchati.
atk-abh03a:260_8: Tatrāpi aṭṭha kappasahassāni vasanto arahattaṃ pattuṃ asakkuṇitvā akaniṭṭhaṃ gacchati.
atk-abh03a:261_0: Imesaṃ pana anāgāmīnaṃ pabhedajānanatthaṃ uddhaṃsoto akaniṭṭhagāmīcatukkaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh03a:261_1: Tattha yo avihato paṭṭhāya cattāro devaloke sodhetvā akaniṭṭhaṃ gantvā parinibbāyati ayaṃ uddhaṃsoto akaniṭṭhagāmī nāma.
atk-abh03a:261_2: Yo pana heṭṭhā tayo devaloke sodhetvā sudassīdevaloke ṭhatvā parinibbāyati –
atk-abh03a:261_5: Yo pana ito akaniṭṭhameva gantvā parinibbāyati,
atk-abh03a:261_8: Yo pana heṭṭhā catūsu devalokesu tattha tattheva parinibbāyati,
atk-abh03a:263_1: divasaṃ santattānampi hi ārakaṇṭakavipphalikanakhacchedanānaṃ ayomukhe haññamāne papaṭikā uppajjitvāva nibbāyati –
atk-abh03a:263_4: Tato mahantatare ayomukhe haññamāne papaṭikā ākāsaṃ ullaṅghitvā nibbāyati –
atk-abh03a:263_7: Tato mahantatare ayomukhe haññamāne papaṭikā ākāsaṃ ullaṅghitvā nivattamānā pathaviyaṃ anupahaccatalā hutvā parinibbāyati –
atk-abh03a:263_10: Tato mahantatare ayomukhe haññamāne papaṭikā ākāsaṃ ullaṅghitvā pathaviyaṃ patitvā upahaccatalā hutvā nibbāyati –
atk-abh03a:263_13: Tato mahantatare ayomukhe haññamāne papaṭikā paritte tiṇakaṭṭhe patitvā taṃ parittaṃ tiṇakaṭṭhaṃ jhāpetvā nibbāyati –
atk-abh03a:263_16: Tato mahantatare ayomukhe haññamāne papaṭikā vipule tiṇakaṭṭhapuñje patitvā taṃ vipulaṃ tiṇakaṭṭhapuñjaṃ jhāpetvā nibbāyati –
atk-abh03a:263_20: tattha mahantesu tiṇakaṭṭhapuñjesu jhāyamānesu vītaccitaṅgāro vā jālā vā uppatitvā kammārasālaṃ jhāpetvā
atk-abh03a:263_24: Yasmā pana ārakaṇṭakādibhedaṃ khuddakampi mahantampi ayokapālameva,
atk-abh03a:263_25: tasmā sutte sabbavāresu ayokapālantveva vuttaṃ. Yathāha –
atk-abh03a:264_12: Tañca khvassa padaṃ na sabbena sabbaṃ sacchikataṃ hoti.
atk-abh03a:264_13: Tassa na sabbena sabbaṃ mānānusayo pahīno hoti,
atk-abh03a:264_14: na sabbena sabbaṃ bhavarāgānusayo pahīno hoti,
atk-abh03a:264_15: na sabbena sabbaṃ avijjānusayo pahīno hoti.
atk-abh03a:264_16: So pañcannaṃ orambhāgiyānaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā antarāparinibbāyī hoti.
atk-abh03a:264_19: divasaṃ santatte ayokapāle haññamāne papaṭikā nibbattitvā nibbāyeyya;
atk-abh03a:265_7: divasaṃ santatte ayokapāle haññamāne papaṭikā nibbattitvā uppatitvā nibbāyeyya;
atk-abh03a:266_7: divasaṃ santatte ayokapāle haññamāne papaṭikā nibbattitvā uppatitvā anupahacca talaṃ nibbāyeyya;
atk-abh03a:267_7: divasaṃ santatte ayokapāle haññamāne papaṭikā nibbattitvā uppatitvā upahacca talaṃ nibbāyeyya;
atk-abh03a:268_7: divasaṃ santatte ayokapāle haññamāne papaṭikā nibbattitvā uppatitvā paritte tiṇapuñje vā kaṭṭhapuñje vā nipateyya,
atk-abh03a:268_10: aggimpi janetvā dhūmampi janetvā tameva parittaṃ tiṇapuñjaṃ vā kaṭṭhapuñjaṃ vā pariyādiyitvā anāhārā nibbāyeyya;
atk-abh03a:269_7: divasaṃ santatte ayokapāle haññamāne papaṭikā nibbattitvā uppatitvā vipule tiṇapuñje vā kaṭṭhapuñje vā nipateyya,
atk-abh03a:269_9: tameva vipulaṃ tiṇapuñjaṃ vā kaṭṭhapuñjaṃ vā pariyādiyitvā anāhārā nibbāyeyya;
atk-abh03a:270_7: divasaṃ santatte ayokapāle haññamāne papaṭikā nibbattitvā uppatitvā mahante tiṇapuñje vā kaṭṭhapuñje vā nipateyya,
atk-abh03a:270_9: tameva mahantaṃ tiṇapuñjaṃ vā kaṭṭhapuñjaṃ vā pariyādiyitvā gacchampi daheyya,
atk-abh03a:270_11: gacchampi dahitvā dāyampi dahitvā haritantaṃ vā pathantaṃ vā selantaṃ vā udakantaṃ vā ramaṇīyaṃ vā bhūmibhāgaṃ āgamma anāhārā nibbāyeyya;
atk-abh03a:271_2: Ayaṃ vuccati puggalo arahāti ettha pana dvādasa arahanto veditabbā. Kathaṃ?
atk-abh03a:271_5: Tattha suññatavimokkhena vimuttakhīṇāsavo paṭipadāvasena catubbidho hoti;
atk-abh03a:271_8: Iti ime dvādasa arahanto viya dvādaseva sakadāgāmino,
atk-abh03a:271_10: aṭṭhacattālīsa anāgāminoti ettakā puggalā ito muccitvā bahiddhā nuppajjanti,
atk-abh03a:274_2: Evaṃ puggalaṃ pucchitvāpi dhammena puggalaṃ dassetuṃ tattha katamo kodhotiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:274_6: Ayaṃ kodho appahīnoti ayaṃ ettako kodho vikkhambhanappahānena vā tadaṅgappahānena vā samucchedappahānena vā appahīno.
atk-abh03a:275_2: iminā ahirikenāti iminā evaṃpakārena ahirikadhammena samannāgato.
atk-abh03a:276_4: Vacchakasālāya hi anto baddho antoyeva sayitavacchako viya idhaṭṭhakasotāpannasakadāgāmino.
atk-abh03a:276_7: Anto baddho pana bahi sayitavacchako viya rūpārūpabhave sotāpannasakadāgāmino.
atk-abh03a:276_10: Bahi baddho bahi sayitavacchako viya rūpārūpabhave anāgāmī.
atk-abh03a:276_13: Bahi baddho pana antosayitavacchako viya idhaṭṭhakaanāgāmī.
atk-abh03a:278_8: Puttadhītaro pana mātāpitaro paṭijaggantā abhivādanādīni tesaṃ kurumānā katavedino nāma.
atk-abh03a:278_10: Antevāsikasaddhivihārikā ācariyupajjhāye paṭijaggantā abhivādanādīni tesaṃ kurumānā katavedino nāma.
atk-abh03a:279_1: parena akateyeva upakāre attani kataṃ upakāraṃ anapekkhitvā kārako pubbakārī,
atk-abh03a:279_5: Parena katassa upakārassa anurūpappavattiṃ attani kataṃ upakāraṃ upakārato jānanto,
atk-abh03a:280_14: Tesu pubbakārī iṇaṃ demīti saññaṃ karoti,
atk-abh03a:280_15: pacchākārako ‘iṇaṃ jīrāpemī’ti saññaṃ karotī”ti ettakameva vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:281_4: Yo hi upaṭṭhākakulaṃ vā ñātikulaṃ vā nissāya vasamāno cīvare jiṇṇe tehi dinnaṃ cīvaraṃ nikkhipati,
atk-abh03a:281_7: Yo ca teneva nayena laddhaṃ laddhaṃ vissajjeti parassa deti.
atk-abh03a:281_9: Ime dve puggalā sakaṭehipi paccaye upanentena tappetuṃ na sakkāti duttappayā nāma.
atk-abh03a:282_2: na vissajjetīti attano akatvā parassa na deti.
atk-abh03a:282_3: Atireke pana sati na nikkhipati parassa deti.
atk-abh03a:282_5: yo pana bhikkhu upaṭṭhākakulā vā ñātikulā vā jiṇṇacīvaro sāṭakaṃ labhitvā cīvaraṃ katvā paribhuñjati,
atk-abh03a:282_7: aggaḷaṃ datvā pārupantopi puna diyyamāne sahasā na paṭiggaṇhāti.
atk-abh03a:282_8: Yo ca laddhaṃ laddhaṃ attanā paribhuñjati,
atk-abh03a:282_10: Ime dvepi sukhena sakkā tappetunti sutappayā nāmāti.
atk-abh03a:283_2: Na kukkuccāyitabbaṃ kukkuccāyatīti na kukkuccāyitabbayuttakaṃ kukkuccāyati.
atk-abh03a:283_9: attānaṃ uddissa macchamaṃse akateyeva ‘maṃ uddissa kata’nti kukkuccāyati.
atk-abh03a:283_10: Kukkuccāyitabbaṃ na kukkuccāyatīti kukkuccāyitabbayuttakaṃ na kukkuccāyati.
atk-abh03a:283_12: attānaṃ uddissa macchamaṃse kate ‘maṃ uddissa kata’nti na kukkuccāyati.
atk-abh03a:283_14: “‘na kukkuccāyitabba’nti saṅghabhogassa apaṭṭhapanaṃ avicāraṇaṃ na kukkuccāyitabbaṃ nāma,
atk-abh03a:283_18: Imesanti imesaṃ dvinnaṃ puggalānaṃ subhūmiyaṃ tiṇalatādīni viya rattimpi divāpi āsavā vaḍḍhantiyeva.
atk-abh03a:283_19: Sukkapakkhe kappiyamaṃsaṃ labhitvā kappiyamaṃsantveva gaṇhanto na kukkuccāyitabbaṃ na kukkuccāyati nāmāti iminā nayena attho veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:284_0: 88. Hīnādhimuttoti hīnajjhāsayo. Dussīloti nissīlo. Pāpadhammoti lāmakadhammo.
atk-abh03a:285_0: 89. Paṇītādhimuttoti paṇītajjhāsayo. Kalyāṇadhammoti bhaddakadhammo, sucidhammo, sundaradhammo.
atk-abh03a:286_3: Paccekasambuddhā ye ca tathāgatasāvakāti ettha paccekabuddhā navahi lokuttaradhammehi sayaṃ tittā paripuṇṇā.
atk-abh03a:286_6: Sāvakānaṃ pana dhammakathāya aparimāṇānampi devamanussānaṃ abhisamayo hoti.
atk-abh03a:286_7: Evaṃ santepi yasmā pana te dhammaṃ desentā na attano vacanaṃ katvā kathenti,
atk-abh03a:286_9: Sotuṃ nisinnaparisāpi ‘ayaṃ bhikkhu na attanā paṭividdhadhammaṃ katheti,
atk-abh03a:286_13: Yathā hi ‘asukassa nāma idañcidañca dethā’ti raññā āṇattā kiñcāpi ānetvā denti,
atk-abh03a:289_14: Kiñcideva asāruppaṃ disvā ‘idaṃ iminā kataṃ bhavissatī’ti evaṃ parehi āsaṅkanīyasamācāro,
atk-abh03a:289_17: Tassa hi divāṭṭhānādīsu sannipatitvā kiñcideva mantayante bhikkhū disvā ‘ime ekato hutvā mantenti,
atk-abh03a:289_18: kacci nu kho mayā katakammaṃ jānitvā mantentī’ti evaṃ sāsaṅkasamācāro hoti.
atk-abh03a:290_1: Assamaṇo samaṇapaṭiññoti assamaṇo hutvāva samaṇapatirūpakatāya ‘samaṇo aha’nti evaṃ paṭiñño.
atk-abh03a:290_2: Abrahmacārī brahmacāripaṭiññoti aññe brahmacārino sunivatthe supārute sumbhakapattadhare gāmanigamajanapadarājadhānīsu
atk-abh03a:290_3: piṇḍāya caritvā jīvikaṃ kappente disvā sayampi tādisena ākārena tathā paṭipajjanato ‘ahaṃ brahmacārī’ti
atk-abh03a:290_5: ‘Ahaṃ bhikkhū’ti vatvā uposathaggādīni pavisanto pana brahmacāripaṭiñño hotiyeva,
atk-abh03a:290_11: Atha vā kasambu vuccati tintakuṇapagataṃ kasaṭaudakaṃ.
atk-abh03a:290_12: Imasmiñca sāsane dussīlo nāma jigucchanīyattā tintakuṇapakasaṭaudakasadiso.
atk-abh03a:291_0: Tassa na evaṃ hotīti kasmā na hoti?
atk-abh03a:291_1: Yattha patiṭṭhitena sakkā bhaveyya arahattaṃ laddhuṃ,
atk-abh03a:291_3: Yathā hi caṇḍālakumārakassa ‘asuko nāma khattiyakumāro rajje abhisitto’ti sutvāpi,
atk-abh03a:291_5: tasmiṃ kule apaccājātattā na evaṃ hoti –
atk-abh03a:291_6: ‘kudāssu nāmāhampi so khattiyakumāro viya abhisekaṃ pāpuṇeyya’nti;
atk-abh03a:291_7: evameva dussīlassa ‘asuko nāma bhikkhu arahattaṃ patto’ti sutvāpi,
atk-abh03a:291_9: tassa abhāvato ‘kudāssu nāmāhampi so sīlavā viya arahattaṃ pāpuṇeya’nti na evaṃ hoti.
atk-abh03a:291_10: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ evarūpo puggalo arahattāsāya abhāvā nirāsoti vuccati.
atk-abh03a:292_2: Yasmiṃ patiṭṭhitena sakkā bhaveyya arahattaṃ pāpuṇituṃ,
atk-abh03a:292_4: Yathā hi sujātassa khattiyakumārassa ‘asuko nāma khattiyakumāro rajje abhisitto’ti sutvāva yasmiṃ kule paccājātā abhisekaṃ pāpuṇanti,
atk-abh03a:292_7: so kumāro viya abhisekaṃ pāpuṇeyya’nti evameva sīlavato ‘asuko nāma bhikkhu arahattaṃ patto’ti sutvāva yasmiṃ sīle patiṭṭhitena arahattaṃ pattabbaṃ,
atk-abh03a:292_9: ‘kudāssu nāmāhampi so bhikkhu viya arahattaṃ pāpuṇeyya’nti evaṃ hoti.
atk-abh03a:292_10: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ evarūpo puggalo āsaṃso nāma vuccati.
atk-abh03a:292_11: So hi arahattaṃ āsaṃsati patthetīti āsaṃso.
atk-abh03a:293_1: Yā hissa pubbe avimuttassāti yā tassa khīṇāsavassa pubbe arahattavimuttiyā avimuttassa vimuttāsā ahosi,
atk-abh03a:293_4: Yathā hi abhisittassa khattiyassa ‘asuko nāma khattiyakumāro rajje abhisitto’ti sutvā ekassa rañño dvinnaṃ
atk-abh03a:293_5: rajjābhisekānaṃ dvinnaṃ setacchattānaṃ abhāvā na evaṃ hoti –
atk-abh03a:293_6: “kudāssu nāmāhampi so kumāro viya abhisekaṃ pāpuṇeyya”nti;
atk-abh03a:293_7: evameva khīṇāsavassa ‘asuko nāma bhikkhu arahattaṃ patto’ti sutvā,
atk-abh03a:293_9: ‘kudāssu nāmāhampi so bhikkhu viya arahattaṃ pāpuṇeyya’nti na evaṃ hoti.
atk-abh03a:293_10: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ evarūpo puggalo arahattāsāya vigatattā vigatāsoti vuccati.
atk-abh03a:294_3: taṃ tāva upamaṃ dassetuṃ tayo gilānātiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:294_6: Neva vuṭṭhāti tamhā ābādhāti iminā atekicchena vātāpamārādinā rogena samannāgato niṭṭhappatto gilāno kathito.
atk-abh03a:294_7: Vuṭṭhāti tamhā ābādhāti iminā khipitakacchutiṇapupphakajarādippabhedo appamattakābādho kathito.
atk-abh03a:295_0: Labhanto sappāyāni bhojanāni no alabhantoti iminā pana yesaṃ paṭijagganena phāsukaṃ hoti,
atk-abh03a:295_2: Ettha ca patirūpo upaṭṭhāko nāma gilānupaṭṭhākaaṅgehi samannāgato paṇḍito dakkho analaso veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:296_1: Tasmiñhi gilāne attano dhammatāya yāpetuṃ asakkonte bhikkhusaṅghena tassa bhikkhuno ‘eko bhikkhu ca sāmaṇero
atk-abh03a:296_4: tāva gilānassa ca tesañca dvinnaṃ yenattho sabbaṃ bhikkhusaṅghasseva bhāro.
atk-abh03a:296_5: Aññepi gilānā upaṭṭhātabbāti itarepi dve gilānā upaṭṭhātabbā.
atk-abh03a:296_10: na kho pana maṃ paṭijaggantī’ti manopadosaṃ katvā apāye nibbatteyya.
atk-abh03a:296_13: mayhaṃ pana kammavipāko īdiso’ti so bhikkhusaṅghe mettaṃ paccupaṭṭhapetvā sagge nibbattati.
atk-abh03a:296_14: Yo pana appamattakena byādhinā samannāgato labhantopi alabhantopi vuṭṭhātiyeva,
atk-abh03a:296_15: tassa vināpi bhesajjena vūpasamanakabyādhi bhesajje kate khippataraṃ vūpasammati.
atk-abh03a:296_16: Tato so buddhavacanaṃ vā uggaṇhituṃ samaṇadhammaṃ vā kātuṃ sakkhissati.
atk-abh03a:296_17: Iminā kāraṇena aññepi gilānā upaṭṭhātabbāti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:297_1: Niyāmaṃ kusalesu dhammesu sammattanti kusalesu dhammesu magganiyāmasaṅkhātaṃ sammattaṃ.
atk-abh03a:297_4: Buddhantare ekavāraṃ paccekabuddhānaṃ santike ovādaṃ labhitvā paṭividdhapaccekabodhiñāṇo ca.
atk-abh03a:298_0: Dhammadesanā anuññātāti māsassa aṭṭha vāre dhammakathā anuññātā.
atk-abh03a:298_1: Aññesampi dhammo desetabboti itaresampi dhammo kathetabbo.
atk-abh03a:298_3: Padaparamassa hi imasmiṃ attabhāve dhammaṃ paṭivijjhituṃ asakkontassāpi anāgate paccayo bhavissati.
atk-abh03a:298_4: Yo pana tathāgatassa rūpadassanaṃ labhantopi alabhantopi dhammavinayañca savanāya labhantopi alabhantopi dhammaṃ abhisameti;
atk-abh03a:298_6: labhanto pana khippameva abhisamessatīti iminā kāraṇena tesaṃ dhammo desetabbo.
atk-abh03a:299_10: Attahetu vā parahetu vāti attano vā parassa vā hatthapādādihetu vā dhanahetu vā.
atk-abh03a:299_11: Āmisakiñcikkhahetu vāti ettha āmisanti lābho adhippeto.
atk-abh03a:299_12: Kiñcikkhanti yaṃ vā taṃ vā appamattakaṃ.
atk-abh03a:299_14: Sampajānamusā bhāsitā hotīti jānantoyeva musāvādaṃ kattā hoti.
atk-abh03a:299_15: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ evarūpo puggalo gūthasadisavacanattā gūthabhāṇīti vuccati.
atk-abh03a:299_16: Yathā hi gūthaṃ nāma mahājanassa aniṭṭhaṃ hoti akantaṃ;
atk-abh03a:299_17: evameva imassa puggalassa vacanaṃ devamanussānaṃ aniṭṭhaṃ hoti akantaṃ.
atk-abh03a:300_1: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ evarūpo puggalo pupphasadisavacanattā pupphabhāṇīti vuccati.
atk-abh03a:300_2: Yathā hi phullāni vassikāni vā adhimuttakāni vā mahājanassa iṭṭhāni kantāni honti;
atk-abh03a:300_3: evameva imassa puggalassa vacanaṃ devamanussānaṃ iṭṭhaṃ hoti kantaṃ.
atk-abh03a:301_7: Atthamadhuratāya sakalasarīre kopaṃ ajanetvā pemaṃ janetīti pemanīyā.
atk-abh03a:301_8: Hadayaṃ gacchati appaṭihaññamānā sukhena cittaṃ pavisatīti hadayaṅgamā.
atk-abh03a:301_17: Evarūpī kathā bahuno janassa kantā hotīti bahujanakantā.
atk-abh03a:301_18: Bahujanassa kantabhāveneva bahuno janassa manāpā cittavuddhikarāti bahujanamanāpā.
atk-abh03a:301_19: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ evarūpo puggalo madhubhāṇīti vuccati.
atk-abh03a:301_22: Yathā hi catumadhuraṃ nāma madhuraṃ paṇītaṃ;
atk-abh03a:301_23: evameva imassa puggalassa vacanaṃ devamanussānaṃ madhuraṃ hoti.
atk-abh03a:302_14: Purāṇavaṇo hi attano dhammatāya eva pubbaṃ lohitaṃ yūsanti imāni tīṇi savati,
atk-abh03a:302_18: Tassa attano dhammatāya savanaṃ viya kodhanassapi attano dhammatāya uddhumātakassa viya caṇḍikatassa caraṇaṃ.
atk-abh03a:302_19: Kaṭṭhena vā kaṭhalāya vā ghaṭṭanaṃ viya appamattakampi vacanaṃ bhiyyoso mattāya savanaṃ viya ‘mādisaṃ
atk-abh03a:302_20: nāma esa evaṃ vadatī’ti bhiyyoso mattāya uddhumāyanabhāvo daṭṭhabbo.
atk-abh03a:302_21: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ evarūpo puggalo arukūpamacittoti vuccati.
atk-abh03a:303_4: cakkhumā puriso viya hi yogāvacaro daṭṭhabbo.
atk-abh03a:303_7: Vijjantarikāya cakkhumato purisassa sāmantā rūpadassanaṃ viya sotāpattimaggakkhaṇe nibbānadassanaṃ.
atk-abh03a:303_10: Vijjantarikāya cakkhumato purisassa sāmantā rūpadassanaṃ viya sakadāgāmimaggakkhaṇe nibbānadassanaṃ.
atk-abh03a:303_13: Vijjantarikāya cakkhumato purisassa sāmantā rūpadassanaṃ viya anāgāmimaggakkhaṇe nibbānadassanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh03a:303_14: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ evarūpo puggalo vijjūpamacittoti vuccati.
atk-abh03a:304_4: Vajirassa maṇigaṇṭhiṃ vā pāsāṇagaṇṭhiṃ vā vinivijjhitvā agamanabhāvassa natthibhāvo viya arahattamaggañāṇena acchejjānaṃ kilesānaṃ natthibhāvo.
atk-abh03a:304_5: Vajirena nibbiddhavedhassa puna apaṭipūraṇaṃ viya arahattamaggena chinnānaṃ kilesānaṃ puna anuppādo daṭṭhabbo.
atk-abh03a:304_6: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ evarūpo puggalo vajirūpamacittoti vuccati.
atk-abh03a:305_1: Andhādīsu tathārūpaṃ cakkhu na hotīti tathājātikaṃ tathāsabhāvaṃ paññācakkhu na hoti.
atk-abh03a:305_5: Kaṇhasukkasappaṭibhāgeti kaṇhasukkāyeva aññamaññapaṭibāhanato paṭipakkhavasena sappaṭibhāgāti vuccanti.
atk-abh03a:305_7: kusale dhamme ‘kusalā dhammā’ti yena paññācakkhunā jāneyya,
atk-abh03a:305_12: Tathārūpampissa cakkhu na hotīti iminā nayena sesaṭṭhānesupi attho veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:305_13: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ evarūpo puggalo diṭṭhadhammikabhogasaṃharaṇapaññācakkhuno ca samparāyikatthasodhanapaññācakkhuno ca abhāvā andhoti vuccati.
atk-abh03a:306_1: Avakujjapaññādīsu dhammaṃ desentīti upāsako dhammassavanatthāya āgatoti attano kammaṃ pahāya dhammaṃ desenti.
atk-abh03a:306_2: Ādikalyāṇanti ādimhi kalyāṇaṃ bhaddakaṃ anavajjaṃ niddosaṃ katvā desenti.
atk-abh03a:306_7: Itissa dhammaṃ kathentā pubbapaṭṭhapanepi kalyāṇaṃ bhaddakaṃ anavajjameva katvā kathenti,
atk-abh03a:306_22: tato paraṃ eko vā anekā vā majjhaṃ,
atk-abh03a:307_12: Dve dve vā kariyamāne sīlasamādhayo ādi,
atk-abh03a:307_18: Parisuddhanti parisuddhaṃ nijjaṭaṃ niggaṇṭhiṃ katvā desenti.
atk-abh03a:307_19: Brahmacariyaṃ pakāsentīti evaṃ desentā ca seṭṭhacariyabhūtaṃ sikkhattayasaṅgahitaṃ ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ pakāsenti.
atk-abh03a:307_20: Neva ādiṃ manasi karotīti neva pubbapaṭṭhapanaṃ manasi karoti.
atk-abh03a:307_23: Evamevanti ettha kumbho nikkujjo viya avakujjapañño puggalo daṭṭhabbo.
atk-abh03a:307_25: Udakassa vivaṭṭanakālo viya tasmiṃ āsane nisinnassa uggahetuṃ asamatthakālo.
atk-abh03a:307_26: Udakassa asaṇṭhānakālo viya uṭṭhahitvā asallakkhaṇakālo veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:307_27: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ evarūpo puggalo avakujjapaññoti vuccati.
atk-abh03a:308_3: Evamevanti ettha ucchaṅgo viya ucchaṅgapañño puggalo daṭṭhabbo.
atk-abh03a:308_5: Ucchaṅge nānākhajjakāni khādantassa nisinnakālo viya tasmiṃ āsane nisinnassa uggahaṇakālo.
atk-abh03a:308_6: Vuṭṭhahantassa satisammosā vikiraṇakālo viya tasmā āsanā vuṭṭhāya gacchantassa asallakkhaṇakālo veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:308_7: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ evarūpo puggalo ucchaṅgapaññoti vuccati.
atk-abh03a:309_3: Evameva khoti ettha uparimukho ṭhapito kumbho viya puthupañño puggalo daṭṭhabbo.
atk-abh03a:309_5: Udakassa saṇṭhānakālo viya tattha nisinnassa uggahaṇakālo.
atk-abh03a:309_6: No vivaṭṭanakālo viya uṭṭhāya gacchantassa sallakkhaṇakālo veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:309_7: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ evarūpo puggalo puthupaññoti vuccati.
atk-abh03a:310_6: Yathā hi cheko vaḍḍhakī dabbasambhāratthaṃ vanaṃ paviṭṭho na ādito paṭṭhāya sampattasampattarukkhe chindati,
atk-abh03a:310_10: puthujjanā pana adabbatāya na gahitāti veditabbā.
atk-abh03a:311_3: Na khippaṃ lujjatīti na antarā nassati,
atk-abh03a:311_5: Evamevanti evaṃ tassāpi puggalassa kodho na antarā punadivase vā aparadivase vā nibbāti,
atk-abh03a:311_8: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ evarūpo puggalo pāsāṇalekhā viya kujjhanabhāvena ciraṭṭhitikato pāsāṇalekhūpamoti vuccati.
atk-abh03a:312_1: So ca khvassa kodhoti so appamattakepi kāraṇe sahasā kuddhassa kodho.
atk-abh03a:312_3: Yathā pana pathaviyaṃ ākaḍḍhitvā katalekhā vātādīhi khippaṃ nassati,
atk-abh03a:312_4: evamassa sahasā uppannopi kodho khippameva nibbātīti attho.
atk-abh03a:312_5: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ evarūpo puggalo pathaviyaṃ lekhā viya kujjhanabhāvena aciraṭṭhitikato pathavīlekhūpamoti vuccati.
atk-abh03a:313_9: Sandhiyatīti ṭhānagamanādīsu kāyakiriyādīsu kāyena samodhānaṃ gacchati.
atk-abh03a:313_11: Sammodatīti uddesaparipucchādīsu vacīkiriyāsu vācāya samodhānaṃ gacchati.
atk-abh03a:313_12: Vippavāsagatopi piyasahāyako viya piyatarabhāvaṃ upetīti attho. Apica –
atk-abh03a:313_13: kiccakaraṇīyesu tehi saddhiṃ āditova ekakiriyabhāvaṃ upagacchanto saṃsandati.
atk-abh03a:313_16: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ evarūpo puggalo udakalekhā viya khippaṃ saṃsandanato udakalekhūpamoti vuccati.
atk-abh03a:314_3: taṃ tāva upamaṃ dassetuṃ tayo potthakātiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:314_10: So hi navabhāvaṃ atikkamitvā jiṇṇabhāvaṃ appatto majjhe paribhogakālepi dubbaṇṇo ca dukkhasamphasso ca appagghoyeva ca hoti.
atk-abh03a:314_12: Jiṇṇakāle pana aḍḍhamāsakaṃ vā kākaṇikaṃ vā agghati.
atk-abh03a:315_0: Navoti upasampadāya pañcavassakālato heṭṭhā jātiyā saṭṭhivassopi navoyeva.
atk-abh03a:315_2: Dussīlassa hi parisamajjhe nisinnassa nittejatāya sarīravaṇṇopi na sampajjati,
atk-abh03a:315_4: Ye kho panassāti ye kho pana tassa upaṭṭhākā vā ñātimittādayo vā etaṃ puggalaṃ sevanti.
atk-abh03a:315_5: Tesaṃ tanti tesaṃ puggalānaṃ cha satthāre sevantānaṃ micchādiṭṭhikānaṃ viya,
atk-abh03a:315_6: devadattaṃ sevantānaṃ kokālikādīnaṃ viya ca taṃ sevanaṃ dīgharattaṃ ahitāya dukkhāya hoti.
atk-abh03a:315_7: Majjhimoti pañcavassakālato paṭṭhāya yāva navavassakālā majjhimo nāma.
atk-abh03a:315_10: Kiṃ nu kho tuyhanti tuyhaṃ bālassa bhaṇitena ko atthoti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-abh03a:316_2: kāsikavatthaṃ nāma tayo kappāsaṃsū gahetvā kantitasuttena vāyitaṃ sukhumavatthaṃ.
atk-abh03a:316_5: Jiṇṇakāle pana aṭṭhapi dasapi sahassāni agghati.
atk-abh03a:317_0: Tesaṃ taṃ hotīti tesaṃ sammāsambuddhādayo sevantānaṃ viya taṃ sevanaṃ dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya hoti.
atk-abh03a:317_1: Sammāsambuddhañhi ekaṃ nissāya yāvajjakālā muccanakasattānaṃ pamāṇaṃ natthi.
atk-abh03a:317_2: Tathā sāriputtattheramahāmoggallānatthere avasese ca asītimahāsāvake nissāya saggaṃ gatasattānaṃ pamāṇaṃ natthi.
atk-abh03a:317_3: Yāvajjakālā tesaṃ diṭṭhānugatiṃ paṭipannasattānampi pamāṇaṃ natthiyeva.
atk-abh03a:317_4: Ādheyyaṃ gacchatīti tassa mahātherassa taṃ atthanissitaṃ vacanaṃ yathā gandhakaraṇḍake kāsikavatthaṃ ādhātabbataṃ ṭhapetabbataṃ gacchati,
atk-abh03a:317_5: evaṃ uttamaṅge sirasmiṃ hadaye ca ādhātabbataṃ ṭhapetabbatampi gacchati.
atk-abh03a:318_14: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ evarūpo puggalo ‘suppameyyo’ti vuccati.
atk-abh03a:318_15: Yathā hi parittassa udakassa sukhena pamāṇaṃ gayhati;
atk-abh03a:318_16: evameva imehi aguṇaṅgehi samannāgatassa sukhena pamāṇaṃ gayhati.
atk-abh03a:319_3: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ evarūpo puggalo ‘duppameyyo’ti vuccati.
atk-abh03a:319_4: Yathā hi mahāsamuddassa dukkhena pamāṇaṃ gayhati;
atk-abh03a:319_5: evameva imehi guṇaṅgehi samannāgatassa dukkhena pamāṇaṃ gayhati.
atk-abh03a:320_2: Yathā hi ākāsassa na sakkā pamāṇaṃ gahetuṃ,
atk-abh03a:321_4: Na payirupāsitabboti na santike nisīdanavasena punappunaṃ upāsitabbo.
atk-abh03a:321_5: Hīno hoti sīlenātiādīsu upādāyupādāya hīnatā veditabbā.
atk-abh03a:321_7: so dasa sīlāni rakkhantena na sevitabbo.
atk-abh03a:321_10: Aññatra anuddayā aññatra anukampāti ṭhapetvā anuddayañca anukampañca.
atk-abh03a:321_11: Attano atthāya eva hi evarūpo puggalo na sevitabbo.
atk-abh03a:322_2: Sīlasāmaññagatānaṃ satanti sīlena samānabhāvaṃ gatānaṃ santānaṃ.
atk-abh03a:322_3: Sīlakathā ca no bhavissatīti evaṃ samānasīlānaṃ amhākaṃ sīlameva ārabbha kathā bhavissati.
atk-abh03a:322_4: Sā ca no phāsu bhavissatīti sā ca sīlakathā amhākaṃ phāsuvihāro sukhavihāro bhavissati.
atk-abh03a:322_5: Sā ca no pavattinī bhavissatīti sā ca amhākaṃ kathā divasampi kathentānaṃ pavattinī bhavissati,
atk-abh03a:322_7: Dvīsu hi sīlavantesu ekena sīlassa vaṇṇe kathite itaro anumodati;
atk-abh03a:322_8: tena tesaṃ kathā phāsu ceva hoti,
atk-abh03a:322_10: Ekasmiṃ pana dussīle sati dussīlassa sīlakathā dukkathāti neva sīlakathā hoti,
atk-abh03a:322_16: rattiṃ vā divasaṃ vā atikkantampi na jānanti.
atk-abh03a:323_1: Sakkatvā garuṃ katvāti sakkārañceva garukārañca karitvā.
atk-abh03a:323_4: Paripūressāmīti taṃ atirekasīlaṃ puggalaṃ nissāya attano aparipūraṃ sīlarāsiṃ paripūraṃ karissāmi.
atk-abh03a:323_5: Tattha tattha paññāya anuggahessāmīti ettha sīlassa asappāye anupakāradhamme vajjetvā sappāye upakāradhamme
atk-abh03a:323_6: sevanto tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ṭhāne sīlakkhandhaṃ paññāya anuggaṇhāti nāma.
atk-abh03a:324_3: Atha kho nanti atha kho assa.
atk-abh03a:324_5: Evamevanti ettha gūthakūpo viya dussīlyaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-abh03a:324_6: Gūthakūpe patitvā ṭhito dhamanīahi viya dussīlapuggalo.
atk-abh03a:324_7: Guthakūpato uddhariyamānena tena ahinā purisassa sarīraṃ āruḷhenāpi adaṭṭhabhāvo viya dussīlaṃ sevamānassāpi
atk-abh03a:324_8: tassa kiriyāya kāraṇabhāvo sarīraṃ gūthena makkhetvā ahino gatakālo viya dussīlaṃ sevamānassa pāpakittisaddassa
atk-abh03a:325_2: Bhiyyoso mattāya cicciṭāyatīti tañhi jhāyamānaṃ pakatiyāpi papaṭikāyo muñcantaṃ cicciṭāyati ciṭiciṭāti saddaṃ karoti.
atk-abh03a:325_4: Evamevanti evamevaṃ kodhano attano dhammatāyapi uddhato caṇḍikato hutvā carati.
atk-abh03a:325_5: Appamattakaṃ pana vacanaṃ vuttakāle ‘mādisaṃ nāma evaṃ vadatī’ti atirekataraṃ uddhato caṇḍikato hutvā carati.
atk-abh03a:325_10: na sevitabboti yasmā kodhano atiseviyamānopi atiupasaṅkamiyamānopi kujjhatiyeva,
atk-abh03a:325_19: Anupasaṅkamitvā apaṭikkamitvā pana majjhattabhāvena tappentassa sītaṃ vūpasammati,
atk-abh03a:325_21: Tasmā palālaggi viya kodhano puggalo majjhattabhāvena ajjhupekkhitabbo,
atk-abh03a:327_2: sīlesu paripūrakārinoti ete ariyasāvakā yāni tāni maggabrahmacariyassa ādibhūtāni,
atk-abh03a:327_6: tehi ca vuṭṭhānato sīlesu yaṃ kattabbaṃ,
atk-abh03a:327_7: taṃ paripūraṃ samattaṃ karontīti ‘sīlesu paripūrakārino’ti vuccanti.
atk-abh03a:327_10: samādhiṃ paññañca bhāventāpi samādhipaññāsu yaṃ kattabbaṃ taṃ mattaso pamāṇena padesamattameva karontīti
atk-abh03a:327_11: samādhismiṃ paññāya ca mattaso kārinoti vuccanti.
atk-abh03a:327_12: Iminā upāyena itaresupi dvīsu nayesu attho veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:329_5: So yāni tāni khuddānukhuddakāni sikkhāpadāni tāni āpajjatipi,
atk-abh03a:329_11: Yāni ca kho tāni sikkhāpadāni ādibrahmacariyakāni brahmacariyasāruppāni,
atk-abh03a:329_15: So tiṇṇaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā sotāpanno hoti,
atk-abh03a:329_23: sakideva imaṃ lokaṃ āgantvā dukkhassantaṃ karoti.
atk-abh03a:330_4: Tena daṭṭhabboti tena paññāpanena so satthā rūpāvacarasamāpattiyā lābhīti daṭṭhabboti attho.
atk-abh03a:330_6: Sammāsambuddho satthā tena daṭṭhabboti tena titthiyehi asādhāraṇena paññāpanena ayaṃ tatiyo satthā sabbaññubuddho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-abh03a:330_7: Titthiyā hi kāmānaṃ pariññaṃ paññapentā rūpabhavaṃ vakkhanti.
atk-abh03a:330_12: Sammāsambuddho pana kāmānaṃ pariññaṃ pahānaṃ anāgāmimaggena paññapeti.
atk-abh03a:330_14: Ime tayo satthāroti ime dve janā bāhirakā,
atk-abh03a:331_3: Attānaṃ saccato thetato paññapetīti “attā nāmeko atthi nicco dhuvo sassato”ti bhūtato thirato paññapeti.
atk-abh03a:335_4: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ evarūpo puggalo yasmā sayaṃ katena ca dussīlyena samannāgato yañca samādapitena kataṃ,
atk-abh03a:336_1: Sappurisena sappurisataroti attanā katena susīlyena samannāgatattā yañca samādapito karoti.
atk-abh03a:338_1: Kalyāṇoti kusalakammapathasaṅkhātena dasavidhena kalyāṇadhammena samannāgato suddhako bhadrako.
atk-abh03a:340_5: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ evarūpo puggalo tīhi dvārehi āyūhanakammassa sadosattā,
atk-abh03a:341_1: Sāvajjena bahulanti yassa sāvajjameva kāyakammaṃ bahu hoti,
atk-abh03a:341_7: Yo gāmadhammatāya vā nigamadhammatāya vā kadāci karahaci uposathaṃ samādiyati,
atk-abh03a:341_9: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ evarūpo puggalo tīhi dvārehi āyūhanakammesu sāvajjasseva bahulatāya anavajjassa appatāya vajjabahuloti vuccati.
atk-abh03a:342_0: Yathā hi ekasmiṃ padese dubbaṇṇāni duggandhāni pupphāni rāsikatānassu,
atk-abh03a:342_1: tesaṃ upari tahaṃ tahaṃ atimuttakavassikapāṭalāni patitāni bhaveyyuṃ.
atk-abh03a:342_3: Yathā pana ekasmiṃ padese atimuttakavassikapāṭalāni rāsikatānassu,
atk-abh03a:342_4: tesaṃ upari tahaṃ tahaṃ dubbaṇṇaduggandhāni badarapupphādīni patitāni bhaveyyuṃ.
atk-abh03a:342_6: Catuttho pana tīhipi dvārehi āyūhanakammassa niddosattā,
atk-abh03a:343_6: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ ‘cattāro satipaṭṭhānā’tiādinā nayena saṃkhittena mātikāya ṭhapiyamānāya desanānusārena
atk-abh03a:343_7: ñāṇaṃ pesetvā arahattaṃ gaṇhituṃ samattho puggalo ugghaṭitaññūti vuccati.
atk-abh03a:344_2: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ saṅkhittena mātikaṃ ṭhapetvā vitthārena atthe bhājiyamāne arahattaṃ pāpuṇituṃ samattho puggalo vipañcitaññūti vuccati.
atk-abh03a:345_0: 150. Uddesādīhi netabboti neyyo. Anupubbena dhammābhisamayo hotīti anukkamena arahattappatti.
atk-abh03a:346_2: Na tāya jātiyā dhammābhisamayo hotīti na tena attabhāvena jhānaṃ vā vipassanaṃ vā maggaṃ vā phalaṃ vā nibbattetuṃ sakkotīti attho.
atk-abh03a:347_6: Pucchitānantarameva sīghaṃ byākātuṃ asamatthatāya no muttaṃ paṭibhānamassāti no muttappaṭibhāno.
atk-abh03a:347_11: So kira pañhaṃ puṭṭho pariggahetvā yuttapayuttakāraṇameva katheti.
atk-abh03a:348_1: pucchānantarameva yena vā tena vā vacanena paṭibāhati,
atk-abh03a:348_2: vīmaṃsitvāpi ca yuttaṃ na pekkhati catunikāyikapaṇḍitatissatthero viya.
atk-abh03a:348_3: So kira pañhaṃ puṭṭho pañhapariyosānampi nāgameti,
atk-abh03a:348_5: Vacanatthaṃ panassa vīmaṃsiyamānaṃ katthaci na laggati.
atk-abh03a:349_3: So kira pañhaṃ puṭṭho sīghameva katheti,
atk-abh03a:350_2: na yena vā tena vā paṭibāhituṃ sakkoti tibbandhakāranimuggo viya hoti lāḷudāyitthero viya.
atk-abh03a:351_3: Asahitañcāti kathento ca pana na atthayuttaṃ kāraṇayuttaṃ katheti.
atk-abh03a:351_4: Parisā cassa na kusalā hotīti sotuṃ nisinnaparisā cassa yuttāyuttaṃ kāraṇākāraṇaṃ siliṭṭhāsiliṭṭhaṃ na jānātīti attho.
atk-abh03a:351_9: itare pana dhammakathikānaṃ antare paviṭṭhattā evaṃ vuttā.
atk-abh03a:352_3: Tattha gajjitvā no vassanabhāvo nāma pāpako.
atk-abh03a:352_4: Manussā hi yathā devo gajjati ‘suvuṭṭhikā bhavissatī’ti bījāni nīharitvā vapanti.
atk-abh03a:352_5: Atha deve avassante khette bījāni khetteyeva nassanti,
atk-abh03a:352_6: gehe bījāni geheyeva nassantīti dubbhikkhaṃ hoti.
atk-abh03a:352_8: Manussā hi ‘imasmiṃ kāle dubbuṭṭhikā bhavissatī’ti ninnaṭṭhānesuyeva vappaṃ karonti.
atk-abh03a:352_9: Atha devo vassitvā sabbabījāni mahāsamuddaṃ pāpeti,
atk-abh03a:353_0: Bhāsitā hoti no kattāti ‘idāni ganthadhuraṃ pūressāmi,
atk-abh03a:354_0: Kattā hoti no bhāsitāti ‘ganthadhuraṃ vā pūressāmi vāsadhuraṃ vā’ti na bhāsati.
atk-abh03a:354_4: Eko hi ‘asukadivase nāma dānaṃ dassāmī’ti saṅghaṃ nimanteti,
atk-abh03a:354_8: Aparo saṅghaṃ animantetvāva sakkāraṃ katvā ‘bhikkhū ānessāmī’ti na labhati,
atk-abh03a:355_2: gādhaṃ kattā no vasitāti attano āsayaṃ bilaṃ kūpaṃ khaṇati,
atk-abh03a:355_7: Vasitā no gādhaṃ kattāti sayaṃ na khaṇati,
atk-abh03a:355_13: Imāya pana upamāya upamitesu puggalesu paṭhamo yathā sā mūsikā gādhaṃ khaṇati,
atk-abh03a:355_15: Yathā pana sā tattha na vasati,
atk-abh03a:355_18: tathā ayampi pariyattivasena ñāṇaṃ pesetvā catusaccadhammaṃ na paṭivijjhati,
atk-abh03a:355_20: Dutiyo yathā sā mūsikā gādhaṃ na khaṇati,
atk-abh03a:355_22: Yathā pana parena khatabile vasantī jīvitaṃ rakkhati;
