atk-abh03a:355_23: evaṃ parassa kathaṃ sutvā catusaccadhammaṃ paṭivijjhitvā tiṇṇaṃ mārānaṃ vasaṃ atikkamati.
atk-abh03a:356_2: āmaṃ pakkavaṇṇīti anto āmaṃ bahi pakkasadisaṃ.
atk-abh03a:356_3: Pakkaṃ āmavaṇṇīti anto pakkaṃ bahi āmasadisaṃ.
atk-abh03a:356_5: Tattha yathā ambe apakkabhāvo āmatā hoti,
atk-abh03a:357_7: Upamitapuggalesu panettha anto guṇasāravirahito tuccho bāhirasobhanatāya pihito puggalo veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:358_2: udakarahado tāva jaṇṇumattepi udake sati paṇṇarasasambhinnavaṇṇattā vā bahalattā vā udakassa apaññāyamānatalo uttāno gambhīrobhāso nāma hoti.
atk-abh03a:358_3: Tiporisa catuporisepi pana udake sati acchattā udakassa paññāyamānatalo gambhīro uttānobhāso nāma hoti.
atk-abh03a:358_5: Puggalopi kilesussadabhāvato guṇagambhīratāya ca abhāvato guṇagambhīrānaṃ sadisehi abhikkamādīhi yutto uttāno gambhīrobhāso nāma.
atk-abh03a:359_2: balībaddo tāva yo attano gogaṇaṃ ghaṭṭeti ubbejeti,
atk-abh03a:359_5: Puggalopi attano parisaṃ ghaṭṭento vijjhanto pharusena samudācaranto,
atk-abh03a:359_6: paraparisāya pana soraccaṃ nivātavuttitaṃ āpajjanto sakagavacaṇḍo hoti no paragavacaṇḍo nāmāti.
atk-abh03a:359_8: Niddesavāre panettha ubbejitā hotīti ghaṭṭetvā vijjhitvā ubbegappattaṃ karoticceva attho.
atk-abh03a:360_2: āsīviso tāva yassa visaṃ āsuṃ āgacchati sīghaṃ pharati;
atk-abh03a:361_1: Ananuvicca apariyogāhetvā avaṇṇārahassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsitā hotītiādīsu ananuviccāti atulayitvā,
atk-abh03a:362_4: Tatra kālaññū hotīti yamidaṃ kālenāti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:362_7: tassa pañhassa veyyākaraṇatthāya “imasmiṃ kāle pucchitenāpi mayā na kathetabbā,
atk-abh03a:362_10: Upekkhako viharatīti majjhattabhūtāya upekkhāya ṭhito hutvā viharati.
atk-abh03a:363_2: yo uṭṭhānavīriyeneva divasaṃ vītināmetvā tassa nissandaphalamattaṃ kiñcideva labhitvā jīvikaṃ kappeti,
atk-abh03a:363_3: taṃ pana uṭṭhānaṃ āgamma kiñci puññaphalaṃ na paṭilabhati,
atk-abh03a:363_4: taṃ sandhāya yassa puggalassa uṭṭhahatotiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:363_5: Tatūpari devāti tato upari brahmakāyikādayo devā.
atk-abh03a:363_8: Puññavato cāti idaṃ puññavante khattiyabrāhmaṇādayo ceva bhummadeve ādiṃ katvā nimmānaratipariyosāne deve ca sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:363_10: Nerayikā pana neva uṭṭhānena ājīvaṃ uppādetuṃ sakkonti,
atk-abh03a:363_11: nāpi nesaṃ puññaphalena koci ājīvo uppajjati.
atk-abh03a:364_17: Evaṃ puggalo tamo hoti tamaparāyaṇoti ettha eko puggalo bahiddhā ālokaṃ adisvā mātukucchismiññeva kālaṃ
atk-abh03a:364_18: katvā apāyesu nibbattanto sakalepi kappe saṃsarati.
atk-abh03a:364_21: Kuhakassa hi evarūpā nibbatti hotīti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:365_0: Ettha ca nīce kule paccājāto hoti caṇḍālakule vātiādīhi āgamanavipatti ceva pubbuppannapaccayavipatti ca dassitā.
atk-abh03a:365_5: Na lābhītiādīhi sukhakāraṇavipatti ceva upabhogavipatti ca.
atk-abh03a:366_0: Apicettha tividhāya kulasampattiyā paccājātiādikena jotinā yuttato joti,
atk-abh03a:366_3: Khattiyamahāsālakule vātiādīsu khattiyamahāsālāti khattiyā mahāsārā mahāsārappattā khattiyā.
atk-abh03a:366_4: Yesañhi khattiyānaṃ heṭṭhimantena koṭisataṃ nidhānagataṃ hoti,
atk-abh03a:366_5: tayo kahāpaṇakumbhā vaḷañjanatthāya gehamajjhe rāsiṃ katvā ṭhapitā honti,
atk-abh03a:366_8: diyaḍḍho kahāpaṇakumbho vaḷañjanatthāya gehamajjhe rāsiṃ katvā ṭhapito hoti,
atk-abh03a:366_11: kahāpaṇakumbho vaḷañjatthāya gehamajjhe rāsiṃ katvā ṭhapito hoti,
atk-abh03a:366_21: Dassanīyoti aññaṃ kammaṃ pahāya divasampi passitabbayutto.
atk-abh03a:367_2: diṭṭhadhammikāya vā samparāyikāya vā sampattiyā virahito oṇato. Nīco,
atk-abh03a:368_2: rukkho tāva pheggusāraparivāroti vanajeṭṭhakarukkho sayaṃ pheggu hoti,
atk-abh03a:369_12: Parathomanāyāti parehi thutivasena gāthādiupanibandhanena vuttāya thomanāya.
atk-abh03a:371_1: imesu hi catūsu puggalesu rūpe pamāṇaṃ gahetvā pasanno rūpappamāṇo nāma.
atk-abh03a:371_3: Ghose pamāṇaṃ gahetvā pasanno ghosappamāṇo nāma.
atk-abh03a:371_4: Cīvaralūkhapattalūkhesu pamāṇaṃ gahetvā pasanno lūkhappamāṇo nāma.
atk-abh03a:371_5: Dhamme pamāṇaṃ gahetvā pasanno dhammappamāṇo nāma.
atk-abh03a:371_7: Sabbasatte ca tayo koṭṭhāse katvā dve koṭṭhāsā rūpappamāṇā,
atk-abh03a:371_9: Pañca koṭṭhāse katvā cattāro koṭṭhāsā ghosappamāṇā,
atk-abh03a:371_11: Dasa koṭṭhāse katvā nava koṭṭhāsā lūkhappamāṇā,
atk-abh03a:371_13: Satasahassaṃ koṭṭhāse katvā pana eko koṭṭhāsova dhammappamāṇo,
atk-abh03a:372_0: Etasmiṃ catuppamāṇe lokasannivāse buddhesu appasannā mandā,
atk-abh03a:372_2: Rūpappamāṇassa hi buddharūpato uttari pasādāvahaṃ rūpaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-abh03a:372_3: Ghosappamāṇassa buddhānaṃ kittighosato uttari pasādāvaho ghoso nāma natthi.
atk-abh03a:372_4: Lūkhappamāṇassa kāsikāni vatthāni mahārahāni kañcanabhājanāni tiṇṇaṃ utūnaṃ anucchavike sabbasampattiyutte
atk-abh03a:372_6: uttari pasādāvahaṃ aññaṃ lūkhaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-abh03a:372_7: Dhammappamāṇassa sadevake loke asādhāraṇasīlādiguṇassa tathāgatassa sīlādiguṇato uttari pasādāvaho añño sīlādiguṇo nāma natthi.
atk-abh03a:372_8: Iti bhagavā imaṃ catuppamāṇikaṃ lokasannivāsaṃ muṭṭhinā gahetvā viya ṭhitoti.
atk-abh03a:373_9: parapuggalaṃ “tayāpi sīlasampannena bhavituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vatvā yathā sīlaṃ samādiyati,
atk-abh03a:373_13: Etesu pana catūsu paṭhamo vakkalittherasadiso hoti.
atk-abh03a:374_6: Uccārakammādīsu lokiyakulaputtācārena virahito ṭhitakova uccāraṃ karoti,
atk-abh03a:374_9: Hatthāpalekhanoti hatthe piṇḍamhi niṭṭhite jivhāya hatthaṃ apalekhati.
atk-abh03a:374_10: Uccāraṃ vā katvā hatthasmiññeva daṇḍakasaññī hutvā hatthena apalekhatīti dasseti.
atk-abh03a:374_12: Tasmā tesaṃ paṭipadaṃ pūrento evaṃ karoti.
atk-abh03a:374_15: Tena hi ‘tiṭṭha bhaddante’ti vuttopi na tiṭṭhatīti natiṭṭhabhaddantiko.
atk-abh03a:374_16: Tadubhayampi hetaṃ titthiyā “etassa vacanaṃ kataṃ bhavissatī”ti na karonti.
atk-abh03a:374_18: Uddissakatanti “imaṃ tumhe uddissa kata”nti evaṃ ārocitabhikkhaṃ.
atk-abh03a:374_19: Na nimantananti “asukaṃ nāma kulaṃ vā vīthiṃ vā gāmaṃ vā paviseyyāthā”ti evaṃ nimantitabhikkhampi na sādiyati,
atk-abh03a:375_0: Na kumbhimukhāti kumbhito uddharitvā diyyamānaṃ bhikkhaṃ na gaṇhāti.
atk-abh03a:375_5: Na eḷakamantaranti ummāraṃ antaraṃ katvā diyyamānaṃ na gaṇhāti. Kasmā?
atk-abh03a:375_8: Dvinnanti dvīsu bhuñjamānesu ekasmiṃ uṭṭhāya dente na gaṇhati. Kasmā?
atk-abh03a:375_10: Na gabbhiniyātiādīsu pana gabbhiniyā kucchiyaṃ dārako kilamati.
atk-abh03a:375_12: Purisantaragatāya ratiantarāyo hotīti na gaṇhāti na saṅkittīsūti saṅkittetvā katabhattesu.
atk-abh03a:375_13: Dubbhikkhasamaye kira acelakasāvakā acelakānaṃ atthāya tato tato taṇḍulādīni samādapetvā bhattaṃ pacanti,
atk-abh03a:375_15: Na yattha sāti yattha sunakho ‘piṇḍaṃ labhissāmī’ti upaṭṭhito hoti,
atk-abh03a:375_16: tattha tassa adatvā āhaṭaṃ na gaṇhāti. Kasmā?
atk-abh03a:376_1: Sace hi acelakaṃ disvā ‘imassa bhikkhaṃ dassāmā’ti mānussakā bhattagehaṃ pavisanti,
atk-abh03a:376_2: tesu ca pavisantesu kaḷopimukhādīsu nilīnā makkhikā uppatitvā saṇḍasaṇḍā caranti,
atk-abh03a:376_3: tato āhaṭaṃ bhikkhaṃ na gaṇhāti. Kasmā?
atk-abh03a:376_8: Ekāgārikoti yo ekasmiṃyeva gehe bhikkhaṃ labhitvā nivattati.
atk-abh03a:377_8: nīvārā nāma tāva araññe sayaṃ jātā vīhijāti.
atk-abh03a:378_15: yāni kānici tantāvutānaṃ vatthānaṃ kesakambalo tesaṃ patikuṭṭho akkhāyatī”ti.
atk-abh03a:379_1: Gacchantopi ukkuṭikova hutvā uppatitvā uppatitvā gacchati.
atk-abh03a:379_2: Kaṇṭakāpassayikoti ayakaṇṭake vā pakatikaṇṭake vā bhūmiyaṃ koṭṭetvā tattha cammaṃ attharitvā ṭhānacaṅkamādīni karoti.
atk-abh03a:379_6: sāyanti divasassa tikkhattuṃ pāpaṃ pavāhessāmī”ti udakorohanānuyogaṃ anuyutto viharati.
atk-abh03a:381_6: Ṭhapetvā hi sappiṃ avaseso yo koci sneho telanti vuccati.
atk-abh03a:381_7: Kaṇḍuvamānoti nakhānaṃ chinnattā kaṇḍuvitabbakāle tena kaṇḍuvamāno.
atk-abh03a:381_11: vacchopi setakova sace kabarā vā, rattā vā,
atk-abh03a:381_14: So evamāhāti so rājā evaṃ vadeti.
atk-abh03a:381_17: Barihisatthāyāti parikkhepakaraṇatthāya ceva yaññabhūmiyaṃ attharaṇatthāya ca.
atk-abh03a:382_5: Anto tāpanakilesānaṃ abhāvā sītalo jātoti sītībhūto.
atk-abh03a:383_0: Imaṃ pana puggalaṃ buddhuppādato paṭṭhāya dassetuṃ –
atk-abh03a:383_2: Tattha tathāgatoti aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi bhagavā tathāgato –
atk-abh03a:383_13: Suṇāti gahapati vāti kasmā paṭhamaṃ gahapatiṃ niddisati?
atk-abh03a:383_15: Yebhuyyena hi khattiyakulato pabbajitā jātiṃ nissāya mānaṃ karonti.
atk-abh03a:383_16: Brāhmaṇakulā pabbajitā mante nissāya mānaṃ karonti.
atk-abh03a:383_17: Hīnajaccakulā pabbajitā attano vijātitāya patiṭṭhātuṃ na sakkonti.
atk-abh03a:383_18: Gahapatidārakā pana kacchehi sedaṃ muñcantehi piṭṭhiyā loṇaṃ pupphamānāya bhūmiṃ kasitvā tādisassa mānassa abhāvato nihatamānadappā honti.
atk-abh03a:383_19: Te pabbajitvā mānaṃ vā dappaṃ vā akatvā yathābalaṃ buddhavacanaṃ uggahetvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karontā sakkonti arahatte patiṭṭhātuṃ.
atk-abh03a:383_20: Itarehi ca kulehi nikkhamitvā pabbajitā nāma na bahukā,
atk-abh03a:383_22: Iti nihatamānattā ussannattā ca paṭhamaṃ gahapatiṃ niddisatīti.
atk-abh03a:384_0: Aññatarasmiṃ vāti itaresaṃ vā kulānaṃ aññatarasmiṃ.
atk-abh03a:384_2: Tathāgate saddhaṃ paṭilabhatīti parisuddhaṃ dhammaṃ sutvā dhammassāmimhi tathāgate “sammāsambuddho vata so bhagavā”ti saddhaṃ paṭilabhati.
atk-abh03a:384_4: Sambādho gharāvāsoti sacepi saṭṭhihatthe ghare yojanasatantarepi vā dve jāyampatikā vasanti,
atk-abh03a:384_9: Pabbajito hi kūṭāgāraratanapāsāde ca devavimānādīsu ca supihitadvāravātapānesu paṭicchannesu vasantopi neva laggati,
atk-abh03a:385_2: Rajopatho asaṃvutasaṅkāraṭṭhānaṃ viya rajānaṃ kilesarajānaṃ sannipātaṭṭhānato.
atk-abh03a:385_6: yadetaṃ sikkhattayabrahmacariyaṃ ekampi divasaṃ akhaṇḍaṃ katvā carimakacittaṃ pāpetabbatāya ekantaparipuṇṇaṃ.
atk-abh03a:385_7: Ekadivasampi ca kilesamalena amalinaṃ katvā carimakacittaṃ pāpetabbatāya ekantaparisuddhaṃ.
atk-abh03a:385_9: Idaṃ na sukaraṃ agāraṃ ajjhāvasatā agāramajjhe vasantena ekantaparipuṇṇaṃ…pe… carituṃ –
atk-abh03a:385_10: “yaṃnūnāhaṃ kese ca massuñca ohāretvā kasāyarasapītatāya kāsāyāni brahmacariyaṃ carantānaṃ anucchavikāni
atk-abh03a:385_11: vatthāni acchādetvā paridahitvā agārasmā nikkhamitvā anagāriyaṃ pabbajeyya”nti.
atk-abh03a:385_12: Ettha ca yasmā agārassa hitaṃ kasivāṇijjādikammaṃ “agāriya”nti vuccati,
atk-abh03a:385_17: Appaṃ vāti sahassato heṭṭhā bhogakkhandho appo nāma hoti,
atk-abh03a:386_1: Bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāsājīvasamāpannoti yā bhikkhūnaṃ adhisīlasaṅkhātā sikkhā, tañca.
atk-abh03a:386_6: Samāpannoti sikkhaṃ paripūrento sājīvañca avītikkamanto hutvā tadubhayaṃ upagatoti attho.
atk-abh03a:386_7: Pāṇātipātaṃ pahāyātiādīsu pāṇātipātādikathā heṭṭhā vitthāritā eva.
atk-abh03a:386_9: Paṭivirato hotīti pahīnakālato paṭṭhāya tato dussīlyato orato viratova hoti.
atk-abh03a:386_10: Nihitadaṇḍo nihitasatthoti parūpaghātatthāya daṇḍaṃ vā satthaṃ vā ādāya avattanato nikkhittadaṇḍo ceva nikkhittasattho cāti attho.
atk-abh03a:386_12: sabbampi avasesaṃ upakaraṇaṃ sattānaṃ vināsanabhāvato ‘sattha’nti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh03a:386_13: Yaṃ pana bhikkhū kattaradaṇḍaṃ vā dantakaṭṭhavāsiṃ vā pipphalikaṃ vā gahetvā vicaranti,
atk-abh03a:386_19: Tāya dayāpannatāya sabbesaṃ pāṇabhūtānaṃ hitacittakoti attho.
atk-abh03a:387_6: Athenaṃ sucibhūtaṃ attabhāvaṃ katvā viharatīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-abh03a:388_3: Methunāti rāgapariyuṭṭhānavasena sadisattā methunakāti laddhavohārehi paṭisevitabbato methunāti saṅkhaṃ gatā asaddhammā.
atk-abh03a:389_3: Yo hi puriso kadāci musā vadati,
atk-abh03a:389_5: tassa musāvādena antaritattā saccaṃ saccena na ghaṭīyati,
atk-abh03a:389_8: Jīvitahetupi musā avatvā saccena saccaṃ sandahatiyevāti saccasandho.
atk-abh03a:389_17: Asinā sīse chindantepi dve kathā na katheti.
atk-abh03a:389_21: Ekacco hi puggalo na paccayiko hoti.
atk-abh03a:389_23: Asukenā’ti vutte ‘mā tassa vacanaṃ saddahathā’ti vattabbataṃ āpajjati.
atk-abh03a:389_31: Avisaṃvādako lokassāti tāya saccavāditāya lokaṃ na visaṃvādetīti attho.
atk-abh03a:390_0: Imesaṃ bhedāyāti yesaṃ ito sutvāti vuttānaṃ santike sutaṃ,
atk-abh03a:390_2: Bhinnānaṃ vā sandhātāti dvinnaṃ mittānaṃ vā samānupajjhāyakādīnaṃ vā kenacideva kāraṇena bhinnānaṃ ekamekaṃ upasaṅkamitvā –
atk-abh03a:390_4: evaṃ bahussutānaṃ idaṃ na yutta’ntiādīni vatvā sandhānaṃ kattā.
atk-abh03a:390_8: evarūpehi guṇehi samannāgatānaṃ anucchavikameta’ntiādīni vatvā daḷhīkammaṃ kattāti attho.
atk-abh03a:390_15: Te pahāya aññatra gantumpi na icchatīti attho.
atk-abh03a:390_17: Samaggakaraṇiṃ vācaṃ bhāsitāti yā vācā satte samaggeyeva karoti,
atk-abh03a:391_2: Bhūtaṃ tathaṃ tacchaṃ sabhāvameva vadatīti bhūtavādī.
atk-abh03a:391_9: Kālenāti evarūpiṃ bhāsamānopi ca “ahaṃ nidhānavatiṃ vācaṃ bhāsissāmī”ti na akālena bhāsati.
atk-abh03a:391_16: Atthasaṃhitanti anekehipi nayehi vibhajantena pariyādātuṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya atthasampannaṃ bhāsati.
atk-abh03a:391_17: Yaṃ vā so atthavādī atthaṃ vadati,
atk-abh03a:391_18: tena atthena saṃhitattā atthasaṃhitaṃ vācaṃ bhāsati.
atk-abh03a:391_19: Na aññaṃ nikkhipitvā aññaṃ bhāsatīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-abh03a:392_4: aggabījaṃ bījabījanti pañcavidhassa bījagāmassa ceva yassa kassaci nīlatiṇarukkhādikassa bhūtagāmassa ca samārambhā.
atk-abh03a:392_10: Tasmā antomajjhanhike dasakkhattuṃ bhuñjamānopi ekabhattikova hoti.
atk-abh03a:392_15: Atikkante majjhanhike yāva sūriyasatthaṅgamanā bhojanaṃ vikālabhojanaṃ nāma,
atk-abh03a:392_17: Sāsanassa ananulomattā visūkaṃ paṭāṇībhūtaṃ dassananti visūkadassanaṃ.
atk-abh03a:392_18: Attanā naccananaccāpanādivasena naccā ca gītā ca vāditā ca antamaso mayūranaccanāpanādivasenapi pavattānaṃ
atk-abh03a:392_20: Naccādīni hi attanā payojetuṃ vā parehi payojāpetuṃ vā yuttāni passituṃ vā neva bhikkhūnaṃ na bhikkhunīnaṃ vaṭṭanti.
atk-abh03a:392_27: Gandhavasena chavirāgavasena ca sādiyanto vibhūseti nāma.
atk-abh03a:392_29: Tasmā yāya dussīlyacetanāya tāni mālādhāraṇādīni mahājano karoti,
atk-abh03a:393_3: Āmakamaṃsapaṭiggahaṇāti ettha aññatra odissa anuññātā āmakamacchamaṃsānaṃ paṭiggahaṇameva bhikkhūnaṃ na vaṭṭati,
atk-abh03a:393_8: Dāsidāsapaṭiggahaṇāti ettha dāsidāsavaseneva tesaṃ paṭiggahaṇaṃ na vaṭṭati.
atk-abh03a:393_12: Tattha khettaṃ nāma yasmiṃ pubbaṇṇaṃ ruhati.
atk-abh03a:393_14: Yattha vā ubhayampi ruhati taṃ khettaṃ.
atk-abh03a:394_1: Gihīnaṃ pahitaṃ paṇṇaṃ vā sāsanaṃ vā gahetvā tattha tattha gamanaṃ.
atk-abh03a:394_4: Tasmā dūteyyapahīṇagamanānaṃ anugoti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-abh03a:394_11: Tattha rūpakūṭaṃ nāma dve tulā samarūpā katvā gaṇhanto mahatiyā gaṇhāti,
atk-abh03a:394_13: Aṅgakūṭaṃ nāma gaṇhanto pacchābhāge hatthena tulaṃ akkamati,
atk-abh03a:394_15: Gahaṇakūṭaṃ nāma gaṇhanto mūle rajjuṃ gaṇhāti,
atk-abh03a:394_17: Paṭicchannakūṭaṃ nāma tulaṃ susiraṃ katvā anto ayacuṇṇaṃ pakkhipitvā gaṇhanto taṃ pacchābhāge karoti,
atk-abh03a:395_2: Ekaṃ suvaṇṇapātiṃ katvā aññā dve tisso lohapātiyo suvaṇṇavaṇṇā karonti,
atk-abh03a:395_3: tato janapadaṃ gantvā kiñcideva aḍḍhakulaṃ pavisitvā suvaṇṇabhājanāni kiṇathā’ti vatvā agghe pucchite samagghataraṃ dātukāmā honti.
atk-abh03a:395_4: Tato tehi ‘kathaṃ imesaṃ suvaṇṇabhāvo jānitabbo’ti vutte ‘vīmaṃsitvā gaṇhathā’ti suvaṇṇapātiṃ pāsāṇe ghaṃsitvā sabbapātiyo datvā gacchanti.
atk-abh03a:396_2: Tāni hi gaṇhanto heṭṭhā chiddena mānena ‘saṇikaṃ āsiñcā’ti vatvā antobhājane bahuṃ paggharāpetvā gaṇhāti.
atk-abh03a:396_3: Dadanto chiddaṃ pidhāya sīghaṃ pūretvā deti.
atk-abh03a:396_5: Tāni hi gaṇhanto saṇikaṃ sikhaṃ ussāpetvā gaṇhāti.
atk-abh03a:396_6: Dadanto vegena pūretvā sikhaṃ chindanto deti.
atk-abh03a:396_8: Lañjaṃ alabhantā hi khettaṃ amahantampi mahantaṃ katvā minanti.
atk-abh03a:397_2: Vañcananti tehi tehi upāyehi paresaṃ vañcanaṃ.
atk-abh03a:397_4: eko kira luddako migañca migapotakañca gahetvā āgacchati.
atk-abh03a:397_9: migapotako eka”nti ca vutte kahāpaṇaṃ datvā migapotakaṃ gahetvā thokaṃ gantvā nivatto,
atk-abh03a:397_12: Tena hi “dve kahāpaṇe dehī”ti. So āha – “nanu te, bho,
atk-abh03a:397_16: evaṃ so ca kahāpaṇo ayañca kahāpaṇagghaṇako migapotakoti dve kahāpaṇā bhavissantīti.
atk-abh03a:397_17: So “kāraṇaṃ vadatī”ti sallakkhetvā migapotakaṃ gahetvā migaṃ adāsīti.
atk-abh03a:398_0: Nikatīti yogavasena vā māyāvasena vā apāmaṅgaṃ pāmaṅganti,
atk-abh03a:398_5: Tasmā ukkoṭanasāciyogo vañcanasāciyogo nikatisāciyogoti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-abh03a:398_6: Keci aññaṃ dassetvā aññassa parivattanaṃ ‘sāciyogo’ti vadanti.
atk-abh03a:399_6: Yañhi himapātasamaye himena paṭicchannā hutvā maggappaṭipannaṃ janaṃ musanti,
atk-abh03a:399_12: Gehaṃ pavisitvā manussānaṃ ure satthaṃ ṭhapetvā icchitabhaṇḍaggahaṇaṃ.
atk-abh03a:400_1: So santuṭṭho hotīti so catūsu paccayesu dvādasavidhena itarītarapaccayasantosena samannāgato hoti.
atk-abh03a:400_4: Samādāyeva pakkamatīti aṭṭhavidhaṃ bhikkhu parikkhāramattakaṃ sabbaṃ gahetvāva kāyapaṭibaddhaṃ katvāva gacchati.
atk-abh03a:400_5: “Mama vihāro pariveṇaṃ upaṭṭhāko”ti saṅgo vā baddho vā na hoti.
atk-abh03a:400_6: So jiyā muttasaro viya yūthā pakkanto,
atk-abh03a:400_7: mattahatthī viya icchiticchitaṃ senāsanaṃ vanasaṇḍaṃ rukkhamūlaṃ vanapatthaṃ pabbhāraṃ paribhuñjanto ekova tiṭṭhati,
atk-abh03a:406_5: sakuṇo nāma “asukasmiṃ padese rukkho paripakkaphalo”ti ñatvā nānādisāhi āgantvā nakhapakkhatuṇḍādīhi tassa phalāni vijjhantā vidhunantā khādanti.
atk-abh03a:406_7: idaṃ svātanāya bhavissatī”ti tesaṃ na hoti.
atk-abh03a:406_8: Phale pana khīṇe neva rukkhassa ārakkhaṃ ṭhapenti,
atk-abh03a:406_9: na tattha pattaṃ vā nakhaṃ vā tuṇḍaṃ vā ṭhapenti.
atk-abh03a:406_10: Atha kho tasmiṃ rukkhe anapekkho hutvā yo yaṃ disābhāgaṃ icchati,
atk-abh03a:406_12: Evameva ayaṃ bhikkhu nissaṅgo nirapekkhoyeva pakkamati,
atk-abh03a:407_1: So cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvāti so iminā ariyena sīlakkhandhena samannāgato bhikkhu cakkhuviññāṇena rūpaṃ passitvāti attho.
atk-abh03a:407_6: Indriyasaṃvarasukhañhi diṭṭhādīsu diṭṭhamattādivasena pavattatāya avikiṇṇaṃ hoti.
atk-abh03a:408_1: So abhikkante paṭikkanteti so manacchaṭṭhānaṃ indriyānaṃ saṃvarena samannāgato bhikkhu imesu abhikkantapaṭikkantādīsu
atk-abh03a:409_2: Yassa hi ime cattāro paccayā natthi,
atk-abh03a:409_4: tiracchānagatehi vā vanacarakehi vā saddhiṃ vattabbataṃ āpajjati.
atk-abh03a:409_5: Araññe adhivatthā devatā “kiṃ evarūpassa pāpabhikkhuno araññavāsenā”ti bheravaṃ saddaṃ sāventi.
atk-abh03a:409_7: “Asuko bhikkhu araññaṃ pavisitvā idañcidañca pāpakammaṃ akāsī”ti ayaso pattharati.
atk-abh03a:409_10: So hi attano sīlaṃ paccavekkhanto kiñci kāḷakaṃ vā tilakaṃ vā apassanto pītiṃ uppādetvā taṃ khayato vayato sammasanto ariyabhūmiṃ okkamati.
atk-abh03a:409_11: Araññe adhivatthā devatā attamanā vaṇṇaṃ bhāsanti.
atk-abh03a:409_12: Itissa udake pakkhittatelabindu viya yaso vitthāriko hoti.
atk-abh03a:409_15: yathākammūpage satte pajānātīti ettake ṭhāne yaṃ vattabbaṃ siyā,
atk-abh03a:410_1: Tatiyavijjāya so evaṃ samāhite citteti vipassanāpādakaṃ catutthajjhānacittaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh03a:410_3: Arahattamaggo hi āsavānaṃ vināsanato āsavānaṃ khayoti vuccati.
atk-abh03a:410_8: na ito bhiyyo”ti sabbampi dukkhasaccaṃ sarasalakkhaṇappaṭivedhena yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti,
atk-abh03a:410_16: ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadāti sarasalakkhaṇapaṭivedhena yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti,
atk-abh03a:411_0: Evaṃ sarūpato saccāni dassetvā idāni kilesavasena pariyāyato dassento ime āsavātiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:411_1: Tassa evaṃ jānato evaṃ passatoti tassa evaṃ jānantassa evaṃ passantassa saha vipassanāya koṭippattaṃ maggaṃ katheti.
atk-abh03a:411_7: Vimuttasmiṃ vimuttamiti ñāṇanti iminā paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ dasseti.
atk-abh03a:411_9: Tena hi ñāṇena so paccavekkhanto ‘khīṇā jātī’tiādīni pajānāti.
atk-abh03a:411_10: Vusitanti vuṭṭhaṃ parivuṭṭhaṃ kataṃ caritaṃ niṭṭhitanti attho.
atk-abh03a:411_12: Puthujjanakalyāṇakena hi saddhiṃ satta sekkhā brahmacariyavāsaṃ vasanti nāma.
atk-abh03a:411_14: Tasmā so attano brahmacariyavāsaṃ paccavekkhanto vusitaṃ brahmacariyanti pajānāti.
atk-abh03a:411_15: Kataṃ karaṇīyanti catūsu saccesu catūhi maggehi pariññāpahānasacchikiriyābhāvanāvasena soḷasavidhampi kiccaṃ niṭṭhāpitanti attho.
atk-abh03a:411_20: Nāparaṃ itthattāyāti “idāni puna etthabhāvāya evaṃ soḷasakiccabhāvāya kilesakkhayāya vā maggabhāvanākiccaṃ natthī”ti pajānāti.
atk-abh03a:412_2: appahīnoti vikkhambhanappahānena vā tadaṅgappahānena vā samucchedappahānena vā appahīno.
atk-abh03a:413_3: Ajjhattaṃ cetosamathassāti niyakajjhattasaṅkhāte attano citte uppannassa cetosamathassa.
atk-abh03a:413_4: Adhipaññādhammavipassanāyāti adhipaññāsaṅkhātāya khandhadhammesu aniccādivasena pavattāya vipassanāya.
atk-abh03a:414_6: Pāpañca kammaṃ na karotīti paññattaṃ vītikkamanto na karoti.
atk-abh03a:414_7: Sahāpi dukkhena sahāpi domanassenāti kilesapariyuṭṭhāne sati uppannena dukkhadomanassena saddhimpi.
atk-abh03a:414_12: Kiṃ pana te rudantā brahmacariyaṃ carantīti? Āma.
atk-abh03a:415_1: Anāgāmīti kāmarāgabyāpādehi akampanīyacittatāya ca tamhā lokā anāvattidhammatāya ca ṭhitasabhāvo nāma.
atk-abh03a:415_7: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ khīṇāsavo “tiṇṇo pāraṅgato thale tiṭṭhati brāhmaṇo”ti vuccati.
atk-abh03a:416_2: appakaṃ sutaṃ hotīti navaṅge satthusāsane kiñcideva thokaṃ sutaṃ hoti.
atk-abh03a:416_4: na dhammamaññāya dhammānudhammapaṭipanno hotīti aṭṭhakathañca pāḷiñca jānitvā lokuttaradhammassa anurūpadhammaṃ pubbabhāgapaṭipadaṃ paṭipanno na hoti.
atk-abh03a:417_6: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ sotāpanno sāsane mūlajātāya saddhāya patiṭṭhitattā ‘samaṇamacalo’ti vuccati.
atk-abh03a:417_7: Sakadāgāmī pana rajjanakilesassa atthitāya samaṇapadumoti vutto.
atk-abh03a:417_8: Rattaṭṭho hi idha padumaṭṭho nāmāti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:417_9: Anāgāmī kāmarāgasaṅkhātassa rajjanakilesassa natthitāya samaṇapuṇḍarīkoti vutto.
atk-abh03a:417_10: Paṇḍaraṭṭho hi idha puṇḍarīkaṭṭho nāmāti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:417_11: Khīṇāsavo ca thaddhabhāvakarānaṃ kilesānaṃ abhāvena samaṇesu samaṇasukhumālo nāmāti vutto.
atk-abh03a:420_1: tatrāti tesu “ārabhati ca vippaṭisārī ca hotī”tiādinā nayena heṭṭhā uddiṭṭhapuggalesu.
atk-abh03a:420_13: “Ārabhati ca vippaṭisārī ca hotī”ti ayaṃ pana āpattivītikkame āgato.
atk-abh03a:420_14: Tasmā āpattivītikkamavasena ārabhati ceva tappaccayā vippaṭisārī ca hotīti ayamettha attho.
atk-abh03a:421_0: Yathābhūtaṃ nappajānātīti anadhigatattā yathāsabhāvato na jānāti.
atk-abh03a:421_2: yaṃ ṭhānaṃ patvā etassa puggalassa uppannā pāpakā akusalā dhammā aparisesā nirujjhantīti attho.
atk-abh03a:421_6: Evaṃ santepi idha maggakiccavasena phalameva vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh03a:421_18: suddhante ṭhitabhāvapaccavekkhaṇena vippaṭisāraje āsave paṭivinodetvā nīharitvā vipassanācittañceva vipassanāpaññañca bhāvetū”ti.
atk-abh03a:421_19: Amunā pañcamena puggalenāti etena pañcamena khīṇāsavapuggalena.
atk-abh03a:421_20: Samasamo bhavissatīti lokuttaraguṇehi samabhāveneva samo bhavissatīti evaṃ khīṇāsavena ovaditabboti attho.
atk-abh03a:422_0: Ārabhati na vippaṭisārī hotīti āpattiṃ āpajjati.
atk-abh03a:422_3: Aṅguttaraṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “vuṭṭhitattā na vippaṭisārī hotī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:422_4: Na ārabhati vippaṭisārī hotīti āpattiṃ nāpajjati,
atk-abh03a:422_5: vinayapaññattiyaṃ pana akovidattā anāpattiyaṃ āpattisaññī hutvā vippaṭisārī hoti.
atk-abh03a:422_6: Aṅguttaraṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “sakiṃ āpattiṃ āpajjitvā tato vuṭṭhāya pacchā kiñcāpi nāpajjati,
atk-abh03a:422_7: vippaṭisāraṃ pana vinodetuṃ na sakkotī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:422_8: Na ārabhati na vippaṭisārī hotīti neva āpattiṃ āpajjati,
atk-abh03a:422_12: So hi “kiṃ me imasmiṃ buddhakāle parinibbānena,
atk-abh03a:422_13: anāgate metteyyasammāsambuddhakāle parinibbāyissāmī”ti visuddhasīlopi paṭipattiṃ na pūreti.
atk-abh03a:422_14: Sopi “kimatthaṃ āyasmā pamatto viharati puthujjanassa nāma gati anibaddhā.
atk-abh03a:422_15: Āyasmā hi metteyyasammāsambuddhassa sammukhabhāvaṃ labheyyapi na labheyyāpīti arahattatthāya vipassanaṃ bhāvehī”ti ovaditabbova.
atk-abh03a:423_3: So cīvarādīni labhitvā aññaṃ appapuññaṃ āpucchati.
atk-abh03a:423_5: Athassa itaro thokaṃ kupito hutvā maṅkubhāvaṃ uppādetukāmo vadati –
atk-abh03a:423_9: Eko pana ekena saddhiṃ dve tīṇi vassāni vasanto pubbe taṃ puggalaṃ garuṃ katvā pacchā gacchante gacchante kāle cittīkāraṃ na karoti,
atk-abh03a:424_4: eko puggalo sāruppaṃyeva bhikkhuṃ ‘asāruppo eso’ti katheti,
atk-abh03a:424_6: Puna aññena sabhāgena bhikkhunā ‘sāruppo aya’nti vuttepi tassa vacanaṃ na gaṇhāti “asukena nāma ‘asāruppo
atk-abh03a:424_7: aya’nti amhākaṃ kathita”nti purimabhikkhunova kathaṃ gaṇhāti.
atk-abh03a:424_9: Tassa vacanaṃ saddahitvā puna aññena “asāruppo esa bhikkhu,
atk-abh03a:424_10: nāyaṃ tumhākaṃ santikaṃ upasaṅkamituṃ yutto”ti vuttopi tassa vacanaṃ aggahetvā purimasseva kathaṃ gaṇhāti.
atk-abh03a:425_0: Loloti saddhādīnaṃ ittarakālaṭṭhitikattā assaddhiyādīhi lulitabhāvena lolo.
atk-abh03a:425_4: Ettha pana punappunaṃ bhajanavasena saddhāva bhatti.
atk-abh03a:425_7: Evaṃ puggalo lolo hotīti evaṃ ittarasaddhāditāya puggalo lolo nāma hoti.
atk-abh03a:425_10: assapiṭṭhiyaṃ ṭhapitakumbhaṇḍaṃ viya ca anibaddhaṭṭhāno muhuttena pasīdati,
atk-abh03a:426_0: Mando momūhoti aññāṇabhāvena mando avisadatāya momūho. Mahāmūḷhoti attho.
atk-abh03a:427_3: Rajagganti hatthiassādīnaṃ pādappahārabhinnāya bhūmiyā uggataṃ rajakkhandhaṃ.
atk-abh03a:427_4: Na santhambhatīti santhambhitvā ṭhātuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-abh03a:427_6: Dhajagganti hatthiassādipiṭṭhesu vā rathesu vā ussāpitānaṃ dhajānaṃ aggaṃ.
atk-abh03a:427_13: Sahati sampahāranti dve tayo pahāre patvāpi sahati,
atk-abh03a:427_18: Laddhappahārānaṃ pahārajagganatthañceva katakammānaṃ visesaṃ ñatvā ṭhānantaradānatthañca issariyasukhānubhavanatthañca.
atk-abh03a:428_1: Idāni yasmā satthu yodhājīvehi kiccaṃ natthi,
atk-abh03a:428_2: imasmiṃ pana sāsane tathārūpe pañca puggale dassetuṃ idaṃ opammaṃ ābhataṃ,
atk-abh03a:429_2: Na sakkoti brahmacariyaṃ sandhāretunti brahmacariyavāsaṃ anupacchijjamānaṃ gopetuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-abh03a:429_4: Kimassa rajaggasminti kiṃ tassa puggalassa rajaggaṃ nāmāti vadati.
atk-abh03a:431_1: Abhinisīdatīti abhibhavitvā santike vā ekāsane vā nisīdati.
atk-abh03a:432_1: Viniveṭhetvā vinimocetvāti gahitaṭṭhānato tassa hatthaṃ viniveṭhetvā ceva,
atk-abh03a:433_4: attano pana mandattā momūhattā aññāṇeneva piṇḍapātiko hoti.
atk-abh03a:433_5: Pāpiccho icchāpakatoti piṇḍapātikassa me sato “ayaṃ piṇḍapātiko”ti catupaccayasakkāraṃ karissanti. Lajjī,
atk-abh03a:433_7: Evaṃ pāpikāya icchāya ṭhatvā tāya pāpicchāya abhibhūto hutvā piṇḍapātiko hoti.
atk-abh03a:433_8: Ummādavasena piṇḍāya caranto pana ummādā cittavikkhepā piṇḍapātiko nāma hoti.
atk-abh03a:433_9: Vaṇṇitanti idaṃ piṇḍapātikaṅgaṃ nāma buddhehi ca buddhasāvakehi ca vaṇṇitaṃ pasatthanti piṇḍapātiko hoti.
atk-abh03a:433_13: ‘iti santuṭṭho bhavissāmi idaṃ me piṇḍapātikaṅgaṃ santuṭṭhiyā saṃvattissati’;
atk-abh03a:433_15: idaṃ me piṇḍapātikaṅgaṃ kilesasallekhanatthāya saṃvattissatī”ti piṇḍapātiko hoti.
atk-abh03a:433_18: Yaṃ yaṃ laddhaṃ tena teneva yāpanabhāvaṃ nissāyāti attho.
atk-abh03a:434_0: Gavā khīranti gāvito khīraṃ nāma hoti,
atk-abh03a:434_3: Evamevanti yathā etesu pañcasu gorasesu sappimaṇḍo aggo;
atk-abh03a:434_4: evamevaṃ imesu pañcasu piṇḍapātikesu yvāyaṃ appicchatādīni nissāya piṇḍapātiko hoti.
atk-abh03a:434_5: Ayaṃ aggo ca seṭṭho ca pāmokkho ca uttamo ca pavaro ca.
atk-abh03a:434_6: Imesu pana pañcasu piṇḍapātikesu dveva janā piṇḍapātikā,
atk-abh03a:437_2: Sammāsambuddho tena daṭṭhabboti so puggalo tena anācariyakena attanā uppāditena sabbaññutaññāṇena sabbaññubuddho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-abh03a:438_0: Paccekasambuddho tenātiādīsupi tena paccekasambodhiñāṇena so puggalo paccekasambuddho.
atk-abh03a:438_2: Tena dukkhassa antakaraṇena te puggalā avasesā arahanto.
atk-abh03a:438_3: Tena itthattaṃ anāgamanena so puggalo anāgāmī.
atk-abh03a:438_4: Tena itthattaṃ āgamanena te puggalā sotāpannasakadāgāmino daṭṭhabbāti.
atk-abh03a:441_3: Evaṃ puggaloti iminā kāraṇena puggalo ekavāraṃ nimuggo tathā nimuggova hoti.
atk-abh03a:441_4: Etassa hi puna bhavato vuṭṭhānaṃ nāma natthīti vadanti.
atk-abh03a:441_5: Makkhaligosālādayo viya heṭṭhā narakaggīnaṃyeva āhāro hoti.
atk-abh03a:442_0: Sāhu saddhā kusalesu dhammesūti kusaladhammesu saddhā nāma sādhuladdhikāti ummujjati.
atk-abh03a:442_3: Hāyatiyevāti caṅkavāre āsittaudakaṃ viya ekantena parihāyateva.
atk-abh03a:442_5: Imesaṃ saddhādīnaṃ vasena ekavāraṃ ummujjitvā tesaṃ parihāniyā puna nimujjatiyeva,
atk-abh03a:442_8: pañca ca abhiññāyo nibbattetvāpi puna buddhānaṃ paṭikaṇṭakatāya tehi guṇehi parihīno ruhiruppādakammaṃ
atk-abh03a:442_9: saṅghabhedakammañca katvā kāyassa bhedā dutiyacittavārena niraye nibbatti.
atk-abh03a:442_10: Kokāliko dve aggasāvake upavaditvā padumaniraye nibbatto.
atk-abh03a:443_0: Neva hāyati no vaḍḍhatīti appahonakakālepi na hāyati,
atk-abh03a:443_3: Ekacco hi agāriko appahonakakāle pakkhikabhattaṃ vā salākabhattaṃ vā vassāvāsikaṃ vā upanibandhāpeti.
atk-abh03a:443_5: Anagārikopi ādimhi appahonakakāle uddesaṃ vā dhutaṅgaṃ vā gaṇhāti,
atk-abh03a:443_6: medhābalavīriyasampattiyā pahonakakālepi tato uttariṃ na karoti.
atk-abh03a:443_7: Evaṃ puggaloti evaṃ imāya saddhādīnaṃ ṭhitiyā puggalo ummujjitvā ṭhito nāma hoti.
atk-abh03a:444_0: Ummujjitvā vipassati viloketīti sotāpanno puggalo uṭṭhahitvā gamanamaggaṃ gantabbaṃ disaṃ vā āloketi nāma.
atk-abh03a:445_0: Ummujjitvā pataratīti sakadāgāmipuggalo kilesatanutāya uṭṭhahitvā gantabbadisābhimukho patarati nāma.
atk-abh03a:446_0: Patigādhappatto hotīti anāgāmipuggalo uṭṭhāya viloketvā pataritvā gantvā ekasmiṃ ṭhāne patiṭṭhāpatto nāma hoti, tiṭṭhati,
atk-abh03a:447_0: Tiṇṇo pāraṅgato thale tiṭṭhatīti sabbakilesoghaṃ taritvā paratīraṃ gantvā nibbānathale ṭhito nāma hoti.
atk-abh03a:447_1: Ime pana satta puggalā udakopamena dīpitā.
atk-abh03a:448_0: Satta kira jaṅghavāṇijā addhānamaggapaṭipannā antarāmagge ekaṃ puṇṇanadiṃ pāpuṇiṃsu.
atk-abh03a:448_1: Tesu paṭhamaṃ otiṇṇo udakabhīruko puriso otiṇṇaṭṭhāneyeva nimujjitvā puna uṭṭhātuṃ nāsakkhi,
atk-abh03a:448_3: Dutiyo otiṇṇaṭṭhāne nimujjitvā sakiṃ uṭṭhahitvā puna nimuggo uṭṭhātuṃ nāsakkhi,
atk-abh03a:448_6: So majjhe nadiyā ṭhatvā neva orato āgantuṃ,
atk-abh03a:448_10: Chaṭṭho taritvā pārimatīraṃ gantvā kaṭippamāṇe udake ṭhito.
atk-abh03a:448_11: Sattamo pārimatīraṃ gantvā gandhacuṇṇādīhi nhātvā varavatthāni nivāsetvā surabhivilepanaṃ vilimpitvā
atk-abh03a:448_12: nīluppalādīni piḷandhitvā nānālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍito mahānagaraṃ pavisitvā pāsādavaramāruyha uttamabhojanaṃ bhuñji.
atk-abh03a:449_0: Tattha satta jaṅghavāṇijā viya ime satta puggalā.
atk-abh03a:449_2: Paṭhamassa udakabhīrukassa purisassa otiṇṇaṭṭhāneyeva nimujjanaṃ viya micchādiṭṭhikassa vaṭṭe nimujjanaṃ.
atk-abh03a:449_3: Ummujjitvā nimuggapuriso viya saddhādīnaṃ uppattimattakena ummujjitvā tesaṃ parihāniyā nimuggapuggalo.
atk-abh03a:449_4: Majjhe nadiyā ṭhito viya saddhādīnaṃ ṭhitiyā ṭhitapuggalo.
atk-abh03a:449_5: Uttaraṇatitthaṃ olokento viya gantabbamaggaṃ gantabbadisaṃ vā olokento sotāpanno.
atk-abh03a:449_7: Taritvā kaṭimatte udake ṭhitapuriso viya anāvattitadhammatāya ṭhito anāgāmī.
atk-abh03a:449_8: Nhatvā pārimatīraṃ uttaritvā thale ṭhitapuriso viya cattāro oghe atikkamitvā nibbānathale ṭhito khīṇāsavabrāhmaṇo.
atk-abh03a:449_9: Thale ṭhitapurisassa nagaraṃ pavisitvā pāsādavaraṃ āruyha uttamabhojanabhuñjanaṃ viya khīṇāsavassa nibbānārammaṇaṃ
atk-abh03a:453_4: Kāmāvacarattabhāveneva arahattappatti ca anupādisesanibbānappatti ca hotīti attho.
atk-abh03a:454_0: Idha vihāyāti idha kāmāvacare attabhāve vihāya suddhāvāsattabhāve ṭhitānaṃ niṭṭhā hotīti attho.
atk-abh03a:454_1: Antarāparinibbāyiādayo hi idha anāgāmiphalaṃ patvā ito cutā suddhāvāsesu uppajjitvā tena attabhāvena
atk-abh03a:462_0: Suvibhatto asaṃkiṇṇo, yo yo attho yahiṃ yahiṃ;
atk-abh03a:463_0: Tato tato taṃ gahetvā, pahāya ativitthāraṃ.
atk-abh03a:464_0: Visuddhimagge yaṃ vuttaṃ, taṃ anādāya saṅkhatā;
atk-abh03a:468_0: Sampattaṃ kusalaṃ tena, saddhammaṃ sukhumaṃ sivaṃ;
atk-abh03a:483_0: Tasmā naṃ vaṇṇayissāmi, taṃ suṇātha samāhitāti.
atk-abh03a:485_0: Yamakapāṭihīrāvasānasmiñhi bhagavā tidasapure pāricchattakamūle paṇḍukambalasilāyaṃ vassaṃ upagantvā
atk-abh03a:485_1: mātaraṃ kāyasakkhiṃ katvā devaparisāya abhidhammakathaṃ kathento dhammasaṅgaṇīvibhaṅgadhātukathāpuggalapaññattippakaraṇāni
atk-abh03a:485_2: desayitvā kathāvatthudesanāya vāre sampatte “anāgate mama sāvako mahāpañño moggaliputtatissatthero nāma
atk-abh03a:485_3: uppannaṃ sāsanamalaṃ sodhetvā tatiyasaṅgītiṃ karonto bhikkhusaṅghassa majjhe nisinno sakavāde pañca suttasatāni
atk-abh03a:485_4: paravāde pañcāti suttasahassaṃ samodhānetvā imaṃ pakaraṇaṃ bhājessatī”ti tassokāsaṃ karonto yā cesā puggalavāde
atk-abh03a:485_5: tāva catūsu pañhesu dvinnaṃ pañcakānaṃ vasena aṭṭhamukhā vādayutti,
atk-abh03a:485_6: taṃ ādiṃ katvā sabbakathāmaggesu asampuṇṇabhāṇavāramattāya tantiyā mātikaṃ ṭhapesi.
atk-abh03a:485_7: Athāvasesaṃ abhidhammakathaṃ vitthāranayeneva kathetvā vutthavasso suvaṇṇarajatasopānamajjhe maṇimayena
atk-abh03a:485_8: sopānena devalokato saṅkassanagare oruyha sattahitaṃ sampādento yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā
atk-abh03a:486_0: Athassa mahākassapappamukho vasīgaṇo ajātasatturājānaṃ sahāyaṃ gahetvā dhammavinayasarīraṃ saṅgahaṃ āropesi.
atk-abh03a:486_1: Tato vassasatassa accayena vajjiputtakā bhikkhū dasa vatthūni dīpayiṃsu.
atk-abh03a:486_2: Tāni sutvā kākaṇḍakassa brāhmaṇassa putto yasatthero susunāgaputtaṃ kālāsokaṃ nāma rājānaṃ sahāyaṃ gahetvā
atk-abh03a:486_3: dvādasannaṃ bhikkhusatasahassānaṃ antare sattatherasatāni uccinitvā tāni dasavatthūni madditvā dhammavinayasarīraṃ
atk-abh03a:487_0: Tehi pana dhammasaṅgāhakattherehi niggahitā dasasahassā vajjiputtakā bhikkhū pakkhaṃ pariyesamānā attano
atk-abh03a:487_1: anurūpaṃ dubbalapakkhaṃ labhitvā visuṃ mahāsaṅghikācariyakulaṃ nāma akaṃsu.
atk-abh03a:487_2: Tato bhijjitvā aparāni dve ācariyakulāni jātāni –
atk-abh03a:487_4: Gokulikanikāyato bhijjitvā aparāni dve ācariyakulāni jātāni –
atk-abh03a:487_7: Tesaṃyeva antare cetiyavādā nāma apare ācariyavādā uppannā.
atk-abh03a:487_8: Evaṃ mahāsaṅghikācariyakulato dutiye vassasate pañcācariyakulāni uppannāni.
atk-abh03a:488_0: Tasmiṃyeva dutiye vassasate theravādato bhijjitvā dve ācariyavādā uppannā –
atk-abh03a:488_2: Tattha vajjiputtakavādato bhijjitvā apare cattāro ācariyavādā uppannā –
atk-abh03a:488_7: Puna tasmiṃyeva dutiye vassasate mahisāsakavādato bhijjitvā sabbatthivādā dhammaguttikāti dve ācariyavādā uppannā.
atk-abh03a:488_8: Puna sabbatthivādakulato bhijjitvā kassapikā nāma jātā.
atk-abh03a:488_9: Kassapikesu bhinnesu apare saṅkantikā nāma jātā.
atk-abh03a:488_10: Saṅkantikesu bhinnesu suttavādā nāma jātāti theravādato bhijjitvā ime ekādasa ācariyavādā uppannā.
atk-abh03a:488_13: mahāsaṅghikānañca cha ācariyavādāti sabbeva aṭṭhārasa ācariyavādā dutiye vassasate uppannā.
atk-abh03a:490_0: Aññaṃ pakkhaṃ labhitvāna, adhammavādī bahū janā.
atk-abh03a:496_0: Atthaṃ dhammañca bhindiṃsu, vinaye nikāyesu ca pañcasu.
atk-abh03a:499_0: “Aññaṃ sandhāya bhaṇitaṃ, aññaṃ atthaṃ ṭhapayiṃsu te;
atk-abh03a:500_0: Byañjanacchāyāya te bhikkhū, bahuṃ atthaṃ vināsayuṃ.
atk-abh03a:502_0: Patirūpaṃ suttaṃ vinayaṃ, tañca aññaṃ kariṃsu te.
atk-abh03a:530_0: Ganthañca ekadesañhi, chaḍḍetvā aññaṃ akaṃsu te.
atk-abh03a:532_0: Pakatibhāvaṃ jahitvā, tañca aññaṃ akaṃsu te.
atk-abh03a:540_7: Purimakānaṃ pana aṭṭhārasannaṃ ācariyavādānaṃ vasena pavattamāne sāsane paṭiladdhasaddho asoko dhammarājā divase divase buddhapūjāya satasahassaṃ,
atk-abh03a:540_11: catūsu dvāresu bhesajjatthāya satasahassanti pañcasatasahassāni pariccajanto sāsane uḷāraṃ lābhasakkāraṃ pavattesi.
atk-abh03a:541_0: Titthiyā hatalābhasakkārā antamaso ghāsacchādanamattampi alabhantā lābhasakkāraṃ patthayamānā bhikkhūsu pabbajitvā sakāni sakāni diṭṭhigatāni –
atk-abh03a:541_4: Pabbajjaṃ alabhamānāpi sayameva kese chinditvā kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādetvā vihāresu vicarantā uposathakammādikaraṇakāle saṅghamajjhaṃ pavisanti.
atk-abh03a:541_5: Te bhikkhusaṅghena dhammena vinayena satthusāsanena niggayhamānāpi dhammavinayānulomāya paṭipattiyā asaṇṭhahantā
atk-abh03a:541_6: anekarūpaṃ sāsanassa abbudañca malañca kaṇṭakañca samuṭṭhāpenti.
atk-abh03a:541_10: keci “dhammañca vinayañca vobhindissāmā”ti tathā tathā paggaṇhiṃsu.
atk-abh03a:541_11: Tadā bhikkhusaṅgho na tehi saddhiṃ uposathaṃ vā pavāraṇaṃ vā akāsi.
atk-abh03a:542_1: aññadatthu duggahitagāhinā bālena amaccena anekesu bhikkhūsu jīvitā voropitesu vippaṭisārī ahosi.
atk-abh03a:542_2: So tañca vippaṭisāraṃ tañca sāsane uppannaṃ abbudaṃ vūpasametukāmo “ko nu kho imasmiṃ atthe paṭibalo”ti saṅghaṃ pucchitvā “moggaliputtatissatthero,
atk-abh03a:542_3: mahārājā”ti sutvā saṅghassa vacanena ahogaṅgāpabbatato theraṃ pakkosāpetvā iddhipāṭihāriyadassanena therassa
atk-abh03a:542_4: ānubhāve nibbicikiccho attano kukkuccaṃ pucchitvā vippaṭisāraṃ vūpasamesi.
atk-abh03a:542_5: Theropi taṃ rājuyyāneyeva vasanto satta divasāni samayaṃ uggaṇhāpesi.
atk-abh03a:542_6: So uggahitasamayo sattame divase asokārāme bhikkhusaṅghaṃ sannipātāpetvā sāṇipākāraṃ parikkhipāpetvā
atk-abh03a:542_7: sāṇipākārantare nisinno ekaladdhike ekaladdhike bhikkhū ekato ekato kāretvā ekamekaṃ bhikkhusamūhaṃ pakkosāpetvā pucchi – “bhante,
atk-abh03a:542_21: Rājā paṭhamameva samayassa uggahitattā nayime bhikkhū aññatitthiyā imeti ñatvā tesaṃ setakāni vatthāni datvā uppabbājesi.
atk-abh03a:543_9: karotu bhikkhusaṅgho uposatha’nti ārakkhaṃ datvā nagaraṃ pāvisi.
atk-abh03a:543_12: Tasmiṃ samāgame moggaliputtatissatthero yāni ca tadā uppannāni vatthūni,
atk-abh03a:543_14: sabbesampi tesaṃ paṭibāhanatthaṃ satthārā dinnanayavaseneva tathāgatena ṭhapitamātikaṃ vibhajanto sakavāde
atk-abh03a:543_15: pañca suttasatāni paravāde pañcāti suttasahassaṃ āharitvā imaṃ parappavādamathanaṃ āyatilakkhaṇaṃ kathāvatthuppakaraṇaṃ abhāsi.
atk-abh03a:544_0: Tato saṭṭhisatasahassasaṅkhyesu bhikkhū uccinitvā tipiṭakapariyattidharānaṃ pabhinnapaṭisambhidānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-abh03a:544_1: sahassamekaṃ gahetvā yathā mahākassapatthero ca yasatthero ca dhammañca vinayañca saṅgāyiṃsu;
atk-abh03a:544_2: evameva saṅgāyanto sāsanamalaṃ visodhetvā tatiyasaṅgītiṃ akāsi.
atk-abh03a:544_3: Tattha abhidhammaṃ saṅgāyanto imaṃ yathābhāsitaṃ pakaraṇaṃ saṅgahaṃ āropesi.
atk-abh03a:550_0: Tasmā naṃ vaṇṇayissāmi, taṃ suṇātha samāhitā”ti.
atk-abh03a:556_1: Tattha puggalo upalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthenāti ayaṃ pucchā.
atk-abh03a:556_6: Bhagavatā hi imasmiṃ pakaraṇe nānappakārānaṃ laddhīnaṃ visodhanatthaṃ tantivasena mātikā ṭhapitā.
atk-abh03a:556_7: Sā therena satthārā dinnanaye ṭhatvā tantivasena vibhattā.
atk-abh03a:556_8: Na hi thero yattakā ettha vādamaggā dassitā,
atk-abh03a:556_9: tattakehi vādīhi saddhiṃ vādena viggāhikakathaṃ kathesi.
atk-abh03a:556_10: Evaṃ santepi pana tāsaṃ tāsaṃ kathānaṃ atthassa sukhāvadhāraṇatthaṃ sakavādīpucchā,
atk-abh03a:556_13: paravādīpaṭiññāti evaṃ vibhāgaṃ dassetvāva atthavaṇṇanaṃ karissāma.
atk-abh03a:557_0: Puggalo upalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthenāti hi ayaṃ sakavādīpucchā.
atk-abh03a:557_4: Sāsane vajjiputtakā ceva samitiyā ca bahiddhā ca bahū aññatitthiyā.
atk-abh03a:557_9: Saccikaṭṭhaparamatthenāti ettha saccikaṭṭhoti māyāmarīciādayo viya abhūtākārena aggahetabbo bhūtaṭṭho.
atk-abh03a:557_12: rūpañca upalabbhatī”tiādinā khandhāyatanadhātuindriyavasena sattapaññāsavidho dhammappabhedo dassito.
atk-abh03a:557_21: so hi yaṃ taṃ parato vuttaṃ bhagavatā –
atk-abh03a:557_23: taṃ gahetvā yasmā pana bhagavā saccavādī na visaṃvādanapurekkhāro vācaṃ bhāsati,
atk-abh03a:557_25: sadevakaṃ pana lokaṃ sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā pavedeti,
atk-abh03a:557_26: tasmā yo tena vutto “atthi puggalo attahitāya paṭipanno”ti,
atk-abh03a:557_27: so saccikaṭṭhaparamattheneva atthīti laddhiṃ gahetvā “āmantā”ti paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:558_0: Athassa tādisassa lesavacanassa chalavādassa okāsaṃ adadamāno sakavādī yo saccikaṭṭhotiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:558_4: asassato sanimitto animitto”ti evaṃ paridīpito rūpādisattapaññāsavidho dhammappabhedo āgato;
atk-abh03a:559_1: tasmā tena saccikaṭṭhaparamatthena so puggalo upalabbhatīti ayamettha attho.
atk-abh03a:559_3: ruppanādibhedena vā sappaccayādibhedena vā ākārena yo saccikaṭṭhaparamattho upalabbhati,
atk-abh03a:559_6: So hi tathārūpaṃ puggalaṃ anicchanto avajānāti.
atk-abh03a:560_1: Yasmā te purimāya vattabbapaṭiññāya pacchimā navattabbapaṭiññā,
atk-abh03a:560_4: Taṃ niggahaṃ dosaṃ aparādhaṃ sampaṭicchāhīti attho.
atk-abh03a:560_5: Evaṃ niggahaṃ ājānāpetvā idāni taṃ ṭhapanāya ceva anulomapaṭilomato pāpanāropanānañca vasena pākaṭaṃ karonto hañci puggalotiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:560_6: Tattha hañci puggalo upalabbhatīti yadi puggalo upalabbhati,
atk-abh03a:560_8: Ayaṃ tāva paravādīpakkhassa ṭhapanato niggahapāpanāropanānaṃ lakkhaṇabhūtā anulomaṭhapanā nāma.
atk-abh03a:560_9: Tena vata retiādi anulomapakkhe niggahassa pāpitattā anulomapāpanā nāma.
atk-abh03a:560_18: Yaṃ tattha vadesītiādi anulomapakkhe niggahassa āropitattā anulomaropanā nāma.
atk-abh03a:560_19: Yaṃ tassa pariyosāne micchātipadaṃ tassa purato idaṃ te’ti āharitabbaṃ.
atk-abh03a:561_0: No ce pana vattabbetiādi “na hevaṃ vattabbe”ti paṭikkhittapakkhassa ṭhapitattā paṭilomato niggahapāpanāropanānaṃ lakkhaṇabhūtā paṭilomaṭhapanā nāma.
atk-abh03a:561_1: No ca vata retiādi paṭilomapakkhe niggahassa pāpitattā paṭilomapāpanā nāma.
atk-abh03a:561_2: Puna yaṃ tattha vadesītiādi paṭilomapakkhe niggahassa āropitattā paṭilomaropanā nāma.
atk-abh03a:561_3: Idhāpi pariyosāne micchātipadassa purato idaṃ teti āharitabbameva.
atk-abh03a:562_2: tena vata bho so upalabbhatīti vattabbo.
atk-abh03a:562_3: Yaṃ pana tattha vadesi “vattabbo kho purimapañhe ‘saccikaṭṭhaparamatthena upalabbhatī’ti,
atk-abh03a:562_4: no ca vattabbo dutiyapañhe ‘tato so puggalo upalabbhatī”’ti,
atk-abh03a:562_5: idaṃ te micchāti evaṃ tāva anulomato ṭhapanāpāpanāropanā honti.
atk-abh03a:562_6: Atha na vattabbo dutiyapañhe “tato so upalabbhatī”ti,
atk-abh03a:562_8: Yaṃ panettha vadesi “vattabbo kho purimapañhe ‘saccikaṭṭhaparamatthena upalabbhatī’ti,
atk-abh03a:562_9: no ca vattabbo dutiyapañhe ‘tato so puggalo upalabbhatī”’ti,
atk-abh03a:562_10: idaṃ te micchāti evaṃ paṭilomato ṭhapanāpāpanāropanā honti.
atk-abh03a:562_11: Evametaṃ niggahassa ca anulomapaṭilomato catunnaṃ pāpanāropanānañca vuttattā upalabbhatītiādikaṃ anulomapañcakaṃ nāma.
atk-abh03a:562_12: Ettha ca kiñcāpi anulomato pāpanāropanāhi eko,
atk-abh03a:562_13: paṭilomato pāpanāropanāhi ekoti dve niggahā katā.
atk-abh03a:562_14: ‘Ājānāhi niggaha’nti etasseva panettha puggalo upalabbhatīti paṭhamaṃ vādaṃ nissāya paṭhamassa niggahassa
atk-abh03a:562_15: dvīhākārehi āropitattā ekovāyaṃ niggahoti paṭhamo niggaho.
atk-abh03a:563_3: So hi “atthi puggalo attahitāya paṭipanno”ti gahitattā “nupalabbhatī”ti asampaṭicchanto evaṃ pucchati.
atk-abh03a:563_6: Puna itaro attanā adhippetaṃ saccikaṭṭhaṃyeva sandhāya yo saccikaṭṭhotiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:563_8: Sakavādī ‘puggalo’ti upādāpaññattisabbhāvatopi dvinnaṃ saccānaṃ ekato katvā pucchitattāpi na hevanti paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:564_0: Idāni kiñcāpi tena paṭhamaṃ paramatthasaccavasena nupalabbhanīyatā sampaṭicchitā,
atk-abh03a:564_2: Paravādī pana ‘nupalabbhatī’ti vacanasāmaññamattaṃ chalavādaṃ nissāya yaṃ tayā paṭhamaṃ paṭiññātaṃ,
atk-abh03a:564_3: taṃ pacchā paṭikkhittanti bhaṇḍanassa paṭibhaṇḍanaṃ viya attano katassa niggahakammassa paṭikammaṃ karonto ājānāhi paṭikammanti āha.
atk-abh03a:564_4: Idāni yathāssa anulomapañcake sakavādinā vādaṭṭhapanaṃ katvā anulomapaṭilomato pāpanāropanāhi niggaho pākaṭo kato,
atk-abh03a:564_5: evaṃ paṭikammaṃ pākaṭaṃ karonto hañci puggalotiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:564_7: Yasmā panettha ṭhapanā nāma paravādīpakkhassa ṭhapanato “ayaṃ tava doso”ti dassetuṃ ṭhapanamattameva hoti,
atk-abh03a:564_8: na niggahassa vā paṭikammassa vā pākaṭabhāvakaraṇaṃ,
atk-abh03a:564_10: Tasmā idaṃ anulomapaṭilomato pāpanāropanānaṃ vasena catūhākārehi.
atk-abh03a:564_11: Paṭikammassa katattā paṭikammacatukkaṃ nāmāti ekaṃ catukkaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh03a:565_1: Evaṃ paṭikammaṃ katvā idāni yvāssa anulomapañcake sakavādinā niggaho kato,
atk-abh03a:565_2: tassa tameva chalavādaṃ nissāya dukkaṭabhāvaṃ dassento tvañce pana maññasītiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:565_3: Tattha tvaṃ ce pana maññasīti yadi tvaṃ maññasi.
atk-abh03a:565_4: Vattabbe khoti idaṃ paccanīke āmantāti paṭiññaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:565_5: No ca vattabbeti idaṃ pana na hevāti avajānanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:565_6: Tena tava tatthāti tena kāraṇena tvaṃyeva tasmiṃ nupalabbhatīti pakkhe –
atk-abh03a:565_8: Hevaṃ niggahetabbeti puna na hevāti avajānanto evaṃ niggahetabbo.
atk-abh03a:565_9: Atha taṃ niggaṇhāmāti athevaṃ niggahārahaṃ taṃ niggaṇhāma.
atk-abh03a:565_10: Suniggahito ca hosīti sakena matena niggahitattā suniggahito ca bhavasi.
atk-abh03a:566_0: Evamassa niggahetabbabhāvaṃ dassetvā idāni taṃ niggaṇhanto hañcītiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:566_2: Pariyosāne pana idaṃ te micchāti idaṃ tava vacanaṃ micchā hotīti attho.
atk-abh03a:566_3: Idaṃ chalavādena catūhi ākārehi niggahassa katattā niggahacatukkaṃ nāma.
atk-abh03a:567_1: Evaṃ niggahaṃ katvāpi idāni “yadi ayaṃ mayā tava matena kato niggaho dunniggaho,
atk-abh03a:567_2: yo mama tayā heṭṭhā anulomapañcake kato niggaho,
atk-abh03a:567_3: sopi dunniggaho”ti dassento ese ce dunniggahitetiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:567_4: Tattha ese ce dunniggahiteti eso ce tava vādo mayā dunniggahito.
atk-abh03a:567_5: Atha vā eso ce tava mayā kato niggaho dunniggaho.
atk-abh03a:567_6: Hevamevaṃ tattha dakkhāti tatthāpi tayā mama heṭṭhā kate niggahe evamevaṃ passa.
atk-abh03a:567_7: Idāni yvāssa heṭṭhā sakavādinā niggaho kato,
atk-abh03a:567_8: taṃ “vattabbe kho”tiādivacanena dassetvā puna taṃ niggahaṃ aniggahabhāvaṃ upanento no ca mayaṃ tayātiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:567_9: Tattha no ca mayaṃ tayā tattha hetāya paṭiññāyātiādīsu ayamattho –
atk-abh03a:567_10: yasmā so tayā mama kato niggaho dunniggaho,
atk-abh03a:567_11: tasmā mayaṃ tayā tattha anulomapañcake āmantāti etāya paṭiññāya evaṃ paṭijānantā puna na hevāti paṭikkhepe
atk-abh03a:567_14: īdisena pana niggahena dunniggahitā mayaṃ homa.
atk-abh03a:568_0: Idāni yaṃ niggahaṃ sandhāya “dunniggahitā ca homā”ti avoca,
atk-abh03a:568_3: Evamidaṃ anulomapaṭilomato catūhi pāpanāropanāhi niggahassa upanītattā upanayanacatukkaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-abh03a:569_1: Idāni “na hevaṃ niggahetabbe”tiādikaṃ niggamanacatukkaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-abh03a:569_2: Tattha na hevaṃ niggahetabbeti yathāhaṃ tayā niggahito,
atk-abh03a:569_4: Etassa hi niggahassa dunniggahabhāvo mayā sādhito.
atk-abh03a:569_7: tasmā yaṃ maṃ niggaṇhāsi hañci puggalo…pe…
atk-abh03a:569_10: Tena hi ye kate niggaheti yena kāraṇena idaṃ micchā,
atk-abh03a:569_11: tena kāraṇena yo tayā niggaho kato,
atk-abh03a:569_19: Ettāvatā sakavādino pubbapakkhe sati paravādino vacanasāmaññamattena chalavādena jayo hoti.
atk-abh03a:571_1: Idāni yathā paravādino pubbapakkhe sati sakavādino dhammeneva tathena sujayo hoti,
atk-abh03a:571_2: tathā vāduppattiṃ dassetuṃ puggalo nupalabbhatīti paccanīkānulomapañcakaṃ āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh03a:571_5: Suddhasammutisaccaṃ vā paramatthamissakaṃ vā sammutisaccaṃ sandhāya yo saccikaṭṭhoti puna anuyogo paravādissa,
atk-abh03a:571_6: sammutivasena nupalabbhatīti navattabbattā missakavasena vā anuyogassa saṃkiṇṇattā na hevanti paṭikkhepo sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a:571_7: Paṭiññātaṃ paṭikkhipatīti vacanasāmaññamattena ājānāhi niggahantiādivacanaṃ paravādissa.
atk-abh03a:571_8: Evamayaṃ puggalo nupalabbhatīti dutiyavādaṃ nissāya dutiyo niggaho hotīti veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:572_1: Idāni dhammena samena attano vāde jayaṃ dassetuṃ anulomanaye pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:572_3: Laddhiyā okāsaṃ adatvā paramatthavasena puna anuyogo sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:572_5: Tato paraṃ dhammena samena attano jayadassanatthaṃ ājānāhi paṭikammantiādi sabbaṃ sakavādīvacanameva hoti.
atk-abh03a:572_6: Tattha sabbesaṃ paṭikammaniggahopanayananiggamanacatukkānaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva attho veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:572_10: Tattha purimapañcake paravādissa sakavādinā kato niggaho suniggaho.
atk-abh03a:572_11: Sakavādissa pana paravādinā chalavādaṃ nissāya paṭikammaṃ katvā attanā sādhito jayo dujjayo.
atk-abh03a:572_12: Dutiyapañcake sakavādissa paravādinā kato niggaho dunniggaho.
atk-abh03a:572_13: Paravādissa pana sakavādinā dhammavādaṃ nissāya paṭikammaṃ katvā attanā sādhito jayo sujayoti paṭhamasaccikaṭṭho.
atk-abh03a:578_0: Dhammena hi jayo nāma, adhammena kuto jayo.
atk-abh03a:585_1: Evaṃ suddhikasaccikaṭṭhaṃ vitthāretvā idāni tameva aparehi okāsādīhi nayehi vitthāretuṃ puna puggalo upalabbhatītiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh03a:585_4: Puna sabbatthāti sarīraṃ sandhāya anuyogo sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:585_5: rūpasmiṃ attānaṃ samanupassanādosañca ‘aññaṃ jīvaṃ aññaṃ sarīra’nti āpajjanadosañca disvā paṭikkhepo paravādissa.
atk-abh03a:585_8: Tattha yasmā sarīraṃ sandhāya “sabbattha na upalabbhatī”ti vutte sarīrato bahi upalabbhatīti āpajjati.
atk-abh03a:585_10: paṭhamaṃ anujānitvā pacchā avajānātīti chalavādassa vasena paṭikammaṃ paravādissa.
atk-abh03a:588_1: Dutiyanaye sabbadāti purimapacchimajātikālañca dharamānaparinibbutakālañca sandhāya anuyogo sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:588_2: sveva khattiyo so brāhmaṇotiādīnaṃ āpattidosañca dharamānaparinibbutānaṃ visesābhāvadosañca disvā paṭikkhepo paravādissa.
atk-abh03a:591_1: Tatiyanaye sabbesūti khandhāyatanādīni sandhāya anuyogo sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:594_1: Evametāni tīṇi anulomapaccanīkapañcake anulomamattavaseneva tāva paṭipāṭiyā bhājetvā puna paccanīkānulomapañcake
atk-abh03a:594_3: Tattha anulomapañcakassa pāḷiyaṃ saṅkhipitvā āgate paccanīke vuttanayeneva paccanīkassa ca pāḷiyaṃ saṅkhipitvā
atk-abh03a:594_5: Ettāvatā suddhikassa ceva imesañca tiṇṇanti catunnaṃ saccikaṭṭhānaṃ ekekasmiṃ saccikaṭṭhe anulomapaccanīkassa
atk-abh03a:594_6: paccanīkānulomassa cāti dvinnaṃ dvinnaṃ paccanīkānaṃ vasena ayaṃ aṭṭhamukhā nāma vādayutti niddiṭṭhā
atk-abh03a:594_8: Yā ekekasmiṃ mukhe ekekassa niggahassa vasena aṭṭhakaniggahoti pāḷiyaṃ likhiyati.
atk-abh03a:602_2: Tattha rūpañcāti yathā rūpaṃ paramatthato upalabbhati,
atk-abh03a:602_3: kiṃ te puggalopi tatheva upalabbhatīti sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:602_4: atthi puggaloti vacanamattaṃ gahetvā paṭiññā paravādissa.
atk-abh03a:602_5: Yadi te rūpaṃ viya paramatthato puggalo atthi,
atk-abh03a:602_6: rūpato vedanādīnaṃ viya puggalassāpi aññattaṃ āpajjatīti anuyogo sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:602_9: Dhammato panettha sattapaññāsabhedassa saccikaṭṭhaparamatthassa vasena sakavādīpakkhamūlake anulomapaccanīke sattapaññāsa anulomapañcakāni dassitāni.
atk-abh03a:602_13: Tattha “vuttaṃ bhagavatā”ti vacanamattena puggalassa atthitaṃ rūpassa ca saccikaṭṭhaparamatthavasena
atk-abh03a:602_14: upalabbhanīyataṃ dassetvā ubhinnaṃ aññattaṃ paṭijānāpanatthaṃ vuttaṃ bhagavatāti anuyogo paravādissa,
atk-abh03a:605_1: Idāni rūpādīheva saddhiṃ opammavasena saccikaṭṭhasaṃsandanaṃ hoti.
atk-abh03a:605_2: Tattha rūpavedanānaṃ upaladdhisāmaññena aññattapucchā ca puggalarūpānaṃ upaladdhisāmaññapucchā cāti pucchādvayampi sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:605_4: Paravādinā anuññātena upaladdhisāmaññena rūpavedanānaṃ viya rūpapuggalānaṃ aññattānuyogo sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:605_7: Dhammato panettha rūpamūlakādīnaṃ cakkānañca vasena sakavādīpakkhe vīsādhikāni nava niggahapañcakasatāni dassitāni. Kathaṃ?
atk-abh03a:605_16: Evaṃ sabbānipi vīsādhikāni nava niggahapañcakasatāni honti.
atk-abh03a:606_1: Paravādīpakkhepi rūpaṃ upalabbhatīti anulomavaseneva rūpavedanādīnaṃ aññattapaṭiññaṃ kāretvā puna atthi
atk-abh03a:606_2: puggaloti suttaṃ nissāya chalavasena puggalassa rūpādīhi upaladdhisāmaññaṃ āropetvā aññattānuyogo kato.
atk-abh03a:606_4: Dhammatopi sakavādīpakkhe vuttanayena vīsādhikāni nava paṭikammapañcakasatāni dassitāni.
atk-abh03a:609_2: tena yasmā rūpādīsu sattapaññāsāya saccikaṭṭhaparamatthesu aññatarena bhavitabbaṃ;
atk-abh03a:609_15: Ayañca rūpādīsu ekadhammatopi puggalassa aññattaṃ na icchati,
atk-abh03a:609_18: aññātāvindriyaṃ puggaloti sakalaṃ paramatthasaccaṃ sandhāya āraddho.
atk-abh03a:609_19: Sakalaṃ pana paccattalakkhaṇavasena ekato vattuṃ na sakkāti tantivasena anuyogalakkhaṇamattametaṃ ṭhapitaṃ.
atk-abh03a:609_21: Vādakāmena pana imaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ gahetvā yathā yathā paravādissa okāso na hoti,
atk-abh03a:610_1: rūpasmiṃ puggalotiādīsu yathā ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ nissāya tayo mahābhūtā,
atk-abh03a:610_2: vatthurūpaṃ nissāya viññāṇaṃ rūpasminti vattuṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-abh03a:610_8: Yathā ca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ nissayavasena “vedanāya rūpaṃ…pe…
atk-abh03a:610_11: Sabbānuyogesu pana ucchedadiṭṭhibhayena ceva samayavirodhena ca paṭikkhepo paravādissa.
atk-abh03a:610_13: Dhammato panettha sattapaññāsāya saccikaṭṭhesu ekekasmiṃ cattāri cattāri katvā niggahavasena aṭṭhavīsādhikāni dve pañcakasatāni dassitāni.
atk-abh03a:610_15: Yā panettha atthi puggaloti vutte sakavādissa paṭiññā,
atk-abh03a:614_2: Tattha yasmā ṭhapetvā nibbānaṃ seso saccikaṭṭhaparamattho paccayapaṭibaddhatāya sappaccayo,
atk-abh03a:614_6: nibbānaṃ vuttappakārābhāvato appaccayaṃ asaṅkhataṃ sassataṃ animittanti idaṃ saccikaṭṭhassa lakkhaṇaṃ.
atk-abh03a:614_7: Tasmā yadi puggalopi saccikaṭṭhaparamatthova tassāpi iminā lakkhaṇena bhavitabbanti sandhāya puggalo sappaccayotiādayo aṭṭhapi anuyogā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:614_10: Evametāni sakavādīpakkhe anulomapaccanīke anulomamattavasena aṭṭha pañcakāni veditabbāni.
atk-abh03a:615_2: Tattha yasmā paravādinā suttavasena sammutisaccaṃ sādhitaṃ,
atk-abh03a:615_5: Chalavasena pana vattabbaṃ “ājānāhi paṭikamma”ntiādi sabbaṃ idhāpi saṅkhittameva.
atk-abh03a:618_8: taṃ ekatthaṃ vā bhaveyya nānatthaṃ vā.
atk-abh03a:618_18: Tena taṃ vadāmi “yadi te yo puggalo,
atk-abh03a:618_23: Tato puggalavādī yasmā puggalassa upalabbhataṃ icchati,
atk-abh03a:618_26: upalabbhati ke hi ci puggalo ke hi ci na puggalotiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:618_28: mama puggalo atthi puggaloti satthu vacanato upalabbhati.
atk-abh03a:618_31: atha kho ke hi ci puggalo ke hi ci na puggaloti.
atk-abh03a:618_36: koci na puggaloti ayaṃ panettha attho.
atk-abh03a:618_38: puggalopi hi rūpādīsupi yo koci dhammo upalabbhatiyeva,
atk-abh03a:618_42: puggalo ke hi ci upalabbhati ke hi ci na upalabbhatīti.
atk-abh03a:618_44: puggalo upalabbhatīti padadvayassa atthato ekatte yadi upalabbhatīti anuññāto dhammo puggalato anaññopi koci puggalo koci na puggalo,
atk-abh03a:618_48: So puggalassa anupaladdhiṃ anicchanto na hevanti paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:618_53: apica yasmā “puggalo upalabbhatisaccikaṭṭhaparamatthenā”ti ayaṃ puggalavādino paṭiññā,
atk-abh03a:619_8: atthi na sabbo puggaloti ettakaṃ hoti,
atk-abh03a:619_9: tasmā naṃ sakavādī sampaṭicchāpetvā idāni naṃ evaṃ anuyuñjati.
atk-abh03a:619_10: Tayā hi “atthi puggalo attahitāya paṭipanno”ti vacanamattaṃ nissāya “puggalo atthī”ti laddhi gahitā,
atk-abh03a:619_20: Atha naṃ asampaṭicchanto na hevāti paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:622_2: Rūpadhātuyā hi puggalavādī rūpiṃ puggalaṃ paññapeti,
atk-abh03a:622_4: Tassa taṃ laddhiṃ bhindituṃ sabbāpi pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:622_6: So hi rūpīti vutte rūpakāyasabbhāvato ceva tathārūpāya ca paññattiyā atthitāya paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:622_7: Kāmīti vutte vītarāgasabbhāvato ceva tathārūpāya ca paññattiyā natthitāya paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:622_8: Arūpīti vuttepi arūpakkhandhasabbhāvato ceva tathārūpāya ca paññattiyā atthitāya paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:622_9: Dvīsupi nayesu sattoti puggalassa vevacanavasena vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:623_1: Idāni yasmā so “kāye kāyānupassī”ti āgataṭṭhāne añño kāyo añño puggaloti icchati,
atk-abh03a:623_2: tasmā taṃ laddhiṃ bhindituṃ kāyoti vā sarīranti vātiādi sakavādīpucchā hoti.
atk-abh03a:623_3: Tattha kāyaṃ appiyaṃ karitvāti kāyaṃ appetabbaṃ allīyāpetabbaṃ ekībhāvaṃ upanetabbaṃ avibhajitabbaṃ katvā pucchāmīti attho.
atk-abh03a:623_8: Same samabhāge tajjāteti samo samabhāgo tajjātiko.
atk-abh03a:623_12: Puggaloti vā jīvoti vāti pucchāyapi eseva nayo.
atk-abh03a:623_13: Añño kāyoti puṭṭho pana kāyānupassanāya evaṃladdhikattā paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:623_14: Aññaṃ jīvanti puṭṭho pana āhacca bhāsitaṃ suttaṃ paṭikkhipituṃ asakkonto avajānāti.
atk-abh03a:624_1: Paravādīpakkhe pana añño kāyo añño puggaloti puṭṭho sakavādī ṭhapanīyapañhattā paṭikkhipati,
atk-abh03a:627_2: Tattha yasmā puggalavādī “sa sattakkhattuparamaṃ sandhāvitvāna puggalo”tiādīni suttāni nissāya puggalo sandhāvatīti laddhiṃ gahetvā voharati,
atk-abh03a:627_3: tasmāssa taṃ laddhiṃ bhindituṃ sandhāvatīti pucchā sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a:627_11: So ca añño cāti puṭṭho ekaccasassatadiṭṭhibhayena.
atk-abh03a:627_12: Neva so na aññoti puṭṭho amarāvikkhepadiṭṭhibhayena.
atk-abh03a:627_13: Puna cattāropi pañhe ekato puṭṭho catunnampi diṭṭhīnaṃ bhayena paṭikkhipitvā puna yānissa suttāni nissāya
atk-abh03a:627_14: laddhi uppannā tāni dassento tena hi puggalo sandhāvatītiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:628_2: kiṃ so asmiñca parasmiñca loke ekoyevā”ti adhippāyena svevāti niyametvā puṭṭho sassatabhayā paṭikkhipitvā
atk-abh03a:628_3: puna daḷhaṃ katvā tatheva puṭṭho yasmā so puggalova na añño bhāvo,
atk-abh03a:628_6: Sveva manussoti puṭṭho manussasseva devattābhāvato paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:629_1: Puna puṭṭho “ahaṃ tena samayena sunetto nāma satthā ahosi”ntiādisuttavasena paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:629_2: Athassa sakavādī devamanussupapattīnaṃ nānattato vacanaṃ micchāti pakāsento manusso hutvātiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:630_1: Tattha hevaṃ maraṇaṃ na hehitīti evaṃ sante maraṇaṃ na bhavissatīti attho.
atk-abh03a:630_2: Ito paraṃ yakkho petoti attabhāvanānattavasena anuyoganānattaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh03a:631_0: 82. Khattiyotiādīni jātivasena ceva aṅgavekallādivasena ca vuttāni.
atk-abh03a:632_1: Puna na vattabbanti paravādinā puṭṭho idhaṭṭhakassa upapattivasena paralokassa gamanābhāvato paṭiññā
atk-abh03a:632_2: sakavādissa puna sotāpannassa bhavantarepi sotāpannabhāvāvijahanato dutiyapaṭiññāpi tasseva.
atk-abh03a:633_0: 88. Puna devaloke upapannassa manussattābhāvadassanena anuyogo sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a:634_1: Tato paraṃ anañño avigatoti ettha anaññoti sabbākārena ekasadiso.
atk-abh03a:634_3: Na hevanti devaloke upapannassa manussabhāvābhāvato evamāha.
atk-abh03a:635_1: Puna daḷhaṃ katvā anuyutto “sveva puggalo sandhāvatī”ti laddhiyā anujānāti.
atk-abh03a:635_2: Hatthacchinnotiādi ākāravigamanadassanena avigato sandhāvatīti laddhibhindanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:636_1: Sarūpotiādīsu paṭhame pañhe iminā rūpakāyena saddhiṃ agamanaṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:636_3: So hi tassa laddhiyā sarūpova gantvā mātukucchiṃ pavisati.
atk-abh03a:636_5: Taṃ jīvanti yena rūpasaṅkhātena sarīrena saddhiṃ gacchati,
atk-abh03a:636_6: kimassa tadeva jīvaṃ taṃ sarīranti pucchati.
atk-abh03a:636_7: Paravādī idha sarīranikkhepā suttavirodhā ca paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:637_2: Taṃ jīvanti yena vedanādisaṅkhātena sarīrena saddhiṃ gacchati.
atk-abh03a:637_3: Kimassa tadeva jīvaṃ taṃ sarīranti pucchati.
atk-abh03a:637_5: aññaṃ jīvaṃ aññaṃ sarīranti etissā hi laddhiyā pañcapi khandhā sarīranti adhippetā.
atk-abh03a:638_1: Arūpotiādīsu paṭhame pañhe antarābhavaṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:638_2: Dutiye arūpā rūpaṃ upapajjamānaṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti. Aññaṃ,
atk-abh03a:638_3: jīvanti yaṃ rūpasaṅkhātaṃ sarīraṃ pahāya arūpo sandhāvati,
atk-abh03a:639_2: Aññaṃ jīvanti yaṃ vedanādisaṅkhātaṃ sarīraṃ pahāya avedano aviññāṇo sandhāvati,
atk-abh03a:640_1: Rūpaṃ sandhāvatītiādīsu ye rūpādayo khandhe upādāya puggalaṃ paññapeti,
atk-abh03a:640_2: kiṃ te tasmiṃ puggale sandhāvante tampi rūpaṃ sandhāvatīti pucchati.
atk-abh03a:640_3: Paravādī “avijjānīvaraṇānaṃ sattānaṃ taṇhāsaṃyojanānaṃ sandhāvataṃ saṃsarata”nti sattasseva sandhāvanavacanato paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:640_4: Puna puṭṭho yasmā rūpādidhamme vinā puggalo natthi,
atk-abh03a:640_5: tasmā tasmiṃ sandhāvante tenapi rūpena sandhāvitabbanti saññāya paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:641_1: Rūpaṃ na sandhāvatītiādīsu yasmā te rūpaṃ puggalo na hoti,
atk-abh03a:641_4: kiṃ te rūpaṃ na sandhāvatīti attho.
atk-abh03a:641_5: Itaro puggale sandhāvante na sakkā tassa upādānabhūtena rūpena sandhāvitunti saññāya paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:642_1: āyasmato matena rukkhaṃ upādāya chāyā viya,
atk-abh03a:642_4: rūpādīnaṃ sandhāvane asati tesu khandhesu bhijjamānesu so tava puggalo bhijjati ce,
atk-abh03a:642_10: Athāpi tesu khandhesu bhijjamānesu so puggalo na bhijjati,
atk-abh03a:646_4: So hi rukkhaṃ upādāya chāyāya viya,
atk-abh03a:646_6: rūpādīni upādāya puggalassa paññattiṃ paññāpanaṃ avabodhanaṃ icchati,
atk-abh03a:646_8: Puna yathā rukkhupādānā chāyā rukkho viya,
atk-abh03a:646_9: indhanupādāno ca aggi indhanaṃ viya aniccādidhammo,
atk-abh03a:646_10: evaṃ te rūpādiupādāno puggalo rūpādayo viya aniccoti imamatthaṃ puṭṭho attano laddhiyaṃ ṭhatvā paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:647_1: Nīlaṃ rūpaṃ upādāya nīlotiādīsu nīlarūpena saddhiṃ puggalassa ekattaṃ,
atk-abh03a:647_2: ekasarīre nīlādīnaṃ bahūnaṃ vasena bahubhāvañca anicchanto paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:648_1: Kusalaṃ vedananti etthāpi vedanāya saddhiṃ ekattaṃ ekasantāne bahūnaṃ kusalavedanānaṃ vasena bahubhāvañca anicchanto paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:648_3: Saphalotiādīni puṭṭho tathārūpassa vohārassa abhāvato paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:652_1: Rūpaṃ upādāya vedanaṃ upādāyāti ettha aññepi rūpamūlakā dukatikacatukkā veditabbā.
atk-abh03a:652_2: Yasmā pana khandhe upādāya puggalassa paññatti,
atk-abh03a:652_3: tasmā dvepi tayopi cattāropi pañcapi upādāya paññattiṃ paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:652_4: Ekasantāne pana dvinnaṃ pañcannaṃ vā abhāvā paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:653_4: evaṃ tassa puggalassāpi āpajjatīti dassetuṃ yathā rukkhantiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:653_7: Paravādī pana tathā anicchanto laddhiyaṃ ṭhatvā paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:654_2: Negaḷikoti tena bandhako yassa rūpaṃ so rūpavāti yasmā yassa rūpaṃ so rūpavā hoti,
atk-abh03a:655_1: Citte cittetiādīsu sarāgādicittavasena sarāgāditaṃ sandhāya cittānupassanāvasena paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:655_2: Jāyatītiādinā nayena puṭṭho puggalassa khaṇikabhāvaṃ anicchanto paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:655_4: Puna na vattabbaṃ “kumārako”ti vā “kumārikā”ti vā puṭṭho lokavohārasamucchedabhayena vattabbanti paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:656_1: Idāni paravādī aññenākārena laddhiṃ patiṭṭhāpetukāmo na vattabbaṃ puggalo upalabbhatītiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:656_2: Tattha na vattabbanti kiṃ te iminā evaṃ bahunā upādāpaññattānuyogena,
atk-abh03a:656_5: Tato sakavādinā āmantāti vutte nanu yo passatītiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:656_13: nanu yo yaṃ rūpaṃ yena cakkhunā passati,
atk-abh03a:656_14: so taṃ rūpaṃ tena cakkhunā passanto puggaloti.
atk-abh03a:656_15: Sakavādī kiñcāpi cakkhuviññāṇassa nissayabhāvaṃ gacchantaṃ cakkhumeva rūpaṃ passati,
atk-abh03a:656_19: passati arahā cakkhunā rūpa”ntiādisammutivasena pana āmantāti paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:657_1: Tato chalavādaṃ nissāya paravādinā puggalassa vattabbatāya sādhitāya tameva vādaṃ parivattetvā puggalo upalabbhatītiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:657_2: Tattha yo na passatīti andho asaññasatto arūpaṃ upapanno nirodhaṃ samāpanno,
atk-abh03a:657_3: anandhopi ca aññatra dassanasamayā na passati nāma.
atk-abh03a:658_1: Suttasaṃsandanāyaṃ dibbassa cakkhuno rūpagocarattā rūpaṃ passatīti āha.
atk-abh03a:658_3: Tatiyavāre “rūpaṃ disvā puggalaṃ vibhāvetī”ti laddhito ubho passatīti āha.
atk-abh03a:658_4: Yasmā pana passitabbaṃ nāma diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ mutaṃ viññātanti catubbidhe rūpasaṅgahe rūpāyatanameva saṅgahitaṃ,
atk-abh03a:661_2: Tattha kamme sati niyamato tassa kārakenapi bhavitabbanti laddhiyā pucchā paravādissa,
atk-abh03a:661_7: Idāni yasmā paravādī puggalaṃ sandhāya kattāti pucchati,
atk-abh03a:662_1: Tassa kattā kāretāti ettha yadi yaṃ yaṃ upalabbhati,
atk-abh03a:662_2: tassa tassa kattā puggalo te upalabbhati,
atk-abh03a:662_3: kiṃ tassāpi kārako ca kārāpako ca añño puggalo upalabbhatīti attho.
atk-abh03a:662_5: Puna puṭṭho yasmā puggalaṃ mātāpitaro janenti nāmaṃ karonti posenti,
atk-abh03a:662_7: Ye ca pana taṃ kalyāṇamittā vā ācariyā vā tāni tāni vijjāṭṭhānasippāyatanāni sikkhāpenti,
atk-abh03a:662_8: te kārāpakā nāmāti imamatthaṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:662_9: Purimakammameva tassa kattā ceva kārāpetā cāti adhippetaṃ.
atk-abh03a:663_2: yadi kammānaṃ kārakassa kattā tassāpi kattā tassāpi kattā attheva,
atk-abh03a:663_3: evaṃ sante purimena purimena avassaṃ pacchā pacchā puggalo kātabboti imināpi te kammānaṃ kārakena puggalena āyatiṃ añño puggalo kātabbo,
atk-abh03a:663_7: Paccayābhāvena paccayapaṭibaddhassa dukkhassa abhāvā yaṃ nibbānaṃ vuttaṃ,
atk-abh03a:663_9: Atha vā tassa tassevāti yadi kammaṃ kammamattaṃ na hoti,
atk-abh03a:663_13: Evaṃ sante yā esā kammavaṭṭassa appavattikaraṇena dukkhassa antakiriyā vuttā,
atk-abh03a:663_16: Ito aparāsupi upalabbhati sāmaññena kārakapucchāsu puggalaṃyeva sandhāya “kattā kāretā”ti vuttaṃ,
atk-abh03a:664_1: Añño kalyāṇapāpakānaṃ kammānaṃ kattāti pañho “saṅkhāravantaṃ vā attāna”ntiādidiṭṭhibhayā paṭikkhitto.
atk-abh03a:665_1: Vipāko upalabbhatītiādi vipākapaṭisaṃvedīvasena puggalaṃ dassentassa laddhibhindanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:665_3: vipākapavattito aññassa vedakassa abhāvā paṭikkhepo sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a:666_1: Tassa paṭisaṃvedīti tassa vipākapaṭisaṃvedakassa paṭisaṃvedī yasmā pana paṭisaṃveditabbo nāma vipāko,
atk-abh03a:666_4: Puna puṭṭho yasmā puññavipāke ṭhitattā vipākapaṭisaṃvedī puttaṃ vā patiṃ vā mātā vā jāyā vā paricumbati parisajjati,
atk-abh03a:666_5: tasmā tathārūpaṃ paṭisaṃveditaṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti paravādī.
atk-abh03a:667_0: Tassa tassevāti yadi vipāko vipākamattaṃ na hoti,
atk-abh03a:667_2: tassāpi paṭisaṃvedī tassāpi paṭisaṃvedīti evaṃ puggalaparamparā atthi.
atk-abh03a:667_3: Evaṃ sante yā esā vipākavaṭṭassa appavattikaraṇena dukkhassa antakiriyā vuttā,
atk-abh03a:667_5: Ito paraṃ upalabbhatisāmaññena paṭisaṃvedīpucchāsu heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva attho veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:668_1: Añño kalyāṇapāpakānaṃ kammānaṃ vipākapaṭisaṃvedīti pañho “vedanavantaṃ vā attāna”ntiādidiṭṭhibhayā paṭikkhitto.
atk-abh03a:669_1: Dibbaṃ sukhantiādi kalyāṇapāpakānaṃ kammānaṃ vipākaṃ bhājetvā dassanavasena āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh03a:670_0: 148. Mahāpathavīādīni hi ārammaṇaṃ katvā vedayitānaṃ uppatti appaṭisiddhā.
atk-abh03a:671_2: Tattha so karotīti yaṃ tvaṃ kattāti ca paṭisaṃvedīti ca vadesi,
atk-abh03a:672_1: Puna puṭṭho “idha nandati pecca nandatī”tiādisuttavasena paṭiññā tasseva.
atk-abh03a:672_2: Athassa vacanokāsaṃ paṭibāhanto sakavādī sayaṃkataṃ sukhadukkhanti āha.
atk-abh03a:673_1: Tattha añño karotīti kārakavedakānaṃ aññattapucchāvasena vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:673_2: Tato paravādī suttavirodhabhayena paṭikkhipitvā puna puṭṭho “manussabhūto katvā devabhūto paṭisaṃvedetī”ti maññamāno paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:673_3: Evaṃvādino pana paraṃkataṃ sukhadukkhaṃ āpajjatīti tassa vasena puṭṭho puna paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:674_1: So ca añño cāti kārakavedakānaṃ ekattaaññattapucchāvasena vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:674_2: Tato paravādī suttavirodhabhayeneva paṭikkhipitvā puna puṭṭho purime dvepi naye ekato katvā paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:674_3: Evaṃvādino pana sayaṃkatañca paraṃkatañca sukhadukkhaṃ āpajjatīti tassa vasena puṭṭho puna paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:675_1: Neva so karotīti kārakavedakānaṃ ekattaaññattapaṭikkhepavasena vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:675_2: Tato paravādī suttavirodhavaseneva paṭikkhipitvā puna puṭṭho yasmā manusso devalokūpapattiyā kammaṃ katvā na manussabhūtova paṭisaṃvedeti,
atk-abh03a:675_5: tasmā kārakato vedako neva so hoti,
atk-abh03a:675_8: Evaṃvādino pana asayaṃkāraṃ aparaṃkāraṃ adhiccasamuppannaṃ sukhadukkhaṃ āpajjatīti tassa vasena puṭṭho puna paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:675_9: Apica imasmiṃ vomissakanaye ādito paṭṭhāya imināpi nayena attho veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:675_10: Yasmā hi ayaṃ puggalavādī kammānaṃ kārakañceva vedakañca icchati,
atk-abh03a:675_14: ubhohi vāpi na bhavitabbanti idamāpannaṃ hoti.
atk-abh03a:675_15: Evamāpannameva anuyogaṃ anuyuñjanto sakavādī “so karotī”tiādayo cattāropi vikappe āha.
atk-abh03a:676_0: Pariyosāne pana cattāropi pañhā ekato puṭṭhā.
atk-abh03a:676_1: Tattha paṭikkhepo ca paṭijānanā ca sayaṃkatādidosappatti ca purimanayeneva veditabbā.
atk-abh03a:676_2: Ito paraṃ “kalyāṇapāpakānī”ti avatvā heṭṭhā vuttanayā eva “kammaṃ atthī”tiādinā vikappena dassitā.
atk-abh03a:680_2: Tattha āmantāti sakavādinā paṭiññāte paravādī “bahiddhā anindriyabaddharūpe iddhividhādivisesādhigamo natthi,
atk-abh03a:680_4: tasmā iddhādinibbattakena puggalena bhavitabba”nti maññamāno nanu atthi koci iddhiṃ vikubbatītiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:683_8: “Arahā hutvā na arahā”ti panettha moghapañhattā na vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:685_4: Puna puṭṭho puggalaṃ sandhāya paṭiññā tasseva.
atk-abh03a:686_0: 211. Añño puggalotipañhepi saṅkhatehi khandhehi aññattaṃ anicchanto paṭikkhepo tasseva.
atk-abh03a:687_0: 212. Khandhā saṅkhatātiādi saṅkhatāsaṅkhatāni sarūpena dassetvā aññattapucchanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:688_0: 213. Rūpaṃ saṅkhatantiādi khandhe vibhāgato dassetvā aññattapucchanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:690_1: Puna na uppādo paññāyatītiādinā nayena puṭṭho “dukkhameva hi sambhoti,
atk-abh03a:690_2: dukkhaṃ tiṭṭhati veti cā”tiādivacanato puggalassa uppādādayo nāma na yujjantīti paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:695_1: Vedanaṃ vediyamānapañhe vedanaṃ vediyamāno pariggahitavedano yogāvacarova pajānāti,
atk-abh03a:697_0: 226. Pārāyanagāthāya suññato lokaṃ avekkhassūti sattasuññatavasena khandhalokaṃ olokehīti attho.
atk-abh03a:698_2: Paravādissa hi “suññato lokaṃ avekkhassū”ti gāthāya yo avekkhati,
atk-abh03a:698_7: Idaṃ pañcavokāravasena anujānitvā puna taṃ jīvanti puṭṭho suttavirodhabhayena paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:698_8: Vinā rūpenāti idaṃ catuvokāravasena anujānitvā puna aññaṃ jīvanti puṭṭho suttavirodhabhayeneva paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:698_9: “Abbhantaragato”ti ca “bahiddhā nikkhamitvā”ti ca idaṃ “saha rūpena vinā rūpenā”ti heṭṭhā vuttassa lakkhaṇavacanaṃ.
atk-abh03a:698_11: ito vā etto vā anikkhamitvā rūpaparicchedavaseneva ṭhito hutvāti attho.
atk-abh03a:699_3: Evaṃ sabbasuttānaṃ āgamaṭṭhakathāsu vuttanayeneva attho veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:700_1: Vuttaṃ bhagavatā sappikumbhotiādi “sabbāva desanā yathārutavaseneva atthato na gahetabbā”ti dassanatthaṃ ābhataṃ.
atk-abh03a:700_2: Yathā hi suvaṇṇaṃ gahetvā kato suvaṇṇavikāro kumbho suvaṇṇakumbhoti vuccati,
atk-abh03a:700_3: na evaṃ sappiṃ gahetvā kato sappissa vikāro sappikumbho nāma atthi.
atk-abh03a:700_8: na evaṃ bhattaṃ vā yāgu vā atthi.
atk-abh03a:700_9: Kālaparicchedaṃ pana akatvā divase divase dassāmāti paññattavasena “niccabhattaṃ dhuvayāgū”ti vuccatīti ayamettha attho.
atk-abh03a:701_0: “Atthi puggalo attahitāya paṭipanno”tiādīsupi yathā rūpādayo dhammā paccattalakkhaṇasāmaññalakkhaṇavasena atthi,
atk-abh03a:701_3: Iti iminā lokavohārena lokasammutiyā lokaniruttiyā atthi puggaloti ayamettha attho.
atk-abh03a:701_7: Rūpādidhammā pana vināpi lokasammutiṃ paccattasāmaññalakkhaṇavasena paññāpanato atthīti ayamettha attho.
atk-abh03a:702_0: Buddhānaṃ pana dve kathā sammutikathā ca paramatthakathā ca.
atk-abh03a:702_2: brahmātiādikā sammutikathā nāma. Aniccaṃ, dukkhaṃ, anattā, khandhā, dhātuyo,
atk-abh03a:703_1: brahmāti vāti vutte jānituṃ paṭivijjhituṃ niyyātuṃ arahattajayaggāhaṃ gahetuṃ sakkoti,
atk-abh03a:703_2: tassa bhagavā āditova sattoti vā puggaloti vā posoti vā devoti vā brahmāti vā katheti.
atk-abh03a:703_3: Yo paramatthadesanāya aniccanti vā dukkhanti vātiādīsu aññataraṃ sutvāva jānituṃ paṭivijjhituṃ niyyātuṃ arahattajayaggāhaṃ gahetuṃ sakkoti.
atk-abh03a:703_5: Tathā sammutikathāya bujjhanakasattassa na paṭhamaṃ paramatthakathaṃ katheti.
atk-abh03a:703_6: Sammutikathāya pana bodhetvā pacchā paramatthakathaṃ katheti.
atk-abh03a:703_7: Paramatthakathāya bujjhanakasattassāpi na paṭhamaṃ sammutikathaṃ katheti.
atk-abh03a:703_8: Paramatthakathāya pana bodhetvā pacchā sammutikathaṃ katheti.
atk-abh03a:703_9: Pakatiyā pana paṭhamameva paramatthakathaṃ kathentassa desanā lūkhākārā hoti.
atk-abh03a:703_10: Tasmā buddhā paṭhamaṃ sammutikathaṃ kathetvā pacchā paramatthakathaṃ kathenti.
atk-abh03a:703_11: Te sammutikathaṃ kathentāpi saccameva sabhāvameva amusāva kathenti.
atk-abh03a:703_12: Paramatthakathaṃ kathentāpi saccameva sabhāvameva amusāva kathenti. Ayañhi –
atk-abh03a:709_1: dve bhagavato desanā paramatthadesanā ca khandhādivasena,
atk-abh03a:709_4: Tasmā “atthi puggalo”ti vacanamattato abhiniveso na kātabbo.
atk-abh03a:717_7: dhammā samayavimuttassa bhikkhuno parihānāya saṃvattantī”ti evamādīni hi suttāni nissāya sammitiyā vajjiputtakā
atk-abh03a:717_8: sabbatthivādino ekacce ca mahāsaṅghikā arahatopi parihāniṃ icchanti,
atk-abh03a:717_9: tasmā te vā hontu aññeyeva vā,
atk-abh03a:717_11: tesaṃ laddhibhindanatthaṃ parihāyati arahā arahattāti pucchā sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a:717_12: Tatra parihāyatīti dve parihāniyo pattaparihāni ca appattaparihāni ca.
atk-abh03a:717_13: Tattha “dutiyampi kho āyasmā godhiko tamhā sāmayikāya cetovimuttiyā parihāyī”ti ayaṃ pattaparihāni nāma.
atk-abh03a:717_14: “Mā vo sāmaññatthikānaṃ sataṃ sāmaññattho parihāyī”ti ayaṃ appattaparihāni.
atk-abh03a:717_17: Sakasamaye pana imaṃ pattaparihāniṃ nāma lokiyasamāpattiyāva icchanti,
atk-abh03a:717_19: Parasamayepi naṃ sabbasāmaññaphalesu sabbabhavesu sabbakālesu sabbesañca puggalānaṃ na icchanti.
atk-abh03a:717_20: Taṃ pana tesaṃ laddhimattamevāti sabbaṃ laddhijālaṃ bhindituṃ puna sabbatthātiādinā nayena desanā vaḍḍhitā.
atk-abh03a:718_0: Tattha yasmā paravādī kamena parihāyitvā sotāpattiphale ṭhitassa arahato parihāniṃ na icchati,
atk-abh03a:718_2: Yasmā ca rūpārūpabhavesu ṭhitassa na icchati,
atk-abh03a:718_3: kammārāmatādīnaṃ pana parihāniyadhammānaṃ bhāvato kāmabhave ṭhitasseva icchati,
atk-abh03a:718_5: Puna daḷhaṃ katvā puṭṭho kāmabhavaṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:718_6: Sabbasmimpi hi kāmabhave parihānikarā kāmaguṇā atthi,
atk-abh03a:720_2: Dutiye ayonisomanasikaroto rattibhāge vā divasabhāge vā sabbadā parihāyanato paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:720_3: Tatiye parihānikaradhammasamāyoge sati muhuttameva parihāni nāma hoti,
atk-abh03a:720_4: tato pubbe aparihīnassa pacchā parihīnassa ca parihāni nāma natthīti paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:721_0: Sabbeva arahantoti pañhānaṃ paṭhamasmiṃ tikkhindriye sandhāya paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:721_3: Tesañhi sabbesampi parihāni na hotīti tassa laddhi.
atk-abh03a:722_6: “catūhi satasahassehi seṭṭhī seṭṭhittaṃ karonto satasahassehi parihīne seṭṭhī seṭṭhittā parihīno hotī”ti.
atk-abh03a:722_7: Tato sakavādinā ekadesena parihāniṃ sandhāya “āmantā”ti vutte sabbasāpateyyā parihīno hotīti pucchati.
atk-abh03a:722_8: Tathā aparihīnattā sakavādī na hevāti vatvā atha naṃ “evameva arahāpi parihāyati ca.
atk-abh03a:722_9: Na ca catūhi phalehī”ti uppannaladdhikaṃ dutiyaṃ bhabbapañhaṃ pucchati.
atk-abh03a:722_10: Paravādī seṭṭhino abhabbatāya niyamaṃ apassanto paṭijānitvā arahato catūhi phalehi parihānibhabbataṃ
atk-abh03a:722_11: puṭṭho “niyato sambodhiparāyaṇo”ti vacanassa ayoniso atthaṃ gahetvā laddhiyaṃ ṭhito sotāpattiphalato
atk-abh03a:725_2: Tattha yasmā keci arahatova parihāniṃ icchanti,
atk-abh03a:725_9: Sotāpannassa pana tepi sabbathāpi na icchantiyeva,
atk-abh03a:725_11: Tattha tesaṃ laddhivasena paṭiññā ca paṭikkhepo ca veditabbā.
atk-abh03a:725_12: “Parihāyati anāgāmī anāgāmiphalā”ti hi pañhasmiṃ ye anāgāmino parihāniṃ na icchanti,
atk-abh03a:725_14: Ye pakatianāgāmino vā arahattā parihāyitvā ṭhitaanāgāmino vā parihāniṃ icchanti,
atk-abh03a:726_1: Yaṃ panettha “sotāpattiphalassa anantarā arahattaṃyeva sacchikarotī”ti vuttaṃ,
atk-abh03a:726_2: taṃ parihīnassa puna vāyamato arahattappattiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:727_1: Tato paraṃ “parihāni nāmesā kilesappahānassa vā mandatāya bhaveyya,
atk-abh03a:727_3: saccānaṃ vā adassanenā”ti evamādīnaṃ vasena anuyuñjituṃ kassa bahutarā kilesā pahīnātiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:727_4: Taṃ sabbaṃ uttānādhippāyameva suttānaṃ panattho āgamaṭṭhakathāsu vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:728_1: Samayavimutto arahā arahattā parihāyatīti ettha mudindriyo samayavimutto,
atk-abh03a:728_4: vasippatto jhānalābhī ceva sabbe ca ariyapuggalā ariye vimokkhe asamayavimuttāti sanniṭṭhānaṃ.
atk-abh03a:728_5: So pana taṃ attano laddhiṃ gahetvā samayavimutto parihāyati,
atk-abh03a:731_2: Tattha uccāvacāti uttamahīnabhedato uccā ca avacā ca.
atk-abh03a:731_11: Tāya cetāya uccāvacāya paṭipadāya na pāraṃ diguṇaṃ yanti,
atk-abh03a:731_12: ekamaggena dvikkhattuṃ nibbānaṃ na gacchantīti attho. Kasmā?
atk-abh03a:731_16: Nayidaṃ ekaguṇaṃ mutanti tañca idaṃ pāraṃ ekavāraṃyeva phusanārahaṃ na hoti. Kasmā?
atk-abh03a:732_0: Atthi chinnassa chediyanti chinnassa kilesavaṭṭassa puna chinditabbaṃ kiñci atthīti pucchati.
atk-abh03a:732_1: Itaro tikkhindriyaṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipitvā puna puṭṭho mudindriyaṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:732_3: Tattha oghapāsoti kilesogho ceva kilesapāso ca.
atk-abh03a:733_1: Katassa paṭicayoti bhāvitassa maggassa puna bhāvanā.
atk-abh03a:734_1: Parihānāya saṃvattantīti paravādinā ābhate sutte pañca dhammā appattaparihānāya ceva lokiyasamāpattiparihānāya ca saṃvattanti.
atk-abh03a:734_2: So pana pattassa arahattaphalassa parihānāya sallakkheti.
atk-abh03a:734_4: Itaropi asamayavimuttaṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipitvā itaraṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:734_5: Kāmarāgavasena vā pavattamānaṃ taṃ paṭikkhipitvā itarathā pavattamānaṃ paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:734_6: Rāgādīnaṃ pana atthitaṃ puṭṭho paṭijānituṃ na sakkoti.
atk-abh03a:735_1: Kiṃ pariyuṭṭhitoti kena pariyuṭṭhito anubaddho ajjhotthato vā hutvāti attho.
atk-abh03a:735_4: Rāgo upacayaṃ gacchatīti bhāvanāya pahīnaṃ sandhāyāha.
atk-abh03a:735_6: Sakkāyadiṭṭhiādīnaṃ pana dassanena pahīnattā upacayaṃ na icchati.
atk-abh03a:740_6: Tattha ye paranimmitavasavattideve upādāya taduparidevesu maggabhāvanampi na icchanti seyyathāpi sammitiyā,
atk-abh03a:740_7: te sandhāya natthi devesūti pucchā sakavādissa. “Tīhi,
atk-abh03a:740_9: ṭhānehi jambudīpakā manussā uttarakuruke ca manusse adhiggaṇhanti deve ca tāvatiṃse.
atk-abh03a:740_11: Sūrā satimanto idha brahmacariyavāso”ti idaṃ suttaṃ nissāya dvepi brahmacariyavāsā natthi devesūti uppannaladdhivasena paṭiññā paravādissa.
atk-abh03a:740_12: Puna dvinnampi brahmacariyānaṃ antarāyikadhammavaseneva sabbe devā jaḷāti pucchā sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a:740_13: Tattha hatthasaṃvācikāti mūgā viya hatthamuddhāya vattāro.
atk-abh03a:740_16: Paṭiññāya adhippāyaṃ asallakkhetvā pabbajjāvasena anuyogo paravādissa.
atk-abh03a:741_1: Yattha natthi pabbajjāti pañhe gihīnañceva ekaccānañca devānaṃ maggapaṭilābhaṃ sandhāya paṭikkhepo tasseva.
atk-abh03a:741_2: Puna puṭṭho paccantavāsino ceva asaññasatte ca sandhāya paṭiññā tasseva.
atk-abh03a:741_4: Puna “atthi devesū”ti pañhepi maggabhāvanaṃ sandhāyeva paṭiññā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:743_0: Atthi yattha atthīti atthi te devā,
atk-abh03a:743_2: yattha atthīti evaṃ sattapadesavibhāgamukhena vissajjanaṃ sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a:744_1: Suttānuyoge kuhiṃ phaluppattīti tassa anāgāmino arahattaphaluppatti kuhinti pucchā sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a:745_2: yasmā anāgāmipuggalo idha loke bhāvitena maggena tattha suddhāvāsesu phalaṃ sacchikaroti,
atk-abh03a:747_1: Idāni yadi aññattha bhāvitena maggena aññattha phalasacchikiriyā hoti,
atk-abh03a:747_2: sotāpannādīnampi siyāti etamatthaṃ dassetuṃ puna anāgāmītiādīnaṃ saṃsandanapucchā sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a:747_5: Idha bhāvitamaggo hi anāgāmī idhavihāyaniṭṭho nāma hoti.
atk-abh03a:747_6: So idha anāgāmimaggaṃ bhāvetvā “opapātiko tatthaparinibbāyī”ti vacanato “puna maggabhāvanaṃ vinā upapattivaseneva
atk-abh03a:747_8: Sotāpannasakadāgāmino pana tattha maggaṃ bhāvetvā tatrupapattikā nāma hontīti tesaṃ idhāgamanaññeva natthi.
atk-abh03a:747_9: Iti so anāgāmissa phalasacchikiriyaṃ puṭṭho paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:748_0: Anāgāmī puggalo tattha bhāvitena maggenāti pañhe “anāgāmino tattha maggabhāvanāva natthī”ti laddhiyā paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:748_2: na ca kilesā pahīyantīti pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:748_4: Rūpāvacaramaggena hi so idhavihāyaniṭṭho nāma jāto.
atk-abh03a:749_0: Anāgāmī puggalo katakaraṇīyoti pañhe “opapātiko tatthaparinibbāyī”ti vacanato upapattiyāvassa katakaraṇīyādibhāvaṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:749_1: Arahāti pañhe idhaparinibbāyino arahato vaseneva paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:750_0: Atthi arahato punabbhavotiādīsupi tatthaparinibbāyī idhaparinibbāyīnaṃ vaseneva attho veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:750_1: Appaṭividdhākuppova tatthaparinibbāyatīti puṭṭho idheva bhāvitena maggena tassa akuppapaṭivedhaṃ icchanto paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:751_0: Yathā migoti paṭhamaṃ udāharaṇaṃ paravādissa, dutiyaṃ sakavādissa. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānatthamevāti.
atk-abh03a:754_2: Tattha ye sotāpannādīnaṃ nānābhisamayavasena dukkhadassanādīhi odhiso odhiso ekadesena ekadesena kilesappahānaṃ
atk-abh03a:754_4: tesaṃ taṃ laddhiṃ bhindituṃ odhisoti pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:758_2: Tattha yesaṃ “jhānalābhī puthujjano saha saccābhisamayā anāgāmī nāma hoti,
atk-abh03a:758_3: tassa puthujjanakāleyeva kāmarāgabyāpādā pahīnā”ti laddhi seyyathāpi etarahi sammitiyānaṃ,
atk-abh03a:758_4: tesaṃ taṃ laddhiṃ bhindituṃ jahati puthujjanoti pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:758_5: jhānavikkhambhitānaṃ pana tesaṃ pariyuṭṭhānaṃ apassantassa paṭiññā paravādissa.
atk-abh03a:758_6: Yasmā pana tesaṃ jhānavikkhambhitānampi anāgāmimaggeneva accantaṃ pahānaṃ hoti,
atk-abh03a:758_10: Tato paraṃ anāgāmimaggaṭṭhena saddhiṃ puthujjanasaṃsandanaṃ hoti.
atk-abh03a:759_1: Tato paraṃ anāgāmiphale saṇṭhātīti puṭṭho jhānānāgāmitaṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:759_2: Arahatte saṇṭhātīti puṭṭho dassanamaggena uddhambhāgiyānaṃ pahānābhāvato paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:760_0: Apubbaṃ acarimaṃ tayo maggeti puṭṭho tathārūpāya bhāvanāya abhāvā paṭikkhipati.
