atk-abh03a:760_1: Puna puṭṭho tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ kiccasabbhāvaṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:760_3: Katamena maggenāti puṭṭho anāgāmimaggenāti jhānānāgāmitaṃ sandhāya vadati.
atk-abh03a:760_4: Puna saṃyojanappahānaṃ puṭṭho tiṇṇaṃ anāgāmimaggena tesaṃ kilesānaṃ appaheyyattā paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:760_5: Dutiyaṃ puṭṭho paṭhamamaggasseva jhānānāgāmimaggabhāvaṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:764_3: ayaṃ vuccati rūpakkhandho”tiādivacanato “sabbepi atītādibhedā dhammā khandhasabhāvaṃ na vijahanti,
atk-abh03a:764_16: vedanaṃ vā rūpena anānaṃ ekalakkhaṇameva katvā sabbamatthīti pucchati.
atk-abh03a:764_17: Yampi natthi tampatthīti yampi chaṭṭhakhandhādikaṃ sasavisāṇādikaṃ vā kiñci natthīti siddhaṃ,
atk-abh03a:764_19: Sabbamatthīti yā diṭṭhi sā diṭṭhi micchādiṭṭhīti,
atk-abh03a:764_20: yā diṭṭhi sā diṭṭhi sammādiṭṭhīti hevamatthīti iminā idaṃ pucchati –
atk-abh03a:764_22: sā diṭṭhi ayāthāvakattā micchādiṭṭhīti evaṃ yā amhākaṃ diṭṭhi,
atk-abh03a:764_23: sā diṭṭhi yāthāvakattā sammādiṭṭhīti evaṃ tava samaye atthīti pucchati.
atk-abh03a:764_24: Itaro sabbesupi etesu nayesu vuttappakārāya atthitāya abhāvato paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:764_25: Imesu pana sabbesupi nayesu “ājānāhi niggaha”nti ādiṃ katvā sabbo kathāmaggabhedo vitthārato veditabboti ayaṃ tāvettha vādayutti.
atk-abh03a:767_1: Paccuppannaṃ rūpaṃ appiyaṃ karitvāti atītānāgataṃ pahāya paccuppannarūpameva appiyaṃ avibhajitabbaṃ karitvā.
atk-abh03a:767_2: Rūpabhāvaṃ jahatītipañhe niruddhassāpi rūpassa rūpakkhandhasaṅgahitattā paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:767_3: Rūpabhāvaṃ na jahatīti paṭilomapañhepi rūpakkhandhena saṅgahitattāva paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:767_4: Odātaṃ vatthaṃ appiyaṃ karitvāti ettha kiñcāpi na sabbaṃ vatthaṃ odātaṃ,
atk-abh03a:767_5: iminā pana vatthanti avatvā “odātaṃ vatthaṃ appiyaṃ karitvā”ti vutte sakavādinā ekatthatā anuññātā.
atk-abh03a:767_6: Odātabhāvaṃ jahatīti pañhe vaṇṇavigamaṃ sandhāya paṭiññā sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a:767_7: Vatthabhāvaṃ jahatīti ettha pana paññattiyā avigatattā paṭikkhepo tasseva.
atk-abh03a:768_1: Atītaṃ atītabhāvaṃ na jahatīti puṭṭho “yadi jaheyya,
atk-abh03a:768_2: anāgataṃ vā paccuppannaṃ vā siyā”ti maññamāno paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:768_3: Anāgataṃ anāgatabhāvaṃ na jahatīti puṭṭho pana “yadi na jaheyya,
atk-abh03a:769_1: Evaṃ suddhikanayaṃ vatvā puna khandhavasena dassetuṃ atītaṃ rūpantiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:771_2: Tattha hañci atītaṃ nvatthīti yadi atītaṃ no atthīti attho.
atk-abh03a:771_3: Atītaṃ atthīti micchāti atītañca taṃ atthi cāti micchā eva.
atk-abh03a:771_4: Taññeva anāgataṃ taṃ paccuppannanti puṭṭho anāgatakkhaṇeyevassa paccuppannatāya abhāvaṃ sandhāya kālanānattena paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:772_0: Dutiyaṃ puṭṭho yaṃ uppādato pubbe anāgataṃ ahosi,
atk-abh03a:772_2: Hutvā hoti hutvā hotīti yadetaṃ tayā “anāgataṃ hutvā paccuppannaṃ hotī”ti vadatā taññeva anāgataṃ taṃ
atk-abh03a:772_3: paccuppannanti laddhivasena “anāgataṃ vā paccuppannaṃ vā hutvā hotī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:772_5: Itaro hutvā bhūtassa puna hutvā abhāvato na hevanti paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:773_0: Dutiyaṃ puṭṭho yasmā taṃ anāgataṃ hutvā paccuppannaṃ hontaṃ “hutvā hotī”ti saṅkhaṃ gataṃ,
atk-abh03a:773_2: Atha naṃ sakavādī “yadi te taṃ anāgataṃ hutvā paccuppannaṃ hontaṃ ‘hutvā hotī’ti saṅkhaṃ gataṃ,
atk-abh03a:773_4: yaṃ anāgataṃ na hutvā paccuppannaṃ na hontaṃ ‘na hutvā na hotī’ti saṅkhaṃ gataṃ sasavisāṇaṃ,
atk-abh03a:773_5: kiṃ te tampi puna na hutvā na hotī”tiadhippāyena na hutvā na hoti na hutvā na hotīti pañhaṃ pucchati.
atk-abh03a:773_8: eva anāgataṃ na hutvā paccuppannaṃ na hotīti nahutvānahoti nāma tāva hotu,
atk-abh03a:773_9: puna nahutvānahotibhāvo panassa kuto”ti maññamāno paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:773_10: Taññeva paccuppannaṃ taṃ atītanti pañhepi paccuppannakkhaṇeyevassa atītatāya abhāvaṃ sandhāya kālanānattā paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:774_0: Dutiyapañhe puṭṭho yaṃ atītabhāvato pubbe paccuppannaṃ ahosi,
atk-abh03a:774_2: Hutvā hoti hutvā hotīti yadetaṃ tayā “paccuppannaṃ hutvā atītaṃ hotī”ti vadatā “taññeva paccuppannaṃ
atk-abh03a:774_3: taṃ atīta”nti laddhivasena “paccuppannaṃ vā atītaṃ vā hutvā hotī”ti vuttaṃ,
atk-abh03a:774_5: Itaro hutvā bhūtassa puna hutvā abhāvato na hevanti paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:775_0: Dutiyapañhe yasmā taṃ paccuppannaṃ hutvā atītaṃ hontaṃ “hutvā hotī”ti saṅkhaṃ gataṃ,
atk-abh03a:775_2: Atha naṃ sakavādī “yadi te taññeva paccuppannaṃ hutvā atītaṃ hontaṃ ‘hutvā hotī’ti saṅkhaṃ gataṃ,
atk-abh03a:775_4: yaṃ paccuppannaṃ na hutvā atītaṃ na hontaṃ ‘na hutvā na hotī’ti saṅkhaṃ gataṃ sasavisāṇaṃ,
atk-abh03a:775_5: kiṃ te tampi puna na hutvā na hotī”ti adhippāyena na hutvā na hoti na hutvā na hotīti pañhaṃ pucchati.
atk-abh03a:775_7: taṃ natthitāya eva paccuppannaṃ na hutvā atītaṃ na hotīti nahutvānahoti nāma tāva hotu.
atk-abh03a:775_8: Puna nahutvānahotibhāvo panassa kuto”ti maññamāno paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:775_9: Ubhayaṃ ekato katvā āgate tatiyapañhepi imināvupāyena yojanā kātabbā.
atk-abh03a:776_3: paccuppannassa ca anāgate vutto hutvābhāvo āpajjati.
atk-abh03a:776_7: “kiṃ te etesu ekekaṃ hutvā hoti hutvā hotī”ti? Itaro –
atk-abh03a:776_8: “taññeva anāgataṃ taṃ paccuppanna”nti pañhe paṭikkhittanayeneva paṭikkhipitvā puna puṭṭho dutiye pañhe paṭiññātanayeneva paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:776_9: Atha naṃ sakavādī “taññeva anāgataṃ taṃ paccuppanna”nti pañhāvasena tesu ekekaṃ hutvā hoti hutvā hotīti
atk-abh03a:776_10: paṭijānantaṃ purimaṃ paṭikkhittapañhaṃ parivattitvā pucchanto na hutvā na hoti na hutvā na hotīti pucchati.
atk-abh03a:776_12: nanu “tayā taññeva anāgataṃ taṃ paccuppanna”nti vutte paṭhamapañhaṃ paṭikkhipantena anāgatassa hotibhāvo paccuppannassa ca hutvābhāvo paṭikkhittoti.
atk-abh03a:777_0: Dutiyapañhe ca taññeva anāgataṃ taṃ paccuppannanti paṭiññātaṃ.
atk-abh03a:777_1: Evaṃ sante anāgatampi na hutvā na hoti nāma.
atk-abh03a:777_2: Paccuppannampi na hutvā na hotiyeva nāma.
atk-abh03a:777_4: “kiṃ te etesu ekekaṃ na hutvā na hoti na hutvā na hotī”ti?
atk-abh03a:777_5: Paravādī sabbato andhakārena pariyonaddho viya tesaṃ nahutvānahotibhāvaṃ apassanto na hevanti paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:778_0: Dutiyavārepi yadi taññeva paccuppannaṃ taṃ atītaṃ,
atk-abh03a:778_2: atītassa ca paccuppanne vutto hutvābhāvo āpajjati,
atk-abh03a:778_6: “kiṃ te etesu ekekaṃ hutvā hoti hutvā hotī”ti?
atk-abh03a:778_7: Itaro taññeva paccuppannaṃ taṃ atītantipañhe paṭikkhittanayeneva paṭikkhipitvā puna puṭṭho dutiyapañhe paṭiññātanayeneva paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:778_8: Atha naṃ sakavādī “taññeva paccuppannaṃ taṃ atīta”nti pañhāvasena tesu ekekaṃ hutvā hoti hutvā hotīti
atk-abh03a:778_9: paṭijānantaṃ purimaṃ paṭikkhittapañhaṃ parivattitvā pucchanto na hutvā na hoti na hutvā na hotīti pucchati.
atk-abh03a:778_11: nanu tayā taññeva paccuppannaṃ taṃ atītanti vutte paṭhamapañhaṃ paṭikkhipantena paccuppannassa hotibhāvo,
atk-abh03a:779_0: Dutiyapañhe ca te “taññeva paccuppannaṃ taṃ atīta”nti paṭiññātaṃ.
atk-abh03a:779_1: Evaṃ sante paccuppannampi na hutvā na hoti nāma,
atk-abh03a:779_2: atītampi na hutvā na hotiyeva nāma.
atk-abh03a:779_4: “kiṃ te etesu ekekaṃ na hutvā na hoti,
atk-abh03a:779_6: Paravādī sabbato andhakārena pariyonaddho viya tesaṃ nahutvānahotibhāvaṃ apassanto na hevanti paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:780_0: Tatiyavārepi yadi taññeva anāgataṃ taṃ paccuppannaṃ taṃ atītaṃ;
atk-abh03a:780_6: “kiṃ te tīsupi etesu ekekaṃ hutvā hoti hutvā hotī”ti?
atk-abh03a:780_9: taṃ atīta”ntipañhe paṭikkhittanayeneva paṭikkhipitvā puna puṭṭho dutiyapañhe paṭiññātanayeneva paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:780_12: taṃ atīta”nti pañhāvasena tesu ekekaṃ hutvā hoti,
atk-abh03a:780_13: hutvā hotīti paṭijānantaṃ purimaṃ paṭikkhittapañhaṃ parivattitvā pucchanto na hutvā na hoti na hutvā na hotīti pucchati.
atk-abh03a:780_17: taṃ atītanti vutte paṭhamapañhaṃ paṭikkhipantena anāgatapaccuppannānaṃ hotibhāvo;
atk-abh03a:780_19: Tena anāgataṃ paccuppannañca na hoti nāma.
atk-abh03a:781_3: Evaṃ sante anāgatampi na hutvā na hoti nāma,
atk-abh03a:781_4: paccuppannampi atītampi na hutvā na hotiyeva nāma.
atk-abh03a:781_6: “kiṃ te etesu ekekaṃ na hutvā na hoti na hutvā na hotī”ti?
atk-abh03a:781_7: Paravādī sabbato andhakārena pariyonaddho viya tesaṃ na hutvā na hotibhāvaṃ apassanto na hevanti paṭikkhipatīti.
atk-abh03a:784_1: Atītaṃ cakkhu atthītiādīsupi cakkhādibhāvāvijahaneneva atthitaṃ paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:784_2: Passatītiādīni puṭṭho pana tesaṃ viññāṇānaṃ kiccābhāvavasena paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:786_1: Tena ñāṇena ñāṇakaraṇīyaṃ karotīti pañhe tassa ñāṇassa niruddhattā kiccabhāvamassa apassanto paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:786_2: Puna puṭṭho atītārammaṇaṃ paccuppannaṃ ñāṇaṃ atītānaṃ dhammānaṃ jānanato atītaṃ ñāṇanti lesena paccuppannameva
atk-abh03a:786_3: “atītaṃ ñāṇa”nti katvā tena ñāṇena ñāṇakaraṇīyassa atthitāya paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:786_4: Athassa sakavādī lesokāsaṃ adatvā tena ñāṇena dukkhaṃ parijānātītiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:786_5: Itaro atītārammaṇeneva ñāṇena imesaṃ catunnaṃ kiccānaṃ abhāvā paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:788_1: Arahato atīto rāgo atthītiādīsupi rāgādibhāvāvijahanto evaṃ paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:788_2: Sarāgotiādīsu suttavirodhabhayena ceva yuttivirodhabhayena ca paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:790_1: Evaṃ sabbampi pāḷianusāreneva viditvā parato atthi siyā atītaṃ,
atk-abh03a:790_9: nvātītaṃ atītanti tena kāraṇena atītaṃ no atītaṃ,
atk-abh03a:792_1: Na vattabbaṃ “atītaṃ atthi anāgataṃ atthī”ti suttasādhanāya pucchā paravādissa,
atk-abh03a:792_8: Evaṃ sabbattha pucchā ca paṭiññā ca veditabbā.
atk-abh03a:792_9: Yaṃ panetaṃ paravādinā anāgatassa atthibhāvasādhanatthaṃ “nanu vuttaṃ bhagavatā kabaḷīkāre, ce,
atk-abh03a:792_10: bhikkhave”ti suttassa pariyosāne atthi tattha āyatiṃ punabbhavābhinibbattītiādi dassitaṃ na taṃ anāgatassa atthibhāvasādhakaṃ.
atk-abh03a:792_11: Tañhi hetūnaṃ pariniṭṭhitattā avassaṃ bhāvitaṃ sandhāya tattha vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:796_2: Tattha khandhādibhāvāvijahanato atītānāgatānaṃ atthitaṃ icchantassa atītaṃ khandhāti pucchā paravādissa,
atk-abh03a:796_5: tassa niruttipathasuttena atthitāya vāritattā paṭikkhepo sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a:796_6: Āyatanadhātupucchāsupi anāgatapañhesupi paccuppannena saddhiṃ saṃsanditvā anulomapaṭilomato āgatapañhesupi
atk-abh03a:798_1: Suttasādhane pana na vattabbanti pucchā sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a:798_2: Tattha natthi ceteti natthi ca ete dhammāti attho.
atk-abh03a:798_3: Khandhādibhāve sati natthitaṃ anicchantassa āmantāti paṭiññā paravādissa,
atk-abh03a:802_4: tesaṃ laddhibhindanatthaṃ atītaṃ atthīti pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:802_11: yadi te atītaṃ ekaccaṃ atthi ekaccaṃ natthi,
atk-abh03a:803_0: Avipakkavipākadhammā ekacceti idaṃ yasmā yesaṃ so avipakkavipākānaṃ atthitaṃ icchati,
atk-abh03a:803_2: Tasmā yathā te atītaṃ ekaccaṃ atthi,
atk-abh03a:803_3: kiṃ tathā avipakkavipākāpi dhammā ekacce atthī ekacce natthīti codetuṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:803_4: Vipakkavipākāti idaṃ yesaṃ so natthitaṃ icchati,
atk-abh03a:803_6: Avipākāti idaṃ abyākatānaṃ vasena codetuṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:803_7: Iti imesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ rāsīnaṃ vasena sabbesu anulomapaṭilomesu paṭiññā ca paṭikkhepo ca veditabbā.
atk-abh03a:804_0: Vipaccissantīti katvā te atthīti pucchā sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a:804_1: Yathā dhammadharassa puggalassa niddāyantassāpi bahupavattino dhammā atthīti vuccanti,
atk-abh03a:804_2: evaṃ lokavohāravasena atthitaṃ sandhāya paṭiññā paravādissa.
atk-abh03a:804_3: Vipaccissantīti katvā paccupannāti dutiyapañhe “kammānaṃ avināsasaṅkhāto kammūpacayo nāmeko atthī”ti laddhiyaṃ ṭhatvā paṭiññā paravādissa.
atk-abh03a:806_1: Anāgataṃ atthītiādīsupi ekaccaṃ atthīti uppādino dhamme sandhāya vadati.
atk-abh03a:809_3: satipaṭṭhānānaṃ samudayañca atthaṅgamañca desessāmī”ti satipaṭṭhānasaṃyutte vuttanayeneva yesaṃ kāyādayo
atk-abh03a:809_4: satiyā ārammaṇadhamme gahetvā “sabbe dhammā satipaṭṭhānā”ti laddhi,
atk-abh03a:809_14: Satiyā paṭṭhānā satipaṭṭhānā”ti iminā atthena satigocarāpi satipaṭṭhānā.
atk-abh03a:809_17: Satiyova paṭṭhānā satipaṭṭhānā”ti iminā atthena satiyova satipaṭṭhānā.
atk-abh03a:809_19: Ye pana taṃ pariyāyaṃ pahāya ekanteneva “sabbe dhammā satipaṭṭhānā”ti vadanti,
atk-abh03a:809_22: Sabbe dhammā satīti anuyuttassa pana sabbesaṃ satisabhāvābhāvato paṭikkhepo tasseva.
atk-abh03a:809_24: Ekāyanamaggo hi kilesānaṃ khayabhūtaṃ nibbānaṃ gacchatīti khayagāmī.
atk-abh03a:809_27: Evametehi padehi “kiṃ te sabbe dhammā evarūpo te ekāyano maggo hotī”ti pucchati.
atk-abh03a:813_2: Tattha yesaṃ “sabbepi atītādibhedā dhammā rūpādivasena atthi,
atk-abh03a:813_5: tasmā sabbamevidaṃ evaṃ atthi evaṃ natthī”ti laddhi,
atk-abh03a:813_7: te sandhāya atītaṃ atthīti pucchā sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a:813_10: Atha naṃ sakavādī “yadi atītova evaṃ atthi,
atk-abh03a:813_19: Tato paraṃ atthaṭṭho natthaṭṭhoti atthisabhāvo natthisabhāvo nāma hotīti pucchati.
atk-abh03a:813_22: heva natthī”ti ca “tena hi rūpaṃ hevatthi,
atk-abh03a:813_23: heva natthī”ti cātiādīni vatvā kiñcāpi paravādinā laddhi patiṭṭhāpitā,
atk-abh03a:818_2: Tattha ye arahattaṃ paṭijānantānaṃ appatte pattasaññīnaṃ adhimānikānaṃ kuhakānaṃ vā arahattaṃ paṭijānantānaṃ
atk-abh03a:818_3: sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ disvā “mārakāyikā devatā arahato asuciṃ upasaṃharantī”ti maññanti;
atk-abh03a:818_4: seyyathāpi etarahi pubbaseliyā ca aparaseliyā ca;
atk-abh03a:818_5: te sandhāya atthi arahatoti pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:818_7: Idāni yasmā sukkavissaṭṭhi nāma rāgasamuṭṭhānā hoti,
atk-abh03a:818_8: tasmā atthi arahato rāgoti anuyogo āraddho.
atk-abh03a:819_0: Mārakāyikā devatā attanotiādipañhe yasmā tāsaṃ devatānaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhi nāma natthi,
atk-abh03a:820_0: Neva attanotipañhe pana nimminitvā upasaṃharantīti laddhiyā paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:820_1: Lomakūpehītipañhe sappitelānaṃ viya lomakūpehi upasaṃharaṇābhāvaṃ disvā paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:821_3: no”ti evaṃ vimatiṃ gāhayissāmāti evaṃ vacasāyaṃ katvā upasaṃharantīti attho.
atk-abh03a:821_4: Atthi arahato vimatīti puṭṭho aṭṭhavatthukaṃ vicikicchaṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipati,
atk-abh03a:821_5: dutiyaṃ puṭṭho itthipurisānaṃ nāmagottādīsu sanniṭṭhānābhāvaṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:822_0: 309. Atthi tassa āsayoti tassa sukkassa uccārapassāvānaṃ viya patiṭṭhānokāso atthīti pucchati.
atk-abh03a:826_3: Tattha yesaṃ “arahato itthipurisādīnaṃ nāmagottādīsu ñāṇappavattiyā abhāvena atthi aññāṇaṃ,
atk-abh03a:826_5: Yasmā ca nesaṃ tāni vatthūni pare vitaranti pakāsenti ācikkhanti,
atk-abh03a:826_6: tasmā nesaṃ atthi paravitaraṇā”ti imā laddhiyo,
atk-abh03a:826_8: tesaṃ tā laddhiyo bhindituṃ tīsupi kathāsu pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:826_10: Tattha sabbesupi pañhesu ceva vissajjanesu ca pāḷiṃ anugantvāva attho veditabboti.
atk-abh03a:829_2: Tattha yesaṃ “sotāpattimaggakkhaṇe paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpannassa dukkhanti vācā bhijjatī”ti laddhi,
atk-abh03a:829_4: te sandhāya samāpannassa atthi vacībhedoti pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:829_6: Puna sabbatthāti tayo bhave sandhāya puṭṭho arūpaṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:829_7: Sabbadāti kālavasena puṭṭho paṭhamamaggakkhaṇe paṭhamajjhānikasamāpattito aññaṃ sabbaṃ samāpattikālaṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:829_8: Sabbesaṃ samāpannānanti puṭṭho lokiyasamāpattiyo samāpanne sandhāya paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:829_9: Sabbasamāpattīsūti puṭṭho dutiyajjhānādikaṃ lokuttaraṃ sabbañca lokiyasamāpattiṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:830_3: Evaṃ sante kasmā kāyabhedopi na hotī”ti codanatthaṃ pucchati.
atk-abh03a:830_4: Itaro laddhivasena paṭikkhipati ceva paṭijānāti ca.
atk-abh03a:830_5: Idāni yadi so maggakkhaṇe “dukkha”nti vācaṃ bhāsati,
atk-abh03a:830_8: itarampi na bhāseyyāti codanatthaṃ dukkhanti jānantotiādayo pañhā vuttā.
atk-abh03a:830_9: Itaro pana attano laddhivaseneva paṭijānāti ceva paṭikkhipati ca.
atk-abh03a:830_10: Lokuttaraṃ paṭhamajjhānaṃ samāpanno dukkhadukkhanti vipassatīti hissa laddhi.
atk-abh03a:832_1: No vata re vattabbeti yadi avisesena yaṃkiñci samāpannassa natthi vacībhedo,
atk-abh03a:832_6: tattha yena samāpatticittena so vacībhedo samuṭṭhito,
atk-abh03a:835_2: Tattha “dukkhaṃ dukkhanti vācaṃ bhāsanto dukkhe ñāṇaṃ āharati,
atk-abh03a:835_4: Tañca panetaṃ maggaṅgaṃ maggapariyāpanna”nti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:835_8: Ye kecīti paṭhamapañhe avipassake sandhāya paṭikkhipati,
atk-abh03a:838_2: Tattha yesaṃ samāpatticittañceva bhavaṅgacittañca anuppabandhena pavattamānaṃ disvā “ekameva cittaṃ ciraṃ
atk-abh03a:838_3: tiṭṭhatī”ti laddhi seyyathāpi etarahi heṭṭhā vuttappabhedānaṃ andhakānaṃ,
atk-abh03a:838_7: Upaḍḍhadivaso uppādakkhaṇoti ettha ṭhitikkhaṇaṃ anāmasitvā “aniccā vata saṅkhārā,
atk-abh03a:839_0: Te dhammā cittena lahuparivattāti puṭṭho cittato lahutaraparivattino dhamme apassanto paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:839_1: Dutiyaṃ puṭṭho yassa cittassa dīghaṭṭhitiṃ icchati,
atk-abh03a:839_4: kappā tiṭṭhanti ye marū”tiādivacanavasena āruppato aññatra paṭikkhipati,
atk-abh03a:839_6: Muhuttaṃ muhuttaṃ uppajjatīti pañhe paravādissa “uppādavayadhammino”tiādisuttavirodhabhayena paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:842_4: ādittaṃ sabbe saṅkhārā dukkhā”tiādīni suttāni ayoniso gahetvā “nippariyāyeneva sabbe saṅkhārā kukkuḷā
atk-abh03a:842_7: tesaṃ nānappakārasukhasandassanena taṃ laddhiṃ vivecetuṃ pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:842_9: Tattha anodhiṃ katvāti odhiṃ mariyādaṃ koṭṭhāsaṃ akaritvā,
atk-abh03a:842_11: Sesaṃ sabbaṃ pāḷinayeneva veditabbaṃ saddhiṃ suttasādhanāyāti.
atk-abh03a:845_0: 339. Idāni anupubbābhisamayakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṃ –
atk-abh03a:848_0: Ādīni suttāni ayoniso gahetvā “sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno ekacce kilese dukkhadassanena pajahati,
atk-abh03a:848_2: tathā sesāpīti evaṃ soḷasahi koṭṭhāsehi anupubbena kilesappahānaṃ katvā arahattapaṭilābho hotī”ti evarūpā nānābhisamayaladdhi uppannā,
atk-abh03a:848_6: Anupubbena sotāpattimagganti puṭṭho pana ekassa maggassa bahubhāvāpattibhayena paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:848_8: Tāni vā cattāripi ñāṇāni eko sotāpattimaggoyevāti paṭijānāti,
atk-abh03a:849_1: Magge diṭṭhe phale ṭhitoti pañhe yasmā dukkhadassanādīhi dassanaṃ apariniṭṭhitaṃ,
atk-abh03a:849_3: tadā so phale ṭhitoti saṅkhaṃ gacchati,
atk-abh03a:850_1: Dukkhe diṭṭhe cattāri saccānīti pucchā paravādissa,
atk-abh03a:850_3: Puna dukkhasaccaṃ cattāri saccānīti anuyoge catunnampi nānāsabhāvattā paṭikkhepo tasseva.
atk-abh03a:851_1: samuddato ekabindussa rase paṭividdhe sesaudakassa paṭivedho viya ekadhamme aniccādito paṭividdhe sabbepi
atk-abh03a:852_1: Aṭṭhahi ñāṇehīti sāvakānaṃ sādhāraṇehi saccañāṇehi ceva paṭisambhidāñāṇehi ca.
atk-abh03a:852_7: aniccaṃ saṅkhataṃ paṭiccasamuppannaṃ khayadhammaṃ vayadhammaṃ virāgadhammaṃ nirodhadhamma”nti evaṃ tattheva vuttañāṇehi.
atk-abh03a:855_2: Tattha buddho bhagavā lokuttarena vohārena voharatīti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:856_0: Hañci buddhassa bhagavato vohāro lokiye sote paṭihaññatīti ettha yadi so lokuttare paṭihaññeyya.
atk-abh03a:856_2: Lokiye paṭihaññamānassa pana lokuttaratā nāma natthīti ayametthādhippāyo.
atk-abh03a:856_7: Sabbe te maggaṃ bhāventīti pañhesu ye maggaṃ nappaṭilabhanti,
atk-abh03a:858_2: Lokiyaṃ voharantassa lokiyoti ayampi ekā laddhi.
atk-abh03a:861_2: Tattha yesaṃ appaṭisaṅkhānirodhañca paṭisaṅkhānirodhañca dvepi ekato katvā nirodhasaccanti laddhi,
atk-abh03a:861_4: te sandhāya dve nirodhāti pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:861_6: Dve dukkhanirodhāti pañhesu yasmā dve dukkhasaccāni na icchati,
atk-abh03a:861_10: Dve nirodhasaccānītipañhesu dvinnaṃ dukkhasaccānaṃ nirodhavasenaanicchanto paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:862_0: Atthi dvinnaṃ nibbānānantiādīsu pucchāsu uccanīcatādīni apassanto paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:863_0: Appaṭisaṅkhāniruddheti ye paṭisaṅkhāya lokuttarena ñāṇena aniruddhā suddhapakatikattā vā uddesaparipucchādīnaṃ
atk-abh03a:863_1: vā vasena na samudācaraṇato niruddhāti vuccanti,
atk-abh03a:863_6: Tattha bhaggānaṃ puna abhañjanato appaṭisaṅkhāniruddhānaṃ vā ariyamagge uppanne tathā nirujjhanatova sakavādī accantabhaggataṃ paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:868_3: catunnaṃ satipaṭṭhānānaṃ bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā ṭhānañca ṭhānato aṭṭhānañca aṭṭhānato yathābhūtaṃ pajānāmī”tiādīni
atk-abh03a:868_8: Tathāgatabalañca nāmetaṃ sāvakehi sādhāraṇampi atthi asādhāraṇampi sādhāraṇāsādhāraṇampi.
atk-abh03a:868_16: Ayaṃ pana avisesena sabbampi sādhāraṇanti āha.
atk-abh03a:868_17: Tamenaṃ tato vivecetuṃ tathāgatabalaṃ sāvakabalanti puna anuyogo āraddho.
atk-abh03a:868_18: Tattha paṭhamapañhe niddesato sabbākāravisayataṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:868_21: Pubbayogo ca pubbacariyā ca atthato ekaṃ,
atk-abh03a:869_0: Indriyaparopariyattipañhe ekadesena sādhāraṇataṃ sandhāya sāvakavisaye paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:870_1: Idāni yasmā uddesato ṭhānāṭṭhānādīni sāvako jānāti,
atk-abh03a:870_2: tasmā sāvakassa tathā jānanaṃ pakāsetvā tena jānanamattasāmaññena tesaṃ sāvakasādhāraṇattaṃ patiṭṭhāpetuṃ
atk-abh03a:870_4: Tattha indriyaparopariyattiñāṇaṃ channaṃ asādhāraṇañāṇānaṃ aññataranti na gahitaṃ.
atk-abh03a:870_5: Āsavakkhayena vā āsavakkhayanti yaṃ tathāgatassa āsavakkhayena saddhiṃ sāvakassa āsavakkhayaṃ paṭicca vattabbaṃ siyā nānākaraṇaṃ,
atk-abh03a:870_7: Vimuttiyā vā vimuttinti padepi eseva nayo.
atk-abh03a:871_1: Idāni yaṃ sakavādinā “āsavānaṃ khaye ñāṇaṃ sādhāraṇa”nti anuññātaṃ,
atk-abh03a:871_2: tena saddhiṃ saṃsanditvā sesānampi sādhāraṇabhāvaṃ pucchituṃ puna āsavānaṃ khayetiādayo paravādipañhāva honti.
atk-abh03a:871_3: Tesaṃ vissajjane sakavādinā āsavakkhaye visesābhāvena taṃ ñāṇaṃ sādhāraṇanti anuññātaṃ.
atk-abh03a:871_5: Puna ṭhānāṭṭhānādīnaṃ āsavakkhayeneva saddhiṃ saṃsanditvā asādhāraṇapucchā paravādisseva.
atk-abh03a:871_8: Tato indriyaparopariyattena saddhiṃ saṃsanditvā asādhāraṇapucchā paravādissa.
atk-abh03a:871_12: Tato ṭhānāṭṭhānādīhi saddhiṃ saṃsanditvā indriyaparopariyattassa sādhāraṇapucchā paravādissa.
atk-abh03a:874_3: atha kho purimānipi nava balāni ariyāni”cceva laddhi,
atk-abh03a:874_8: maggādīsu tena aññatarena bhavitabbanti maggādivasena pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:875_3: Sattasuññatā nāma diṭṭhiyā parikappitena sattena suññā pañcakkhandhā.
atk-abh03a:875_4: Saṅkhārasuññatā nāma sabbasaṅkhārehi suññaṃ vivittaṃ nissaṭaṃ nibbānaṃ.
atk-abh03a:875_7: Manasi karotīti puṭṭhopi nibbānameva sandhāya paṭikkhipati,
atk-abh03a:875_10: suññatamanasikāro nibbānārammaṇo”ti imaṃ nayaṃ gahetvā “dvinnaṃ phassānaṃ dvinnaṃ cittānaṃ samodhānaṃ hotī”ti puṭṭho lesokāsaṃ alabhanto paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:875_14: Ekadhammasmimpi āropetvā ṭhapetabbasaṅkhātena ca paṇidahitabbaṭṭhena paṇihitasaṅkhaṃ gatena sattapaṇidhinā appaṇihitā khandhā.
atk-abh03a:875_15: Taṇhāpaṇidhinā taṇhāya vā ārammaṇabhūtena sabbasaṅkhārapaṇidhinā appaṇihitaṃ nibbānaṃ.
atk-abh03a:875_16: Tasmā idhāpi paṭikkhepo ca paṭiññā ca purimanayeneva veditabbā.
atk-abh03a:876_1: Tato “yathā satipaṭṭhānādayo lokuttaradhammā ariyā ceva suññatādiārammaṇā ca,
atk-abh03a:876_2: kiṃ te evaṃ ṭhānāṭṭhānañāṇa”nti anulomapaṭilomapucchā honti.
atk-abh03a:876_3: Tattha sabbāpi paṭiññā sabbe ca paṭikkhepā paravādisseva.
atk-abh03a:876_5: Pāḷiyaṃ pana sesāni saṅkhipitvā avasāne cutūpapātañāṇameva vibhattaṃ.
atk-abh03a:876_6: Tato paraṃ sakasamayepi “ariya”nti siddhena āsavānaṃ khayañāṇena saddhiṃ saṃsanditvā sesañāṇānaṃ anulomato ca paṭilomato ca ariyabhāvapucchā honti.
atk-abh03a:876_10: Pāḷiyaṃ panettha paṭhamanavamāneva dassetvā satta ñāṇāni saṅkhittānīti.
atk-abh03a:879_3: Yathā pana malīnaṃ vatthaṃ dhoviyamānaṃ malā vimuccati,
atk-abh03a:879_4: evaṃ sarāgaṃ cittaṃ rāgato vimuccatī”ti laddhi,
atk-abh03a:879_8: Tato rāgasahagatantiādinā nayena puṭṭho maggakkhaṇe cittaṃ vimuccati nāma.
atk-abh03a:879_9: Tadā ca evarūpaṃ cittaṃ natthīti paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:880_0: Saphassantiādinā nayena puṭṭhopi yathā phasso ca cittañca ubho rāgato vimuccanti,
atk-abh03a:883_3: maggakkhaṇe samucchedavimuttiyā vimuccamānaṃ nāma hotī”ti laddhi,
atk-abh03a:883_4: te sandhāya vimuttaṃ vimuccamānanti pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:884_3: ekadesena vā ekadese vā avimuttaṃ hoti kiṃ evaṃ ekadesaṃ vimuttaṃ,
atk-abh03a:884_7: Yathā hi kariyamānā kaṭādayo vippakatattā ekadesena katā ekadesena akatā honti,
atk-abh03a:884_8: tathā idampi ekadesaṃ vimuttaṃ ekadesaṃ avimuttanti āpajjati.
atk-abh03a:884_9: Tato paravādī kaṭādīnaṃ viya cittassa ekadesābhāvā paṭhamapañhe paṭikkhipitvā dutiye vimuccamānassa apariniṭṭhitavimuttitāya paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:884_11: Na hi taṃ tadā samucchedavimuttiyā vimuccamānaṃ.
atk-abh03a:884_13: Tañhi tadā samucchedavimuttiyā vimuttekadesena vimuccamānantissa laddhi.
atk-abh03a:884_14: Tato sakavādī “yadi te ekameva cittaṃ ekadesaṃ vimuttaṃ ekadesaṃ avimuttaṃ,
atk-abh03a:884_15: evaṃ sante yo ekeneva cittena sotāpanno hoti,
atk-abh03a:884_17: ekadesaṃ na sotāpanno āpajjatī”ti codanatthaṃ ekadesaṃ sotāpannotiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:885_0: Uppādakkhaṇapañhe yadi ekameva cittaṃ vimuttañca vimuccamānañca,
atk-abh03a:885_1: ekasmiṃ khaṇe vimuttaṃ ekasmiṃ vimuccamānaṃ āpajjati.
atk-abh03a:886_4: Tasmā yaṃ tassa yogino evaṃ jānato evaṃ passato etehi āsavehi cittaṃ vimuccati,
atk-abh03a:886_8: yadi te vimuccatīti vacanato vimuttaṃ vimuccamānaṃ,
atk-abh03a:887_1: kiṃ evaṃ vippakatarāgāditāya rajjamānādīnipi atthī”ti codanatthaṃ puna atthi cittantiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh03a:887_2: Paravādināpi tathārūpaṃ cittaṃ apassantena sabbaṃ paṭikkhittaṃ.
atk-abh03a:887_4: tatiyā natthī”ti anubodhento nanu rattañceva arattañcātiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:887_7: rāgasampayuttaṃ cittaṃ rattaṃ vippayuttaṃ arattanti dveva koṭiyo,
atk-abh03a:887_11: Vimuttipakkhepi dveyeva koṭiyo dassetuṃ hañci rattañcevātiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:887_17: Vimuccamānaṃ nāmāti paramatthato tatiyā koṭi natthīti.
atk-abh03a:890_2: Tattha yesaṃ anulomagotrabhumaggakkhaṇe kilesānaṃ samudācārābhāvato aṭṭhamakassa sotāpattimaggaṭṭhapuggalassa dve pariyuṭṭhānā pahīnāti laddhi,
atk-abh03a:890_5: maggakkhaṇato paṭṭhāya diṭṭhiyā anuppattiṃ sandhāya paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a:890_6: Tato yasmā diṭṭhi nāmesā sotāpannasseva pahīnā,
atk-abh03a:890_8: tasmā aṭṭhamako puggalo sotāpannoti anuyogo sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a:890_10: Anusayapañhe pariyuṭṭhānato añño anusayoti tesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:892_1: Maggo bhāvitoti pañhe tasmiṃ khaṇe bhāveti,
atk-abh03a:895_2: Tattha yesaṃ “aṭṭhamako maggakkhaṇe indriyāni paṭilabhati nāma,
atk-abh03a:895_5: te sandhāya natthi saddhindriyanti pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:895_7: Natthi saddhāti puṭṭho pana saddhindriyato saddhāya nānattaṃ sallakkhetvā paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:895_12: tassa atthi saddhindriyādīnipīti dīpanatthaṃ atthi mano atthi manindriyantiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh03a:898_2: Tattha yesaṃ catutthajjhānadhammūpatthaddhaṃ maṃsacakkhumeva dibbacakkhu nāma hotīti laddhi,
atk-abh03a:899_1: dibbacakkhu maṃsacakkhū”ti puṭṭho taṃ mattameva taṃ na hotīti paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:900_4: na tādisaṃ itarassāti evametesaṃ ānubhāvagocarā asadisā.
atk-abh03a:901_0: Upādiṇṇaṃ hutvā anupādiṇṇaṃ hotīti puṭṭho yasmā maṃsacakkhu upādiṇṇaṃ,
atk-abh03a:901_5: maggo dibbassa cakkhuno”ti vacanaṃ nissāya maṃsacakkhupaccayā dibbacakkhu uppajjati,
atk-abh03a:901_6: tañca rūpāvacarikānaṃ catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ pasādoti icchati,
atk-abh03a:901_8: Kāmāvacaraṃ hutvāti puṭṭhopi yasmā na maṃsacakkhumeva dibbacakkhūti icchati,
atk-abh03a:901_10: Dutiyaṃ puṭṭho rūpāvacarajjhānapaccayena uppannattā rūpāvacaraṃ nāma jātanti paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:902_0: Rūpāvacaraṃ hutvā arūpāvacaranti puṭṭhopi tato paraṃ bhāvanāya arūpāvacarakkhaṇe rūpāvacaracittassa abhāvā paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:902_1: Dutiyaṃ puṭṭho arūpāvacarikānaṃ catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ pasādo hutvā uppajjatīti laddhiyā paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:903_3: Dveva cakkhūnīti puṭṭho kiñcāpi dibbacakkhuno dhammupatthaddhassa paññācakkhubhāvaṃ na icchati,
atk-abh03a:903_5: Puna puṭṭho maṃsacakkhu dhammupatthaddhaṃ dibbacakkhu hotīti laddhivasena paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:906_2: Tattha ekaṃyeva sotanti puṭṭho dvinnaṃ atthitāya paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:906_3: Puna puṭṭho yasmā tadeva dhammupatthaddhaṃ dibbasotaṃ nāma hoti,
atk-abh03a:909_3: yathākammūpage satte pajānātī”ti suttaṃ ayoniso gahetvā yathākammūpagatañāṇameva dibbacakkhunti laddhi,
atk-abh03a:909_6: Puna yathākammūpagatañca manasi karotīti puṭṭho ekacittassa ārammaṇadvayābhāvā paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:909_8: Puna lesokāsaṃ adatvā dvinnaṃ phassānanti puṭṭho paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:910_1: Āyasmā sāriputto yathākammūpagataṃ ñāṇaṃ jānātīti idaṃ sakavādī yasmā thero appicchatāya abhiññāñāṇāni na vaḷañjetīti ekacce na jānanti,
atk-abh03a:910_3: tasmā taṃ “dibbacakkhuno alābhī thero”ti maññamānaṃ pucchati.
atk-abh03a:910_4: Teneva kāraṇena “atthāyasmato sāriputtassa dibbacakkhū”ti parato puṭṭho paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:910_7: Idānissa vikkhepaṃ karonto sakavādī nanu āyasmā sāriputtotiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:910_8: Imañhi gāthaṃ thero vaḷañjanapaṇidhiyā eva abhāvena āha,
atk-abh03a:910_11: Tasmā tassa laddhiyā therassa yathākammūpagatañāṇameva atthi,
atk-abh03a:910_13: Tena vuttaṃ “tena hi na vattabbaṃ yathākammūpagatañāṇaṃ dibbacakkhū”ti.
atk-abh03a:913_2: Tattha yesaṃ tāvatiṃse deve upādāya tatuttari devesu yasmā te pañca verāni na samācaranti,
atk-abh03a:913_6: Tato yasmā saṃvaro nāma saṃvaritabbe asaṃvare sati hoti,
atk-abh03a:914_0: Atthi manussesūtiādi saṃvare sati asaṃvarassa asaṃvare ca sati saṃvarassa pavattidassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:915_1: Pāṇātipātā veramaṇīti ādipañhesu pāṇātipātādīnaṃ asamācaraṇavasena paṭiññā,
atk-abh03a:916_0: Avasāne natthi devesu saṃvarotipañhe pāṇātipātādīni katvā puna tato saṃvarābhāvaṃ sandhāya paṭiññā sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a:916_5: Evaṃ patiṭṭhitā pana laddhi appatiṭṭhitāva hotīti.
atk-abh03a:919_2: Tattha yesaṃ “saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇa”nti vacanato vinā viññāṇena paṭisandhi nāma natthi.
atk-abh03a:919_3: “Saññuppādā ca pana te devā tamhā kāyā cavantī”ti vacanato asaññasattānampi cutipaṭisandhikkhaṇe saññā atthīti laddhi,
atk-abh03a:919_7: Tato naṃ sakavādī “kiṃ te taṃ ṭhānaṃ saññābhavo”tiādīhi codetuṃ saññābhavo saññāgatītiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:919_8: Taṃ sabbaṃ tato parañca pāḷinayeneva veditabbanti.
atk-abh03a:922_2: Tattha yesaṃ “nevasaññānāsaññāyatana”nti vacanato na vattabbaṃ “tasmiṃ bhave saññā atthī”ti laddhi,
atk-abh03a:927_1: Idāni gihissa arahāti kathā nāma hoti.
atk-abh03a:927_2: Tattha yesaṃ yasakulaputtādīnaṃ gihibyañjane ṭhitānaṃ arahattappattiṃ disvā “gihi assa arahā”ti laddhi,
atk-abh03a:927_7: Paravādī pana adhippāyaṃ asallakkhetvā gihibyañjanamattameva passanto paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:931_0: So brāhmaṇo so samaṇo sa bhikkhū”’ti. ;
atk-abh03a:932_0: Imaṃ nayaṃ dassetuṃ atthi arahatotiādi āraddhaṃ. Taṃ sabbaṃ uttānatthamevāti.
atk-abh03a:935_2: Tattha yesaṃ “opapātiko hoti tatthaparinibbāyī”tivacanāni ayoniso gahetvā suddhāvāsesu upapattiyā arahāti laddhi,
atk-abh03a:935_3: “yesaṃ vā upahaccaparinibbāyī”ti padaṃ parivattitvā “upapajjaparinibbāyī”ti pariyāpuṇantānaṃ saha upapattiyā arahā hotīti laddhi,
atk-abh03a:935_10: Tasmāssa imaṃ nayaṃ dassetuṃ saha upapattiyā sotāpannotiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh03a:936_0: 389. Sāriputtotiādi imesu mahātheresu ko ekopi saha upapattiyā arahā nāmāti codanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:940_8: kiṃ tassa teyeva uppajjantīti codanatthaṃ maggo phalantiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh03a:940_9: Cakkhu anāsavanti puṭṭho tassa sāsavattā paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:941_1: Cīvarapañhe ekova dhammo anāsavo sāsavo ca hotīti lakkhaṇavirodhabhayā paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:941_2: Dutiyaṃ puṭṭho anāsavassa hutvā sāsavassa hotīti paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:941_4: Sakavādī pana taññevāti anuññātattā “maggo anāsavo hutvā”tiādīhi codeti.
atk-abh03a:944_2: Tattha dve samannāgamā paccuppannakkhaṇe samaṅgībhāvasamannāgamo ca rūpāvacarādīsu aññatarabhūmippattito paṭilābhasamannāgamo ca.
atk-abh03a:944_5: Yesaṃ pana ṭhapetvā ime dve samannāgame añño upapattidhammavasena eko samannāgamo nāma hotīti laddhi,
atk-abh03a:944_7: tesaṃ pattidhammo nāma koci natthīti anubodhanatthaṃ arahā catūhi phalehi samannāgatoti pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:944_9: Athassa “yadi te arahā catūhi khandhehi viya catūhi phalehi samannāgato,
atk-abh03a:944_10: evaṃ sante ye catūsu phalesu cattāro phassādayo,
atk-abh03a:944_11: tehi te arahato samannāgatatā pāpuṇātī”ti codanatthaṃ arahā catūhi phassehītiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh03a:944_12: Taṃ sabbaṃ paravādinā ekakkhaṇe catunnaṃ phassādīnaṃ abhāvā paṭikkhittaṃ.
atk-abh03a:945_1: Sotāpattiphalaṃ vītivattoti na paṭhamajjhānaṃ viya dutiyajjhānalābhī;
atk-abh03a:946_1: Tehi ca aparihīnoti pañhe yasmā yathā paccanīkasamudācārena lokiyajjhānadhammā parihāyanti,
atk-abh03a:946_5: te tathā pahīnāva tathā paṭippassaddhāyeva ca honti,
atk-abh03a:946_7: Svāyamattho parato “arahatā cattāro maggā paṭiladdhā”tiādīsu pakāsitoyeva.
atk-abh03a:949_1: Arahā chahi upekkhāhīti kathāyapi imināva nayena attho veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:949_2: Arahā hi chasu dvāresu upekkhānaṃ uppattibhabbatāya tāhi samannāgatoti vuccati,
atk-abh03a:952_3: Tasmā yesaṃ yathā odātena vaṇṇena odāto,
atk-abh03a:952_7: te sandhāya pucchā ca anuyogo ca sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:953_0: Atītāyāti pañhe tasmiṃ khaṇe abhāvato paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:953_3: Dutiyaṃ puṭṭho yaṃ tena tāya karaṇīyaṃ kataṃ,
atk-abh03a:953_5: Lesokāsaṃ pana adatvā dukkhaṃ parijānātītiādinā nayena puṭṭho tassa kiccassa abhāvā paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:954_0: Anāgatapañhe tasmiṃ khaṇe maggañāṇassa abhāvā paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:954_1: Dutiyaṃ puṭṭho “agamā rājagahaṃ buddho”ti anāgatāya bodhiyā buddhabhāvaṃ maññamāno paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:954_2: Bodhikaraṇīyaṃ karotīti puṭṭho tasmiṃ khaṇe kiccābhāvena paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:955_1: Tisso bodhiyo ekato katvā puṭṭho sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ sandhāya tīhipi buddhoti vattabbabhāvato paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:955_2: Puna tīhiti puṭṭho sabbāsaṃ ekakkhaṇe abhāvā paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:955_3: Dutiyaṃ puṭṭho atītānāgatapaccuppannassa sabbaññutaññāṇassa vasena paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:955_4: Puna lesokāsaṃ adatvā satataṃ samitanti puṭṭho paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:956_2: Nanu bodhipaṭilābhāti pañhe pana yasmiṃ santāne bodhisaṅkhātaṃ maggañāṇaṃ uppannaṃ,
atk-abh03a:956_4: Tassa adhippāyaṃ ajānitvā hañcīti laddhiṭṭhapanā paravādissa.
atk-abh03a:956_5: Idānissa asallakkhaṇaṃ pākaṭaṃ kātuṃ bodhipaṭilābhā buddhoti bodhiyā buddhoti pucchā sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a:956_9: Itaro “bodhipaṭilābho nāma bodhiyā uppajjitvā niruddhāyapi santāne uppannabhāvoyeva.
atk-abh03a:956_10: Bodhi nāma maggakkhaṇe ñāṇa”nti imaṃ vibhāgaṃ asallakkhentova puna paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:956_11: Tato sakavādinā bodhipaṭilābhā bodhīti puṭṭho vacanokāsaṃ alabhanto paṭikkhipatīti.
atk-abh03a:960_2: Tattha “yehi samannāgatassa mahāpurisassa dveva gatiyo bhavantī”ti imaṃ suttaṃ ayoniso gahetvā lakkhaṇasamannāgato bodhisattova hotīti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:961_0: Cakkavattisattoti pañhesu yasmā cakkavattī sattopi ca bodhisattopi,
atk-abh03a:962_2: So hi pacchime bhave buddho hoti,
atk-abh03a:965_2: Tattha yesaṃ ghaṭikārasutte jotipālassa pabbajjaṃ sandhāya “bodhisatto kassapabhagavato pāvacane okkantaniyāmo caritabrahmacariyo”ti laddhi,
atk-abh03a:965_6: Tato yasmā niyāmoti vā brahmacariyanti vā ariyamaggassa nāmaṃ,
atk-abh03a:965_7: bodhisattānañca ṭhapetvā pāramīpūraṇaṃ aññā niyāmokkanti nāma natthi.
atk-abh03a:965_11: Kevalañhi naṃ buddhā attano ñāṇabale ṭhatvā –
atk-abh03a:965_18: Pacchimabhavaṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipitvā jotipālakāle anussavaṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:966_3: na itare okkantaniyāmā evarūpā hontī”ti dassetuṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:967_0: Sāvako jātiṃ vītivattoti yāya jātiyā sāvako,
atk-abh03a:967_1: taṃ vītivatto aññasmiṃ bhave asāvako hotīti pucchati.
atk-abh03a:970_2: Tattha yesaṃ “catutthamaggaṭṭho puggalo pattidhammavasena tīhi phalehi samannāgato”ti laddhi,
atk-abh03a:970_6: Sesamettha heṭṭhā catūhi phalehi samannāgatakathāyaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbanti.
atk-abh03a:973_6: Puna sabbe saṃyojanāti puṭṭho heṭṭhā vuttamaggattayena pahīne sandhāya paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:973_7: Dutiyaṃ puṭṭho tena maggena appahīnassa abhāvā paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:978_9: Evaṃ catubbidhe vimuttiñāṇe nippariyāyena phalañāṇameva vimutti.
atk-abh03a:978_11: Tasmā “idaṃ nāma vimuttiñāṇaṃ vimutta”nti avatvā aviseseneva “vimuttiñāṇaṃ vimutta”nti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:978_15: Puna yaṃkiñcīti puṭṭho paccavekkhaṇādīni sandhāya paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:978_16: Paṭipannassāti puṭṭho maggañāṇassa anāsavataṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:978_17: Yasmā pana taṃ sotāpannassa phale ṭhitassa ñāṇaṃ na hoti,
atk-abh03a:978_18: tasmā vimuttaṃ nāma na hotīti codanatthaṃ puna sakavādī sotāpannassātiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:981_2: Tattha yasmā ānandattherādayo sekhā “uḷāro bhagavā”tiādinā nayena asekhe jānanti,
atk-abh03a:981_7: Jānāti passatīti idaṃ attanā adhigatassa jānanavasena vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:981_8: Gotrabhunotiādi heṭṭhimāya bhūmiyaṃ ṭhitassa uparūpariñāṇassa abhāvadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:981_9: Nanu āyasmā ānando sekho “uḷāro bhagavā”ti jānātīti paravādī asekhe bhagavati pavattattā taṃ asekhañāṇanti icchati,
atk-abh03a:981_11: Tasmā evaṃ patiṭṭhāpitāpi laddhi appatiṭṭhāpitāva hotīti.
atk-abh03a:984_3: tassa taṃ ñāṇaṃ viparītañāṇa”nti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:984_10: Tato sakavādī “lakkhaṇapathavīpi sasambhārapathavīpi nimittapathavīpi pathavīdevatāpi sabbā pathavīyeva,
atk-abh03a:984_11: tāsu pathavīti ñāṇaṃ viparītaṃ na hoti.
atk-abh03a:984_13: Kiṃ te idaṃ etesu aññatara”nti codetuṃ anicce niccantiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:985_3: Sabbeva pathavīti sabbaṃ taṃ pathavīkasiṇaṃ lakkhaṇapathavīyeva hotīti pucchati.
atk-abh03a:985_6: atthi ca koci pathaviṃ pathavito samāpajjatīti pucchā sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a:985_9: atthi ca koci taṃ pathaviṃ pathavitoyeva samāpajjati,
atk-abh03a:985_12: taṃ tathā samāpajjantassa ñāṇaṃ viparītaṃ hoti,
atk-abh03a:985_14: tampi samāpajjantassa sabbavipariyesasamugghātanaṃ maggañāṇampi te viparītaṃ hotū”ti dassanatthaṃ vuttanti.
atk-abh03a:988_3: taṃ “bhabbo esa dhammaṃ abhisametu”nti yasmā bhagavā jānāti,
atk-abh03a:988_4: tasmā “aniyatassa puthujjanasseva sato puggalassa niyāmagamanāya ñāṇaṃ atthī”ti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:988_9: Yaṃ panassa ñāṇaṃ disvā bhagavā “bhabbo aya”nti jānāti,
atk-abh03a:989_0: Athassa sakavādī ayuttavāditaṃ dīpetuṃ niyatassāti viparītānuyogamāha.
atk-abh03a:989_1: Tattha paṭhamapañhe maggena niyatassa aniyāmagamanāya ñāṇaṃ nāma natthīti paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:989_3: Tatiye aniyatassa natthīti puṭṭhattā laddhivirodhena paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:989_4: Puna paṭhamapañhameva catutthaṃ katvā niyatassa niyāmagamanādivasena tayo pañhā katā.
atk-abh03a:989_5: Tesu paṭhame yasmā ādimaggena niyatassa puna tadatthāya ñāṇaṃ natthi,
atk-abh03a:989_9: Puna paṭhamapañhaṃ aṭṭhamaṃ katvā aniyatassa aniyāmagamanādivasena tayo pañhā katā.
atk-abh03a:989_11: Puna paṭhamapañhameva dvādasamaṃ katvā taṃmūlakā atthi niyāmotiādayo pañhā katā.
atk-abh03a:989_12: Tattha yasmā niyāmagamanāya ñāṇaṃ nāma maggañāṇameva hoti,
atk-abh03a:989_13: tasmā taṃ sandhāya atthi niyāmoti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:989_22: Tasmā iminā kāraṇena patiṭṭhitāpissa laddhi appatiṭṭhitāyevāti.
atk-abh03a:992_3: sabbaṃ lokuttaramevā”ti gahetvā “sabbaṃ ñāṇaṃ paṭisambhidā”ti laddhi,
atk-abh03a:992_9: Ye keci sammutinti pañhe puthujjane sandhāya paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:992_15: kiṃ sabbā sā paṭisambhidā”ti pucchanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:992_16: Tena hi sabbaṃ ñāṇanti yasmā sabbā lokuttarapaññā paṭisambhidā,
atk-abh03a:992_17: tasmā sabbanti vacanaṃ sāmaññaphalena saddhiṃ patiṭṭhāpetīti.
atk-abh03a:995_3: Ye pana evaṃ vibhāgaṃ akatvā saccanti vacanasāmaññena sammutiñāṇampi “saccārammaṇamevā”ti vadanti,
atk-abh03a:995_5: te ayuttavādinoti tesaṃ vādavisodhanatthaṃ ayaṃ kathā āraddhā.
atk-abh03a:995_14: tena ñāṇena dukkhapariññādīni kareyyā”ti codetuṃ tena ñāṇenātiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:998_2: Tattha cetopariyāye ñāṇanti vacanamattameva gahetvā “taṃ ñāṇaṃ cittārammaṇamevā”ti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:998_8: tasmā na vattabbaṃ taṃ cittārammaṇaññevā”ti codanatthaṃ nanu atthi kocītiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh03a:998_11: Puna phassārammaṇe ñāṇaṃ na vattabbanti puṭṭho phassassa phusanalakkhaṇaṃ manasikaroto phassovārammaṇaṃ hotīti paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:998_12: Kiṃ panetaṃ phassapariyāye ñāṇanti puṭṭho pana tādisassa suttapadassa abhāvā paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:998_15: tadeva dassetvā laddhiṃ patiṭṭhāpetuṃ nanu cetopariyāye ñāṇantiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:998_16: Sā panesā vacanamattābhinivesena patiṭṭhāpitāpi appatiṭṭhāpitāva hotīti.
atk-abh03a:1001_7: Tattha ye sabbasmimpi anāgate ñāṇaṃ icchanti,
atk-abh03a:1001_12: kiṃ tena anantaraṃ anāgataṃ mūlādivasena jānātī”ti codetuṃ anāgataṃ mūlatotiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:1001_16: Tato ca taṃ hinoti pavattayatīti hetu.
atk-abh03a:1001_27: Yasmā pana anantaraṃ cittaṃ etehākārehi na sakkā jānituṃ,
atk-abh03a:1001_29: Anāgataṃ hetupaccayatanti yā anantarānāgate citte hetupaccayatā,
atk-abh03a:1001_34: Gotrabhunotiādi yasmiṃ anāgate ñāṇaṃ na uppajjati,
atk-abh03a:1001_36: Pāṭaliputtassāti suttaṃ yasmiṃ anāgate ñāṇaṃ uppajjati,
atk-abh03a:1001_38: Yasmā panetaṃ na sabbasmiṃ anāgate ñāṇassa sādhakaṃ;
atk-abh03a:1004_2: Tattha yesaṃ “sabbasaṅkhāresu aniccato diṭṭhesu tampi ñāṇaṃ aniccato diṭṭhaṃ hotī”ti vacanaṃ nissāya
atk-abh03a:1004_7: Atha naṃ “yadi avisesena paṭuppanne ñāṇaṃ atthi,
atk-abh03a:1004_9: Evaṃ sante dvinnaṃ ñāṇānaṃ ekato abhāvā teneva ñāṇena taṃ jānitabbaṃ hotī”ti codanatthaṃ tenāti anuyogo sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a:1004_10: Tattha paṭhamapañhe teneva taṃ jānituṃ na sakkāti paṭikkhepo itarassa.
atk-abh03a:1004_12: Paṭipāṭito bhaṅgaṃ passanto bhaṅgānupassaneneva bhaṅgānupassanāñāṇaṃ passatīti adhippāyo.
atk-abh03a:1004_13: Tena ñāṇena taṃ ñāṇaṃ jānātītiādīsupi eseva nayo.
atk-abh03a:1004_14: Tena phassena taṃ phassantiādīnissa lesokāsanivāraṇatthaṃ vuttāni.
atk-abh03a:1004_15: Yaṃ panetena laddhipatiṭṭhāpanatthaṃ nanu sabbasaṅkhāretiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1004_16: Tattha nayato taṃ ñāṇaṃ diṭṭhaṃ hoti,
atk-abh03a:1004_18: Tasmā evaṃ patiṭṭhitāpissa laddhi appatiṭṭhitāva hoti.
atk-abh03a:1007_2: Tattha “buddhāpi sattānaṃ ariyaphalappattiyā dhammaṃ desenti sāvakāpi,
atk-abh03a:1007_3: iti iminā sāmaññena buddhānaṃ viya sāvakānampi tena tena sattena pattabbe phale ñāṇaṃ atthī”ti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1007_7: Atha naṃ “yadi sāvakassa phale ñāṇaṃ atthi,
atk-abh03a:1007_8: yathā buddhā samānepi sotāpattiphale attano ñāṇabalena ‘ayaṃ ekabījī,
atk-abh03a:1007_11: kiṃ te evaṃ sāvakopī”ti codetuṃ sāvako phalassa kataṃ paññapetīti āha.
atk-abh03a:1008_0: Atthi sāvakassa phalaparopariyattītiādi phale ñāṇassa atthitāya paccayapucchanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1008_3: idaṃ opara”nti evaṃ phalānaṃ uccāvacabhāvajānanasaṅkhātā phale paropariyatti nāma atthi.
atk-abh03a:1008_5: tāsaṃ atthitāya tassa tassa puggalassa tesaṃ tesaṃ indriyānaṃ vasena taṃ taṃ phalaṃ jānanti,
atk-abh03a:1008_6: kiṃ te sāvakassāpi etā paropariyattiyo atthīti.
atk-abh03a:1009_0: Atthi sāvakassa khandhapaññattītiādīnipi “yadi te sāvakassa buddhānaṃ viya phale ñāṇaṃ atthi,
atk-abh03a:1009_3: sakkoti so etā paññattiyo attano balena jānituṃ vā paññapetuṃ vā”ti codanatthaṃ vuttāni.
atk-abh03a:1009_4: Sāvako jinotiādi “yadi sāvakassa buddhānaṃ viya phale ñāṇaṃ atthi,
atk-abh03a:1009_5: evaṃ sante sveva jino”ti codanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1009_7: Aññāṇīti pañhe avijjāsaṅkhātassa aññāṇassa vihatattā paṭikkhitto,
atk-abh03a:1009_8: na panassa buddhānaṃ viya phale ñāṇaṃ atthi.
atk-abh03a:1015_2: Tattha niyāmoti “bhabbo niyāmaṃ okkamituṃ kusalesu dhammesu sammatta”nti vacanato ariyamaggo vuccati.
atk-abh03a:1015_3: Yasmā pana tasmiṃ uppajjitvā niruddhepi puggalo aniyato nāma na hoti,
atk-abh03a:1015_4: tasmā “so niyāmo niccaṭṭhena asaṅkhato”ti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1016_2: Niyāmo saṅkhatotipañhe niruddhepi magge niyāmassa atthitaṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:1016_3: Sotāpattiniyāmotiādipañhesupi anulomato ca paṭilomato ca imināva nayena attho veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:1016_4: Pañca asaṅkhatānīti puṭṭho pañcannaṃ asaṅkhatānaṃ āgataṭṭhānaṃ apassanto paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:1016_5: Dutiyaṃ puṭṭho catunnaṃ sammattaniyāmānaṃ niyāmavacanato nibbānassa ca asaṅkhatabhāvato paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:1019_2: Tattha yesaṃ nidānavagge “uppādā vā tathāgatānaṃ anuppādā vā tathāgatānaṃ ṭhitāva sā dhātu dhammaṭṭhitatā”tiādivacanato
atk-abh03a:1020_1: Avijjā asaṅkhatāti ādayo pañhā avijjādīnaṃyeva paṭiccasamuppādabhāvadassanatthaṃ vuttā.
atk-abh03a:1020_2: Yena panatthena tattha ekekaṃ aṅgaṃ “paṭiccasamuppādo”ti vuccati,
atk-abh03a:1021_1: Avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārāti yā tattha dhammaṭṭhitatātiādi yena suttena laddhi patiṭṭhāpitā,
atk-abh03a:1021_4: yā ayaṃ heṭṭhā “ṭhitāva sā dhātu dhammaṭṭhitatā dhammaniyāmatā”ti vuttā na sā aññatra avijjādīhi visuṃ ekā atthi.
atk-abh03a:1021_6: Uppannepi hi tathāgate anuppannepi avijjāto saṅkhārā sambhavanti,
atk-abh03a:1021_8: tasmā “avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā”ti yā etasmiṃ pade saṅkhāradhammānaṃ kāraṇaṭṭhena ṭhitatāti dhammaṭṭhitatā.
atk-abh03a:1021_9: Tesaṃyeva ca dhammānaṃ kāraṇaṭṭheneva niyāmatāti dhammaniyāmatāti avijjā vuccati.
atk-abh03a:1021_12: Paravādī laddhivasena paṭijānitvā puna dve asaṅkhatānīti puṭṭho suttābhāvena paṭikkhipitvā laddhivaseneva paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:1021_14: Heṭṭhā vuttasadisaṃ pana tattha vuttanayeneva veditabbanti.
atk-abh03a:1024_4: tathāni avitathānī”ti suttaṃ nissāya “cattāri saccāni niccāni asaṅkhatānī”ti laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1024_11: Nirodhe vatthusaccaṃ nāma natthi asaṅkhatameva tanti.
atk-abh03a:1024_18: na ca bādhanalakkhaṇādīhi aññāni dukkhādīni nāma atthīti.
atk-abh03a:1025_0: Dukkhasaccanti pañhe laddhivasena lakkhaṇaṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:1025_2: Ito paraṃ suddhikapañhā ca saṃsandanapañhā ca sabbe pāḷianusāreneva veditabbā.
atk-abh03a:1025_3: Avasāne laddhipatiṭṭhāpanatthaṃ āhaṭasuttaṃ atthassa micchā gahitattā anāhaṭasadisamevāti.
atk-abh03a:1028_2: Tattha yesaṃ “cattāro āruppā āneñjā”ti vacanaṃ nissāya “sabbepi te dhammā asaṅkhatā”ti laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1031_6: Saṅkhatāsaṅkhatalakkhaṇānaṃ pana abhāvena na vattabbā “saṅkhatāti vā asaṅkhatā”ti vā.
atk-abh03a:1031_14: na tathā taṃ keci uppādenti nāma.
atk-abh03a:1031_18: Tena hīti yasmā saṅkhatā na hoti,
atk-abh03a:1031_20: Idaṃ pana asaṅkhatabhāve kāraṇaṃ na hotīti vuttampi avuttasadisamevāti.
atk-abh03a:1034_9: Yesaṃ pana “duvidhopi yasmā saṅkhato na hoti,
atk-abh03a:1037_2: Tattha yesaṃ tāḷacchiddādīsu ñāṇappavattiṃ nissāya “sabbopi ajaṭākāso sanidassano”ti laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1037_4: te sandhāya ākāso sanidassanoti pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:1037_8: Cakkhuñca paṭiccātipañhesu evarūpassa suttassa abhāvena paṭikkhipitvā tulantarikādīnaṃ upaladdhiṃ nissāya paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:1037_9: Dvinnaṃ rukkhānaṃ antaranti ettha rukkharūpaṃ cakkhunā disvā antare rūpābhāvato ākāsanti manodvāraviññāṇaṃ uppajjati,
atk-abh03a:1040_2: Tattha yesaṃ pāsāṇaudakajālarukkhacalanānañceva pañcindriyapatiṭṭhokāsānañca vaṇṇāyatanaṃ kāyaviññattikāle
atk-abh03a:1040_7: Sesaṃ sabbattha pāḷianusārena ceva heṭṭhā vuttanayena ca veditabbanti.
atk-abh03a:1040_8: Pathavīdhātu sanidassanāti ādiṃ katvā kāyakammaṃ sanidassananti pariyosānakathā niṭṭhitā.
atk-abh03a:1044_2: Tattha yasmā dāmādīhi balibaddādayo viya keci dhammā kehici dhammehi saṅgahitā nāma natthi,
atk-abh03a:1044_3: tasmā “natthi keci dhammā kehici dhammehi saṅgahitā,
atk-abh03a:1044_4: evaṃ sante ekavidhena rūpasaṅgahotiādi niratthaka”nti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1044_6: te sandhāya aññenatthena saṅgahabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:1044_9: taṃ dassetuṃ nanu atthi keci dhammātiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1044_11: Yā panesā paravādinā laddhipatiṭṭhāpanatthaṃ yathā dāmena vātiādikā upamā āhaṭā,
atk-abh03a:1044_12: sakavādinā taṃ anabhinanditvā appaṭikkositvā “hañci dāmena vā”ti tassa laddhi bhinnāti veditabbā.
atk-abh03a:1044_14: yadi te dāmādīhi balibaddādayo saṅgahitā nāma,
atk-abh03a:1044_15: atthi keci dhammā kehici dhammehi saṅgahitāti.
atk-abh03a:1047_2: Tattha yasmā tilamhi telaṃ viya na vedanādayo saññādīsu anupaviṭṭhā,
atk-abh03a:1047_3: tasmā “natthi keci dhammā kehici dhammehi sampayuttā,
atk-abh03a:1047_4: evaṃ sante ñāṇasampayuttantiādi niratthakaṃ hotī”ti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1047_6: te sandhāya aññenevatthena sampayuttataṃ dassetuṃ pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:1047_9: Yo panesa paravādinā “yathā tilamhi tela”ntiādiko upamāpañho āhaṭo,
atk-abh03a:1047_10: so yasmā vedanāsaññānaṃ viya tilatelānaṃ lakkhaṇato nānattavavatthānaṃ natthi.
atk-abh03a:1047_12: teneva tilaṃ nibbattetvā gahite purimasaṇṭhānena tilo nāma na paññāyati,
atk-abh03a:1050_4: iti natthi cetasiko dhammo”ti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1050_9: Phassikāti tādisaṃ vohāraṃ apassantassa pucchā paravādissa.
atk-abh03a:1050_12: evaṃ sopi phassanissitattā phassikoti vutte doso natthīti paṭiññā sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a:1053_5: “Saddhā hiriyaṃ kusalañca dāna”nti āgataṭṭhāne cāgacetanā dānaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1053_11: Sā hi uppajjamānā bhayabheravādisaṅkhātaṃ dussīlyacetanaṃ dāti khaṇḍeti lunāti vāti dānaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1053_13: Evametaṃ tividhampi atthato cetasiko ceva dhammo deyyadhammo cāti duvidhaṃ hoti.
atk-abh03a:1053_19: Atha naṃ deyyadhammavasena codetuṃ labbhāti pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:1053_20: annādīni viya so na sakkā dātunti paṭikkhepo itarassa.
atk-abh03a:1053_21: Puna daḷhaṃ katvā puṭṭhe “abhayaṃ detī”ti suttavasena paṭiññā tasseva.
atk-abh03a:1053_22: Phassapañhādīsu pana phassaṃ detītiādivohāraṃ apassanto paṭikkhipateva.
atk-abh03a:1054_2: Na hi acetasiko annādidhammo āyatiṃ vipākaṃ deti,
atk-abh03a:1054_6: hitacittena aniṭṭhaṃ akantaṃ bhesajjaṃ dentassa nimbabījādīhi viya nimbādayo aniṭṭhameva phalaṃ nibbatteyya.
atk-abh03a:1054_8: tasmā aniṭṭhepi deyyadhamme dānaṃ iṭṭhaphalameva hotīti.
atk-abh03a:1055_0: Evaṃ paravādinā cetasikadhammassa dānabhāve patiṭṭhāpite sakavādī itarena pariyāyena deyyadhammassa dānabhāvaṃ
atk-abh03a:1055_2: Paravādī pana cīvarādīnaṃ iṭṭhavipākataṃ apassanto paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:1055_6: Tasmā tena hi na vattabbanti iṭṭhaphalabhāveneva na vattabbatā yujjati.
atk-abh03a:1058_4: bhikkhu cīvaraṃ paribhuñjamāno”ti ca evamādīni suttāni ayoniso gahetvā yesaṃ paribhogamayaṃ nāma puññaṃ atthī”ti laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1058_8: Atha naṃ “puññaṃ nāma phassādayo kusalā dhammā,
atk-abh03a:1058_10: tasmā phassādīhi te vaḍḍhitabba”nti codetuṃ paribhogamayo phassotiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1058_11: Taṃ sabbaṃ itarena tesaṃ avaḍḍhanato paṭikkhittaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1058_12: Latāviyātiādīni “kiriyāya vā bhāvanāya vā vināpi yathā latādīni sayameva vaḍḍhanti,
atk-abh03a:1058_13: kiṃ te evaṃ vaḍḍhantī”ti codanatthaṃ vuttāni.
atk-abh03a:1058_14: Tathā panassa avaḍḍhanato na hevāti paṭikkhittaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1059_1: Na samannāharatīti pañhe paṭiggāhakānaṃ paribhogena purimacetanā vaḍḍhati,
atk-abh03a:1059_2: evaṃ taṃ hoti puññanti laddhivasena paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:1059_3: Tato anāvaṭṭentassātiādīhi puṭṭho dāyakassa cāgacetanaṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:1059_4: Tattha anāvaṭṭentassāti dānacetanāya purecārikena āvajjanena bhavaṅgaṃ anāvaṭṭentassa aparivaṭṭentassa.
atk-abh03a:1059_7: Āvajjanañhi bhavaṅgaṃ vicchinditvā attano gatamagge uppajjamānaṃ dānacetanaṃ samannāharati nāma.
atk-abh03a:1059_8: Evaṃkiccena iminā cittena asamannāharantassa puññaṃ hotīti pucchati.
atk-abh03a:1059_10: Āvajjanena hi tadanantaraṃ uppajjamānaṃ manaṃ karoti nāma.
atk-abh03a:1059_18: ābhogassa vā anantaraṃ taṃ puññaṃ hotīti attho.
atk-abh03a:1060_1: Dvinnaṃ phassānantiādīsupi ekakkhaṇe dāyakassa dvinnaṃ phassādīnaṃ abhāvā paṭikkhipati,
atk-abh03a:1060_2: dāyakassa ca paribhuñjantassa cāti ubhinnaṃ phassādayo sandhāya paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:1060_3: Apicassa pañcannaṃ viññāṇānaṃ samodhānaṃ hotīti laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1060_5: Atha naṃ sakavādī pariyāyassa dvāraṃpidahitvā ujuvipaccanīkavasena codetuṃ kusalādipañhaṃ pucchati.
atk-abh03a:1060_6: Tatrāpi kusalākusalānaṃ ekassekakkhaṇe sampayogābhāvaṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:1060_7: Paribhogamayaṃ pana cittavippayuttaṃ uppajjatīti laddhiyā paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:1061_1: Suttasādhane ārāmaropakādīnaṃ anussaraṇapaṭisaṅkharaṇādivasena antarantarā uppajjamānaṃ puññaṃ sandhāya sadā puññaṃ pavaḍḍhatīti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1061_2: Appamāṇo tassa puññābhisandoti idaṃ appamāṇavihārino dinnapaccayattā ca “evarūpo me cīvaraṃ paribhuñjatī”ti anumodanavasena ca vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1061_4: Yasmā pana paṭiggāhakena paṭiggahetvā aparibhuttepi deyyadhamme puññaṃ hotiyeva,
atk-abh03a:1064_3: petā kālaṅkatā tahi”nti vacanaṃ nissāya “yaṃ ito cīvarādi dinnaṃ teneva yāpentī”ti laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1064_5: te sandhāya ito dinnenāti pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:1064_8: Añño aññassa kārakoti aññassa vipākadāyakānaṃ kammānaṃ añño kārako,
atk-abh03a:1064_9: na attanāva attano kammaṃ karotīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-abh03a:1064_10: Evaṃ puṭṭho pana itaro suttavirodhabhayena paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:1064_11: Dānaṃ dentanti dānaṃ dadamānaṃ disvāti attho.
atk-abh03a:1064_12: Tattha yasmā attano anumoditattā ca tesaṃ tattha bhogā uppajjanti,
atk-abh03a:1064_13: tasmāssa iminā kāraṇena laddhiṃ patiṭṭhapentassāpi appatiṭṭhitāva hoti.
atk-abh03a:1064_14: Na hi te ito dinneneva vatthunā yāpenti.
atk-abh03a:1067_3: ādhipaccasaṃvattaniyaṃ kamma”nti ettha issarānaṃ bhāvo issariyaṃ nāma,
atk-abh03a:1067_11: “Phasso hotī”tiādinā nayena niddiṭṭhesu vipākesu phasso sukhavedanīyādibhedo hoti.
atk-abh03a:1067_12: So ca saññādayo ca sukhavedanādīhi sampayuttā,
atk-abh03a:1068_1: Kammavipāko paresaṃ sādhāraṇoti pañhe phassādayo sandhāya paṭikkhipati,
atk-abh03a:1068_2: kammasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpañca pathavīādīnaṃyeva ca sādhāraṇabhāvaṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:1068_4: Sabbe sattā pathaviṃ paribhuñjantīti pañhe pathaviṃ anissite sandhāya paṭikkhipati,
atk-abh03a:1068_6: Pathaviṃ aparibhuñjitvā parinibbāyantīti pañhe āruppe parinibbāyantānaṃ vasena paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:1068_9: Sakasamaye pana katokāsassa kammassa uppannaṃ vipākaṃ akhepetvā parinibbānaṃ natthi.
atk-abh03a:1068_10: Tesañca laddhiyā pathavī sādhāraṇavipākattā uppannavipākoyeva hoti.
atk-abh03a:1068_11: Taṃ vipākabhāvena ṭhitaṃ akhepetvā parinibbānaṃ na yujjatīti codetuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-abh03a:1068_13: Cakkavattisattassa kammavipākanti pañhe asādhāraṇaṃ phassādiṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipati,
atk-abh03a:1068_15: Pathavīsamuddasūriyacandimādayo hi sabbesaṃ sādhāraṇakammavipākoti tesaṃ laddhi.
atk-abh03a:1069_2: Ādhipaccaṃ nāma sesajane attano vase vattetvā tehi garukātabbaṭṭhena adhipatibhāvo.
atk-abh03a:1069_3: Tattha kammaṃ paṭilābhavasena taṃsaṃvattanikaṃ nāma hoti,
atk-abh03a:1072_2: Tattha yesaṃ “atthi dubbaṇṇasaṃvattaniyaṃ kammaṃ appāyukasaṃvattaniyaṃ kamma”nti ettha dubbaṇṇatā nāma jarā.
atk-abh03a:1073_1: Akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ jarāmaraṇaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ vipākoti pañhe jarāmaraṇena nāma aniṭṭhavipākena bhavitabbanti laddhiyā paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:1073_2: Teneva kāraṇena kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ jarāmaraṇassa kusalavipākataṃ paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:1074_2: Abyākatānaṃ avipākānaṃ jarāmaraṇaṃ vipākoti vattabbatāya pariyāyo natthi,
atk-abh03a:1075_2: Appāyukatā nāma āyuno ciraṃ pavattituṃ asamatthatā.
atk-abh03a:1075_3: Tattha akusalakammaṃ kammasamuṭṭhānassa dubbaṇṇarūpassa kammapaccayo hoti,
atk-abh03a:1075_5: Utusamuṭṭhānādino pana taṃpaṭilābhavasena āyuno ca upacchedakavasena paccayo hoti.
atk-abh03a:1078_5: te sandhāya natthi ariyadhammavipākoti pucchā sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a:1079_0: Sotāpattiphalaṃ na vipākotiādīsu sotāpattimaggādīnaṃ apacayagāmitaṃ sandhāya ariyaphalānaṃ navipākabhāvaṃ paṭijānāti,
atk-abh03a:1079_2: So hi ācayagāmittikassa evaṃ atthaṃ dhāreti –
atk-abh03a:1079_6: Tasmā evaṃ paṭijānāti ca paṭikkhipati ca.
atk-abh03a:1080_1: Kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ savipākaṃ ācayagāmītiādikā pucchā paravādissa,
atk-abh03a:1080_3: Lokiyañhi kusalaṃ vipākacutipaṭisandhiyo ceva vaṭṭañca ācinantaṃ gacchatīti ācayagāmi.
atk-abh03a:1080_4: Lokuttarakusalaṃ cutipaṭisandhiyo ceva vaṭṭañca apacinantaṃ gacchatīti apacayagāmi.
atk-abh03a:1080_7: Imamatthaṃ sandhāyettha sakavādino paṭiññā ca paṭikkhepo ca veditabbāti.
atk-abh03a:1083_2: Tattha yasmā vipāko vipākassa aññamaññādipaccayavasena paccayo hoti,
atk-abh03a:1083_7: Tassa vipākoti tassa vipākadhammadhammassa vipākassa yo vipāko,
atk-abh03a:1083_10: Dutiyaṃ puṭṭho tappaccayāpi aññassa vipākassa uppattiṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:1083_11: Evaṃ sante panassa kusalākusalassa viya tassāpi vipākassa vipāko,
atk-abh03a:1083_12: tassāpi vipākoti vaṭṭānupacchedo āpajjatīti puṭṭho samayavirodhabhayena paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:1084_0: Vipākoti vātiādimhi vacanasādhane pana yadi vipākassa vipākadhammadhammena ekatthatā bhaveyya,
atk-abh03a:1084_2: Vipāko ca vipākadhammadhammo cāti ettha ayaṃ adhippāyo –
atk-abh03a:1084_3: so hi catūsu vipākakkhandhesu ekekaṃ aññamaññapaccayādīsu paccayaṭṭhena vipākadhammadhammataṃ paccayuppannaṭṭhena
atk-abh03a:1084_4: ca vipākaṃ maññamāno “vipāko vipākadhammadhammo”ti puṭṭho āmantāti paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:1084_5: Atha naṃ sakavādī “yasmā tayā ekakkhaṇe catūsu khandhesu vipāko vipākadhammadhammopi anuññāto,
atk-abh03a:1084_6: tasmā tesaṃ sahagatādibhāvo āpajjatī”ti codetuṃ evamāha.
atk-abh03a:1084_8: Taññeva akusalanti yadi te vipāko vipākadhammadhammo,
atk-abh03a:1090_2: Tattha asurakāyena saddhiṃ chagatiyoti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1090_8: gatiyo”ti lomahaṃsanapariyāye paricchinnānaṃ gatīnaṃ vasena codetuṃ nanu pañca gatiyotiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:1090_10: Kasmā pana sakavādī cha gatiyo na sampaṭicchati,
atk-abh03a:1090_11: nanu “catūhāpāyehi ca vippamutto”ti ettha asurakāyopi gahitoti.
atk-abh03a:1090_17: asurakāyoti visuṃ ekā gati nāma natthi.
atk-abh03a:1091_0: Idāni etameva atthaṃ dassetuṃ nanu kālakañcikātiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1091_1: Tattha samānavaṇṇāti sadisarūpasaṇṭhānā bībhacchā virūpā duddassikā.
atk-abh03a:1091_6: Sukkapakkhe samānavaṇṇāti sadisarūpasaṇṭhānā abhirūpā pāsādikā dassanīyā pabhāsampannā.
atk-abh03a:1091_10: Nanu atthi asurakāyoti idaṃ asurakāyasseva sādhakaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1091_11: Tassa pana visuṃ gatiparicchedābhāvena na gatisādhakanti.
atk-abh03a:1094_2: Tattha yesaṃ “antarā parinibbāyī”ti suttapadaṃ ayoniso gahetvā “antarābhavo nāma atthi,
atk-abh03a:1094_4: iddhimā viya aniddhimā mātāpitisamāgamañceva utusamayañca olokayamāno sattāhaṃ vā atirekasattāhaṃ vā tiṭṭhatī”ti laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1094_8: Atha naṃ ye ca bhagavatā tayo bhavā vuttā,
atk-abh03a:1094_11: yadi te antarābhavo nāma koci bhavo atthi,
atk-abh03a:1094_12: tena kāmabhavādīnaṃyeva aññatarena bhavitabbaṃ pañcavokārabhavādinā viya,
atk-abh03a:1094_17: Kāmabhavassa cātiādi yadi antarābhavo nāma atthi,
atk-abh03a:1094_18: imesaṃ bhavānaṃ antarā dvinnaṃ sīmānaṃ sīmantarikā viya bhaveyyāti codetuṃ āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1094_19: Paravādī pana tathā anicchanto sabbapañhe paṭikkhipati kevalaṃ laddhiyā,
atk-abh03a:1094_21: Teneva naṃ sakavādī ‘no vata re’ti paṭisedheti.
atk-abh03a:1095_1: Pañcamī sā yonītiādīnipi yathāparicchinnayoniādīsu so samodhānaṃ na gacchati,
atk-abh03a:1095_2: atha tena tato tato atirekena bhavitabbanti codetuṃ vuttāni.
atk-abh03a:1095_3: Antarābhavūpagaṃ kammanti yadi sopi eko bhavo,
atk-abh03a:1095_4: yathā kāmabhavūpagādīni kammāni atthīti satthārā vibhajitvā dassitāni,
atk-abh03a:1095_5: evaṃ tadupagenāpi kammena bhavitabbanti codanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1095_6: Yasmā pana parasamaye antarābhavūpagaṃ nāma pāṭiyekkaṃ kammaṃ natthi,
atk-abh03a:1095_8: tadupageneva kammena antarābhave nibbattatīti tesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1095_10: Atthi antarābhavūpagā sattāti puṭṭhopi kāmabhavūpagāyeva nāma teti laddhiyā paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:1095_11: Jāyantītiādīni puṭṭhopi tattha jātijarāmaraṇāni ceva cutipaṭisandhiparamparañca anicchanto paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:1095_12: Rūpādivasena puṭṭhopi yasmā antarābhavasattassa anidassanaṃ rūpaṃ,
atk-abh03a:1095_13: vedanādayopi aññesaṃ viya na oḷārikāti tassa laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1096_1: Idāni kāmabhavo bhavo gatītiādi bhavasaṃsandanaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-abh03a:1096_3: yadi te antarābhavo nāma koci bhavo bhaveyya,
atk-abh03a:1096_10: Itaro puna laddhimattavasena taṃ taṃ paṭijānāti ceva paṭikkhipati ca.
atk-abh03a:1097_1: Sabbesaññeva sattānaṃ atthi antarābhavoti puṭṭho yasmā nirayūpagaasaññasattūpagaarūpūpagānaṃ antarābhavaṃ na icchati,
atk-abh03a:1097_4: Ānantariyassātiādi yesaṃ so antarābhavaṃ na icchati,
atk-abh03a:1097_6: Taṃ sabbaṃ pāḷianusāreneva veditabbaṃ saddhiṃ suttasādhanenāti.
atk-abh03a:1100_2: Tattha sakasamaye tāva kāmadhātūti vatthukāmāpi vuccanti –
atk-abh03a:1100_6: Kilesakāmā kamanīyaṭṭhena ceva kamanaṭṭhena ca kāmā,
atk-abh03a:1100_8: Kāmabhavo kamanīyaṭṭhena kamanaṭṭhena vatthukāmapavattidesaṭṭhenāti tīhi kāraṇehi kāmo,
atk-abh03a:1100_12: kāmaguṇā”ti vacanamattaṃ nissāya pañceva kāmaguṇā kāmadhātūti gahitaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1100_15: te sandhāya kāmadhātunānattaṃ bodhetuṃ pañcevāti pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:1100_20: No ca vata re vattabbe pañcevāti imesu tappaṭisaṃyuttachandādīsu sati pañceva kāmaguṇā kāmadhātūti na vattabbaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1100_21: Etepi hi chandādayo kamanīyaṭṭhena kāmā ca dhātu cātipi kāmadhātu.
atk-abh03a:1101_1: Tattha paravādī channampi āyatanānaṃ vatthukāmabhāvena nakāmadhātubhāvaṃ paṭikkhipitvā puna manoti puṭṭho
atk-abh03a:1102_2: Yasmā pana kāmaguṇamatte bhavoti vohāro natthi,
atk-abh03a:1102_4: Kāmaguṇūpagaṃ kammantiādi sabbaṃ kāmaguṇamattassa nakāmadhātubhāvadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1102_7: Tattha jāyanti jiyanti miyanti cavanti upapajjanti,
atk-abh03a:1102_8: na kāmaguṇesūti iminā upāyena sabbattha attho veditabboti.
atk-abh03a:1105_4: kāmaguṇā”ti vacanamattaṃ nissāya rūpāyatanādīni pañcevāyatanāni kāmāti laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1105_6: tesaṃ kilesakāmasseva nippariyāyena kāmabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ pañcevāti pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:1108_2: Tattha “rūpino dhammā rūpadhātu nāmā”ti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1108_6: Atha naṃ sakavādī yasmā rūpadhātu nāma rūpabhavo,
atk-abh03a:1108_10: Sāva kāmadhātūti puṭṭho bhūmiparicchedena virodhaṃ passamāno paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:1108_11: Puna daḷhaṃ katvā puṭṭho attano laddhivasena paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:1108_12: Evaṃ sante pana dvīhi bhavehi samannāgatatā āpajjati,
atk-abh03a:1108_13: tena taṃ sakavādī kāmabhavena cāti ādimāha.
atk-abh03a:1111_2: Arūpadhammesu pana vedanākkhandhameva gahetvā vedanā bhavotiādinā nayenettha desanā katā.
atk-abh03a:1111_3: Tattha kiṃ te arūpino dhammāti saṅkhaṃ gatā vedanādīsu aññatarā hotīti evamattho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-abh03a:1114_2: Tattha yesaṃ “rūpī manomayo sabbaṅgapaccaṅgī ahīnindriyo”ti suttaṃ nissāya brahmakāyikānaṃ ghānādinimittānipi
atk-abh03a:1114_3: āyatanānevāti kappetvā saḷāyataniko tesaṃ attabhāvoti laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1114_7: Atha naṃ yaṃ tattha āyatanaṃ natthi,
atk-abh03a:1114_8: tassa vasena codetuṃ atthi tattha ghānāyatanantiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1114_9: Tato paravādī yaṃ tattha ajjhattikānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ āyatanānaṃ ghānādikaṃ saṇṭhānanimittaṃ tadeva āyatananti laddhiyā paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:1114_10: Bāhirānaṃ gandhāyatanādīnaṃ vasena puṭṭho ghānappasādādayo tattha na icchati,
atk-abh03a:1115_1: Atthi tattha ghānāyatanaṃ atthi gandhāyatanaṃ tena ghānena taṃ gandhaṃ ghāyatīti tasmiṃyeva parasamaye ekacce ācariye sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1115_2: Te kira tattha cha ajjhattikāni āyatanāni paripuṇṇāni icchanti,
atk-abh03a:1115_3: āyatanena ca nāma sakiccakena bhavitabbanti tehi ghānādīhi te gandhādayo ghāyanti sāyanti phusantītipi icchanti.
atk-abh03a:1115_4: Taṃ laddhiṃ sandhāya paravādī āmantāti paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:1116_1: Atthi tattha mūlagandhotiādīni pana puṭṭho atthibhāvaṃ sādhetuṃ asakkonto paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:1116_2: Nanu atthi tattha ghānanimittantiādi saṇṭhānamattasseva sādhakaṃ,
atk-abh03a:1119_2: Tattha yesaṃ “viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpa”nti vacanato āruppabhavepi oḷārikarūpā nissaṭaṃ sukhumarūpaṃ atthīti laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1119_4: te sandhāya atthi rūpanti pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:1122_2: Tattha yesaṃ kāyavacīviññattisaṅkhātaṃ rūpameva kāyakammaṃ vacīkammaṃ nāma,
atk-abh03a:1122_6: te sandhāya kusalena cittena samuṭṭhitanti pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:1122_10: atthi te so tassāti codetuṃ sārammaṇantiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1122_14: Parato pana kusalena cittena samuṭṭhitā vedanā saññā cetanā saddhātiādīsu vedanādīnaññeva cettha patthanā paṇidhīti labbhati,
atk-abh03a:1122_17: sotapatitattā pana evaṃ tanti gatāti veditabbā.
atk-abh03a:1122_18: Rūpāyatanantiādi purimavāre “sabbantaṃ kusala”nti saṃkhittassa pabhedadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1122_20: vacīkammakathā “akusalena cittena samuṭṭhita”ntiādividhānañca sabbaṃ pāḷianusāreneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1125_2: Tattha yesaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ nāma cittavippayutto arūpadhammo,
atk-abh03a:1125_7: Natthi rūpīnaṃ dhammānaṃ āyūti pañhe upādinnarūpānampi tiṇakaṭṭhādīnampi santānavasena pavattimeva āyu
atk-abh03a:1125_8: ṭhiti yapanā yāpanā iriyanā vattanā pālanāti icchati,
atk-abh03a:1125_11: Atthi arūpajīvitindriyanti pañhe arūpadhammānaṃ cittavippayuttaṃ jīvitindriyasantānaṃ nāma atthīti icchati,
atk-abh03a:1126_1: Rūpīnaṃ dhammānaṃ āyu arūpajīvitindriyanti pañhe sattasantāne rūpino vā hontu arūpino vā,
atk-abh03a:1127_1: Nirodhasamāpannapañhesupi cittavippayuttaṃ arūpajīvitameva sandhāya paṭikkhipati ca paṭijānāti ca.
atk-abh03a:1127_2: Sakavādī pana taṃ asampaṭicchanto yaṃ arūpapavatte asati atthi,
atk-abh03a:1127_6: Kāyaviññatti vacīviññatti sammāvācā sammākammanto jīvitindriyanti evamādayopi dhammā saṅkhārakkhandhapariyāpannātissa laddhi.
atk-abh03a:1127_7: Sakavādī pana taṃ asampaṭicchanto yadi niruddhepi arūpapavatte saṅkhārakkhandho atthi,
atk-abh03a:1127_8: catunnampi khandhānaṃ atthitā hotūti codetuṃ atthi vedanākkhandhoti ādimāha.
atk-abh03a:1127_10: samāpajjantassa ca vuṭṭhahantassa ca pubbāparabhāgaṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:1128_2: Tassa hi laddhiyā asaññasattānaṃ paṭisandhikāle cittaṃ uppajjitvā nirujjhati,
atk-abh03a:1128_3: tena saha cittavippayuttaarūpajīvitindriyaṃ uppajjitvā yāvatāyukaṃ pavattati.
atk-abh03a:1128_4: Tasmā tesaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ natthīti puṭṭho paṭikkhipati,
atk-abh03a:1128_8: Sakavādī pana taṃ anicchanto “sace tattha ekakkhaṇepi vedanādayo atthi,
atk-abh03a:1132_2: Tattha yena arahatā purimabhave arahā abbhācikkhitapubbo,
atk-abh03a:1132_3: so tassa kammassa hetu arahattā parihāyatīti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1133_0: Handa hi arahantānaṃ abbhācikkhatīti idaṃ yassa kammassa hetu parihāyati,
atk-abh03a:1133_2: Atha naṃ sakavādī taṃ pakkhaṃ paṭijānāpetvā “yadi evaṃ yehi arahanto na abbhācikkhitapubbā,
atk-abh03a:1133_3: te sabbe arahattaṃ pāpuṇeyyu”nti codetuṃ ye kecītiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:1133_4: Itaro tassa kammassa arahattaṃ sampāpuṇane niyāmaṃ apassanto paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:1138_2: Tattha sakasamaye saṅkhāre ādīnavato nibbānañca ānisaṃsato passantassa saṃyojanappahānaṃ hotīti nicchayo.
atk-abh03a:1138_3: Yesaṃ pana tesu dvīsupi ekaṃsikavādaṃ gahetvā “ānisaṃsadassāvinova saṃyojanappahānaṃ hotī”ti laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1139_1: nibbāne ca ānisaṃsadassāvī hotīti pañhasmiṃ ayamadhippāyo –
atk-abh03a:1139_2: ānisaṃsadassāvissa saṃyojanānaṃ pahānaṃ hotīti tesaṃ laddhi.
atk-abh03a:1139_3: Nanu saṅkhāre aniccato manasikaroto saṃyojanā pahīyantīti ca puṭṭho āmantāti paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:1139_4: Tena te saṅkhāre ca aniccato manasikaroti,
atk-abh03a:1139_5: nibbāne ca ānisaṃsadassāvī hotīti idaṃ āpajjati,
atk-abh03a:1139_9: Sakavādī panassa adhippāyaṃ madditvā aniccamanasikārassa ānisaṃsadassāvitāya ca ekato paṭiññātattā dvinnaṃ
atk-abh03a:1139_10: phassānaṃ dvinnaṃ cittānaṃ samodhānaṃ hotīti pucchati.
atk-abh03a:1139_17: Yadi tāva aniccādito manasikaroto pahānaṃ bhaveyya,
atk-abh03a:1139_20: anussavavasena nibbāne ānisaṃsaṃ passantassa vipassanācitteneva bhaveyya,
atk-abh03a:1139_23: Yasmā pana ariyamaggakkhaṇe aniccādimanasikārassa kiccaṃ nipphattiṃ gacchati puna niccatotiādigahaṇassa anuppattidhammabhāvato,
atk-abh03a:1139_25: tasmā kiccanipphattivasena aniccādito manasikaroto ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattivasena ca nibbāne ānisaṃsadassāvissa saṃyojanānaṃ pahānaṃ hotīti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1140_1: Nibbāne sukhānupassīti suttaṃ nibbāne sukhānupassanādibhāvameva sādheti,
atk-abh03a:1143_2: Tattha yesaṃ “nibbānaṃ maññatī”tiādīnaṃ ayoniso atthaṃ gahetvā amatārammaṇaṃ saṃyojanaṃ hotīti laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1143_7: amatassa saṃyojaniyādibhāvo āpajjatīti codetuṃ amataṃ saṃyojaniyantiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:1143_10: Nibbānaṃ nibbānatoti āhaṭasuttaṃ pana diṭṭhadhammanibbānaṃ sandhāya bhāsitaṃ,
atk-abh03a:1146_2: Tattha rūpaṃ sappaccayaṭṭhena sārammaṇaṃ nāma hoti,
atk-abh03a:1146_4: Yesaṃ pana avisesena rūpaṃ sārammaṇanti laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1146_6: te sandhāya ārammaṇatthassa vibhāgadassanatthaṃ pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:1146_9: Na vattabbanti pañhe olubbhārammaṇaṃ sandhāya paṭiññā sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a:1149_2: Tattha yesaṃ anusayā nāma cittavippayuttā ahetukā abyākatā,
atk-abh03a:1149_7: Atha naṃ anārammaṇena nāma evaṃvidhena bhavitabbanti codetuṃ rūpantiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:1149_9: Saṅkhārakkhandho anārammaṇoti pañhe cittasampayuttasaṅkhārakkhandhaṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:1149_13: Sānusayoti pañhe pana appahīnānusayattā sānusayatā anuññātā.
atk-abh03a:1149_19: Evarūpassa ca idaṃ nāma ārammaṇanti na vattabbaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1152_2: Tattha yasmā arahā cakkhuviññāṇasamaṅgī ñāṇīti vuccati,
atk-abh03a:1152_3: tassa ñāṇassa tasmiṃ khaṇe ārammaṇaṃ natthi,
atk-abh03a:1155_3: tasmā tadārammaṇena cittena ārammaṇassa natthitāya anārammaṇena bhavitabbanti atītaṃ anārammaṇanti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1158_4: Tattha asukacittaṃ nāma vitakkassārammaṇaṃ na hotīti niyamābhāvato siyā sabbaṃ cittaṃ vitakkānupatitaṃ,
atk-abh03a:1158_5: vitakkavippayuttacittasabbhāvato pana na sabbaṃ cittaṃ vitakkānupatitaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1158_6: Iti imaṃ vibhāgaṃ akatvā aviseseneva sabbaṃ cittaṃ vitakkānupatitanti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1161_3: tasmā sabbaso vitakkayato vicārayato antamaso manodhātupavattikālepi vitakkavipphāro saddoyevāti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1161_5: te sandhāya sabbasoti pucchā sakavādissa paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a:1161_7: phassādivipphāropi saddo bhaveyyāti codetuṃ sabbaso phusayatotiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:1161_9: Vitakkavipphāro saddo sotaviññeyyoti vitakkassa vipphāramattameva saddoti katvā pucchati,
atk-abh03a:1161_12: Nanu vitakkavipphārasaddo na sotaviññeyyoti idaṃ tasseva laddhiyā dasseti.
atk-abh03a:1161_15: Itaro pana “vitakkavipphārasaddaṃ sutvā ādisatī” ti vacanato sotaviññeyyovāti vadati.
atk-abh03a:1164_2: Tattha yasmā koci aññaṃ bhaṇissāmīti aññaṃ bhaṇati,
atk-abh03a:1164_3: tasmā nayathācittassa vācā cittānurūpā cittānugatikā na hoti,
atk-abh03a:1164_8: Atha naṃ “yadi taṃsamuṭṭhāpakaṃ cittaṃ na siyā,
atk-abh03a:1164_9: phassādayopi tasmiṃ khaṇe na siyu”nti codetuṃ aphassakassātiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:1164_10: Na bhaṇitukāmotiādīsu yasmā aññaṃ bhaṇissāmīti aññaṃ bhaṇantopi bhaṇitukāmoyeva nāma hoti,
atk-abh03a:1165_1: Nanu atthi koci aññaṃ bhaṇissāmītiādīsu cīvaranti bhaṇitukāmo cīranti bhaṇeyya.
atk-abh03a:1165_4: iti pubbabhāgena cittena asadisattā ayathācitto nāma hoti,
atk-abh03a:1165_7: iti acittakā sā vācāti atthaṃ sandhāya iminā udāharaṇena “nayathācittassa vācā”ti patiṭṭhāpitāpi appatiṭṭhāpitāva hotīti.
atk-abh03a:1168_2: Tattha yasmā koci aññatra gacchissāmīti aññatra gacchati,
atk-abh03a:1168_3: tasmā nayathācittassa kāyakammaṃ cittānurūpaṃ cittānugatikaṃ na hoti,
atk-abh03a:1171_2: Tattha samannāgatapaññatti paṭilābhapaññattīti dve paññattiyo veditabbā.
atk-abh03a:1171_4: Aṭṭha samāpattilābhino pana samāpattiyo kiñcāpi na ekakkhaṇe pavattanti,
atk-abh03a:1171_9: Tattha yesaṃ imaṃ vibhāgaṃ aggahetvā yasmā jhānalābhīnaṃ atītānāgatāni jhānānipi atthi,
atk-abh03a:1176_2: Tattha yesaṃ “upapattesiyanti saṅkhaṃ gatassa bhavaṅgacittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇena saheva kiriyāti saṅkhaṃ
atk-abh03a:1176_3: gatā kusalā vā akusalā vā cattāro khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānarūpañcāti pañcakkhandhā uppajjanti.
atk-abh03a:1176_4: Tesu hi anuppannesu bhavaṅge niruddhe santativicchedo bhaveyyā”ti laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1176_8: Tattha upapattesiyeti catūsupi padesu bahuvacanabhummatthe ekavacanabhummaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1176_9: Upapattesiyesu pañcasu khandhesu aniruddhesūti ayañhettha attho.
atk-abh03a:1176_11: Tattha paṭhamapañhe khandhalakkhaṇavasena kiriyavasena ca pañceva nāma te khandhāti paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:1176_12: Dutiyapañhe purimapacchimavasena upapattesiyakiriyavasena ca nānattaṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:1176_13: Dvinnaṃ pana phassānaṃ cittānañca samodhānaṃ puṭṭho suttalesābhāvena paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:1177_0: Kiriyā cattāroti rūpena vinā kusalā akusalā vā cattāro gahitā.
atk-abh03a:1177_1: Kiriyāñāṇanti paravādinā cakkhuviññāṇasamaṅgikkhaṇe arahato anuññātaṃ anārammaṇañāṇaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1177_4: Mato maggaṃ bhāvetīti chalena pucchā paravādissa.
atk-abh03a:1177_5: Yasmā pana paṭisandhito yāva cuticittā satto jīvatiyeva nāma,
atk-abh03a:1180_9: evaṃ tampi rūpaṃ siyā”ti codetuṃ sārammaṇotiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:1180_10: Tattha paṭikkhepo ca paṭiññā ca paravādino laddhianurūpena veditabbā.
atk-abh03a:1183_2: Tattha yesaṃ “cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā na nimittaggāhī hotī”ti suttaṃ nissāya “pañcaviññāṇasamaṅgissa atthi maggabhāvanā”ti laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1183_9: na ca tāni maggagatikāni anibbānārammaṇattā alokuttarattā ca,
atk-abh03a:1183_10: na maggo pañcaviññāṇagatiko tesaṃ lakkhaṇena asaṅgahitattā”ti codetuṃ nanu pañcaviññāṇā uppannavatthukātiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:1183_15: Evaṃ sante yadidaṃ “pañcaviññāṇā uppannavatthukā”tiādi lakkhaṇaṃ vuttaṃ,
atk-abh03a:1183_16: taṃ evaṃ avatvā “cha viññāṇā”ti vattabbaṃ siyā.
atk-abh03a:1183_20: tasmā sakavādī taṃ lakkhaṇaṃ paravādiṃ sampaṭicchāpetvā no ca vata re vattabbe pañcaviññāṇasamaṅgissa atthi maggabhāvanāti āha.
atk-abh03a:1184_11: Te aniruddhaṃ vatthuṃ nissayaṃ katvā pavattanato asambhinnavatthukā,
atk-abh03a:1184_13: Te aniruddhāneva rūpādīni ārabbha pavattanato asambhinnārammaṇā,
atk-abh03a:1184_18: Te attano attanova rūpādigocare pavattanato na aññamaññassa gocaravisayaṃ paccanubhonti,
atk-abh03a:1184_19: maggo rūpādīsu ekampi gocaraṃ na karoti.
atk-abh03a:1184_20: Te kiriyamanodhātuṃ purecārikaṃ katvā uppajjanato na asamannāhārā na amanasikārā uppajjanti,
atk-abh03a:1184_28: Te sampaṭicchanādīhi antaritattā na aññamaññassa samanantarā uppajjanti,
atk-abh03a:1184_30: Tesaṃ aññatra abhinipātā ābhogamattampi kiccaṃ natthi,
atk-abh03a:1184_33: tasmā sakavādī imehākārehi paravādiṃ maggassa apañcaviññāṇagatikabhāvaṃ sampaṭicchāpetvā no ca vata re
atk-abh03a:1185_1: Suññataṃ ārabbhāti “yathā lokuttaramaggo suññataṃ nibbānaṃ ārabbha,
atk-abh03a:1185_4: Itaro “cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe cā”ti vacanato paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:1185_5: Dutiyaṃ puṭṭho “na nimittaggāhī”ti vacanato yaṃ tattha animittaṃ,
atk-abh03a:1186_6: Cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā na nimittaggāhīti ettha javanakkhaṇe na nimittaggāhitā vuttā,
atk-abh03a:1189_0: 580-583. Idāni pañcaviññāṇā kusalāpītikathā nāma hoti. Sā heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva atthato veditabbāti.
atk-abh03a:1192_2: Tattha ābhogo nāma kusalākusalavasena hoti satthārā ca “cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā nimittaggāhī hoti,
atk-abh03a:1192_4: taṃ ayoniso gahetvā “pañcaviññāṇā sābhogā”ti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1195_2: Tattha “sīle patiṭṭhāya naro sapañño”tiādivacanato yasmā lokiyena sīlena sīlavā lokuttaraṃ maggaṃ bhāveti,
atk-abh03a:1195_3: tasmā “purimena ca lokiyena maggakkhaṇe lokuttarena cāti dvīhi sīlehi samannāgato nāma hotī”ti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1195_7: Atha naṃ “yadi so ekakkhaṇe lokiyalokuttarehi dvīhi sīlehi samannāgato,
atk-abh03a:1195_8: dvīhi phassādīhipi tena samannāgatena bhavitabba”nti codetuṃ dvīhi phassehītiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:1195_10: Lokiyena ca lokuttarena cāti pañhe pubbe samādinnañca maggakkhaṇe uppannasammāvācādīni ca sandhāya paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:1196_2: Itaro pana taṃ vītikkamaṃ viya sallakkhento dussīlotiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:1199_2: Tattha yasmā sīle uppajjitvā niruddhepi samādānahetuko sīlopacayo nāma atthi,
atk-abh03a:1202_1: Idāni sīlaṃ na cittānuparivattītikathā nāma hoti.
atk-abh03a:1205_2: Tattha “ārāmaropā”ti gāthāya atthaṃ ayoniso gahetvā “sadā puññaṃ pavaḍḍhatī”ti vacanato “samādānahetukaṃ sīlaṃ vaḍḍhatī”ti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1208_3: vacīviññatti vacīkammanti gahitattā “viññatti sīla”nti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1208_7: Atha naṃ yasmā sīlaṃ nāma virati,
atk-abh03a:1208_10: Abhivādanaṃ sīlantiādi yathārūpaṃ viññattiṃ so “sīla”nti maññati taṃ uddharitvā dassetuṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1208_11: Yasmā pana sā virati na hoti,
atk-abh03a:1211_2: Tattha cittavippayuttaṃ apuññūpacayañceva āṇattiyā ca pāṇātipātādīsu aṅgapāripūriṃ sandhāya “aviññatti dussīlya”nti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1211_9: asukaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ avaharissāmī”ti evaṃ pāpasamādānaṃ katvā.
atk-abh03a:1211_10: Ubho vaḍḍhantīti puṭṭho dānakkhaṇe pāpassa anuppattiṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:1211_11: Dutiyaṃ puṭṭho cittavippayuttaṃ pāpūpacayaṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:1217_3: Tattha yasmā puthujjano kusalābyākate citte vattamāne “sānusayo”ti vattabbo,
atk-abh03a:1217_10: te sandhāya tīsupi kathāsu pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:1217_12: Sesaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayattā sakkā pāḷimaggeneva jānitunti,
atk-abh03a:1220_2: Tattha maggañāṇena aññāṇe vigatepi puna cakkhuviññāṇādivasena ñāṇavippayuttacitte vattamāne yasmā taṃ maggacittaṃ na pavattati,
atk-abh03a:1220_7: Atha naṃ “yadi aññāṇe vigate ‘ñāṇī’ti paññatti na siyā,
atk-abh03a:1220_8: rāgādīsu vigatesu vītarāgādipaññattipi na siyāti puggalapaññattiyaṃ akovidosī”ti codetuṃ rāge vigatetiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:1220_9: Itaro tesu vigatesu sarāgādibhāve yuttiṃ apassanto paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:1220_10: Pariyosāne yasmā ñāṇapaṭilābhena so ñāṇīti vattabbataṃ arahati,
atk-abh03a:1223_2: Tattha yasmā arahā cakkhuviññāṇādisamaṅgī paṭiladdhaṃ maggañāṇaṃ sandhāya “ñāṇī”ti vuccati,
atk-abh03a:1223_3: na cassa taṃ tena cittena sampayuttaṃ,
atk-abh03a:1223_8: Atha naṃ “yadi te ñāṇaṃ cittavippayuttaṃ cittavippayuttesu rūpādīsu aññataraṃ siyā”ti codetuṃ rūpantiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:1223_11: Pariyosāne pana paññavāti puṭṭho paṭilābhavasena taṃ pavattiṃ icchati,
atk-abh03a:1226_2: Tattha yesaṃ “lokuttaramaggakkhaṇe yogāvacaro idaṃ dukkhanti vācaṃ bhāsati,
atk-abh03a:1226_3: evamassa idaṃ dukkhanti vācaṃ bhāsato ca idaṃ dukkhanti ñāṇaṃ pavattatī”ti laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1226_6: maggakkhaṇe tathā vācābhāsanaṃ ñāṇappavattiñca sandhāya paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a:1226_7: Yasmā pana so sesasaccapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ vācaṃ puthujjanova bhāsati,
atk-abh03a:1226_8: na ca tassa tathā ñāṇappavattīti icchati,
atk-abh03a:1226_11: Itaro pana sakasamaye tādisaṃ vohāraṃ apassanto paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:1226_12: Iti ca danti cātiādi yadi tassa dukkhe ñāṇaṃ pavattati, i- kāra daṃ- kāra du- kāra kha-
atk-abh03a:1226_13: kāresu paṭipāṭiyā catūhi ñāṇehi pavattitabbanti dassetuṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1229_2: Tattha iddhipādabhāvanānisaṃsassa atthaṃ ayoniso gahetvā “iddhibalena samannāgato kappaṃ tiṭṭheyyā”ti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1229_4: te sandhāya iddhibalena samannāgato kappaṃ tiṭṭheyyāti pucchā sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a:1229_10: kappassa asaṅkhyeyyānī”ti ettha hi mahākappova kappoti vutto.
atk-abh03a:1229_14: Āyukappanaṃ āyuvidhānaṃ kammassa vipākavasena vā vassagaṇanāya vā āyuparicchedoti attho.
atk-abh03a:1230_0: Atha naṃ sakavādī “sace te iddhibalena samannāgato,
atk-abh03a:1230_2: so vassasataṃ appaṃ vā bhiyyo’ti evaṃ paricchinnā āyukappā uddhaṃ mahākappaṃ vā mahākappekadesaṃ vā jīveyya
atk-abh03a:1230_3: iddhimayikenassa āyunā bhavitabba”nti codetuṃ iddhimayiko so āyūtiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:1230_9: iddhimā hi yāvatāyukaṃ jīvitappavattiyā antarāyakare dhamme iddhibalena paṭibāhitvā antarā akālamaraṇaṃ nivāretuṃ sakkoti,
atk-abh03a:1231_0: Atītaṃ anāgatanti idaṃ avisesena kappaṃ tiṭṭheyyāti paṭiññātattā codeti.
atk-abh03a:1231_1: Dve kappetiādi “yadi iddhimā jīvitaparicchedaṃ atikkamituṃ sakkoti,
atk-abh03a:1231_2: na kevalaṃ ekaṃ anekepi kappe tiṭṭheyyā”ti codanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1231_3: Uppanno phassotiādi na sabbaṃ iddhiyā labbhati,
atk-abh03a:1234_2: Tattha yesaṃ ekacittakkhaṇe uppannāpi ekaggatā samādhānaṭṭhena samādhīti aggahetvā “satta rattindivāni
atk-abh03a:1234_10: Na hi ekaṃ paccuppannacittameva cittasantati nāma hoti,
atk-abh03a:1234_11: kiṃ te sabbāpi sā samādhī”ti codetuṃ atītātiādimāha,
atk-abh03a:1235_0: Nanu atītaṃ niruddhantiādi “cittasantatiyaṃ paccuppannameva cittaṃ kiccakaraṃ,
atk-abh03a:1235_2: kathaṃ taṃ samādhi nāma hotī”ti dassetuṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1235_10: Nanu vuttaṃ bhagavatāti suttaṃ purimapacchimavasena pavattamānassa samādhissa abbokiṇṇataṃ sādheti,
atk-abh03a:1238_2: Tattha “ṭhitāva sā dhātū”ti vacanaṃ nissāya “paṭiccasamuppādasaṅkhātā dhammaṭṭhitatā nāma ekā atthi,
atk-abh03a:1238_7: Atha naṃ “yadi parinipphannānaṃ avijjādīnaṃ aññā dhammaṭṭhitatā nāma parinipphannā atthi,
atk-abh03a:1238_8: tāyapi ca te dhammaṭṭhitatāya aññā ṭhitatā parinipphannā āpajjatī”ti codetuṃ tāya ṭhitatātiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:1238_10: Dutiyaṃ puṭṭho anantarapaccayatañceva aññamaññapaccayatañca sandhāya paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:1241_2: Tattha “aniccānaṃ rūpādīnaṃ aniccatāpi rūpādayo viya parinipphannā”ti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1241_6: Atha naṃ “yadi te rūpādayo viya aniccatā parinipphannā,
atk-abh03a:1241_7: tassāpi aññāya parinipphannāya aniccatāya bhavitabba”nti codetuṃ tāya aniccatāyātiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:1241_8: Itaro dvinnaṃ aniccatāya ekato abhāvena paṭikkhipitvā puna yasmā sā aniccatā niccā na hoti,
atk-abh03a:1241_11: Athassa sakavādī lesokāsaṃ adatvā yā tena dutiyā aniccatā paṭiññātā,
atk-abh03a:1241_12: tāyapi tato parāyapīti paramparavasena anupacchedadosaṃ āropento tāya tāyevātiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:1241_13: Jarā parinipphannātiādi yasmā uppannassa jarāmaraṇato aññā aniccatā nāma natthi,
atk-abh03a:1241_15: Tatrāpi paravādino purimanayeneva paṭiññā ca paṭikkhepo ca veditabbo.
