atk-abh03a:1242_4: evaṃ parinipphannānaṃ aniccatādīnaṃ tāni natthī”ti maññamāno ekantena paṭikkhipatiyevāti.
atk-abh03a:1247_3: na nimittaggāhī hotī”ti suttaṃ nissāya “saṃvaropi asaṃvaropi kamma”nti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1248_0: Atha naṃ yā sakasamaye cetanā “kamma”nti vuttā yathā sā kāyavacīmanodvāresu pavattamānā kāyakammādināmaṃ labhati,
atk-abh03a:1248_2: sopi cakkhundriyādīsu pavattamāno cakkhukammādināmaṃ labheyyā”ti codetuṃ cakkhundriyasaṃvaro cakkhukammantiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:1248_3: Itaro tādisaṃ suttapadaṃ apassanto catūsu dvāresu paṭikkhipitvā pañcame kāyadvāre pasādakāyaṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipati,
atk-abh03a:1248_5: So hi pasādakāyampi viññattikāyampi kāyindriyantveva icchati.
atk-abh03a:1248_9: “Cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā”ti suttaṃ tesu dvāresu saṃvarāsaṃvarameva dīpeti,
atk-abh03a:1251_4: sañcetanikānaṃ kammāna”nti suttapadaṃ nissāya “sabbaṃ kammaṃ savipāka”nti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1251_8: kammaṃ vadāmī”ti satthārā avisesena cetanā “kamma”nti vuttā;
atk-abh03a:1251_10: abyākatā avipākāti imaṃ vibhāgaṃ dassetuṃ sabbaṃ kammanti pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:1251_12: Puna sabbā cetanāti pañhesu abyākataṃ sandhāya paṭikkhepo,
atk-abh03a:1251_16: bhikkhave”ti suttaṃ sati paccaye diṭṭhadhammādīsu vipākapaṭisaṃvedanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
atk-abh03a:1254_2: Tattha “so tassa kammassa katattā upacitattā ussannattā vipulattā brahmassaro hotī”tiādīni ayoniso gahetvā “saddo vipāko”ti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1254_5: Rūpadhammesu panāyaṃ vohāro natthī”ti dassetuṃ pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:1254_7: Sukhavedanīyotiādi “vipāko nāma evarūpo hotī”ti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1254_9: Mahāpuriso hi kammassa katattā suciparivāropi hoti,
atk-abh03a:1257_2: Tattha yasmā saḷāyatanaṃ kammassa katattā uppannaṃ,
atk-abh03a:1257_5: te sandhāya cakkhāyatanaṃ vipākoti pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:1257_8: Saḷāyatanaṃ vipākoti ettha manāyatanaṃ siyā vipāko.
atk-abh03a:1260_3: tasmā “sattakkhattuparamo puggalo sattakkhattuparamatāya niyato”ti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1260_5: tesaṃ ṭhapetvā “ariyamaggaṃ añño tassa niyamo natthi,
atk-abh03a:1260_6: yena so sattakkhattuparamatāya niyato bhaveyyā”ti imaṃ vibhāgaṃ dassetuṃ pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:1261_1: dve niyāmā sammattaniyāmo ca micchattaniyāmo ca.
atk-abh03a:1261_6: Tattha sattakkhattuparamo sotāpattimaggena avinipātadhammatāya ca phaluppattiyā ca niyamito.
atk-abh03a:1262_0: Abhabbo antarāti pañhesu ānantariyābhāvaṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipati,
atk-abh03a:1262_2: Atthi so niyāmoti pañhe sattakkhattuparamatāya niyāmaṃ apassanto paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:1262_3: Atthi te satipaṭṭhānātiādi niyāmasaṅkhāte maggadhamme dassetuṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1262_4: Tassa pana puna paṭhamamaggānuppattito tepi natthi,
atk-abh03a:1262_7: Nanu so sattakkhattuparamoti ettha bhagavā “ayaṃ puggalo ettake bhave sandhāvitvā parinibbāyissati,
atk-abh03a:1262_9: na bhavaniyāmaṃ nāma kiñci tena sattakkhattuparamo,
atk-abh03a:1267_2: Tattha yasmā dosasampayuttena cittena pāṇātipāto hoti,
atk-abh03a:1267_4: tasmā “diṭṭhisampanno sañcicca pāṇaṃ jīvitā voropeyyā”ti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1267_8: Sañcicca mātarantiādipañhesu pana “aṭṭhānametaṃ anavakāso”ti suttabhayena paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:1267_9: Satthari agāravotiādi satthārādīsu sagāravassa sikkhāpadassa vītikkamābhāvadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1267_10: Itaro pana akusalavasena tassa agāravo nāma natthīti paṭikkhipitvā sagāravabhāvañca sampaṭicchitvā puna
atk-abh03a:1267_11: agāravoti puṭṭho tesu tesu kiccesu pasutatāya vikkhittānaṃ asatiyā amanasikārena cetiye abhivādanapadakkhiṇakaraṇābhāvaṃ
atk-abh03a:1267_13: Puna ohadeyyātiādinā nayena puṭṭho tādisāya kiriyāya sañcicca akaraṇato paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:1270_2: Tattha ye duggatiñca duggatisattānaṃ rūpādiārammaṇaṃ taṇhañcāti ubhayampi duggatīti gahetvā puna tathā
atk-abh03a:1270_7: Āpāyike rūpe rajjeyyātiādi paravādino laddhiyā diṭṭhisampannassa duggati appahīnā,
atk-abh03a:1270_10: Nirayaṃ upapajjeyyātiādi duggatipahānameva duggatigāminitaṇhāpahānaṃ vā dīpeti,
atk-abh03a:1276_3: kappaṃ nirayamhi paccatī”ti “sakalampi kappaṃ saṅghabhedako niraye tiṭṭhatī”ti laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1276_7: Buddho ca loketi idaṃ vinā buddhuppādena saṅghabhedassa abhāvadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1276_8: Kappo ca saṇṭhāti saṅgho ca bhijjatītiādi “yadi so sakalaṃ kappaṃ tiṭṭhati,
atk-abh03a:1276_9: saṇṭhahanato paṭṭhāya taṃ kammaṃ katvā tattha uppajjitvā tiṭṭheyyā”ti dassetuṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1276_11: Kappaṭṭho iddhimāti pañhe bhāvanāmayaṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipati,
atk-abh03a:1276_14: Chandiddhipādotiādi “jātimayāya iddhiyā iddhimāti laddhimattametaṃ, kiṃ tena,
atk-abh03a:1276_16: iminā nayena iddhipādā bhāvitā bhaveyyu”nti codanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1276_17: Āpāyiko nerayikoti suttaṃ yaṃ so ekaṃ kappaṃ asītibhāge katvā tato ekabhāgamattaṃ kālaṃ tiṭṭheyya,
atk-abh03a:1279_4: taṃ mahaggataṃ lokuttaraṃ vā na paṭilabhati.
atk-abh03a:1279_5: Yesaṃ pana imaṃ vibhāgaṃ akatvā aviseseneva “so kusalacittaṃ na paṭilabhatī”ti laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1279_7: tesaṃ vibhāgadassanena taṃ laddhiṃ bhindituṃ pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:1282_2: Tattha anantarāpayutto nāma yena khandhabhedato anantarā vipākadāyakaṃ mātughātādi ānantariyakammaṃ āṇattaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1282_3: Tattha yassa niyatāya āṇattiyā āṇatto taṃ kammaṃ karissati,
atk-abh03a:1282_4: so atthasādhikāya cetanāya uppāditattā micchattaniyato hoti,
atk-abh03a:1282_6: Yassa aniyatāya āṇattiyā āṇatto taṃ kammaṃ karissati,
atk-abh03a:1282_7: so atthasādhikāya cetanāya anuppāditattā na micchattaniyato,
atk-abh03a:1282_8: bhabbo sammattaniyāmaṃ okkamitunti idaṃ sakasamaye sanniṭṭhānaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1282_9: Yesaṃ pana “aniyatāyapi āṇattiyā abhabboyeva sammattaniyāmaṃ okkamitu”nti laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1282_11: tesaṃ taṃ laddhiṃ bhindituṃ sakavādī pubbapakkhaṃ datvā anantarāpayuttoti paravādinā attānaṃ pucchāpeti.
atk-abh03a:1282_14: Tato paravādī mātughātādikammassa āṇattattāva “so micchattaniyato”ti maññati.
atk-abh03a:1282_16: Sakavādī pana ekassa puggalassa dvinnaṃ niyāmānaṃ anokkantimattameva sandhāya na hevanti paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:1283_2: Aniyatampi hi āṇattiṃ payojetvā ṭhitassa “ananucchavikaṃ mayā kata”nti kukkuccaṃ uppajjateva,
atk-abh03a:1283_4: Hañcītiādi kukkuccuppattimattaṃ gahetvā paravādinā laddhipatiṭṭhāpanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1284_1: Idāni yassa aniyatāṇattikassāpi anantarāpayuttassa paravādinā sammattaniyāmokkamanaṃ paṭisiddhaṃ,
atk-abh03a:1284_2: tameva puggalaṃ gahetvā anantarāpayutto puggalo abhabboti pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:1284_4: Atha naṃ sakavādī “abhabbo nāma mātughātādikammānaṃ kārako,
atk-abh03a:1284_5: kiṃ te tena tāni kammāni katānī”ti codetuṃ mātā jīvitā voropitātiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:1284_6: Itaro tesaṃ vatthūnaṃ arogatāya tathārūpaṃ kiriyaṃ apassanto “na heva”nti paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:1285_0: Taṃ kammaṃ paṭisaṃharitvāti aniyatāṇattikammaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1285_1: Tañhi “mā kho mayā āṇattaṃ ākāsī”ti āṇattaṃ nivārentena paṭisaṃhaṭaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-abh03a:1285_4: Evaṃ santepi panettha purimāṇattiyāyeva niyatabhāvaṃ maññamāno paravādī “āmantā”ti paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:1285_5: Atha naṃ sakavādī tassa kammassa paṭisaṃhaṭabhāvaṃ sampaṭicchāpetvā attano laddhiṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā hañcītiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:1286_1: Puna anantarāpayuttoti pariyosānapañhe paṭhamapañhe viya pucchā paravādissa,
atk-abh03a:1286_4: paṭisaṃhaṭakālato pubbe payuttakālaṃ sandhāya paṭiññā sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a:1286_5: Payuttapubbatāmattaṃ gahetvā aniyatāṇattivasena hañcīti laddhipatiṭṭhāpanaṃ paravādissa.
atk-abh03a:1286_6: Ayaṃ pana laddhi ayoniso patiṭṭhitattā appatiṭṭhitāva hotīti.
atk-abh03a:1289_5: Ime dve niyāme ṭhapetvā añño niyāmo nāma natthi.
atk-abh03a:1289_6: Sabbepi hi sesā tebhūmakadhammā aniyatā nāma.
atk-abh03a:1289_8: Buddhehi pana attano ñāṇabalena “ayaṃ satto anāgate bodhiṃ pāpuṇissatī”ti byākato bodhisatto puññussadattā niyatoti vuccati.
atk-abh03a:1289_9: Iti imaṃ vohāramattaṃ gahetvā “pacchimabhaviko bodhisatto tāya jātiyā bhabbo dhammaṃ abhisametu”nti adhippāyena
atk-abh03a:1289_14: Micchattaniyatotiādi aññena niyāmena niyatassa aññaniyāmābhāvadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1289_17: Bhabbo bodhisattoti vacanaṃ kevalaṃ bodhisattassa bhabbataṃ dīpeti,
atk-abh03a:1289_20: So hi pubbe ekenapi niyatadhammena aniyato bodhimūle saccadassanena niyāmaṃ okkantoti.
atk-abh03a:1292_2: Tattha suddhassa suddhakiccābhāvato nīvaraṇehi nivuto ophuṭo pariyonaddho ca nīvaraṇaṃ jahatīti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1292_6: Ratto rāgantiādi nivutassa nīvaraṇajahane dosadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1292_7: Parisuddhe pariyodātetiādi vikkhambhanavisuddhiyā visuddhassa samucchedavisuddhidassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1292_8: Tassa evaṃ jānatotiādi jānato passato āsavakkhayaṃ dīpeti,
atk-abh03a:1295_2: Tattha sammukhībhūtoti saṃyojanānaṃ sammukhībhāvaṃ tehi samaṅgībhāvaṃ upagato.
atk-abh03a:1298_4: sā cassa jhānanikanti jhānārammaṇā hotī”ti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1298_8: Taṃ jhānaṃ tassa jhānassa ārammaṇanti pañhesu tasseva tadārammaṇataṃ apassanto suttavirodhabhayena paṭikkhipati,
atk-abh03a:1298_10: So tadassādetīti suttaṃ jhānalābhino jhānā vuṭṭhāya jhānassādaṃ sādheti,
atk-abh03a:1301_2: Tattha “yaṃkiñci vedanaṃ vedeti sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā,
atk-abh03a:1301_3: so taṃ vedanaṃ abhinandati abhivadatī”ti sutte diṭṭhābhinandanavasena vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1301_7: te sandhāya atthi asātarāgoti pucchā sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a:1301_8: Tattha asātarāgoti asāte dukkhavedayite “aho vata me etadeva bhaveyyā”ti rajjanā.
atk-abh03a:1302_1: So taṃ vedanaṃ abhinandatīti sutte pana vinivaṭṭetvā dukkhavedanameva ārabbha rāguppatti nāma natthi,
atk-abh03a:1302_2: samūhaggahaṇena pana vedayitalakkhaṇaṃ dhammaṃ dukkhavedanameva vā attato samanupassanto diṭṭhimaññanāsaṅkhātāya
atk-abh03a:1302_5: dukkhāya vedanāya abhibhūto tassā paṭipakkhaṃ kāmasukhaṃ patthayantopi dukkhavedanaṃ abhinandati nāma.
atk-abh03a:1305_3: dhammataṇhāti imāsu chasu taṇhāsu yasmā sabbapacchimā taṇhā dhammataṇhāti vuttā,
atk-abh03a:1305_9: Kāmataṇhātiādīhi tīhi koṭṭhāsehi chapi taṇhā saṅkhipitvā dassitā.
atk-abh03a:1305_10: Rūpādīsu hi chasu ārammaṇesu kāmassādavasena pavattā taṇhā kāmataṇhā.
atk-abh03a:1305_11: “Bhavissati attā ca loko cā”ti sassatadiṭṭhisahagatā taṇhā bhavataṇhā.
atk-abh03a:1305_13: Nanu sā dhammataṇhāti padaṃ taṇhāya dhammārammaṇaṃ ārabbha pavattiṃ dīpeti,
atk-abh03a:1313_3: akusalaṃ vā kusalassa anantarā uppajjanakaṃ nāma natthīti tesaṃ aññamaññaṃ paṭisandhānaṃ na yujjati.
atk-abh03a:1313_4: Ye pana yasmā ekavatthusmiññeva rajjati virajjati ca,
atk-abh03a:1313_5: tasmā taṃ aññamaññaṃ paṭisandahatīti laddhiṃ gahetvā ṭhitā,
atk-abh03a:1313_11: Bhavaṅgārammaṇato aññasmiṃ ārammaṇe cittaṃ paṇidahati ṭhapetīti paṇidhi.
atk-abh03a:1313_12: Kusalaṃ anāvaṭṭentassāti yaṃ taṃ akusalānantaraṃ paṭisandahantaṃ kusalaṃ uppajjati,
atk-abh03a:1313_14: Itaro pana vinā āvajjanena kusalassa uppattiṃ apassanto paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:1313_15: Kusalaṃ ayoniso manasikarototi idaṃ yadi akusalānantaraṃ kusalaṃ uppajjeyya,
atk-abh03a:1313_16: akusalasseva āvajjanena ayoniso manasikaroto uppajjeyyāti codanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1313_18: Nanu yasmiṃyeva vatthusminti vacanaṃ ekārammaṇe sarāgavirāguppattiṃ dīpeti,
atk-abh03a:1316_2: Tattha upapattesiyena paṭisandhicittena saheva opapātikānaṃ saḷāyatanaṃ uppajjati.
atk-abh03a:1316_5: Tāni ca kho yena kammunā paṭisandhi gahitā,
atk-abh03a:1316_6: tasseva aññassa vā katattāti ayaṃ sakasamaye vādo.
atk-abh03a:1316_7: Yesaṃ pana ekakammasambhavattā sampannasākhāviṭapānaṃ rukkhādīnaṃ aṃkuro viya bījamattaṃ saḷāyatanaṃ
atk-abh03a:1316_12: Sabbaṅgapaccaṅgītiādi saḷāyatane sati evarūpo hutvā okkameyyāti codanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1316_14: Parato mātukucchigatassa pacchā kesāti pucchā sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a:1319_2: Tattha naccagītādīsu rūpadassanasaddasavanādīnaṃ lahuparivattitaṃ disvā “imāni viññāṇāni aññamaññassa anantarā uppajjantī”ti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1319_6: Sotaviññāṇaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃyevāti yadi cakkhuviññāṇassa anantarā uppajjeyya,
atk-abh03a:1319_7: vipākamanodhātu viya rūpārammaṇaṃ siyāti codetuṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1319_8: Cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati sotaviññāṇanti pañhesu suttābhāvena paṭikkhipitvā anantaruppattiṃ sallakkhento laddhivasena paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:1319_9: Taññeva cakkhuviññāṇaṃ taṃ sotaviññāṇanti yathā paṭhamajavanānantaraṃ dutiyajavanaṃ manoviññāṇabhāvena taññeva hoti,
atk-abh03a:1319_10: kiṃ te tathā etampi dvayaṃ ekamevāti pucchati.
atk-abh03a:1319_12: Naccati gāyatītiādivacanaṃ ārammaṇasamodhāne lahuparivattitāya vokiṇṇabhāvaṃ dīpeti,
atk-abh03a:1322_3: tañca kho “sabbaṃ rūpaṃ cattāri ca mahābhūtāni catunnañca mahābhūtānaṃ upādāyarūpa”nti vacanato upādāyarūpanti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1322_5: te sandhāya ariyarūpaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ upādāyāti pucchā sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a:1322_11: Yaṃ kiñci rūpanti suttaṃ ṭhapetvā bhūtāni sesarūpassa upādābhāvaṃ dīpeti,
atk-abh03a:1325_2: Tattha yasmā puthujjano kusalābyākate citte vattamāne sānusayoti vattabbo,
atk-abh03a:1325_6: te sandhāya añño kāmarāgānusayoti pucchā sakavādissa paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a:1325_8: Sānusayotiādi pana tasmiṃ samaye anusayassa appahīnattā sānusayoti vattabbataṃ,
atk-abh03a:1328_2: Tattha yasmā aniccādito manasikarotopi rāgādayo uppajjanti.
atk-abh03a:1331_5: Rūpadhātuarūpadhātupariyāpannāyeva ca nāma hontīti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1331_9: Tattha anusetīti yathā kāmarāgo kāmavitakkasaṅkhātaṃ kāmadhātuṃ sahajātavasena anuseti,
atk-abh03a:1331_10: kiṃ te evaṃ rūparāgo rūpadhātunti pucchati.
atk-abh03a:1331_11: Pariyāpannoti yathā ca so tividhāya kāmadhātuyā kilesakāmavasena pariyāpannattā kāmadhātupariyāpanno,
atk-abh03a:1331_12: kiṃ te evaṃ rūparāgopi rūpadhātupariyāpannoti pucchati.
atk-abh03a:1331_13: Itaro panassa adhippāyaṃ asallakkhento kevalaṃ laddhivasena āmantāti paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:1331_14: Atha naṃ tamatthaṃ sallakkhāpetuṃ kusalavipākakiriyasaṅkhātehi samāpattesiyādīhi saṃsanditvā pucchituṃ samāpattesiyotiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:1331_16: Nanu kāmarāgotiādivacanampi kāmarāgasseva kāmadhātuyaṃ anusayabhāvaṃ pariyāpannatañca dīpeti,
atk-abh03a:1334_2: Tattha vipākakiriyarūpanibbānasaṅkhātaṃ catubbidhaṃ abyākataṃ avipākattā abyākatanti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1334_5: Yesaṃ pana imaṃ vibhāgaṃ aggahetvā purimābyākataṃ viya diṭṭhigatampi abyākatanti laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1334_7: tesaṃ taṃ vibhāgaṃ dassetuṃ diṭṭhigataṃ abyākatanti pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:1337_2: Tattha yasmā puthujjano jhānalābhī kāmesu vītarāgoti vattabbo hoti,
atk-abh03a:1342_4: tesaññeva yasmā ārammaṇānantarasamanantarapaccayena paccayo na hoti,
atk-abh03a:1342_6: so yasmā tesaṃyeva anantarasamanantarapaccayena paccayo na hoti,
atk-abh03a:1345_2: Tattha yesaṃ samaye “avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā”ti ayameva tanti,
atk-abh03a:1345_7: te sandhāya avijjāsaṅkhārādīnaṃ aññamaññapaccayatāpi atthīti dassetuṃ pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:1345_10: Tasmā saṅkhārapaccayāpi avijjāti ettha sahajātaaññamaññaatthiavigatasampayuttavasena paccayatā veditabbā.
atk-abh03a:1345_11: Upādānapaccayāpi taṇhāti ettha ṭhapetvā kāmupādānaṃ sesāni tīṇi upādānāni avijjāya saṅkhārā viya taṇhāya paccayā hontīti veditabbāni.
atk-abh03a:1348_4: kathāvatthūnī”ti suttaṃ nissāya kālasaṅkhāto addhā nāma parinipphanno atthīti yesaṃ laddhi;
atk-abh03a:1348_5: tesaṃ “addhā nāma koci parinipphanno natthi aññatra kālapaññattimattā.
atk-abh03a:1348_6: Rūpādayo pana khandhāva parinipphannā”ti vibhāgaṃ dassetuṃ addhā parinipphannoti pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:1348_9: rūpādīsu anena aññatarena bhavitabba”nti codetuṃ rūpantiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:1351_0: 722-723. Khaṇalayamuhuttakathāsupi eseva nayo. Sabbepi hete khaṇādayo addhāpariyāyā evāti.
atk-abh03a:1354_2: Tattha yasmā catūhi āsavehi uttari añño āsavo nāma natthi,
atk-abh03a:1354_4: tasmā cattāro āsavā anāsavāti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1354_9: evaṃ sante tehi maggādilakkhaṇappattehi bhavitabba”nti codetuṃ maggotiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:1357_2: Tattha jarāmaraṇaṃ nāma aparinipphannattā lokiyanti vā lokuttaranti vā na vattabbaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1357_3: “Lokiyā dhammā lokuttarā dhammā”ti hi duke jarāmaraṇaṃ neva lokiyapade,
atk-abh03a:1357_5: Tattha yesaṃ imaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ anādiyitvā lokuttarānaṃ dhammānaṃ jarāmaraṇaṃ lokuttaranti laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1360_2: Tattha saññāvedayitanirodhasamāpatti nāma na koci dhammo,
atk-abh03a:1360_4: Iti sā neva lokiyā na lokuttarā.
atk-abh03a:1363_1: Idāni yasmā sā lokuttarā na hoti,
atk-abh03a:1366_2: asuko na maraṇadhammo”ti sattānaṃ maraṇadhammatāya niyāmo natthīti saññāvedayitanirodhaṃ samāpannopi kālaṃ kareyyāti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1366_4: tesaṃ samāpannāyapi maraṇadhammatāya maraṇasamayañca amaraṇasamayañca dassetuṃ pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:1366_6: Atha naṃ yasmā kālaṃ karontassa nāma maraṇantikehi phassādīhi bhavitabbaṃ,
atk-abh03a:1367_0: Aphassakassa kālakiriyātiādīni puṭṭho sesasatte sandhāya paṭikkhipati visaṃ kameyyātiādīni puṭṭho samāpattiānubhāvaṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:1367_2: Evaṃ sante pana samāpattiānubhāvo nāma na hoti,
atk-abh03a:1368_2: Atthi so niyāmoti paravādissa pañhe pana yasmā evarūpo niyāmo nāma natthi,
atk-abh03a:1368_11: Yathā pana cakkhuviññāṇasamaṅgissa kālakiriyā na hoti,
atk-abh03a:1371_2: Tattha saññāvirāgavasena pavattabhāvanā asaññasamāpattipi nirodhasamāpattipi saññāvedayitanirodhasamāpatti nāma.
atk-abh03a:1371_3: Iti dve saññāvedayitanirodhasamāpattiyo lokiyā ca lokuttarā ca.
atk-abh03a:1371_7: Imaṃ pana vibhāgaṃ akatvā avisesena saññāvedayitanirodhasamāpatti asaññasattupikāti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1371_11: Atha naṃ yasmā asaññasamāpattiṃ samāpannassa alobhādayo atthi,
atk-abh03a:1372_1: Idhāpi asaññīti pañhe idha saññāvirāgavasena samāpannattā asaññitā anuññātā,
atk-abh03a:1372_3: Tasmā imaṃ paṭiññaṃ gahetvā laddhiṃ patiṭṭhapentena chalena patiṭṭhāpitā hoti.
atk-abh03a:1372_4: Idha vā nirodhasamāpattiṃ sandhāya asaññitā anuññātā.
atk-abh03a:1372_5: Tatrāpi ito cutassa anāgāmino nirodhasamāpattimeva tasmāpi imāya paṭiññāya patiṭṭhāpitā laddhi appatiṭṭhitāyevāti.
atk-abh03a:1375_2: Tattha yesaṃ kammūpacayo nāma kammato añño cittavippayutto abyākato anārammaṇoti laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1375_4: te sandhāya aññaṃ kammanti pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:1375_7: phassāditopi aññena phassūpacayādinā bhavitabba”nti codetuṃ añño phassotiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:1376_1: Kammena sahajātoti pañhesu cittavippayuttaṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipati,
atk-abh03a:1377_1: Sārammaṇoti puṭṭho pana ekantaṃ anārammaṇameva icchati,
atk-abh03a:1377_3: Cittaṃ bhijjamānanti yadā cittaṃ bhijjamānaṃ hoti,
atk-abh03a:1378_4: Tasmiṃ pana kamme niruddhe yāva aṃkuruppādā bījaṃ viya yāva vipākuppādā kammūpacayo tiṭṭhatītissa laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1378_9: so ca yāva vipākuppādā tiṭṭhatītissa laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1378_10: tasmā naṃ tesaṃ tiṇṇampi ekattaṃ pucchati vipāko sārammaṇoti idaṃ vipāko viya vipākadhammadhammopi ārammaṇapaṭibaddhoyevāti codanatthaṃ pucchati.
atk-abh03a:1384_3: te yadi parassa cittaṃ niggaṇhituṃ na sakkuṇeyyuṃ,
atk-abh03a:1384_6: Balappattiyā pana vasībhāvena ca addhā te parassa cittaṃ niggaṇhantīti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1384_8: te sandhāya paro parassāti pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:1387_2: Tattha “bahūnaṃ vata no bhagavā sukhadhammānaṃ upahattā”ti suttaṃ nissāya paro parassa sukhaṃ anuppadetīti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1387_6: Dukkhaṃ anuppadetīti puṭṭho pana tādisaṃ suttapadaṃ apassanto paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:1387_7: Attano sukhantiādipañhe yaṃ attano parassa vā,
atk-abh03a:1387_12: na taṃ anuppadinnaṃ nāma bhavitumarahatīti laddhiyāpaṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:1387_13: No ca vata retitādisassa sukhassa abhāvā vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1387_14: Sukhadhammānaṃ upahattātivacanaṃ bhagavato paresaṃ sukhuppattiyā paccayabhāvaṃ dīpeti,
atk-abh03a:1390_2: Tattha duvidho manasikāro nayato ca ārammaṇato ca.
atk-abh03a:1390_3: Tattha ekasaṅkhārassāpi aniccatāya diṭṭhāya sabbe saṅkhārā aniccāti avasesesu nayato manasikāro hoti.
atk-abh03a:1390_4: Atīte pana saṅkhāre manasikaronto na anāgate manasikātuṃ sakkoti.
atk-abh03a:1390_5: Atītādīsu aññataraṃ manasikaroto ārammaṇato manasikāro hoti.
atk-abh03a:1390_6: Tattha paccuppanne manasikaronto yena cittena te manasikaroti,
atk-abh03a:1390_8: Tattha yesaṃ “sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā”tiādivacanaṃ nissāya “manasikaronto nāma adhigayha adhigaṇhitvā saṅgaṇhitvā
atk-abh03a:1391_0: Atha naṃ yasmā sabbe ekato manasikarontena yena cittena te manasikaroti,
atk-abh03a:1391_2: Tasmā taṃcittatāya codetuṃ tena cittenāti āha.
atk-abh03a:1391_3: Itaro ārammaṇaṃ katvā na sakkā jānitunti sandhāya paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:1391_4: Evaṃlakkhaṇaṃ cittanti ñātattā pana tampi cittaṃ ñātameva hotīti sandhāya paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:1391_5: Atha vā taññeva tassa ārammaṇaṃ na hotīti paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:1391_7: yadā paññāya passatī”tiādīni nissāya uppannaladdhivasena paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:1391_9: Tena phassenātiādīsu pana tathārūpaṃ suttaṃ apassanto paṭikkhipateva.
atk-abh03a:1391_12: Sabbe saṅkhārātiādivacanaṃ nayato dassanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
atk-abh03a:1394_4: Imaṃ pana vibhāgaṃ akatvā “cattāro mahābhūtā hetū”ti vacanamattaṃ nissāya aviseseneva rūpaṃ hetūti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1394_8: Alobho hetūti kiṃ te rūpaṃ alobhasaṅkhāto hetūti pucchati,
atk-abh03a:1394_11: Mahābhūtā upādāyarūpānaṃ upādāyahetūti ettha paccayaṭṭhena hetubhāvo vutto,
atk-abh03a:1399_2: Tattha “kāyakammaṃ vacīkammaṃ kusalampi akusalampī”tivacanaṃ nissāya kāyavacīkammasaṅkhātaṃ kāyaviññattivacīviññattirūpaṃ
atk-abh03a:1399_5: te sandhāya rūpaṃ kusalanti pucchā sakavādissa paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a:1399_7: evaṃvidhena anena bhavitabba”nti codetuṃ sārammaṇanti ādimāha.
atk-abh03a:1402_2: Tattha yaṃ kammassa katattā uppannā cittacetasikā viya kammassa katattā uppannaṃ taṃ rūpampi vipākoti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1405_4: tasmā rūpāvacarārūpāvacarakammānampi katattā rūpena rūpāvacarārūpāvacarena bhavitabbanti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1405_6: te sandhāya atthi rūpaṃ rūpāvacarārūpāvacaranti pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:1408_1: Idāni rūparāgo rūpadhātupariyāpanno arūparāgo arūpadhātupariyāpannoti kathā nāma hoti.
atk-abh03a:1408_3: tasmā rūparāgārūparāgehipi rūpadhātuarūpadhātupariyāpannehi bhavitabbanti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1414_1: Idāni atthi arahato puññūpacayotikathā nāma hoti.
atk-abh03a:1414_2: Tattha yesaṃ arahato dānasaṃvibhāgacetiyavandanādīni kammāni disvā atthi arahato puññūpacayoti laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1414_11: Dānaṃ dadeyyātiādīsu kiriyacittena dānādipavattisabbhāvato sakavādī paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:1414_12: Itaro cittaṃ anādiyitvā kiriyāpavattimattadassaneneva laddhiṃ patiṭṭhapeti.
atk-abh03a:1414_13: Sā pana ayoniso patiṭṭhāpitattā appatiṭṭhāpitā hotīti.
atk-abh03a:1417_1: Idāni natthi arahato akālamaccūtikathā nāma hoti.
atk-abh03a:1417_4: sañcetanikānaṃ kammānaṃ katānaṃ upacitānaṃ apaṭisaṃveditvā byantībhāvaṃ vadāmī”ti suttassa atthaṃ ayoniso
atk-abh03a:1417_12: arahantaghātakena nāma na bhavitabba”nti codetuṃ natthi arahantaghātakoti āha.
atk-abh03a:1417_13: Itaro ānantariyakammassa ceva tādisānañca puggalānaṃ sabbhāvato paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:1418_1: Visaṃ na kameyyāti pañhe “yāva pubbe katakammaṃ parikkhayaṃ na gacchati,
atk-abh03a:1419_2: sañcetanikānaṃ kammānaṃ katānaṃ vipākaṃ apaṭisaṃveditvā avinditvā ananubhavitvā byantībhāvaṃ tesaṃ kammānaṃ parivaṭumaparicchinnabhāvaṃ na vadāmi,
atk-abh03a:1419_5: upapajjavedanīyānaṃ anantaraṃ upapattiṃ upapajjitvāva na tato paraṃ,
atk-abh03a:1419_8: Evaṃ sabbathāpi saṃsārapavatte sati laddhavipākavāre kamme na vijjateso jagatippadeso,
atk-abh03a:1419_10: Evaṃ sante yadetaṃ “aladdhavipākavārampi kammaṃ avassaṃ arahato paṭisaṃveditabba”nti kappanāvasena “natthi
atk-abh03a:1422_2: Tattha “kammunā vattati loko”ti suttaṃ nissāya “sabbamidaṃ kammakilesavipākavaṭṭaṃ kammatova hotī”ti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1422_6: Atha naṃ “evaṃ sante kammampi kammato āpajjatī”ti codetuṃ kammampi kammatoti āha.
atk-abh03a:1422_7: Itaro yadi kammampi kammatova nāma taṃ kammaṃ vipākoyeva siyāti paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:1423_3: tampi purimatare bhave kammatoti kammavipāko sampajjati,
atk-abh03a:1423_4: tena te sabbamidaṃ kammavipākato āpajjatī”ti codetuṃ pucchati.
atk-abh03a:1423_5: Itaro bījato aṃkurasseva paccuppannapavattassa kammato nibbattiṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:1423_6: Dutiyaṃ puṭṭho tassāpi kammassa bījassa purimabījato viya purimakammato pavattattā paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:1423_9: Itaro dussīlyacetanāpi purimakammanibbattā ekena pariyāyena vipākoyevāti laddhiyā paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:1423_10: Atha naṃ “yadi te pāṇātipāto kammavipākato nibbattati,
atk-abh03a:1423_11: pāṇātipāto viya vipākopi saphalo āpajjatī”ti codetuṃ saphaloti āha.
atk-abh03a:1423_12: Itaro pāṇātipātassa nirayasaṃvattanikādibhāvato saphalataṃ passanto paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:1423_13: Kammavipākassa pana idaṃ nāma phalanti vuttaṭṭhānaṃ apassanto paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:1423_16: Kammunā vattatīti suttaṃ “natthi kamma”nti akammavāditaṃ paṭikkhipitvā “atthi kamma”nti kammavāditaṃ kammassakataṃ dīpeti.
atk-abh03a:1426_6: anindriyabaddhaṃ udayabbayapaṭipīḷanaṭṭhena “yadaniccaṃ taṃ dukkha”nti saṅgahitattā dukkhaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1426_7: Imaṃ vibhāgaṃ aggahetvā “yassa pariññāya bhagavati brahmacariyaṃ vussati,
atk-abh03a:1426_11: tesaṃ itarassāpi dukkhabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ indriyabaddhaññevāti pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:1426_13: Atha naṃ “yasmā bhagavatā ‘yadaniccaṃ taṃ dukkha’nti vuttaṃ,
atk-abh03a:1426_14: tasmā indriyabaddheneva tena aniccena bhavitabba”nti codetuṃ indriyabaddhaññeva aniccantiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:1426_15: Nanu anindriyabaddhaṃ aniccanti nanu pathavīpabbatapāsāṇādi anindriyabaddhampi aniccanti attho.
atk-abh03a:1427_1: Na vattabbaṃ indriyabaddhaññeva dukkhanti pañhe āmantāti paṭiññā sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a:1427_3: Uṇhakālasmiñhi aggi sītakāle ca vāto dukkhassa ārammaṇaṃ,
atk-abh03a:1427_5: Tasmā vināpi aniccaṭṭhena anindriyabaddhaṃ dukkhanti vattabbaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1427_6: Kammakilesehi pana anibbattattā dukkhaṃ ariyasaccanti na vattabbaṃ,
atk-abh03a:1427_8: Yasmā pana tiṇakaṭṭhādinirodho vā utubījādinirodho vā dukkhanirodhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ nāma na hoti,
atk-abh03a:1427_10: itaraṃ pana dukkhamevāti idaṃ nānattaṃ dassetuṃ paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:1427_11: Yathā indriyabaddhassātiādivacanaṃ indriyabaddhassa pariññāya brahmacariyavāsaṃ pariññātassa puna anuppattiṃ dīpeti.
atk-abh03a:1427_13: “Yadaniccaṃ taṃ dukkha”nti vacanena pana saṅgahitassa anindriyabaddhassa dukkhabhāvaṃ paṭisedhetuṃ na sakkāti,
atk-abh03a:1430_3: tasmā ṭhapetvā ariyamaggaṃ avasesā saṅkhārā dukkhā”ti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1430_7: Atha naṃ “yadi evaṃ samudayassāpi dukkhabhāvo āpajjatī”ti codetuṃ dukkhasamudayopīti āha.
atk-abh03a:1433_1: Idāni na vattabbaṃ saṅgho dakkhiṇaṃ paṭiggaṇhātītikathā nāma hoti.
atk-abh03a:1433_5: tasmā na vattabbaṃ saṅgho dakkhiṇaṃ paṭiggaṇhātī”ti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1433_7: te sandhāya na vattabbanti pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:1433_10: na naṃ satthā āhuneyyātiādīhi thomeyyā”ti codetuṃ nanu saṅgho āhuneyyotiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:1433_11: Saṅghassa dānaṃ dentīti “ye te saṅghassa denti,
atk-abh03a:1433_12: te paṭiggāhakesu asati kassa dadeyyu”nti codanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1433_13: Āhutiṃ jātavedo vāti suttaṃ parasamayato āgataṃ.
atk-abh03a:1433_19: Maggaphalapātubhāvaparisuddhe pana khandhe upādāya paññattā aṭṭha puggalā saṅgho,
atk-abh03a:1436_1: Idāni na vattabbaṃ saṅgho dakkhiṇaṃ visodhetītikathā nāma hoti.
atk-abh03a:1436_3: na ca tāni dakkhiṇaṃ visodhetuṃ sakkonti,
atk-abh03a:1436_4: tasmā na vattabbaṃ saṅgho dakkhiṇaṃ visodhetī”ti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1436_8: Āhuneyyotiādi “yadi saṅgho dakkhiṇaṃ visodhetuṃ na sakkuṇeyya,
atk-abh03a:1436_9: na naṃ satthā evaṃ thomeyyā”ti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1436_16: appamattikāyapi dakkhiṇāya mahantaṃ phalaṃ pāpuṇantīti attho.
atk-abh03a:1439_1: Idāni na vattabbaṃ saṅgho bhuñjatītikathā nāma hoti.
atk-abh03a:1439_4: tasmā na vattabbaṃ saṅgho bhuñjati, pivati, khādati,
atk-abh03a:1439_10: saṅghabhattādikaraṇaṃ niratthakaṃ bhaveyyā”ti codetuṃ nanu atthi keci saṅghabhattāni karontītiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:1439_13: Aṭṭha pānānīti idampi “yadi saṅgho na piveyya,
atk-abh03a:1439_14: kassetāni pānāni satthā anujāneyyā”ti codanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1442_1: Idāni na vattabbaṃ saṅghassa dinnaṃ mahapphalantikathā nāma hoti.
atk-abh03a:1442_3: na ca sakkā tesaṃ kiñci dātuṃ,
atk-abh03a:1442_5: nāpi tesaṃ dānena koci upakāro ijjhati,
atk-abh03a:1442_6: tasmā na vattabbaṃ saṅghassa dinnaṃ mahapphala”nti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1442_10: Āhuneyyotiādi “yadi saṅghassa dinnaṃ mahapphalaṃ na bhaveyya,
atk-abh03a:1442_11: na naṃ satthā evaṃ thomeyyā”ti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1445_1: Idāni na vattabbaṃ buddhassa dinnaṃ mahapphalantikathā nāma hoti.
atk-abh03a:1445_3: lokānuvattanatthaṃ pana paribhuñjamānaṃ viya attānaṃ dasseti,
atk-abh03a:1445_4: tasmā nirupakārattā na vattabbaṃ tasmiṃ dinnaṃ mahapphala”nti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1445_9: kimaṅgaṃ pana evarūpe aggapuggale”ti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1448_5: paṭiggāhakena vipāko nibbattitoti añño aññassa kārako bhaveyya,
atk-abh03a:1448_11: dāyakasseva cittavisuddhi vipākadāyikā hotī”ti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1448_17: Añño aññassa kārakoti yadi dāyakassa dānacetanā paṭiggāhakena katā bhaveyya,
atk-abh03a:1448_19: Tassa pana dānacetanā parisuddhā paṭiggāhakasaṅkhātaṃ vatthuṃ paṭicca mahāvipākaṭṭhena visujjhati,
atk-abh03a:1453_4: lokaṃ abhibhuyya viharati anupalitto lokenā”ti suttaṃ ayoniso gahetvā “bhagavā tusitabhavane nibbatto tattheva vasati,
atk-abh03a:1453_10: Atha naṃ puṭṭhokāsena ceva suttasādhanena ca saññāpetuṃ nanu atthītiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:1453_11: Loke jātoti paravādī tusitapuraṃ sandhāya vadati.
atk-abh03a:1453_12: Satthārā panetaṃ manussalokaññeva sandhāya lokaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1453_13: Lokaṃ abhibhuyyāti paravādī manussalokaṃ abhibhavitvāti diṭṭhiyā vadati,
atk-abh03a:1453_15: Anupalitto lokenāti paravādī manussalokena anupalittataṃva sandhāya vadati,
atk-abh03a:1453_16: satthā pana lokadhammesu kilesehi anupalitto vihāsi.
atk-abh03a:1456_2: Tattha “tusitapure ṭhito bhagavā dhammadesanatthāya abhinimmitaṃ pesesi,
atk-abh03a:1456_3: tena ceva tassa ca desanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā āyasmatā ānandena dhammo desito,
atk-abh03a:1456_9: sveva satthā bhaveyyā”ti codetuṃ abhinimmito jinotiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:1459_2: Tattha piyāyitānaṃ vatthūnaṃ vipattiyā sarāgānaṃ rāgavasena karuṇāpatirūpikaṃ pavattiṃ disvā “rāgova karuṇā nāma,
atk-abh03a:1459_4: tasmā natthi buddhassa bhagavato karuṇā”ti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1459_8: Atha naṃ “karuṇā nāmesā nikkilesatāya ceva sattārammaṇatāya ca cetovimuttitāya ca ekādasānisaṃsatāya ca mettādīhi samānajātikā,
atk-abh03a:1459_10: mettādayopissa na siyu”nti codanatthaṃ natthi buddhassa bhagavato mettātiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:1459_11: Ākāruṇikoti pañhe tathārūpaṃ vohāraṃ apassanto paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:1462_2: Tattha yesaṃ buddhe bhagavati ayoniso pemavasena “bhagavato uccārapassāvo aññe gandhajāte ativiya adhigaṇhāti,
atk-abh03a:1462_3: natthi tato ca sugandhataraṃ gandhajāta”nti laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1465_2: Tattha yesaṃ buddhe bhagavati ayoniso pemavaseneva “bhagavā sotāpanno hutvā sakadāgāmī,
atk-abh03a:1465_5: ekeneva pana ariyamaggena cattāri phalāni sacchākāsī”ti laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1465_9: Atha naṃ catūhi phalehi saddhiṃ uppannānaṃ catunnaṃ phassādīnaṃ ekato samodhānavasena codetuṃ catunnaṃ phassānantiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:1465_11: Arahattamaggenāti ca vutte tena sakkāyadiṭṭhiādīnaṃ pahānābhāvavasena codeti.
atk-abh03a:1465_12: Bhagavā sotāpannoti buddhabhūtassa sotāpannabhāvo natthīti paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:1468_4: bhikkhu vivicceva kāmehi paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati,
atk-abh03a:1468_7: catutthaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharatī”ti imaṃ paṭipāṭidesanaṃ nissāya “tassa tassa jhānassa upacārappavattiṃ vināva jhānā jhānaṃ saṅkamatī”ti laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1468_11: Atha naṃ “yadi te dutiyajjhānūpacāraṃ appatvā uppaṭipāṭiyā paṭhamajjhānā dutiyajjhānameva saṅkamati,
atk-abh03a:1468_13: dutiyato catutthampi saṅkameyyā”ti codetuṃ paṭhamā jhānātiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:1468_17: Kāme ādīnavatoti paṭhamaṃ kāme ādīnavato manasi karoto pacchā uppajjati.
atk-abh03a:1468_19: Taññeva paṭhamanti “yadi purimajavanato pacchimajavanaṃ viya anantaraṃ uppajjeyya,
atk-abh03a:1468_20: ṭhapetvā purimapacchimabhāvaṃ lakkhaṇato taññeva taṃ bhaveyyā”ti codetuṃ pucchati.
atk-abh03a:1468_22: Vivicceva kāmehītiādīhi paṭipāṭiyā jhānānaṃ desitabhāvaṃ dīpeti,
atk-abh03a:1471_2: Tattha yesaṃ samaye “pañcakanaye pañca jhānāni vibhattāni,
atk-abh03a:1471_3: kevalaṃ tayo samādhī uddiṭṭhā”ti avitakkavicāramattassa samādhino okāsaṃ ajānantānaṃ “paṭhamassa ca dutiyassa
atk-abh03a:1471_4: ca jhānassa antare jhānantarikā nāma esā”ti laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1472_0: Dutiyassa ca jhānassāti “yadi jhānantarikā nāma bhaveyya,
atk-abh03a:1472_3: So kevalaṃ laddhiyā abhāvena paṭikkhipati ceva paṭijānāti ca.
atk-abh03a:1473_1: Savitakko savicārotiādi “tiṇṇampi samādhīnaṃ samādhibhāve samāne avitakko vicāramattova samādhi jhānantariko,
atk-abh03a:1473_2: na itaroti ko ettha visesahetū”ti codanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1474_1: Dvinnaṃ jhānānaṃ paṭuppannānanti paṭhamadutiyāni sandhāya pucchati.
atk-abh03a:1474_2: Itaro “tesaṃ paccuppannānaṃyeva antare avitakko vicāramatto samādhi jhānantariko nāma hotī”ti laddhiyā paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:1474_3: Paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ niruddhanti puṭṭho tiṇṇaṃ ekakkhaṇe pavatti na yuttāti paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:1474_4: Avitakko vicāramatto samādhi paṭhamaṃ jhānanti catukkanayavasena pucchati.
atk-abh03a:1474_5: Sakavādī tasmiṃ naye tassa abhāvā paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:1474_7: yathā tesu tīsu samādhīsu dve samādhī jhānāneva,
atk-abh03a:1477_1: Idāni samāpanno saddaṃ suṇātītikathā nāma hoti.
atk-abh03a:1477_2: Tattha “yasmā paṭhamassa jhānassa saddo kaṇḍako vutto bhagavatā,
atk-abh03a:1477_3: yadi ca samāpanno taṃ na suṇeyya,
atk-abh03a:1477_10: Cakkhunā rūpaṃ passatītiādi “samāpannassa tāva pañcadvārappavattaṃ natthi,
atk-abh03a:1477_11: tasmiṃ asati yadi so saddaṃ suṇeyya,
atk-abh03a:1477_14: Oḷārikena hi saddena sote ghaṭṭite paṭhamajjhānato vuṭṭhānaṃ hoti,
atk-abh03a:1477_17: Dutiyassa jhānassātiādi “yathā aññopi kaṇḍako antosamāpattiyaṃ natthi,
atk-abh03a:1480_1: Idāni cakkhunā rūpaṃ passatītikathā nāma hoti.
atk-abh03a:1480_2: Tattha “cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā”ti vacanaṃ nissāya “pasādacakkhumeva rūpaṃ passatī”ti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1480_7: rūpena rūpaṃ passeyyātī”ti codetuṃ rūpena rūpaṃ passatīti āha.
atk-abh03a:1480_8: Itaro rūpāyatanaṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipitvā puna puṭṭho cakkhumeva sandhāya paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:1480_10: passatīti hi mayaṃ paṭijānanaṃ sandhāya pucchāma,
atk-abh03a:1480_12: Tasmā vadehi tāva “kiṃ te cakkhumā rūpena rūpaṃ paṭivijānātī”ti.
atk-abh03a:1480_13: Itaro purimanayeneva paṭikkhipati ceva paṭijānāti ca.
atk-abh03a:1480_14: Atha naṃ “evaṃ sante rūpaṃ manoviññāṇaṃ āpajjati,
atk-abh03a:1480_15: tañhi paṭivijānāti nāmā”ti codetuṃ rūpaṃ manoviññāṇanti āha.
atk-abh03a:1480_17: Atthi cakkhussa āvaṭṭanātiādi “yadi cakkhu paṭivijānanaṭṭhena passati,
atk-abh03a:1480_18: cakkhuviññāṇassa viya tassāpi āvajjanāya bhavitabba”nti codetuṃ pucchati.
atk-abh03a:1480_24: bhikkhu cakkhunā rūpaṃ passatīti sasambhārakathānayena vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1480_25: Yathā hi usunā vijjhantopi “dhanunā vijjhatī”ti vuccati,
atk-abh03a:1485_3: pahīnakilesassa ca atītāpi kilesā pahīnāva honti,
atk-abh03a:1485_13: Natthi kilese jahatīti imasmiṃ pana paravādissa pañhe yasmā kacavaraṃ pajahantassa kacavare chaḍḍanavāyāmo
atk-abh03a:1485_14: viya kilese pajahantassa na atītādibhedesu kilesesu vāyāmo atthi,
atk-abh03a:1485_15: nibbānārammaṇe pana ariyamagge pavattite kilesā anuppannāyeva nuppajjantīti pahīnā nāma honti,
atk-abh03a:1485_17: Tena hi atīte kilese pajahatītiādi pana yasmā “natthi kilesapajahanā”ti na vattabbaṃ,
atk-abh03a:1488_2: Tattha suññatāti dve suññatā khandhānañca anattalakkhaṇaṃ nibbānañca.
atk-abh03a:1488_3: Tesu anattalakkhaṇaṃ tāva ekaccaṃ ekena pariyāyena siyā saṅkhārakkhandhapariyāpannaṃ, nibbānaṃ,
atk-abh03a:1488_5: Imaṃ pana vibhāgaṃ aggahetvā “suññatā saṅkhārakkhandhapariyāpannā”ti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1488_13: Yassa hi avibhajitvā “ekadeseneva suññatā saṅkhārakkhandhapariyāpannā”ti laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1488_17: Saṅkhārakkhandho na aniccotiādi nibbānasaṅkhātāya suññatāya aniccabhāvāpattidosadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1489_1: Saṅkhārakkhandhassa suññatāti “yadi aññassa khandhassa suññatā aññakkhandhapariyāpannā,
atk-abh03a:1489_3: Saṅkhārakkhandhassa suññatā na vattabbātiādi “yadi saṅkhārakkhandhasuññatā sesakkhandhapariyāpannā na hoti,
atk-abh03a:1489_4: sesakkhandhasuññatāpi saṅkhārakkhandhapariyāpannā na hotī”ti paṭilomadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1490_4: Tattha saṅkhārāti “sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā”ti āgataṭṭhāne viya pañcakkhandhā,
atk-abh03a:1490_5: te ca attattaniyasuññattā suññatāti sāsanāvacaraṃ hoti,
atk-abh03a:1490_8: Yasmā panetaṃ na suññatāya saṅkhārakkhandhapariyāpannabhāvaṃ dīpeti,
atk-abh03a:1493_2: Tattha maggavīthiyampi phalasamāpattivīthiyampi ariyamaggassa vipākacittaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ nāmāti sakasamaye sanniṭṭhānaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1493_3: Yesaṃ pana tathā aggahetvā “kilesapahānañceva phaluppatti ca sāmaññaphalaṃ,
atk-abh03a:1493_8: Sesamettha heṭṭhā vuttanayattā yathā pāḷimeva niyyātīti.
atk-abh03a:1496_9: Na vattabbantiādi yāya laddhiyā patti asaṅkhatāti maññati,
atk-abh03a:1496_11: Tattha sakavādī “na hevaṃ vattabbe”ti paṭikkhipanto kevalaṃ pattiyā rūpādibhāvaṃ na sampaṭicchati.
atk-abh03a:1496_12: Na hi patti nāma koci dhammo atthi,
atk-abh03a:1496_14: Itaro pana paṭikkhepamatteneva asaṅkhatāti laddhiṃ patiṭṭhapeti,
atk-abh03a:1499_2: Tattha yesaṃ “rūpādīnaṃ sabbadhammānaṃ rūpādisabhāvatāsaṅkhātā tathatā nāma atthi,
atk-abh03a:1499_3: sā ca saṅkhatesu rūpādīsu apariyāpannattā asaṅkhatā”ti laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1502_4: Ayaṃ nayo ṭhapetvā akusalaṃ sabbadhamme bhajati.
atk-abh03a:1502_5: Iṭṭhavipākaṃ nāma āyatiṃ upapattipavattesu iṭṭhaphalanipphādakaṃ puññaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1502_7: Yesaṃ pana imaṃ vibhāgaṃ aggahetvā anavajjabhāvamatteneva nibbānaṃ kusalanti laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1502_9: tesaṃ iṭṭhavipākaṭṭhena nibbānassa kusalatābhāvaṃ dīpetuṃ pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:1505_2: Tattha yesaṃ “sakiṃ nimuggo nimuggova hotī”ti suttaṃ nissāya “atthi puthujjanassa accantaniyāmatā”ti laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1505_6: Mātughātakotiādi “niyatamicchādiṭṭhikassa ca mātughātakādīnañca samāne micchattaniyāme mātughātakādīhipi
atk-abh03a:1505_8: Itaro “niyatamicchādiṭṭhiko saṃsārakhāṇuko bhavantarepi niyatova ime pana ekasmiññeva attabhāve”ti laddhiyā na hevanti paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:1506_1: Vicikicchā uppajjeyyāti “ayaṃ niyato vā no vā”ti evaṃ uppajjeyyāti pucchati.
atk-abh03a:1506_3: Nuppajjeyyāti puṭṭho pana yaṃ diṭṭhiṃ āsevanto niyāmaṃ okkanto,
atk-abh03a:1506_5: Tato pahīnāti puṭṭho maggena appahīnattā paṭikkhipati,
atk-abh03a:1506_7: Atha naṃ yasmā pahānaṃ nāma vinā ariyamaggena natthi,
atk-abh03a:1506_10: Puna katamenāti puṭṭho micchāmaggaṃ sandhāya akusalenātiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:1507_2: Itaro yasmā “yepi te okkalā vayabhiññā natthikavādā akiriyavādā ahetukavādā”ti vacanato tissopi niyatamicchādiṭṭhiyo ekassa uppajjanti,
atk-abh03a:1508_1: Atha naṃ “na ca nāma so accantaniyāmo”ti codetuṃ hañcītiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:1508_3: Nuppajjeyyāti pañhe yaṃ sassatadiṭṭhiyā sassatanti gahitaṃ,
atk-abh03a:1508_4: tadeva ucchijjissatīti gahetvā anuppattiṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:1509_4: Imasmiññeva hi bhave abhabbo so taṃ diṭṭhiṃ pajahitunti ayamettha adhippāyo,
atk-abh03a:1509_6: Sabbakālaṃ ummujjitvā nimujjatītiādi vacanamatte abhinivesaṃ akatvā attho pariyesitabboti dassanatthaṃ vuttanti.
atk-abh03a:1512_2: Tattha lokiyā saddhā saddhā eva nāma,
atk-abh03a:1512_10: Natthi lokiyā saddhātiādi yasmā lokiyāpi saddhādayova dhammā adhipatiyaṭṭhena indriyaṃ,
atk-abh03a:1512_11: na saddhādīhi aññaṃ saddhindriyādi nāma atthi,
atk-abh03a:1512_13: Atthi lokiyo manotiādi yathā te lokiyāpi manādayo dhammā manindriyādīni,
atk-abh03a:1512_14: evaṃ lokiyā saddhādayopi saddhindriyānīti upamāya tassatthassa vibhāvanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1517_3: tasmā asañciccāpi tesu vatthūsu vikopitesu ānantariko hotī”ti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1517_9: avasesā pāṇātipātādayopi asañcicca bhaveyyu”nti codanatthaṃ asañciccapāṇaṃ hantvātiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:1517_13: rogapaṭikārādikāle asañcicca ghātaṃ sandhāya paṭiññā sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a:1517_14: Nanu mātā jīvitā voropitāti pañhepi asañcicca voropitaṃ sandhāya paṭiññā sakavādisseva.
atk-abh03a:1517_15: Evaṃ adhippāyaṃ pana aggahetvā hañcīti laddhipatiṭṭhāpanaṃ itarassa.
atk-abh03a:1517_18: Saṅghabhedake pana dhammasaññiṃ sandhāya saṅghabhedo ānantarikoti pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:1517_20: kappaṃ nirayamhi paccatī”ti vacanaṃ ayoniso gahetvā paṭiññā paravādissa.
atk-abh03a:1517_21: Puna sabbeti puṭṭho sakapakkhe dhammasaññiṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipati,
atk-abh03a:1517_24: Nanu vuttaṃ bhagavatāti suttaṃ ekanteneva dhammavādissa ānantarikabhāvadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1517_26: Itaro pana adhippāyaṃ aggahetvā laddhiṃ patiṭṭhapeti.
atk-abh03a:1520_4: Lokiyaṃ samāpattiñāṇampi hoti dānādivasena pavattaṃ kammassakatañāṇampi;
atk-abh03a:1520_6: Imaṃ pana vibhāgaṃ akatvā “saccaparicchedakameva ñāṇaṃ na itaraṃ,
atk-abh03a:1520_7: tasmā natthi puthujjanassa ñāṇa”nti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1523_3: natthi nirayapālā nāma sattā”ti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1523_7: Atha naṃ “yadi tattha nirayapālā na siyuṃ,
atk-abh03a:1523_9: Kāraṇikesu hi sati kāraṇā”ti codetuṃ natthi nirayesūtiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:1524_2: Yathā hi manussesu sati kāraṇikesu kāraṇā,
atk-abh03a:1524_6: Na vessabhū nopi ca pettirājāti paravādinā sakasamayato suttaṃ ābhataṃ.
atk-abh03a:1524_12: attano kammehi ito paṇunnaṃ paralokaṃ pattaṃ purisaṃ na ete vessabhūādayo hananti.
atk-abh03a:1524_13: Yehi pana so kammehi tattha paṇunno,
atk-abh03a:1524_14: tāni sakāni kammāniyeva naṃ tattha hanantīti kammassakataṃ dīpeti,
atk-abh03a:1527_2: Tattha devesu erāvaṇādayo devaputtā hatthivaṇṇaṃ assavaṇṇaṃ vikubbanti,
atk-abh03a:1527_4: Yesaṃ pana tiracchānavaṇṇino devaputte disvā “atthi devesu tiracchānagatā”ti laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1527_9: tiracchānayoniyampi devā siyu”nti codetuṃ atthi tiracchānagatesūtiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:1527_12: Erāvaṇoti pañhe tassa atthitāya paṭiññā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:1530_2: Tattha yesaṃ “pubbeva kho panassa kāyakammaṃ vacīkammaṃ ājīvo suparisuddho hotī”ti idañceva suttaṃ sammāvācākammantājīvānañca
atk-abh03a:1530_8: sā ca na maggotiādi parasamayavasena vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1530_10: Rūpattā pana maggo na hotīti vaṇṇitā.
atk-abh03a:1530_11: Sammādiṭṭhi maggaṅgantiādi maggaṅgassa amaggatā nāma natthīti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1530_12: Pubbeva kho panassāti sutte parisuddhasīlassa maggabhāvanā nāma hoti,
atk-abh03a:1530_13: na itarassāti āgamaniyapaṭipadāya visuddhibhāvadassanatthaṃ “kāyakammaṃ vacīkammaṃ ājīvo suparisuddho hotī”ti vuttaṃ,
atk-abh03a:1530_15: Tenevāha “evamassāyaṃ ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchatī”ti.
atk-abh03a:1533_2: Tattha dhammacakkappavattane dvādasākārañāṇaṃ sandhāya “dvādasavatthukaṃ ñāṇaṃ lokuttara”nti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1533_9: ekekasmiṃ sacce saccañāṇakiccañāṇakatañāṇānaṃ vasena ñāṇanānattaṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:1533_11: Nanu vuttaṃ bhagavatāti suttaṃ saddhiṃ pubbabhāgaparabhāgehi ñāṇanānattaṃ dīpeti,
atk-abh03a:1539_2: Tattha tisso saṅgītiyo sandhāya “sāsanaṃ navaṃ kata”nti ca “atthi koci tathāgatassa sāsanaṃ navaṃ karotī”ti
atk-abh03a:1539_3: ca “labbhā tathāgatassa sāsanaṃ navaṃ kātu”nti ca yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1539_5: te sandhāya tīsupi kathāsu pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:1539_7: Satipaṭṭhānātiādi sāsanaṃ nāma satipaṭṭhānādayo ceva ariyadhammā,
atk-abh03a:1539_10: ṭhapetvā te aññesaṃ vā satipaṭṭhānādīnaṃ karaṇena akusalādīnaṃ vā kusalādibhāvakaraṇena sāsanaṃ navaṃkataṃ nāma bhaveyya,
atk-abh03a:1539_13: labbhā vā evaṃ kātunti tīsupi pucchāsu codanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1542_2: Tattha yassa puggalassa yo dhammo paccuppanno,
atk-abh03a:1542_3: so tena avivitto nāmāti idaṃ sakasamaye sanniṭṭhānaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1542_4: Yasmā pana puthujjanena tedhātukā dhammā apariññātā,
atk-abh03a:1542_5: tasmā so ekakkhaṇeyeva sabbehipi tedhātukehi dhammehi avivittoti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1542_9: Phassehītiādi sabbesaṃ phassādīnaṃ ekakkhaṇe pavattidosadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1545_2: Tattha yasmā arahā sabbaṃ buddhavisayaṃ na jānāti,
atk-abh03a:1545_3: tasmā tassa tattha avijjāvicikicchāhi appahīnāhi bhavitabbanti saññāya “atthi kiñci saññojanaṃ appahāya arahattappattī”ti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1545_7: Atthi kiñci sakkāyadiṭṭhītiādi arahato sabbasaṃyojanappahānadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1545_8: Sabbaṃ buddhavisayanti pañhadvaye arahato sabbaññutaññāṇābhāvena paṭisedho kato,
atk-abh03a:1545_10: Itaro pana tesaṃ appahīnataṃ sandhāya tena hīti laddhiṃ patiṭṭhapeti.
atk-abh03a:1548_5: Sabhāgasantatiṃ pana parivattetvā visabhāgasantatikaraṇe vā sabhāgasantativaseneva ciratarappavattane vā yesaṃ atthāya kariyati,
atk-abh03a:1548_6: tesaṃ puññādīni kāraṇāni nissāya katthaci ijjhati,
atk-abh03a:1548_7: bhikkhūnaṃ atthāya pānīyassa sappikhīrādikaraṇe viya mahādhātunidhāne dīpādīnaṃ cirasantānappavattane viya cāti idaṃ sakasamaye sanniṭṭhānaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1548_8: Yaṃ pana āyasmā pilindavaccho rañño pāsādaṃ suvaṇṇantveva adhimucci,
atk-abh03a:1548_11: te sandhāya atthi adhippāyaiddhīti pucchā sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a:1548_15: Atha naṃ aniccādīnaṃ niccāditāya anuyuñjituṃ niccapaṇṇā rukkhā hontūtiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:1548_17: Laddhipatiṭṭhāpane suvaṇṇo ca panāsīti rañño puññūpanissayena āsi,
atk-abh03a:1551_2: Tattha ṭhapetvā tasmiṃ tasmiṃ kāle sarīravemattataṃ āyuvemattataṃ pabhāvemattatañca sesehi buddhadhammehi buddhānaṃ buddhehi hīnātirekatā nāma natthi.
atk-abh03a:1551_5: te sandhāya atthi buddhānanti pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:1551_8: Itaro tesaṃ vasena hīnātirekataṃ apassanto paṭikkhipatiyevāti.
atk-abh03a:1554_2: Tattha catūsu disāsu heṭṭhā uparīti samantato lokadhātusannivāsaṃ,
atk-abh03a:1554_3: sabbalokadhātūsu ca buddhā atthīti attano vikappasippaṃ uppādetvā “sabbadisāsu buddhā tiṭṭhantī”ti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1554_8: Puna puṭṭho laddhivasena aññalokadhātuyaṃ ṭhitaṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:1557_2: Tattha yasmā rūpādayo rūpādisabhāvena niyatā na taṃ sabhāvaṃ vijahanti,
atk-abh03a:1557_5: te sandhāya sabbe dhammāti pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:1557_9: ito añño niyāmo nāma natthī”ti codetuṃ micchattaniyatātiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:1557_10: Tattha paṭikkhepo ca paṭiññā ca paravādissa.
atk-abh03a:1557_21: Vedanādīhi panassa nānattapaññāpanatthaṃ esa vohāro hotīti.
atk-abh03a:1557_22: Tasmā “rūpaṃ rūpaṭṭhena niyata”nti vadantena rūpaṃ niyatanti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-abh03a:1557_23: Niyatañca nāma micchattaniyataṃ vā siyā sammattaniyataṃ vā,
atk-abh03a:1557_27: Rūpaṃ rūpaṭṭhena niyatanti ettha hi rūpaṃ rūpameva,
atk-abh03a:1557_30: Ito aññathā panassa niyatattaṃ natthīti puna teneva nayena codetuṃ micchattaniyatantiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:1557_32: Tena hi rūpanti laddhipi ayoniso patiṭṭhāpitattā appatiṭṭhitāva hotīti.
atk-abh03a:1560_3: tasmā sabbe kammā niyatā”ti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1560_8: Sace diṭṭheva dhamme vipākaṃ dātuṃ sakkoti deti,
atk-abh03a:1560_9: no ce ahosikammaṃ nāma hotīti imamatthaṃ sandhāya paṭiññā sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a:1560_10: Micchattasammattaniyāmavasena panetaṃ aniyatamevāti sabbaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbanti.
atk-abh03a:1565_3: tasmā atthi kiñci saṃyojanaṃ appahāya parinibbāna”nti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1568_2: Tattha yasmā arahā sativepullappatto parinibbāyantopi sato sampajānova parinibbāti,
atk-abh03a:1568_7: Atha naṃ yasmā kusalacitto nāma puññābhisaṅkhārābhisaṅkharaṇādivasena hoti,
atk-abh03a:1568_10: Sato sampajānoti idaṃ javanakkhaṇe kiriyasatisampajaññānaṃ vasena asammohamaraṇadīpanatthaṃ vuttaṃ,
atk-abh03a:1571_2: Tattha bhagavā catutthajjhāne ṭhito parinibbāyīti sallakkhetvā “arahā āneñje ṭhito parinibbāyatī”ti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1571_7: Sabbe hi saññino sattā bhavaṅgacitte ṭhatvā bhavaṅgapariyosānena cuticittena kālaṃ karonti.
atk-abh03a:1571_8: Iti naṃ iminā atthena codetuṃ evamāha.
atk-abh03a:1571_9: Tattha kiñcāpi catuvokārabhave arahato pakaticittampi āneñjaṃ hoti,
atk-abh03a:1571_11: Tasmā no ca vata re vattabbeti āha.
atk-abh03a:1574_2: Tattha atītabhave sotāpannaṃ mātukucchiyaṃ vasitvā nikkhantaṃ disvā “atthi gabbhaseyyāya dhammābhisamayo”ti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1574_7: dhammābhisamayassa kāraṇehi dhammadesanādīhi bhavitabba”nti codetuṃ atthi gabbhaseyyāya dhammadesanātiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:1574_12: kammaṭṭhānapariggāhakānaṃ satisampajaññānaṃ abhāvā muṭṭhassati asampajāno nāma hoti,
atk-abh03a:1577_2: Tattha acirajātānaṃ pana sotāpannānaṃ arahattappattiṃ suppavāsāya ca upāsikāya sattavassikaṃ gabbhaṃ
atk-abh03a:1577_3: disvā “atthi gabbhaseyyāya arahattappattī”ti ca supine ākāsagamanādīni disvā “atthi dhammābhisamayo”ti
atk-abh03a:1577_4: ca “atthi tattha arahattappattī”ti ca idhāpi yesaṃ laddhiyo,
atk-abh03a:1580_4: sā ca kho abbohārikā”ti vacanato “sabbaṃ supinagatassa cittaṃ abyākata”nti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1580_9: Supinagatassa cittaṃ abbohārikanti idaṃ āpattiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1580_10: Supinagatassa hi pāṇātipātādivasena kiñcāpi akusalacittaṃ pavattati,
atk-abh03a:1580_11: vatthuvikopanaṃ pana natthīti na sakkā tattha āpattiṃ paññapetuṃ.
atk-abh03a:1583_3: na koci muhuttampi ṭhatvā āsevanapaccayaṃ āsevati nāma.
atk-abh03a:1583_5: Āsevanapaccayatāya uppannaṃ pana na kiñci atthīti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1583_9: Atha naṃ suttavaseneva paññāpetuṃ nanu vuttaṃ bhagavatā pāṇātipātotiādi ābhataṃ.
atk-abh03a:1586_4: Samānāya hi aniccatāya eko lahuṃ bhijjati,
atk-abh03a:1586_5: eko cirenāti ko ettha niyāmoti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1586_9: Citte mahāpathavītiādīsu tesaṃ tathā saṇṭhānaṃ apassanto paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:1586_11: cakkhāyatanādīni cakkhuviññāṇādīhi saddhiṃyeva uppajjitvā nirujjheyyu”nti codanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1586_12: Itaro pana antomātukucchigatassa viññāṇuppattiṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipati,
atk-abh03a:1586_15: Tena hi ekacittakkhaṇikāti yasmā niccā na honti,
atk-abh03a:1586_16: tasmā ekacittakkhaṇikāti attano ruciyā kāraṇaṃ vadati.
atk-abh03a:1591_2: Tattha kāruññena vā ekena adhippāyena ekādhippāyo,
atk-abh03a:1591_3: saṃsāre vā ekato bhavissāmāti itthiyā saddhiṃ buddhapūjādīni katvā paṇidhivasena eko adhippāyo assāti ekādhippāyo.
atk-abh03a:1591_4: Evarūpo dvinnampi janānaṃ ekādhippāyo methuno dhammo paṭisevitabboti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1594_2: Tattha iriyāpathasampanne ākappasampanne pāpabhikkhū disvā “arahantānaṃ vaṇṇena amanussā methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevantī”ti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1597_14: Itaro pana paṭhamapañhe bhāvanāmayaṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:1597_16: Tatiyakathāyaṃ issariyakāmakārikāhetu nāma dukkarakārikā micchādiṭṭhiyā kariyati.
atk-abh03a:1597_18: sassatādīnipi gaṇheyyāti codanatthaṃ sassato lokotiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1600_2: Tattha mettākaruṇāmuditāyo sandhāya “na rāgo rāgapatirūpako”ti ca issāmacchariyakukkuccāni sandhāya “na
atk-abh03a:1600_3: doso dosapatirūpako”ti ca hasituppādaṃ sandhāya “na moho mohapatirūpako”ti ca dummaṅkūnaṃ puggalānaṃ
atk-abh03a:1600_4: niggahaṃ pesalānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ anuggahaṃ pāpagarahitaṃ kalyāṇapasaṃsaṃ āyasmato pilindavacchassa vasalavādaṃ
atk-abh03a:1600_5: bhagavato kheḷāsakavādaṃ moghapurisavādañca sandhāya “na kileso kilesapatirūpako”ti ca yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1600_9: Atha naṃ yasmā phassādipatirūpakā naphassādayo nāma natthi,
atk-abh03a:1600_10: tasmā rāgādipatirūpakā narāgādayopi natthīti codetuṃ atthi na phassotiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:1604_0: “Dukkhameva hi sambhoti, dukkhaṃ tiṭṭhati veti ca;
atk-abh03a:1605_0: Nāññatra dukkhā sambhoti, nāññaṃ dukkhā nirujjhatī”ti. –
atk-abh03a:1606_3: te sandhāya rūpaṃ aparinipphannanti pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:1606_6: na aniccādisabhāvaṃ siyā”ti codetuṃ rūpaṃ na aniccantiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:1606_8: Sakavādī nanu rūpaṃ aniccantiādi vacanena tassa ekaṃ laddhiṃ paṭisedhetvā dutiyaṃ pucchanto dukkhaññeva parinipphannantiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:1606_9: Athassa tampi laddhiṃ paṭisedhetuṃ na yadaniccantiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:1606_18: taṃ no vata re vattabbe “dukkhaññeva parinipphanna”nti.
atk-abh03a:1606_20: Dhammāyatanadhammadhātūsu pana ṭhapetvā nibbānaṃ sesadhammānaṃ vasena aniccatā veditabbā.
atk-abh03a:1611_0: Paṇṇāsakehi catūhi, tīhi vaggehi ceva ca;
atk-abh03a:1614_0: Yaṃ jino desayi tassa, niṭṭhitā atthavaṇṇanā.
atk-abh03a:1617_0: Yaṃ pattaṃ kusalaṃ tena, lokoyaṃ sanarāmaro;
atk-abh03a:1629_0: Idāni yasmā tasmāssa, hoti saṃvaṇṇanā ayanti.
atk-abh03a:1632_10: indriyayamakanti imesaṃ dasannaṃ yamakānaṃ vasena idaṃ pakaraṇaṃ dasavidhena vibhattanti hi vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1632_11: Tattha yesaṃ dasannaṃ yamakānaṃ vasena idaṃ pakaraṇaṃ dasavidhena vibhattaṃ,
atk-abh03a:1632_12: tesañceva imassa ca pakaraṇassa nāmattho tāva evaṃ veditabbo –
atk-abh03a:1632_18: Iti yugaḷasaṅkhātānaṃ yamakānaṃ vasena desitattā imesu dasasu ekekaṃ yamakaṃ nāma.
atk-abh03a:1632_19: Imesaṃ pana yamakānaṃ samūhabhāvato sabbampetaṃ pakaraṇaṃ yamakanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1633_0: Tattha mūlavasena pucchāvissajjanaṃ katvā desitattā dasannaṃ tāva sabbapaṭhamaṃ mūlayamakanti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1633_7: sabbe te dhammā kusalāti idaṃ yamakaṃ ādi.
atk-abh03a:1633_8: Tassa kusalākusalamūlasaṅkhātānaṃ dvinnaṃ atthānaṃ vasena atthayamakanti vā,
atk-abh03a:1633_9: tesaññeva atthānaṃ vasena anulomapaṭilomato pavattapāḷidhammavasena dhammayamakanti vā,
atk-abh03a:1633_10: anulomapaṭilomato pavattapucchāvasena pucchāyamakanti vā tidhā yamakabhāvo veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:1634_0: Idāni imesaṃ yamakānaṃ vasena desite imasmiṃ mūlayamake uddesavārassa tāva nayayamakapucchāatthavārappabhedavasena
atk-abh03a:1634_2: kusalattikamātikāya hi ‘kusalā dhammā’ti idaṃ ādipadaṃ nissāya mūlanayo,
atk-abh03a:1634_10: ekekasmiṃ yamake anulomapaṭilomavasena dve dve pucchāti catuvīsati pucchā,
atk-abh03a:1634_11: ekekāya pucchāya sanniṭṭhānasaṃsayavasena dve dve atthāti aṭṭhacattālīsa atthāti.
atk-abh03a:1635_0: Tattha ye keci kusalā dhammāti kusalesu “kusalā nu kho,
atk-abh03a:1635_1: na kusalā nu kho”ti sandehābhāvato imasmiṃ pade sanniṭṭhānattho veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:1635_2: Sabbe te kusalamūlāti “sabbe te kusalā dhammā kusalamūlā nu kho,
atk-abh03a:1635_3: nanu kho”ti evaṃ vimativasena pucchitattā imasmiṃ pade saṃsayattho veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:1635_4: So ca kho veneyyānaṃ saṃsayaṭṭhāne saṃsayadīpanatthaṃ vutto,
atk-abh03a:1636_0: Yathā ca kusalapadaṃ nissāya ime cattāro nayā,
atk-abh03a:1636_1: ekekasmiṃ naye tiṇṇaṃ tiṇṇaṃ yamakānaṃ vasena dvādasa yamakāni,
atk-abh03a:1636_2: ekekasmiṃ yamake dvinnaṃ dvinnaṃ pucchānaṃ vasena catuvīsati pucchā;
atk-abh03a:1636_3: ekekāya pucchāya dvinnaṃ dvinnaṃ atthānaṃ vasena aṭṭhacattālīsa atthā ca honti.
atk-abh03a:1636_6: Tīṇipi padāni ekato katvā niddiṭṭhaṃ nāmapadaṃ nissāyapi tathevāti kusalattikamātikāya catūsu padesu sabbepi soḷasa nayā,
atk-abh03a:1636_9: dvenavutisataṃ atthā ca uddesavasena vuttāti veditabbā.
atk-abh03a:1636_10: Ettāvatā mūlavāro nāma paṭhamaṃ uddiṭṭho hoti.
atk-abh03a:1637_0: Tato paraṃ ye keci kusalā dhammā,
atk-abh03a:1637_1: sabbe te kusalahetūtiādayo tasseva mūlavārassa vevacanavasena nava vārā uddiṭṭhā.
atk-abh03a:1637_11: Tattha mūlavāre āgataparicchedeneva sesesupi nayādayo veditabbāti sabbesupi dasasu vāresu saṭṭhisatanayā,
atk-abh03a:1637_14: vīsādhikāni ekūnavīsati atthasatāni ca uddiṭṭhānīti veditabbāni.
atk-abh03a:1637_15: Evaṃ tāva uddesavāre nayayamakapucchāatthavārappabhedavasena pāḷivavatthānameva veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1638_0: Mūlaṃ hetu nidānañcāti gāthā dasannampi vārānaṃ uddānagāthā nāma.
atk-abh03a:1638_4: naṃ gaṇhāthā’ti dassentaṃ viya attano phalaṃ nidetīti nidānaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1638_11: Etaṃ paṭicca appaṭikkhipitvā phalaṃ eti pavattatīti paccayo.
atk-abh03a:1641_1: Idāni yekeci kusalā dhammātiādinā nayena niddesavāro āraddho.
atk-abh03a:1641_3: Kusalā dhammāti kusalattikassa padabhājane vuttalakkhaṇā anavajjasukhavipākā kusalasabhāvā.
atk-abh03a:1641_4: Sabbe te kusalamūlāti kiṃ te sabbeyeva kusalamūlāti pucchati.
atk-abh03a:1641_5: Tīṇeva kusalamūlānīti na te sabbe kusalamūlāni,
atk-abh03a:1641_6: alobhādīni pana tīṇi eva kusalamūlānīti attho.
atk-abh03a:1641_7: Avasesā kusalā dhammā na kusalamūlāti avasesā phassādayo kusalā dhammā kusalamūlāni nāma na honti.
atk-abh03a:1641_8: Atha vā avasesā phassādayo kusalā dhammāyeva nāma,
atk-abh03a:1641_10: Ye vā pana kusalamūlāti ye vā pana paṭhamapucchāya dutiyapadena kusalamūlāti tayo alobhādayo gahitā.
atk-abh03a:1641_11: Sabbe te dhammā kusalāti kiṃ te sabbe tayopi dhammā kusalāti pucchati.
atk-abh03a:1641_12: Āmantāti sabbesampi kusalamūlānaṃ kusalabhāvaṃ sampaṭicchanto āha.
atk-abh03a:1642_1: Ekamūlayamake tāva sabbe te kusalamūlena ekamūlāti gaṇanaṭṭhena ekamūlakaṃ aggahetvā samānaṭṭhena gahetabbā.
atk-abh03a:1642_6: Atha nesaṃ tathābhāvaṃ sampaṭicchanto āmantāti āha.
atk-abh03a:1642_9: Yatheva hi phassādīnaṃ alobhādayo hetupaccayattā mūlaṃ,
atk-abh03a:1643_1: Aññamaññayamake ‘yekeci kusalā’ti apucchitvā yekeci kusalamūlena ekamūlāti pucchā katā. Kasmā?
atk-abh03a:1643_7: Aññamaññamūlāni cāti aññamaññaṃ hetupaccayena paccayā hontīti attho.
atk-abh03a:1643_8: Tasseva paṭilomapucchāya ‘sabbe te dhammā kusalamūlena ekamūlā’ti avatvā sabbe te dhammā kusalāti vuttaṃ. Kasmā?
atk-abh03a:1643_10: Kusalamūlena ekamūlāti hi pucchāya katāya ‘mūlāni yāni ekato uppajjantī’ti heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva vissajjanaṃ kātabbaṃ bhaveyya,
atk-abh03a:1643_12: Tasmā tathā akatvā evaṃ pucchā katā.
atk-abh03a:1643_13: Iminā upāyena mūlamūlanayādīsupi aññamaññamūlayamake pucchāviseso veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:1644_1: Mūlamūlanaye sabbe te kusalamūlamūlāti sabbe te kusalamūlasaṅkhātā mūlāti pucchati.
atk-abh03a:1644_2: Ekamūlamūlāti samānaṭṭhena ekameva mūlamūlaṃ etesanti ekamūlamūlā.
atk-abh03a:1645_0: 56. Mūlakanaye kusalamūlakāti hetupaccayaṭṭhena kusalaṃ mūlaṃ etesanti kusalamūlakā.
atk-abh03a:1646_3: Ayaṃ tāva kusalapadaṃ nissāya nayayamakapucchāsu visesattho.
atk-abh03a:1647_3: ahetukaṃ akusalanti vicikicchāya ceva uddhaccena ca sampayuttaṃ mohaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1648_3: Abyākatamūlena na ekamūlanti idha pana ṭhapetvā sahetukaabyākatasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ,
atk-abh03a:1648_6: taṃ abbohārikaṃ katvā ekato labbhamānakavaseneva cetaṃ vissajjanaṃ kataṃ.
atk-abh03a:1649_5: Ahetukaṃ nāmaṃ nāmamūlena na ekamūlanti ahetukaṃ sabbampi aṭṭhārasa cittuppādavicikicchuddhaccasampayuttamohanibbānasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-abh03a:1649_7: Na hi taṃ tena saddhiṃ uppajjati.
atk-abh03a:1649_8: Sahetukaṃ nāmaṃ nāmamūlenāti padepi sahetukaṃ nāmaṃ nāmamūlenāti attho.
atk-abh03a:1651_2: Mūlaṃ hetu nidānañcātigāthā yathāniddiṭṭhānaṃ dasannampi vārānaṃ puna uddānavaseneva vuttāti.
atk-abh03a:1655_1: Idāni mūlayamake desiteyeva kusalādidhamme khandhavasena saṅgaṇhitvā mūlayamakānantaraṃ desitassa khandhayamakassa vaṇṇanā hoti.
atk-abh03a:1655_7: Tesu paṇṇattivāro khandhānaṃ nāmābhidhānasodhanavaseneva gatattā paṇṇattivāroti vuccati.
atk-abh03a:1655_8: Pavattivāro tena sodhitanāmābhidhānānaṃ khandhānaṃ uppādanirodhavasena pavattiṃ sodhayamāno gato,
atk-abh03a:1655_10: Pariññāvāro iminānukkamena pavattānaṃ khandhānaṃ saṅkhepeneva tisso pariññā dīpayamāno gato,
atk-abh03a:1655_15: Tattha pañcakkhandhātipadaṃ ādiṃ katvā yāva na khandhā,
atk-abh03a:1655_16: na saṅkhārāti padaṃ tāva paṇṇattivārassa uddesavāro veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:1655_18: Tattha pañcakkhandhāti ayaṃ yamakavasena pucchitabbānaṃ khandhānaṃ uddeso.
atk-abh03a:1656_6: rūpakkhandho rūpantiādinā nayena padameva sodhetvā gato padasodhanavāro nāma.
atk-abh03a:1656_13: Tato paraṃ tesaññeva padasodhanavāre sodhitānaṃ khandhānaṃ ‘rūpaṃ rūpakkhandho,
atk-abh03a:1656_14: khandhā vedanākkhandho’tiādinā nayena ekekakhandhamūlakāni cattāri cattāri cakkāni bandhitvā gato padasodhanamūlakānaṃ
atk-abh03a:1656_18: khandhā vedanākkhandho’tiādīni ekekakhandhamūlakāni cattāri cattāri katvā vīsati yamakāni.
atk-abh03a:1657_0: Tato paraṃ rūpaṃ khandho khandhā rūpantiādinā nayena suddhakhandhavaseneva gato suddhakhandhavāro nāma.
atk-abh03a:1657_5: Khandhā rūpakkhandhoti rūpakkhandho khandho ceva rūpakkhandho ca,
atk-abh03a:1657_6: avasesā khandhā na rūpakkhandho’ti evaṃ ‘khandhā rūpa’ntiādīnaṃ khandhā rūpakkhandhotiādinā nayena padaṃ uddharitvā attho vibhatto.
atk-abh03a:1657_8: Vacanasodhane viya hi ettha na vacanaṃ pamāṇaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1657_12: Esopi ca suddhakhandhavāro anulomapaṭilomavasena duvidho hoti.
atk-abh03a:1657_13: Tattha anulomavāre ‘rūpaṃ khandho khandhā rūpa’ntiādīni pañca yamakāni.
atk-abh03a:1658_0: Tato paraṃ tesaññeva suddhakhandhānaṃ rūpaṃ khandho,
atk-abh03a:1658_1: khandhā vedanātiādinā nayena ekekakhandhamūlakāni cattāri cattāri cakkāni bandhitvā gato suddhakhandhamūlakānaṃ
atk-abh03a:1658_3: Tattha khandhā vedanātiādīsu khandhā vedanākkhandhotiādinā nayena attho veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:1658_7: khandhā vedanā’tiādīni ekekakhandhamūlakāni cattāri cattāri katvā vīsati yamakāni.
atk-abh03a:1658_11: Evaṃ tāva ekena yamakasatena dvīhi pucchāsatehi ekekapucchāya sanniṭṭhānasaṃsayavasena dve dve atthe
atk-abh03a:1658_12: katvā catūhi ca atthasatehi paṭimaṇḍito paṇṇattivārassa uddesavāro veditabboti.
atk-abh03a:1661_1: Idāni rūpaṃ rūpakkhandhotiādinā nayena niddesavāro āraddho.
atk-abh03a:1661_2: Tattha rūpaṃ rūpakkhandhoti yaṃkiñci rūpanti vuccati.
atk-abh03a:1661_3: Sabbaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ rūpakkhandhoti vacanasodhanatthaṃ pucchati.
atk-abh03a:1661_5: na rūpakkhandhoti yaṃ ‘piyarūpaṃ sātarūpa’nti ettha rūpanti vuttaṃ,
atk-abh03a:1661_8: Rūpakkhandho rūpañceva rūpakkhandho cāti yo pana rūpakkhandho,
atk-abh03a:1661_9: so rūpantipi rūpakkhandhotipi vattuṃ vaṭṭatīti attho.
atk-abh03a:1661_10: Rūpakkhandho rūpanti ettha pana yasmā rūpakkhandho niyameneva rūpanti vattabbo.
atk-abh03a:1661_16: Saṅkhārayamake avasesā saṅkhārāti ‘aniccā vata saṅkhārā’tiādīsu āgatā saṅkhārakkhandhato avasesā saṅkhatadhammā.
atk-abh03a:1663_4: Paṭilome na khandhā na vedanākkhandhoti ettha ye paññattinibbānasaṅkhātā dhammā khandhā na honti,
atk-abh03a:1665_1: Suddhakhandhavāre rūpaṃ khandhoti yaṃkiñci rūpanti vuttaṃ,
atk-abh03a:1665_3: Tattha yasmā piyarūpasātarūpasaṅkhātaṃ vā rūpaṃ hotu,
atk-abh03a:1665_7: Dutiyapade ‘khandhā rūpa’nti pucchitabbe yasmā rūpantivacanena rūpakkhandhova adhippeto,
atk-abh03a:1665_8: tasmā vacanaṃ anādiyitvā atthavasena pucchanto khandhā rūpakkhandhoti āha.
atk-abh03a:1665_11: Saññā khandhoti etthāpi diṭṭhisaññā vā hotu,
atk-abh03a:1666_1: Paṭilome na rūpaṃ na khandhoti yaṃ dhammajātaṃ rūpaṃ na hoti,
atk-abh03a:1666_3: Vissajjane panassa rūpaṃ ṭhapetvā avasesā khandhā na rūpaṃ,
atk-abh03a:1666_4: khandhāti rūpato aññe vedanādayo khandhā rūpameva na honti,
atk-abh03a:1666_6: Rūpañca khandhe ca ṭhapetvā avasesāti pañcakkhandhavinimuttaṃ nibbānañceva paññatti ca.
atk-abh03a:1668_0: 40-44. Suddhakhandhamūlacakkavāre rūpaṃ khandhotiādīnaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva attho veditabboti.
atk-abh03a:1672_1: Idāni yassa rūpakkhandhotiādinā nayena pavattivāro āraddho.
atk-abh03a:1672_5: Tena pana nayena sakkā so idha avuttopi jānitunti taṃ avatvā niddesavārova āraddho.
atk-abh03a:1672_9: Tesu paṭhamo dhammānaṃ uppādalakkhaṇassa dīpitattā uppādavāroti vuccati.
atk-abh03a:1672_10: Dutiyo tesaññeva nirodhalakkhaṇassa dīpitattā nirodhavāroti vuccati.
atk-abh03a:1672_11: Tatiyo ubhinnampi lakkhaṇānaṃ dīpitattā uppādanirodhavāroti vuccati.
atk-abh03a:1672_13: Nirodhavārena ‘uppannaṃ nāma niccaṃ natthī’ti tesaññeva aniccatā dīpitā.
atk-abh03a:1673_0: Tattha uppādavāre tāva tiṇṇaṃ addhānaṃ vasena cha kālabhedā honti –
atk-abh03a:1673_5: Tesu ‘yassa rūpakkhandho uppajjatī’ti paccuppannābhidhānavasena paccuppanno veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:1673_6: So paccuppannānaṃ dhammānaṃ paccakkhato gahetabbattā ativiya suviññeyyoti paṭhamaṃ vutto.
atk-abh03a:1673_7: Yassa rūpakkhandho uppajjitthāti atītābhidhānavasena atīto veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:1673_8: So paccakkhato anubhūtapubbānaṃ atītadhammānaṃ anumānena anāgatehi suviññeyyatarattā dutiyaṃ vutto.
atk-abh03a:1673_9: Yassa rūpakkhandho uppajjissatīti anāgatābhidhānavasena anāgato veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:1673_10: So paccakkhato ca anubhūtapubbavasena ca gahitadhammānumānena ‘anāgatepi evarūpā dhammā uppajjissantī’ti gahetabbato tatiyaṃ vutto.
atk-abh03a:1674_1: tassa vedanākkhandho uppajjitthāti paccuppannena saddhiṃ atītābhidhānavasena paccuppannenātīto veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:1674_2: So missakesu tīsu suviññeyyatarattā catutthaṃ vutto.
atk-abh03a:1674_3: Yassa rūpakkhandho uppajjati tassa vedanākkhandho uppajjissatīti paccuppannena saddhiṃ anāgatābhidhānavasena paccuppannenānāgato veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:1674_4: So paccakkhato gahetabbānaṃ dhammānaṃ atthitāya atthato suviññeyyataroti pañcamaṃ vutto.
atk-abh03a:1674_6: tassa vedanākkhandho uppajjissatīti atītena saddhiṃ anāgatābhidhānavasena atītenānāgato veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:1675_0: Evametesu chasu kālabhedesu yvāyaṃ paṭhamo paccuppanno,
atk-abh03a:1675_3: Tesu yassāti puggalavasena khandhānaṃ uppattidīpano puggalavāro.
atk-abh03a:1675_5: Yassa yatthāti puggalokāsavasena khandhānaṃ uppattidīpano puggalokāsavāro.
atk-abh03a:1675_6: Ime pana tayopi vārā paṭhamaṃ anulomanayena niddisitvā pacchā paṭilomanayena niddiṭṭhā.
atk-abh03a:1676_0: Tattha paccuppannakāle tāva puggalavārassa anulomanaye “yassa rūpakkhandho uppajjati,
atk-abh03a:1676_9: tassa rūpakkhandho uppajjatī”ti evaṃ rūpakkhandhamūlakāni cattāri yamakāni;
atk-abh03a:1676_11: tassa saññākkhandho uppajjatī”tiādinā nayena vedanākkhandhamūlakāni tīṇi;
atk-abh03a:1676_13: saṅkhārakkhandhamūlakaṃ ekanti aggahitaggahaṇena dasa yamakāni honti.
atk-abh03a:1677_0: Tattha rūpakkhandhamūlakesu catūsu ādito ekameva vissajjitaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1677_1: Sesāni tena sadisavissajjanānīti tantiyā lahubhāvatthaṃ saṅkhittāni.
atk-abh03a:1677_3: Tasmā tānipi tantiyā lahubhāvatthaṃ saṅkhittānevāti evametāni paccuppannakāle puggalavāre anulomanaye
atk-abh03a:1677_4: ekayamakavissajjaneneva dasa yamakāni vissajjitāni nāma hontīti veditabbāni.
atk-abh03a:1677_7: puggalokāsavāre dasāti paccuppannakāle tīsu vāresu anulomanaye tiṃsa yamakāni honti.
atk-abh03a:1677_9: evaṃ paṭilomanayepīti sabbānipi paccuppannakāle saṭṭhi yamakāni honti.
atk-abh03a:1677_11: cattārīsāni ca dve atthasatāni hontīti veditabbāni.
atk-abh03a:1677_12: Evaṃ sesesupi pañcasu kālabhedesu puggalādibhedato anulomapaṭilomanayavasena cha cha vārā.
atk-abh03a:1677_13: Ekekasmiṃ vāre dasa dasa katvā saṭṭhi saṭṭhi yamakānīti tīṇi yamakasatāni.
atk-abh03a:1677_14: Tāni purimehi saddhiṃ saṭṭhādhikāni tīṇi yamakasatāni,
atk-abh03a:1677_22: vīsaṃ tisatādhikāni ca cattāri atthasahassāni veditabbāni.
atk-abh03a:1678_0: Pāḷi pana uppādavāre nirodhavāre ca tīsu asammissakakālabhedesu tasmiṃ tasmiṃ vāre ekekameva yamakaṃ vissajjetvā saṅkhittā.
atk-abh03a:1678_2: tassa saññākkhandho uppajjitthā’tiādinā nayena vedanākkhandhādimūlakesupi ekaṃ yamakaṃ vissajjitaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1678_3: Uppādanirodhavāre pana chasupi kālabhedesu taṃ vissajjitameva.
atk-abh03a:1679_1: imasmiñhi pavattimahāvāre catunnaṃ pañhānaṃ pañca vissajjanāni sattavīsatiyā ṭhānesu pakkhipitvā atthavinicchayo veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:1679_8: Tattha yāya pucchāya vissajjane ekeneva padena gahitakkhandhassa uppādo vā nirodho vā labbhati,
atk-abh03a:1679_10: Yāya pana pucchāya vissajjane dvīhipi padehi gahitakkhandhānaṃ uppādo vā nirodho vā labbhati,
atk-abh03a:1679_12: Yāya pana pucchāya vissajjane ekenapi padena gahitakkhandhassa dvīhipi padehi gahitakkhandhānaṃ uppādo vā,
atk-abh03a:1679_15: Yāya pana pucchāya vissajjane paṭikkhepo vā,
atk-abh03a:1679_18: Yasmā panesa adassiyamāno na sakkā jānituṃ,
atk-abh03a:1680_1: tattha vedanākkhandho nuppajjatī’ti pucchāya tāva uppajjatīti imasmiṃ vissajjane ekeneva padena gahitassa vedanākkhandhassa uppādo labbhati,
atk-abh03a:1680_2: iti ayañceva añño ca evarūpo pañho purepañhoti veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:1680_4: tassa vedanākkhandho uppajjitthā’ti pucchāya pana ‘āmantā’ti imasmiṃ vissajjane dvīhi padehi gahitānaṃ
atk-abh03a:1680_5: rūpavedanākkhandhānaṃ yassa kassaci sattassa atīte uppādo labbhati.
atk-abh03a:1680_6: Iti ayañceva añño ca evarūpo pañho pacchāpañhoti veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:1681_1: tassa vedanākkhandho uppajjatī’ti imāya pana paṭhamapucchāya ‘asaññasattaṃ upapajjantāna’ntiādike imasmiṃ
atk-abh03a:1681_3: no ca tesaṃ vedanākkhandho uppajjatī’ti imasmiṃ koṭṭhāse ekeneva padena gahitassa rūpakkhandhassapi uppādo labbhati.
atk-abh03a:1681_4: ‘Pañcavokāraṃ upapajjantānaṃ tesaṃ rūpakkhandho ca uppajjati vedanākkhandho ca uppajjatī’ti imasmiṃ koṭṭhāse
atk-abh03a:1681_5: dvīhipi padehi saṅgahitānaṃ rūpavedanākkhandhānampi uppādo labbhati.
atk-abh03a:1681_6: Iti ayañceva añño ca evarūpo pañho paripuṇṇapañhoti veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:1681_8: Etassa hi vissajjane purimakoṭṭhāse ekena padena saṅgahitassa rūpakkhandhasseva uppādo dassito.
atk-abh03a:1681_10: Imināyeva ca lakkhaṇena yattha ekena padena saṅgahitassa khandhassa uppādo vā nirodho vā labbhati,
atk-abh03a:1681_12: Yattha dvīhipi padehi saṅgahitānaṃ khandhānaṃ uppādo vā nirodho vā labbhati,
atk-abh03a:1682_1: tassa vedanākkhandho nuppajjitthā’ti imāya pana pucchāya ‘natthī’ti imasmiṃ vissajjane paṭikkhepo labbhati.
atk-abh03a:1682_3: tassa vedanākkhandho nirujjhatī’ti pucchāya ‘no’ti imasmiṃ vissajjane paṭisedho labbhati.
atk-abh03a:1682_4: Tasmā ayañceva duvidho añño ca evarūpo pañho moghapañhoti veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:1683_4: paṭisedhena vissajjananti imāni pana pañca vissajjanāni nāma.
atk-abh03a:1683_5: Tattha yaṃ vissajjanaṃ pāḷipadameva hutvā atthaṃ vissajjeti,
atk-abh03a:1683_8: ‘Yattha rūpakkhandho nuppajjati tattha vedanākkhandho nuppajjatī’ti hi pañhe ‘uppajjatī’ti idaṃ vissajjanaṃ
atk-abh03a:1683_10: tasmā evarūpesu ṭhānesu pāḷigatiyā vissajjanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1683_11: Yaṃ pana vissajjanaṃ paṭivacanabhāvena atthaṃ vissajjeti,
atk-abh03a:1683_15: tassa vedanākkhandho uppajjitthā’ti hi pañhe ‘āmantā’ti idaṃ vissajjanaṃ paṭivacanavaseneva atthaṃ vissajjayamānaṃ gataṃ,
atk-abh03a:1683_17: Yaṃ vissajjanaṃ sarūpena dassetvā atthaṃ vissajjeti;
atk-abh03a:1683_21: tassa vedanākkhandho uppajjatī’ti hi pañhe ‘asaññasattaṃ upapajjantāna’nti idaṃ vissajjanaṃ ‘imesaṃ rūpakkhandho uppajjati,
atk-abh03a:1683_24: vedanākkhandho cā’ti sarūpadassaneneva atthaṃ vissajjayamānaṃ gataṃ.
atk-abh03a:1683_25: Tasmā evarūpesu ṭhānesu sarūpadassanena vissajjanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1683_26: Yaṃ pana vissajjanaṃ tathārūpassa atthassābhāvato atthapaṭikkhepena pañhaṃ vissajjeti,
atk-abh03a:1683_28: Yaṃ tathārūpassa atthassa ekakkhaṇe alābhato atthapaṭisedhanena pañhaṃ vissajjeti,
atk-abh03a:1683_32: tassa vedanākkhandho nuppajjitthā’ti hi pañhe ‘natthī’ti idaṃ vissajjanaṃ;
atk-abh03a:1683_33: evarūpo nāma satto natthīti atthapaṭikkhepena pañhaṃ vissajjayamānaṃ gataṃ;
atk-abh03a:1683_34: tasmā evarūpesu ṭhānesu paṭikkhepena vissajjanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1683_36: tassa vedanākkhandho nirujjhatī’ti pañhe pana ‘no’ti idaṃ vissajjanaṃ ekasmiṃ paṭisandhikkhaṇe uppādena
atk-abh03a:1683_37: saddhiṃ nirodho nāma na labbhatīti atthapaṭisedhanena pañhaṃ vissajjayamānaṃ gataṃ,
atk-abh03a:1683_38: tasmā evarūpesu ṭhānesu paṭisedhena vissajjanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1684_14: ye ca arūpaṃ upapajjitvā parinibbāyissantīti ekaṃ;
atk-abh03a:1684_30: Evaṃ imesaṃ catunnaṃ pañhānaṃ imāni pañca vissajjanāni imesu sattavīsatiyā ṭhānesu pakkhipitvā imasmiṃ pavattimahāvāre atthavinicchayo veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:1684_31: Evaṃ viditvā hi pañhaṃ vissajjantena suvissajjito hoti,
atk-abh03a:1685_1: yassa rūpakkhandho uppajjatīti yassa puggalassa uppādakkhaṇasamaṅgitāya rūpakkhandho uppajjati.
atk-abh03a:1685_2: Tassa vedanākkhandho uppajjatīti vedanākkhandhopi tassa tasmiññeva khaṇe uppajjatīti pucchati.
atk-abh03a:1685_4: Tesaṃ rūpakkhandho uppajjatīti tesaṃ ekantena rūpakkhandho uppajjatiyeva.
atk-abh03a:1685_7: No ca tesaṃ vedanākkhandho uppajjatīti acittakattā pana tesaṃ vedanākkhandho nuppajjateva.
atk-abh03a:1685_8: Idaṃ sattavīsatiyā ṭhānesu paṭhame ṭhāne paripuṇṇapañhassa purimakoṭṭhāse sarūpadassanena vissajjanaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1685_11: vedanākkhandho cāti tesaṃ ekantena rūpavedanākkhandhasaṅkhātā dvepi khandhā uppajjantiyeva.
atk-abh03a:1685_12: Pavatte pana tattha uppannānaṃ te khandhā uppajjantipi nirujjhantipi,
atk-abh03a:1685_14: Idaṃ pañcavokāraṃ upapajjantānanti ṭhāne paripuṇṇapañhassa pacchimakoṭṭhāse sarūpadassanena vissajjanaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1686_1: sakalepi hi imasmiṃ khandhayamake tattha tattha uppannānaṃ pavatte yāva maraṇā khandhānaṃ apariyantesu
atk-abh03a:1686_2: uppādanirodhesu vijjamānesupi lahuparivattānaṃ dhammānaṃ vinibbhogaṃ katvā uppādanirodhe dassetuṃ na
atk-abh03a:1686_3: sukaranti pavattiyaṃ uppādanirodhe anāmasitvā abhinavaṃ vipākavaṭṭaṃ nipphādayamānena nānākammena nibbattānaṃ
atk-abh03a:1686_4: paṭisandhikhandhānaṃ uppādaṃ dassetuṃ sukhanti paṭisandhikāle uppādavaseneva uppādavāro kathito.
atk-abh03a:1686_5: Uppannassa pana vipākavaṭṭassa pariyosānena nirodhaṃ dassetuṃ sukhanti maraṇakāle nirodhavasena nirodhavāro kathito.
atk-abh03a:1687_0: Kiṃ panettha pavattiyaṃ uppādanirodhānaṃ anāmaṭṭhabhāve pamāṇanti? Pāḷiyeva.
atk-abh03a:1687_1: Pāḷiyañhi visesena uppādavārassa anāgatakālavāre ‘pacchimabhavikānaṃ tesaṃ rūpakkhandho ca nuppajjissati,
atk-abh03a:1687_2: vedanākkhandho ca nuppajjissatī’ti ayaṃ pāḷi atipamāṇameva.
atk-abh03a:1687_3: Pacchimabhavikānañhi pavatte rūpārūpadhammānaṃ uppajjituṃ yuttabhāve satipi ‘rūpakkhandho ca nuppajjissati,
atk-abh03a:1687_4: vedanākkhandho ca nuppajjissatī’ti sanniṭṭhānaṃ katvā vuttabhāvena pavatte uppādo na gahitoti veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:1687_5: ‘Suddhāvāse parinibbantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha saññākkhandho na nirujjhittha,
atk-abh03a:1687_6: no ca tesaṃ tattha vedanākkhandho na nirujjhatī’ti ayaṃ pana pāḷi pavatte nirodhassa anāmaṭṭhabhāve ativiya pamāṇaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1687_7: Suddhāvāse parinibbantānañhi cuticittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe ṭhitānaṃ paṭisandhito paṭṭhāya pavatte uppajjitvā niruddhasaññākkhandhānaṃ gaṇanapatho natthi.
atk-abh03a:1687_8: ‘Evaṃ santepi tesaṃ tattha saññākkhandho na nirujjhitthā’ti sanniṭṭhānaṃ katvā vuttabhāvena pavatte nirodho na gahitoti veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:1688_0: Evamettha uppādanirodhesu niyamalakkhaṇaṃ viditvā paṭisandhiuppādameva cutinirodhameva ca gahetvā tesu
atk-abh03a:1688_1: tesu ṭhānesu āgatānaṃ vissajjanānaṃ atthavinicchayo veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:1688_2: So pana sakkā ādivissajjane vuttanayena sabbattha viditunti vissajjanapaṭipāṭiyā na vitthārito.
atk-abh03a:1688_3: Iminā pana evaṃ dinnenapi nayena yo etesaṃ atthavinicchayaṃ jānituṃ na sakkoti,
atk-abh03a:1688_4: tena ācariye payirupāsitvā sādhukaṃ sutvāpi jānitabbo.
atk-abh03a:1691_0: Vasena yāni khandhesu, yamakāni ca pañcasu;
atk-abh03a:1696_0: Vissajjanānaṃ ṭhānāni, yāni tāni ca sabbaso.
atk-abh03a:1699_0: Atthaṃ vaṇṇayatā kātuṃ, kiṃ nu sakkā ito paraṃ;
atk-abh03a:1700_0: Nayena iminā tasmā, atthaṃ jānantu paṇḍitāti.
atk-abh03a:1703_5: puggalokāsavāroti imesu pana tīsu puggalavārova labbhati,
atk-abh03a:1703_9: Yo hi koci puggalo yattha katthaci ṭhāne rūpakkhandhaṃ ce parijānāti,
atk-abh03a:1703_18: tattha vedanākkhandhaṃ parijānātī’ti ādivasena pucchaṃ katvā ‘āmantā’tveva vissajjanaṃ kātabbaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1703_19: Siyāti sadisavissajjanatāya te idha na labbhantīti veditabbā.
atk-abh03a:1704_0: Atha vā pariññākiccaṃ nāma puggalasseva hoti,
atk-abh03a:1704_5: Tassa pana aggahitattā tadanantaro puggalokāsavāro labbhamānopi na gahito.
atk-abh03a:1704_10: saṅkhārakkhandhamūlakaṃ ekanti heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva anulomanaye aggahitaggahaṇena dasa yamakāni.
atk-abh03a:1704_12: Tathā sesesupīti ekekasmiṃ kāle vīsati vīsati katvā chasu kālesu vīsaṃ yamakasataṃ,
atk-abh03a:1704_14: asītyādhikāni cattāri atthasatāni ca hontīti idamettha pāḷivavatthānaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1705_0: Atthavinicchaye panettha atītānāgatapaccuppannasaṅkhātā tayo addhā pavattivāre viya cutipaṭisandhivasena na labbhanti.
atk-abh03a:1705_3: so vedanākkhandhaṃ parijānātī’tiādīsu pucchāsu ‘āmantā’ti vissajjanaṃ kataṃ.
atk-abh03a:1705_4: Lokuttaramaggakkhaṇasmiñhi nibbānārammaṇena cittena pañcasu khandhesu pariññākiccanibbattiyā yaṃ kiñci
atk-abh03a:1705_5: ekaṃ khandhaṃ parijānanto itarampi parijānātīti vuccati.
atk-abh03a:1705_6: Evamettha ‘parijānātī’ti pañhesu anulomanaye pariññākiccassa matthakappattaṃ aggamaggasamaṅgiṃ sandhāya ‘āmantā’ti vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1705_7: Paṭilomanaye pana ‘na parijānātī’ti pañhesu puthujjanādayo sandhāya ‘āmantā’ti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1705_8: ‘Parijānitthā’ti imasmiṃ pana atītakālavāre maggānantaraaggaphale ṭhitopi pariññākiccassa niṭṭhitattā parijānitthayeva nāma.
atk-abh03a:1706_2: so vedanākkhandhaṃ parijānitthāti pañhena aggamaggasamaṅgiṃ pucchati.
atk-abh03a:1706_10: Paṭilomanayavissajjane panettha arahā rūpakkhandhaṃ na parijānātīti arahato pariññāya abhāvena vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1706_11: Aggamaggasamaṅgī vedanākkhandhaṃ na parijānitthāti arahattamaggaṭṭhassa aniṭṭhitapariññākiccatāya vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1706_15: No ca rūpakkhandhanti idampi pucchāvaseneva vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1707_2: so vedanākkhandhaṃ parijānissatīti ettha yasmā maggaṭṭhapuggalo ekacittakkhaṇiko,
atk-abh03a:1707_3: tasmā so parijānissatīti saṅkhaṃ na gacchati.
atk-abh03a:1707_5: Te rūpakkhandhañca na parijānitthāti pucchāsabhāgena vuttaṃ,
atk-abh03a:1712_1: Idāni mūlayamake desiteyeva kusalādidhamme āyatanavasenāpi saṅgaṇhitvā khandhayamakānantaraṃ desitassa āyatanayamakassa vaṇṇanā hoti.
atk-abh03a:1712_8: Idhāpi ca paṇṇattivāro uddesaniddesavasena dvidhā vavatthito.
atk-abh03a:1712_10: ‘Tattha dvādasāyatanānī’ti padaṃ ādiṃ katvā yāva nāyatanā na manoti,
atk-abh03a:1712_12: Tattha dvādasāyatanānīti ayaṃ yamakavasena pucchitabbānaṃ āyatanānaṃ uddeso.
atk-abh03a:1712_15: Yamakavasena pucchāsukhatthañcettha paṭhamaṃ paṭipāṭiyā ajjhattarūpāyatanāni vuttāni.
atk-abh03a:1713_8: Yathā pana khandhayamake padasodhanavārassa anulomavāre ‘rūpaṃ rūpakkhandho,
atk-abh03a:1713_18: padasodhanamūlacakkavārassa panettha anulomavāre ekekāyatanamūlakāni ekādasa ekādasa katvā dvattiṃsasataṃ yamakāni.
atk-abh03a:1713_22: suddhāyatanamūlacakkavārassāpi anulomavāre ekekāyatanamūlakāni ekādasa ekādasa katvā dvattiṃsasataṃ yamakāni.
atk-abh03a:1713_23: Paṭilomavārepi dvattiṃsasatamevāti evamidha chasattatādhikehi pañcahi yamakasatehi,
atk-abh03a:1713_25: caturādhikehi tevīsāya atthasatehi ca paṭimaṇḍito paṇṇattivārassa uddesavāro veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:1716_1: Niddesavāre pana heṭṭhā khandhayamakassa paṇṇattivāraniddese vuttanayeneva attho veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:1716_11: Avasesaṃ rūpanti rūpāyatanato sesaṃ bhūtupādāyarūpañceva piyarūpasātarūpañca.
atk-abh03a:1719_1: Idhāpi ca pavattivārassa uppādavārādīsu tīsu antaravāresu ekekasmiṃ chaḷeva kālabhedā.
atk-abh03a:1719_2: Tesaṃ ekekasmiṃ kāle puggalavārādayo tayo vārā.
atk-abh03a:1719_4: Tattha paccuppannakāle puggalavārassa anulomanaye yathā khandhayamake rūpakkhandhamūlakāni cattāri,
atk-abh03a:1719_7: saṅkhārakkhandhamūlakaṃ ekanti aggahitaggahaṇena dasa yamakāni honti.
atk-abh03a:1719_25: tassa cakkhāyatanaṃ uppajjatī”ti evaṃ cakkhāyatanamūlakāni ekādasa.
atk-abh03a:1719_27: tassa ghānāyatanaṃ uppajjatī”tiādinā nayena sotāyatanamūlakāni dasa;
atk-abh03a:1719_36: manāyatanamūlakaṃ ekanti aggahitaggahaṇena chasaṭṭhi yamakāni honti.
atk-abh03a:1720_8: cakkhusotāyatanānaṃ pavattiṭṭhāne pana ghānāyatanassa na ekantena pavattito “kathaṃ nu kho etaṃ vissajjetabba”nti vimatinivāraṇatthaṃ vissajjitaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1720_9: Rūpāyatanamanāyatanadhammāyatanehi saddhiṃ tīṇi yamakāni asadisavissajjanattā vissajjitāni.
atk-abh03a:1720_10: Sesesu jivhāyatanakāyāyatanehi tāva saddhiṃ dve yamakāni purimehi dvīhi saddhiṃ sadisavissajjanāni.
atk-abh03a:1720_11: Saddāyatanassa paṭisandhikkhaṇe anuppattito tena saddhiṃ yamakassa vissajjanameva natthi.
atk-abh03a:1720_12: Gandharasaphoṭṭhabbāyatanehipi saddhiṃ tīṇi yamakāni purimehi dvīhi sadisavissajjanāneva hontīti tantiyā lahubhāvatthaṃ saṅkhittāni.
atk-abh03a:1720_14: taṃ purimehi sadisavissajjanamevāti ekampi pāḷiṃ nāruḷhaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1720_16: manāyatanadhammāyatanehi saddhiṃ dveti tīṇi yamakāni pāḷiṃ āruḷhāni.
atk-abh03a:1720_20: Gandharasaphoṭṭhabbehi pana saddhiṃ tīṇi rūpāyatanamanāyatanehi saddhiṃ sadisavissajjanāni.
atk-abh03a:1721_1: Gandharasaphoṭṭhabbamūlakāni cattāri tīṇi dve ca heṭṭhimehi sadisavissajjanattā pāḷiṃ nāruḷhāni.
atk-abh03a:1721_2: Manāyatanamūlakaṃ vissajjitamevāti evametāni paccuppannakāle puggalavārassa anulomanaye katipayayamakavissajjaneneva
atk-abh03a:1721_5: evaṃ okāsavārepi puggalokāsavārepi chasaṭṭhīti paccuppannakāle tīsu vāresu anulomanaye aṭṭhanavutisataṃ yamakāni honti.
atk-abh03a:1721_7: evaṃ paṭilomanayepīti sabbānipi paccuppannakāle channavutādhikāni tīṇi yamakasatāni honti.
atk-abh03a:1721_9: caturāsītādhikāni ca pannarasa atthasatāni hontīti veditabbāni.
atk-abh03a:1721_10: Evaṃ sesesupi pañcasu kālabhedesūti sabbānipi chasattatādhikāni tevīsati yamakasatāni.
atk-abh03a:1721_12: tato diguṇā atthāti idamettha uppādavāre pāḷivavatthānaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1721_19: Upari pana “vārasaṅkhepo hotī”tiādīni vatvā tattha tattha saṅkhittā.
atk-abh03a:1722_1: Sacakkhukānaṃ asotakānanti apāye jātibadhiraopapātikaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1722_2: So hi sacakkhuko asotako hutvā upapajjati. Yathāha –
