atk-abh03a:2017_2: Taṃ sabbampi vatthupurejātaṃ ārammaṇapurejātanti dvidhā ṭhitaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2017_5: Sesaṃ imāya pāḷiyā āgatañca anāgatañca vaṇṇo saddo gandho raso catasso dhātuyo tīṇi indriyāni kabaḷīkāro
atk-abh03a:2017_6: āhāroti dvādasavidhaṃ rūpaṃ ārammaṇapurejātapaccayo nāmāti evamettha nānappakārabhedato viññātabbo vinicchayo.
atk-abh03a:2018_0: Evaṃ bhinne panettha cakkhāyatanaṃ dvinnaṃ cakkhuviññāṇānaṃ purejātapaccayena paccayo,
atk-abh03a:2018_2: Vatthurūpaṃ pana ṭhapetvā dvipañcaviññāṇāni cattāro ca āruppavipāke sesānaṃ sabbesampi catubhūmakānaṃ
atk-abh03a:2018_4: Rūpādīni pana pañcārammaṇāni dvipañcaviññāṇānañceva manodhātūnañca ekanteneva purejātapaccayā honti.
atk-abh03a:2018_5: Aṭṭhārasavidhampi panetaṃ rūparūpaṃ kāmāvacarakusalassa rūpāvacarato abhiññākusalassa akusalassa tadārammaṇabhāvino
atk-abh03a:2018_6: kāmāvacaravipākassa kāmāvacarakiriyassa rūpāvacarato abhiññākiriyassāti imesaṃ channaṃ rāsīnaṃ purejātapaccayo
atk-abh03a:2021_1: Pacchājātapaccayaniddese pacchājātāti yassa kāyassa paccayā honti,
atk-abh03a:2021_3: Purejātassāti tesaṃ uppādato paṭhamataraṃ jātassa jātikkhaṇaṃ atikkamitvā ṭhitippattassa.
atk-abh03a:2021_5: Ettha ca tisamuṭṭhānikakāyoti āhārasamuṭṭhānassa abhāvato brahmapārisajjādīnaṃ kāyo veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:2021_7: Ayaṃ pana pacchājātapaccayo nāma saṅkhepato ṭhapetvā āruppavipāke avasesā catubhūmakā arūpakkhandhā.
atk-abh03a:2021_8: So jātivasena kusalākusalavipākakiriyabhedena catudhā bhijjatīti evamettha nānappakārabhedato viññātabbo vinicchayo.
atk-abh03a:2022_0: Evaṃ bhinne panettha pañcavokārabhave uppannaṃ catubhūmakakusalañca akusalañca uppādakkhaṇaṃ atikkamitvā
atk-abh03a:2022_2: Vipākepi ṭhapetvā paṭisandhivipākaṃ avaseso kāmāvacararūpāvacaravipāko tasseva ekantena pacchājātapaccayo hoti.
atk-abh03a:2022_3: Lokuttaropi pañcavokāre uppannavipāko tasseva pacchājātapaccayo hoti.
atk-abh03a:2022_4: Tebhūmakakiriyāpi pañcavokāre uppannāva vuttappakārassa kāyassa pacchājātapaccayo hotīti evamettha paccayuppannatopi viññātabbo vinicchayoti.
atk-abh03a:2025_1: Āsevanapaccayaniddese purimā purimāti sabbanayesu samanantarātītāva daṭṭhabbā.
atk-abh03a:2025_2: Kasmā panettha anantarapaccaye viya “purimā purimā kusalā dhammā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ abyākatānaṃ
atk-abh03a:2025_3: dhammāna”ntiādinā nayena bhinnajātikehi saddhiṃ niddeso na katoti?
atk-abh03a:2025_5: Bhinnajātikā hi bhinnajātikānaṃ arūpadhammānaṃ āsevanaguṇena paguṇabalavabhāvaṃ sādhayamānā attano kusalādibhāvasaṅkhātaṃ gatiṃ gāhāpetuṃ na sakkonti.
atk-abh03a:2025_6: Tasmā tehi saddhiṃ niddesaṃ akatvā ye yesaṃ vāsanāsaṅkhātena āsevanena paguṇatarabalavatarabhāvavisiṭṭhaṃ
atk-abh03a:2025_8: tesaṃ tehi samānajātikeheva saddhiṃ niddeso katoti veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:2025_11: Vipākañhi kammavasena vipākabhāvappattaṃ kammapariṇāmitaṃ hutvā vattati nirussāhaṃ dubbalanti taṃ āsevanaguṇena
atk-abh03a:2025_12: attano sabhāvaṃ gāhāpetvā paribhāvetvā neva aññaṃ vipākaṃ uppādetuṃ sakkoti,
atk-abh03a:2025_14: Kammavegakkhittaṃ pana patitaṃ viya hutvā uppajjatīti sabbathāpi vipāke āsevanaṃ natthīti āsevanābhāvena vipākaṃ na gahitaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2025_15: Kusalākusalakiriyānantaraṃ uppajjamānampi cetaṃ kammapaṭibaddhavuttitāya āsevanaguṇaṃ na gaṇhātīti kusalādayopissa āsevanapaccayā na honti.
atk-abh03a:2025_17: Bhūmito pana ārammaṇato vā nānājātikattaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-abh03a:2025_19: saṅkhārārammaṇañca anulomakusalaṃ nibbānārammaṇassa gotrabhukusalassa āsevanapaccayo hotiyevāti ayaṃ tāvettha pāḷivaṇṇanā.
atk-abh03a:2025_20: Ayaṃ pana āsevanapaccayo jātito tāva kusalo akusalo kiriyābyākatoti tidhā ṭhito.
atk-abh03a:2025_21: Tattha kusalo bhūmito kāmāvacaro rūpāvacaro arūpāvacaroti tividho hoti,
atk-abh03a:2025_22: akusalo kāmāvacarova kiriyābyākato kāmāvacaro rūpāvacaro arūpāvacaroti tividhova,
atk-abh03a:2025_23: lokuttaro āsevanapaccayo nāma natthīti evamettha nānappakārabhedato viññātabbo vinicchayo.
atk-abh03a:2026_0: Evaṃ bhinne panettha kāmāvacarakusalaṃ attano anantarassa kāmāvacarakusalasseva.
atk-abh03a:2026_2: taṃ attanā sadisavedanassa rūpāvacarakusalassa arūpāvacarakusalassa lokuttarakusalassāti imesaṃ rāsīnaṃ āsevanapaccayo hoti.
atk-abh03a:2026_8: so attanā sadisavedanassa rūpāvacarakiriyassa arūpāvacarakiriyassāti imesaṃ rāsīnaṃ āsevanapaccayo hoti.
atk-abh03a:2026_11: Vipāko pana ekadhammassāpi ekadhammopi vā koci vipākassa āsevanapaccayo natthīti evamettha paccayuppannatopi viññātabbo vinicchayoti.
atk-abh03a:2029_2: Kaṭattā ca rūpānanti kammassa kaṭattā uppannarūpānaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2029_3: Kammapaccayenāti anekānampi kappakoṭīnaṃ matthake attano phalaṃ uppādetuṃ samatthena nānākkhaṇikakammapaccayenāti attho.
atk-abh03a:2029_4: Kusalākusalañhi kammaṃ attano pavattikkhaṇe phalaṃ na deti.
atk-abh03a:2029_9: tato aññasmiṃ khaṇe avijjamānampi kevalaṃ kaṭattāyeva diṭṭheva dhamme upapajje vā apare vā pariyāye avasesapaccayasamāyoge
atk-abh03a:2029_10: sati phalaṃ uppādeti niruddhāpi purimasippādikiriyā viya kālantare pacchimasippādikiriyāya.
atk-abh03a:2029_12: Cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ dhammānanti yā kāci cetanā attanā sampayuttakānaṃ dhammānaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2029_15: Kusalādīsu hi yā kāci sahajātacetanā sesadhammānaṃ cittapayogasaṅkhātena kiriyābhāvena upakārikā hoti.
atk-abh03a:2030_1: So hi jātibhedato kusalo akusalo vipāko kiriyāti catudhā bhijjati.
atk-abh03a:2030_2: Tattha kusalo bhūmito kāmāvacarādivasena catudhā bhijjati.
atk-abh03a:2030_4: kiriyā tidhāvāti evamettha nānappakārabhedato viññātabbo vinicchayo.
atk-abh03a:2031_0: Evaṃ bhinne panettha sahajātā kāmāvacarakusalacetanā pañcavokāre attanā sampayuttadhammānañceva cittasamuṭṭhānarūpassa ca,
atk-abh03a:2031_2: Uppajjitvā niruddhā pana attano vipākānaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ nānākkhaṇikakammapaccayena paccayo hoti.
atk-abh03a:2031_5: Sahajātā rūpāvacarakusalacetanā attanā sampayuttadhammānañceva cittasamuṭṭhānarūpānañca ekanteneva sahajātakammapaccayena paccayo.
atk-abh03a:2031_6: Uppajjitvā niruddhā pana attano vipākānañceva kaṭattārūpānañca nānākkhaṇikakammapaccayena paccayo.
atk-abh03a:2031_7: Arūpāvacarā pana lokuttarā ca sahajātā kusalacetanā pañcavokāre attanā sampayuttadhammānañceva cittasamuṭṭhānarūpānañca,
atk-abh03a:2031_9: Uppajjitvā niruddhā panesā duvidhāpi attano attano vipākakkhandhānaññeva nānākkhaṇikakammapaccayena paccayo.
atk-abh03a:2031_10: Sahajātā akusalacetanā pañcavokāre attanā sampayuttakkhandhānañceva cittasamuṭṭhānarūpānañca catuvokāre
atk-abh03a:2031_12: Uppajjitvā niruddhā pana vipākakkhandhānañceva kaṭattārūpānañca nānākkhaṇikakammapaccayena paccayo.
atk-abh03a:2032_0: Kāmāvacararūpāvacarato vipākacetanā attanā sampayuttadhammānaṃ pavatte cittasamuṭṭhānarūpānaṃ,
atk-abh03a:2032_3: Lokuttaravipākacetanā pañcavokāre attanā sampayuttadhammānañceva cittasamuṭṭhānarūpassa ca,
atk-abh03a:2032_5: Tebhūmikā kiriyacetanā pañcavokāre sampayuttadhammānañceva cittasamuṭṭhānarūpassa ca sahajātakammapaccayena paccayo.
atk-abh03a:2032_7: sā arūpadhammānaññeva sahajātakammapaccayena paccayoti evamettha paccayuppannatopi viññātabbo vinicchayoti.
atk-abh03a:2035_1: Vipākapaccayaniddese vipākā cattāro khandhāti yasmā kammasamuṭṭhānāpi rūpā vipākā na honti,
atk-abh03a:2035_3: Evaṃ ayaṃ pāḷi arūpadhammānaññeva vipākapaccayavasena āgatā.
atk-abh03a:2035_4: Pañhāvāre pana “vipākābyākato eko khandho tiṇṇaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ vipākapaccayena paccayo.
atk-abh03a:2035_5: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe vipākābyākato eko khandho tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ vipākapaccayena paccayo”ti
atk-abh03a:2035_7: Idha pana sāvasesavasena desanā katāti ayaṃ tāvettha pāḷivaṇṇanā.
atk-abh03a:2035_8: Ayaṃ pana vipākapaccayo vipākabhāvena jātito ekavidho,
atk-abh03a:2035_9: bhūmibhedato kāmāvacarādivasena catudhā bhijjatīti evamettha nānappakārabhedato viññātabbo vinicchayo.
atk-abh03a:2036_0: Evaṃ bhinne panettha kāmāvacararūpāvacaravipāko attanā sampayuttadhammānaṃ pavatte cittasamuṭṭhānarūpānaṃ
atk-abh03a:2036_4: catuvokāre sampayuttakkhandhānaññeva vipākapaccayo hotīti evamettha paccayuppannatopi viññātabbo vinicchayoti.
atk-abh03a:2039_1: Āhārapaccayaniddese kabaḷīkāro āhāroti catusantatisamuṭṭhāne rūpe ojā āhāro nāma.
atk-abh03a:2039_2: So pana yasmā kabaḷaṃ karitvā ajjhoharitova āhārakiccaṃ karoti,
atk-abh03a:2039_5: Kabaḷaṃ karitvā ajjhoharitabbavatthukattā vā kabaḷīkāroti nāmametaṃ tassa.
atk-abh03a:2039_9: paṭisandhikkhaṇe vipākābyākatā āhārā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ āhārapaccayena paccayoti.
atk-abh03a:2040_0: Ayaṃ pana āhārapaccayo saṅkhepato kabaḷīkāro āhāro, phasso, cetanā,
atk-abh03a:2040_2: Tattha ṭhapetvā kabaḷīkārāhāraṃ sesā tayo arūpāhārā jātivasena kusalākusalavipākakiriyabhedato catudhā bhijjanti.
atk-abh03a:2040_8: bhūmito kāmāvacarovāti evamettha nānappakārabhedato viññātabbo vinicchayo.
atk-abh03a:2041_0: Evaṃ bhinne panettha catubhūmakāpi tayo kusalāhārā pañcavokāre attanā sampayuttadhammānañceva cittasamuṭṭhānarūpassa ca āhārapaccayena paccayo,
atk-abh03a:2041_1: ṭhapetvā pana rūpāvacaraṃ avasesā āruppe sampayuttadhammānaññeva āhārapaccayena paccayo.
atk-abh03a:2041_3: Catubhūmakavipākāhārā pana sabbattha sampayuttakānaṃ āhārapaccayā honti.
atk-abh03a:2041_4: Kāmāvacararūpāvacaravipākā panettha pañcavokāre uppajjamānā pavatte cittasamuṭṭhānarūpassa paṭisandhiyaṃ kaṭattārūpassāpi āhārapaccayā honti.
atk-abh03a:2041_6: āruppe uppannā rūpassa paccayā na honti.
atk-abh03a:2041_7: Tebhūmakāpi tayo kiriyāhārā pañcavokāre sampayuttadhammānañceva cittasamuṭṭhānarūpassa ca,
atk-abh03a:2041_8: kāmāvacarārūpāvacarā pana āruppe sampayuttadhammānaññeva āhārapaccayena paccayo.
atk-abh03a:2041_9: Catusantatisamuṭṭhāno kabaḷīkārāhāro kiñcāpi “imassa kāyassā”ti avisesato vutto,
atk-abh03a:2041_10: visesato panāyamettha āhārasamuṭṭhānarūpassa janako ceva anupālako ca hutvā āhārapaccayena paccayo hoti,
atk-abh03a:2041_11: sesatisantatisamuṭṭhānassa anupālakova hutvā āhārapaccayena paccayo hotīti evamettha paccayuppannatopi viññātabbo vinicchayoti.
atk-abh03a:2044_2: Indriyapaccayenāti sayaṃ purejāto hutvā arūpadhammānaṃ uppādato paṭṭhāya yāva bhaṅgā indriyapaccayena paccayo hoti.
atk-abh03a:2044_5: Taṃsamuṭṭhānānanti ettha heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva kaṭattārūpampi saṅgahitaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2044_7: paṭisandhikkhaṇe vipākābyākatā indriyā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ indriyapaccayena paccayoti.
atk-abh03a:2045_0: Ayaṃ pana indriyapaccayo itthindriyapurisindriyavajjānaṃ samavīsatiyā indriyānaṃ vasena ṭhito.
atk-abh03a:2045_2: kalalādikāle pana vijjamānesupi tesu itthiliṅgapurisaliṅgādīnaṃ abhāvā tāni neva tesaṃ,
atk-abh03a:2045_4: Indriyapaccayo hi attano vijjamānakkhaṇe avinibbhuttadhammānaṃ indriyapaccayataṃ apharanto nāma natthi,
atk-abh03a:2045_8: Iti indriyapaccayo samavīsatiyā indriyānaṃ vasena ṭhitoti veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:2045_11: akusalo kāmāvacarova vipāko catudhāva kiriyāsaṅkhāto tidhā,
atk-abh03a:2045_12: rūpaṃ kāmāvacaramevāti evaṃ anekadhā bhijjatīti evaṃ tāvettha nānappakārabhedato viññātabbo vinicchayo.
atk-abh03a:2046_0: Evaṃ bhinne panettha catubhūmakopi kusalindriyapaccayo pañcavokāre sampayuttadhammānañceva cittasamuṭṭhānarūpassa ca indriyapaccayena paccayo,
atk-abh03a:2046_2: Ṭhapetvā pana rūpāvacarakusalaṃ avasesā kusalākusalā āruppe sampayuttadhammānaññeva indriyapaccayena paccayo.
atk-abh03a:2046_3: Catubhūmako vipākindriyapaccayo ekanteneva sampayuttakānaṃ indriyapaccayena paccayo.
atk-abh03a:2046_4: Kāmāvacararūpāvacarā panettha pañcavokāre uppajjanato pavatte cittasamuṭṭhānarūpassa,
atk-abh03a:2046_7: Āruppe uppannā lokuttaravipākā indriyā rūpassa paccayā na honti.
atk-abh03a:2046_8: Tebhūmakā kiriyindriyā pañcavokāre sampayuttadhammānañceva cittasamuṭṭhānarūpassa ca,
atk-abh03a:2046_9: kāmāvacarārūpāvacarā pana āruppe sampayuttadhammānaññeva indriyapaccayataṃ pharanti.
atk-abh03a:2046_10: Cakkhundriyādivasena chabbidhe rūpindriye cakkhundriyaṃ kusalākusalavipākato sampayuttadhammānaṃ dvinnaṃ cakkhuviññāṇānaṃ,
atk-abh03a:2046_12: rūpajīvitindriyaṃ attanā sahajātarūpānaṃ ṭhitikkhaṇe indriyapaccayena paccayo.
atk-abh03a:2046_13: Sahajātapaccayatā pana tassa natthīti evamettha paccayuppannatopi viññātabbo vinicchayoti.
atk-abh03a:2049_3: Pañcannaṃ pana viññāṇakāyānaṃ abhinipātamattattā tesu vijjamānānipi upekkhāsukhadukkhāni upanijjhānākārassa abhāvato jhānaṅgānīti na uddhaṭāni.
atk-abh03a:2049_4: Tattha pacchinnattā pana sesāhetukesupi jhānaṅgaṃ na uddhaṭameva.
atk-abh03a:2049_7: “paṭisandhikkhaṇe vipākābyākatāni jhānaṅgāni sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ jhānapaccayena paccayo”ti.
atk-abh03a:2049_9: Ayaṃ pana jhānapaccayo sattannaṃ jhānaṅgānaṃ vasena ṭhitopi jātibhedato kusalākusalavipākakiriyavasena catudhā bhijjati,
atk-abh03a:2049_11: tidhāti dvādasadhā bhijjatīti evamettha nānappakārabhedato viññātabbo vinicchayo.
atk-abh03a:2050_0: Evaṃ bhinne panettha catubhūmakampi kusalajhānaṅgaṃ pañcavokāre sampayuttadhammānañceva cittasamuṭṭhānarūpassa ca,
atk-abh03a:2050_1: ṭhapetvā rūpāvacaraṃ avasesaṃ āruppe sampayuttadhammānaññeva jhānapaccayena paccayo.
atk-abh03a:2050_7: Pañcavokāre pana taṃ cittasamuṭṭhānarūpassapi jhānapaccayena paccayo hoti.
atk-abh03a:2050_8: Tebhūmakampi kiriyajhānaṅgaṃ pañcavokāre sampayuttadhammānañceva cittasamuṭṭhānarūpassa ca.
atk-abh03a:2050_10: taṃ sampayuttadhammānaññeva jhānapaccayena paccayoti evamettha paccayuppannatopi viññātabbo vinicchayoti.
atk-abh03a:2053_1: Maggapaccayaniddese maggaṅgānīti ahetukacittuppādavajjesu sesacittesu uppannāni paññā, vitakko,
atk-abh03a:2053_5: Maggassa pana hetupacchimakattā ahetukacittesu maggaṅgāni na uddhaṭāni.
atk-abh03a:2053_8: “paṭisandhikkhaṇe vipākābyākatāni maggaṅgāni sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ maggapaccayena paccayo”ti.
atk-abh03a:2054_0: Ayaṃ pana maggapaccayo dvādasannaṃ maggaṅgānaṃ vasena ṭhitopi jātibhedato kusalādivasena catudhā,
atk-abh03a:2054_1: kusalādīnañca kāmāvacarādibhūmibhedato dvādasadhā bhijjatīti evamettha nānappakārabhedato viññātabbo vinicchayo.
atk-abh03a:2054_2: Evaṃ bhinne panettha catubhūmakampi kusalamaggaṅgaṃ pañcavokāre sampayuttadhammānañceva cittasamuṭṭhānarūpassa ca,
atk-abh03a:2054_3: ṭhapetvā rūpāvacaraṃ avasesaṃ āruppe sampayuttadhammānaññeva maggapaccayena paccayoti sabbaṃ jhānapaccaye
atk-abh03a:2054_4: viya vitthāretabbanti evamettha paccayuppannatopi viññātabbo vinicchayoti.
atk-abh03a:2057_2: Ayaṃ pana sampayuttapaccayo nāma saṅkhepato sabbepi arūpino khandhā.
atk-abh03a:2057_4: bhūmito ca kāmāvacarādīnaṃ vasena anekadhā bhijjatīti evamettha nānappakārabhedato viññātabbo vinicchayo.
atk-abh03a:2057_5: Evaṃ bhinne panettha catubhūmakesupi kusalakkhandhesu eko khandho tiṇṇaṃ khandhānaṃ,
atk-abh03a:2057_7: dve dvinnanti evaṃ sabbepi aññamaññaṃ sampayuttapaccayena paccayo.
atk-abh03a:2057_8: Akusalavipākakiriyakkhandhesupi eseva nayoti evamettha paccayuppannatopi viññātabbo vinicchayoti.
atk-abh03a:2060_1: Vippayuttapaccayaniddese rūpino dhammā arūpīnanti idaṃ tāva hadayavatthuno ceva cakkhundriyādīnañca vasena veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2060_2: Rūpadhammesu hi eteyeva cha koṭṭhāsā arūpakkhandhānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayā honti.
atk-abh03a:2060_7: Arūpino hi khandhā cakkhādīnaṃ vatthūnaṃ abbhantarato nikkhamantā viya uppajjanti.
atk-abh03a:2060_11: Ārammaṇadhammā pana vatthunissayena uppajjamānānaṃ ārammaṇamattā hontīti natthi tesu sampayogāsaṅkā.
atk-abh03a:2060_12: Iti sampayogāsaṅkāya abhāvato na te vippayuttapaccayā.
atk-abh03a:2060_17: Cakkhāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. Sota… ghāna… jivhā…
atk-abh03a:2060_19: Vatthu vipākābyākatānaṃ kiriyābyākatānaṃ khandhānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayoti.
atk-abh03a:2061_0: Arūpino dhammā rūpīnanti idaṃ pana catunnaṃ khandhānaṃ vasena veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2061_1: Arūpadhammesu hi cattāro khandhāva sahajātapurejātānaṃ rūpadhammānaṃ vippayuttapaccayā honti,
atk-abh03a:2061_2: nibbānaṃ pana arūpampi samānaṃ rūpassa vippayuttapaccayo na hoti.
atk-abh03a:2061_6: sahajātā kusalā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
atk-abh03a:2061_7: Pacchājātā kusalā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
atk-abh03a:2061_8: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe vipākābyākatā khandhā kaṭattārūpānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo,
atk-abh03a:2062_0: Ayaṃ pana vippayuttapaccayo nāma saṅkhepato pañcavokārabhave vattamānā rūpārūpadhammā.
atk-abh03a:2062_1: Tesu rūpaṃ vatthuno cakkhādīnañca vasena chadhā bhinnaṃ,
atk-abh03a:2062_3: Tassa bhūmito kāmāvacarādivasena catudhā, ekadhā, tidhā,
atk-abh03a:2062_5: Āruppavipākañhi vippayuttapaccayo na hotīti evamettha nānappakārabhedato viññātabbo vinicchayo.
atk-abh03a:2063_0: Evaṃ bhinne panettha pañcavokārabhave uppannaṃ catubhūmakampi kusalaṃ akusalañca attanā samuṭṭhāpitacittasamuṭṭhānarūpassa
atk-abh03a:2063_2: Uppādakkhaṇaṃ pana atikkamitvā ṭhitikkhaṇaṃ pattassa purejātassa catusamuṭṭhānikatisamuṭṭhānikarūpakāyassa pacchājātavippayuttapaccayena paccayo hoti.
atk-abh03a:2063_3: Ettha ca tisamuṭṭhānikakāyoti āhārasamuṭṭhānassa abhāvato brahmapārisajjādīnaṃ kāyo veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:2063_5: paṭisandhiyaṃ kaṭattārūpassa ca sahajātavippayuttapaccayena paccayo hoti.
atk-abh03a:2063_7: Tividhampi panetaṃ purejātassa catusamuṭṭhānikatisamuṭṭhānikakāyassa pacchājātavippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
atk-abh03a:2063_10: Chadhā ṭhitesu pana rūpesu vatthurūpaṃ paṭisandhikkhaṇe kāmāvacararūpāvacaravipākānaṃ sahajātavippayuttapaccayena paccayo,
atk-abh03a:2063_11: pavatte uppajjamānānaṃ catubhūmakakusalānaṃ akusalānaṃ dvipañcaviññāṇavajjānaṃ tebhūmakavipākānaṃ tebhūmakakiriyānañca
atk-abh03a:2063_13: Cakkhāyatanādīni cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ purejātavippayuttapaccayena paccayoti evamettha paccayuppannatopi viññātabbo vinicchayoti.
atk-abh03a:2066_1: Atthipaccayaniddese cattāro khandhātiādīhi sahajātavasena atthipaccayo niddiṭṭho.
atk-abh03a:2066_3: Yaṃ rūpaṃ nissāyāti ettha sahajātapurejātavasena atthipaccayo niddiṭṭho.
atk-abh03a:2066_4: Evamayaṃ pāḷi sahajātapurejātānaññeva atthipaccayānaṃ vasena āgatā.
atk-abh03a:2066_8: indriyanti imesaṃ vasena āgatattā pacchājātaāhārindriyavasenāpi atthipaccayo labbhati.
atk-abh03a:2066_9: Idha pana sāvasesavasena desanā katāti ayaṃ tāvettha pāḷivaṇṇanā.
atk-abh03a:2067_7: “Cattāro khandhā arūpino”ti ettha hi sabbacittuppattivasena arūpaṃ arūpena vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2067_9: “Okkantikkhaṇe nāmarūpa”nti ettha paṭisandhikhandhānañceva vatthuno ca vasena rūpārūpaṃ rūpārūpena vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2067_13: rūpaṃ arūpassa cittacetasikā dhammā”ti ettha hi pañcavokāravasena arūpaṃ rūpassa vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2067_15: “Cakkhāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇadhātuyā”tiādīsu vatthārammaṇavasena rūpaṃ arūpassa atthipaccayoti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2068_0: Apicesa atthipaccayo nāma saṅkhepato khaṇattayappattaṃ nāmañceva rūpañca,
atk-abh03a:2068_10: Tattha pañca vatthūni ārammaṇāni ca purejātāneva,
atk-abh03a:2068_11: hadayavatthu sahajātaṃ vā hoti purejātaṃ vā.
atk-abh03a:2068_12: Pañhāvāre pana āgato āhāro indriyañca sahajātādibhedaṃ na labhatīti evamettha nānappakārabhedato viññātabbo vinicchayo.
atk-abh03a:2069_0: Evaṃ bhinne panettha catubhūmakakusalopi sahajāto atthipaccayo pañcavokāre “eko khandho tiṇṇannaṃ khandhāna”ntiādinā
atk-abh03a:2069_1: nayena aññamaññaṃ khandhānañceva cittasamuṭṭhānarūpassa ca ṭhapetvā pana rūpāvacarakusalaṃ avaseso āruppe
atk-abh03a:2069_3: Catubhūmako panesa pañcavokāre catusamuṭṭhānikatisamuṭṭhānikakāyassa pacchājāto kusalo atthipaccayena paccayo hoti.
atk-abh03a:2069_5: Sopi hi pañcavokāre sampayuttakkhandhānañceva cittasamuṭṭhānarūpassa ca,
atk-abh03a:2070_0: Vipākato pana kāmāvacararūpāvacaro atthipaccayo niyameneva paṭisandhikkhaṇe khandhānañceva kaṭattārūpassa ca sahajātatthipaccayena paccayo.
atk-abh03a:2070_1: Pavatte pana sampayuttakkhandhānañceva cittasamuṭṭhānarūpassa ca sahajātatthipaccayena paccayo,
atk-abh03a:2070_3: Arūpāvacaravipāko pana āruppe uppannalokuttaravipāko ca attanā sampayuttakkhandhānaññeva sahajātatthipaccayena paccayo.
atk-abh03a:2070_4: Pañcavokāre lokuttaravipāko sampayuttakkhandhānañceva cittasamuṭṭhānarūpassa ca sahajātatthipaccayena paccayo,
atk-abh03a:2070_6: Kiriyato rūpāvacaro atthipaccayo sampayuttakkhandhānañceva cittasamuṭṭhānarūpassa ca sahajātatthipaccayena paccayo,
atk-abh03a:2071_0: Rūpasaṅkhāto pana atthipaccayo sahajāto, purejāto, āhāro,
atk-abh03a:2071_3: Tattha kammasamuṭṭhāno ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ tiṇṇannaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ,
atk-abh03a:2071_6: mahābhūtā upādārūpānanti evaṃ sahajātatthipaccayena paccayo hoti.
atk-abh03a:2071_7: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthurūpaṃ kāmāvacararūpāvacaravipākakkhandhānaṃ sahajātatthipaccayena paccayo hoti.
atk-abh03a:2071_8: Tesampi tisamuṭṭhānikarūpaṃ ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ tiṇṇannaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ,
atk-abh03a:2071_11: mahābhūtā upādārūpānanti evaṃ sahajātatthipaccayena paccayo hoti.
atk-abh03a:2071_13: So duvidhopi heṭṭhā purejātapaccaye vuttanayeneva yojetvā gahetabbo.
atk-abh03a:2071_15: Idha panesa attano aniruddhakkhaṇe paccayabhāvena atthipaccayoti vutto.
atk-abh03a:2071_16: Rūpajīvitindriyampi heṭṭhā indriyapaccaye rūpajīvitindriyayojanāyaṃ vuttanayeneva yojetabbaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2071_17: Idha panetampi attano aniruddhakkhaṇeyeva paccayabhāvena atthipaccayoti vuttanti evamettha paccayuppannatopi viññātabbo vinicchayoti.
atk-abh03a:2074_1: Natthipaccayaniddese samanantaraniruddhāti aññena cittuppādena anantarikā hutvā samanantaraniruddhā.
atk-abh03a:2074_4: Purimesu hi nirodhavasena pacchimānaṃ pavattanokāsaṃ adentesu tesaṃ paṭuppannabhāvo na siyāti ayamettha pāḷivaṇṇanā.
atk-abh03a:2074_8: Kevalaṃ pana tattha “cakkhuviññāṇadhātu taṃsampayuttakā ca dhammā manodhātuyā”tiādinā nayena paccayā ca paccayuppannā ca sarūpato dassitā.
atk-abh03a:2074_9: Idha pana “samanantaraniruddhā cittacetasikā dhammā paṭuppannānaṃ cittacetasikānaṃ dhammāna”nti sabbepi te nirodhuppādavasena sāmaññato dassitāti.
atk-abh03a:2077_3: Iti natthipaccayassa ca imassa ca byañjanamatteyeva nānattaṃ,
atk-abh03a:2080_1: Avigatapaccayaniddese cattāro khandhātiādīnaṃ sabbākārena atthipaccayaniddese vuttanayeneva attho veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:2080_2: Imassapi hi paccayassa atthipaccayena saddhiṃ byañjanamatteyeva nānattaṃ,
atk-abh03a:2083_0: Idāni evaṃ uddesaniddesato dassitesu imesu catuvīsatiyā paccayesu ñāṇacārassa visadabhāvatthaṃ anekadhammānaṃ ekapaccayabhāvato,
atk-abh03a:2083_9: bhavabhedatoti imesaṃ dasannaṃ padānaṃ vasena pakiṇṇakavinicchayo veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:2083_10: Tattha anekadhammānaṃ ekapaccayabhāvatoti etesu hi ṭhapetvā kammapaccayaṃ avasesesu tevīsatiyā paccayesu anekadhammā ekato paccayā honti.
atk-abh03a:2083_11: Kammapaccayo pana eko cetanādhammoyevāti evaṃ tāvettha anekadhammānaṃ ekapaccayabhāvato vinicchayo veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:2084_0: Ekadhammassa anekapaccayabhāvatoti hetupaccaye tāva amoho eko dhammo.
atk-abh03a:2084_2: sesānaṃ vīsatiyā paccayānaṃ vasena paccayo hoti.
atk-abh03a:2084_4: sesānaṃ aṭṭhārasannaṃ paccayānaṃ vasena paccayā honti.
atk-abh03a:2084_6: sesānaṃ sattarasannaṃ paccayānaṃ vasena paccayā honti.
atk-abh03a:2084_8: sesānaṃ soḷasannaṃ paccayānaṃ vasena paccayo hoti.
atk-abh03a:2084_9: Ārammaṇapaccaye rūpāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇadhātuyā ārammaṇapurejātaatthiavigatavasena catudhā paccayo;
atk-abh03a:2084_12: Iminā nayena sabbesaṃ ārammaṇapaccayadhammānaṃ anekapaccayabhāvo veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:2085_0: Adhipatipaccaye ārammaṇādhipatino ārammaṇapaccaye vuttanayeneva anekapaccayabhāvo veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:2085_1: Sahajātādhipatīsu vīmaṃsā amohahetu viya vīsatidhā paccayo hoti.
atk-abh03a:2085_3: sesānaṃ sattarasannaṃ paccayānaṃ vasena paccayo hoti.
atk-abh03a:2085_5: sesānaṃ ekūnavīsatiyā paccayānaṃ vasena paccayo hoti.
atk-abh03a:2086_0: Anantarapaccaye “cakkhuviññāṇadhātū”tiādinā nayena vuttesu catūsu khandhesu vedanākkhandho hetupurejātakammāhāramaggapaccayo na hoti,
atk-abh03a:2086_19: Sati tehi ceva maggapaccayena cāti ekūnavīsatiyā vasena paccayo hoti.
atk-abh03a:2086_20: Jīvitindriyaṃ saddhāya vuttānaṃ aṭṭhārasannaṃ vasena paccayo hoti.
atk-abh03a:2086_21: Hirottappaṃ tato indriyapaccayaṃ apanetvā sesānaṃ sattarasannaṃ vasena paccayo hoti.
atk-abh03a:2086_24: Viratiyo pana tehi ceva maggapaccayena cāti aṭṭhārasadhā paccayā honti.
atk-abh03a:2086_26: micchāvācākammantājīvā tehi ceva kammāhārapaccayehi cāti ekūnavīsatidhā.
atk-abh03a:2086_27: Ahirikaṃ anottappaṃ māno thinaṃ middhaṃ uddhaccanti ime hetupurejātakammavipākāhārindriyajhānamaggapaccayā na honti,
atk-abh03a:2086_28: sesānaṃ pana soḷasannaṃ paccayānaṃ vasena paccayā honti.
atk-abh03a:2086_29: Vicikicchāissāmacchariyakukkuccāni tato adhipatipaccayaṃ apanetvā pannarasadhā viññāṇakkhandhassa.
atk-abh03a:2087_0: Sahajātapaccaye catūsu tāva khandhesu ekekassa dhammassa anekapaccayabhāvo vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:2087_2: Hadayavatthu tesañceva vippayuttassa ca vasena dasadhā paccayo hoti.
atk-abh03a:2088_0: Ekapaccayassa anekapaccayabhāvatoti hetupaccayādīsu yassa kassaci ekassa paccayassa yenākārena yenatthena yo paccayuppannānaṃ paccayo hoti,
atk-abh03a:2088_1: taṃ ākāraṃ taṃ atthaṃ avijahitvāva aññehipi yehākārehi yehi atthehi so tasmiññeva khaṇe tesaṃ dhammānaṃ anekapaccayabhāvaṃ gacchati,
atk-abh03a:2088_2: tato anekapaccayabhāvato tassa vinicchayo veditabboti attho.
atk-abh03a:2088_7: Alobhādosā tato adhipatiindriyamaggapaccaye tayo apanetvā sesānaṃ vasena anekapaccayabhāvaṃ gacchanti.
atk-abh03a:2088_10: Lobhadosamohā te tayo vipākañcāti cattāro apanetvā sesānaṃ vasena anekapaccayabhāvaṃ gacchanti.
atk-abh03a:2089_3: arūpadhammānaṃ pana atītānāgatānaṃ vā rūpadhammānaṃ ārammaṇapaccayabhāve sati ārammaṇādhipatiārammaṇūpanissayamattaññeva uttari labbhati.
atk-abh03a:2089_7: Vīriyaṃ tesañceva indriyamaggapaccayānañcāti imesaṃ vasena aparehipi dasahākārehi anekapaccayabhāvaṃ gacchati.
atk-abh03a:2089_8: Cittaṃ tato maggapaccayaṃ apanetvā āhārapaccayaṃ pakkhipitvā imesaṃ vasena adhipatipaccayato uttari dasahākārehi anekapaccayabhāvaṃ gacchati.
atk-abh03a:2089_9: Ārammaṇādhipatino pana heṭṭhā ārammaṇapaccaye vuttanayeneva anekapaccayabhāvo veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:2090_6: Ayampi ukkaṭṭhaparicchedo vatthusahajātādīnaṃ pana vasenettha hetupaccayādīnaṃ abhāvopi veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:2091_0: Nissayapaccayo nissayapaccayattaṃ avijahantova catuvīsatiyā paccayesu attano nissayapaccayattañceva anantarasamanantarapacchājātaāsevananatthivigatapaccaye
atk-abh03a:2091_1: ca cha apanetvā sesānaṃ vasena aparehipi sattarasahākārehi anekapaccayabhāvaṃ gacchati.
atk-abh03a:2091_2: Ayampi ukkaṭṭhaparicchedova vatthunissayādīnaṃ pana vasenettha hetupaccayādīnaṃ ābhāvopi veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:2092_8: Ayampi ukkaṭṭhaniddesova ārammaṇapurejāte panettha nissayaindriyavippayuttapaccayatā na labbhati.
atk-abh03a:2092_10: Pacchājātapaccayo attano pacchājātapaccayabhāvaṃ avijahantova vippayuttaatthiavigatānaṃ vasena aparehipi tīhākārehi anekapaccayabhāvaṃ gacchati.
atk-abh03a:2093_2: Nānākkhaṇiko upanissayaanantarasamanantaranatthivigatānaṃ vasena aparehipi pañcahākārehi anekapaccayabhāvaṃ gacchati.
atk-abh03a:2093_5: Āhārapaccaye kabaḷīkāro āhāro āhārapaccayattaṃ avijahantova atthiavigatānaṃ vasena aparehipi dvīhākārehi anekapaccayabhāvaṃ gacchati.
atk-abh03a:2094_0: Indriyapaccaye rūpino pañcindriyā indriyapaccayattaṃ avijahantāva nissayapurejātavippayuttaatthiavigatānaṃ
atk-abh03a:2094_2: Rūpajīvitindriyampi indriyapaccayattaṃ avijahantaññeva atthiavigatānaṃ vasena aparehipi dvīhākārehi anekapaccayabhāvaṃ gacchati.
atk-abh03a:2094_7: Maggapaccayo maggapaccayattaṃ avijahantova yathānurūpaṃ jhānapaccaye vuttānaṃ dasannaṃ hetuadhipatīnañcāti
atk-abh03a:2094_8: imesaṃ vasena aparehipi dvādasahākārehi anekapaccayabhāvaṃ gacchati.
atk-abh03a:2095_3: cha paccaye apanetvā sesānaṃ vasena yathānurūpaṃ aparehipi sattarasahākārehi anekapaccayabhāvaṃ gacchati.
atk-abh03a:2095_4: Tattha rūpassa ca arūpassa ca paccayavibhāgo veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:2095_6: apanetvā sesānaṃ vasena yathānurūpaṃ aparehi aṭṭhārasahākārehi anekapaccayabhāvaṃ gacchati.
atk-abh03a:2095_8: Avigatapaccayo atthipaccayasadisoyevāti evamettha ekapaccayassa anekapaccayabhāvatopi viññātabbo vinicchayo.
atk-abh03a:2096_0: Paccayasabhāgatoti etesu hi catuvīsatiyā paccayesu anantarasamanantaraanantarūpanissayaāsevananatthivigatā sabhāgā,
atk-abh03a:2096_1: tathā ārammaṇaārammaṇādhipatiārammaṇūpanissayāti iminā upāyenettha paccayasabhāgatopi viññātabbo vinicchayo.
atk-abh03a:2097_3: vigatapaccayo avigatapaccayenāti iminā upāyenettha paccayavisabhāgatopi viññātabbo vinicchayo.
atk-abh03a:2098_4: aññamaññapaṭipakkhatāyāti imehi kāraṇehi yugaḷakato viññātabbo vinicchayo.
atk-abh03a:2098_5: Anantarasamanantarā hi atthasarikkhatāya ekaṃ yugaḷakaṃ nāma;
atk-abh03a:2098_11: vigatāvigatapaccayā cāti evamettha yugaḷakatopi viññātabbo vinicchayo.
atk-abh03a:2098_18: Sesā janakā ca ajanakā ca upatthambhakā cāti attho.
atk-abh03a:2099_0: Sabbaṭṭhānikāsabbaṭṭhānikatoti etesu ca sahajātanissayaatthiavigatapaccayā sabbaṭṭhānikā nāma,
atk-abh03a:2099_1: sabbesaṃ saṅkhatānaṃ rūpārūpadhammānaṃ ṭhānabhūtā kāraṇabhūtāti attho.
atk-abh03a:2099_9: Vuttāvasesāpi ekaccānaṃ rūpārūpadhammānaṃ uppattihetuto na sabbaṭṭhānikāti evamettha sabbaṭṭhānikā sabbaṭṭhānikatopi viññātabbo vinicchayo.
atk-abh03a:2100_0: Rūpaṃ rūpassātiādivikappatoti etesu ca catuvīsatiyā paccayesu ekapaccayopi ekantena rūpameva hutvā rūpasseva paccayo nāma natthi,
atk-abh03a:2100_1: ekantena pana rūpaṃ hutvā arūpasseva paccayo nāma atthi.
atk-abh03a:2100_4: Purejātapaccayo hi ekantena rūpameva hutvā arūpasseva paccayo hoti.
atk-abh03a:2100_5: Ekantena rūpameva hutvā rūpārūpasseva paccayo nāmātipi natthi,
atk-abh03a:2100_6: ekantena pana arūpaṃ hutvā arūpasseva paccayo nāma atthi.
atk-abh03a:2100_9: So hi sabbopi ekantena arūpameva hutvā arūpasseva paccayo hoti.
atk-abh03a:2100_10: Ekantena arūpameva hutvāpi ekantena rūpasseva paccayo nāmātipi atthi.
atk-abh03a:2100_13: So hi ekantena arūpaṃ hutvā rūpasseva paccayo hoti;
atk-abh03a:2100_14: ekantena pana arūpadhammova hutvā rūpārūpānaṃ paccayopi atthi.
atk-abh03a:2100_17: So hi sabbopi ekantena arūpameva hutvā rūpadhammānaṃ arūpadhammānampi paccayo hoti.
atk-abh03a:2100_18: Ekantena pana rūpārūpameva hutvā rūpasseva paccayo nāmātipi natthi,
atk-abh03a:2100_22: Idañhi dvayaṃ ekantena rūpārūpameva hutvā arūpasseva paccayo hoti.
atk-abh03a:2100_23: Ekantena rūpārūpameva hutvā pana rūpārūpasseva paccayo nāmātipi atthi.
atk-abh03a:2100_26: So hi sabbopi ekantena rūpārūpameva hutvā rūpārūpasseva paccayo hotīti evamettha rūpaṃ rūpassātiādivikappatopi viññātabbo vinicchayo.
atk-abh03a:2101_0: Bhavabhedatoti imesu pana catuvīsatiyā paccayesu pañcavokārabhave tāva na koci paccayo na labbhati nāma.
atk-abh03a:2101_1: Catuvokārabhave pana tayo purejātapacchājātavippayuttapaccaye apanetvā sesā ekavīsatimeva labbhanti.
atk-abh03a:2101_3: Bāhire pana anindriyabaddharūpe sahajātaaññamaññanissayaatthiavigatavasena pañceva labbhantīti evamettha bhavabhedatopi viññātabbo vinicchayoti.
atk-abh03a:2105_1: ye tikādayo nissāya niddiṭṭhattā etaṃ tikapaṭṭhānaṃ,
atk-abh03a:2105_4: Te anāmasitvā yesaṃ paccayānaṃ vasena te tikādayo vibhattā,
atk-abh03a:2105_5: te paccaye eva tāva iminā mātikānikkhepapaccayavibhaṅgasaṅkhātena vārena uddesato ca niddesato ca dassetvā,
atk-abh03a:2105_6: idāni ye tikādayo nissāya niddiṭṭhattā etaṃ tikapaṭṭhānaṃ,
atk-abh03a:2105_9: Te tikādayo imesaṃ paccayānaṃ vasena vitthāretvā dassetuṃ ekekaṃ tikadukaṃ nissāya sattahi mahāvārehi desanā katā.
atk-abh03a:2106_0: Tattha “kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo dhammo”ti evaṃ paṭiccābhidhānavasena vutto paṭiccavāro nāma.
atk-abh03a:2106_1: Kusalaṃ dhammaṃ sahajāto kusalo dhammo”ti evaṃ sahajātābhidhānavasena vutto sahajātavāro nāma.
atk-abh03a:2106_3: Paṭiccābhidhānavasena bujjhanakānaṃ vasena pana paṭhamo vutto,
atk-abh03a:2106_5: Dvīsupi cetesu rūpārūpadhammavasena paccayā ceva paccayuppannadhammā ca veditabbā.
atk-abh03a:2106_8: “Kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā kusalo dhammo”ti evaṃ paccayābhidhānavasena vutto pana paccayavāro nāma.
atk-abh03a:2106_12: Tadanantaro “kusalaṃ dhammaṃ nissāya kusalo dhammo”ti evaṃ nissayābhidhānavasena vutto nissayavāro nāma.
atk-abh03a:2106_14: Paccayābhidhānavasena bujjhanakānaṃ vasena pana paṭhamo vutto,
atk-abh03a:2106_16: Tato paraṃ “kusalaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho kusalo dhammo”ti evaṃ saṃsaṭṭhābhidhānavasena vutto saṃsaṭṭhavāro nāma.
atk-abh03a:2106_17: “Kusalaṃ dhammaṃ sampayutto kusalo dhammo”ti evaṃ sampayuttābhidhānavasena vutto sampayuttavāro nāma.
atk-abh03a:2106_19: Saṃsaṭṭhābhidhānavasena bujjhanakānaṃ vasena pana paṭhamo vutto,
atk-abh03a:2106_21: Dvīsupi cetesu arūpadhammavaseneva paccayā paccayuppannā ca veditabbā.
atk-abh03a:2106_22: Sattamavāre pana yasmā “kusalo dhammo kusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo”tiādinā nayena te te
atk-abh03a:2106_23: pañhe uddharitvā puna “kusalā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhāna”ntiādinā nayena sabbepi te pañhā nijjaṭā
atk-abh03a:2106_25: tasmā so vāro pañhānaṃ sādhukaṃ vibhattattā pañhāvārotveva saṅkhyaṃ gato.
atk-abh03a:2107_0: Tattha yo tāva esa sabbapaṭhamo paṭiccavāro nāma,
atk-abh03a:2107_1: so uddesato niddesato ca duvidho hoti.
atk-abh03a:2107_5: So hi kusalādayo paṭicca kusalādīnaṃ hetupaccayādīnaṃ vasena uddiṭṭhattā uddesavāro,
atk-abh03a:2107_6: kusalādayo paṭicca hetupaccayādivasena kusalādīnaṃ uppattiyā pucchitattā pucchāvāro,
atk-abh03a:2107_7: kusalādayo paṭicca hetupaccayādivasena kusalādīnaṃ uppattiyā paññāpitattā paṇṇattivārotipi vutto.
atk-abh03a:2108_1: Tattha siyā kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjeyya hetupaccayāti parikappapucchā.
atk-abh03a:2108_4: kiṃ so kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca siyāti atha vā kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca yo kusalo dhammo uppajjeyya,
atk-abh03a:2108_10: Ubhayaṃ ekato katvā paṭiccāti paṭigantvā sahuppattisaṅkhātena sadisabhāvena patvā,
atk-abh03a:2108_11: tena saddhiṃ ekato uppattibhāvaṃ upagantvāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-abh03a:2108_12: Kusalo dhammoti evaṃ sahuppattibhāvena kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjeyya hetupaccayāti pucchati.
atk-abh03a:2108_14: Taṃ pana paccayakaraṇaṃ purejātepi paccaye labbhati sahajātepi.
atk-abh03a:2108_16: Siyā kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalotiādīsupi eseva nayo.
atk-abh03a:2108_17: Tattha kiñcāpi sahajātavasena kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo natthi,
atk-abh03a:2108_18: imasmiṃ pana pucchāvāre yampi vissajjiyamānaṃ atthato labbhati,
atk-abh03a:2108_21: Parato pana vissajjane yaṃ na labbhati,
atk-abh03a:2109_0: Evamettha pucchānaṃ atthañceva pucchāgatiñca ñatvā idāni gaṇanavasena pucchāparicchedo veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:2109_1: Ettha hi “kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭiccā”ti kusalapadaṃ ādiṃ katvā kusalākusalābyākatantā tisso pucchā,
atk-abh03a:2109_2: puna tadevādiṃ katvā kusalābyākatādivasena dukappabhedantā tisso,
atk-abh03a:2109_3: puna tadevādiṃ katvā tikantā ca ekā,
atk-abh03a:2109_4: evaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭiccāti kusalādikā satta pucchā,
atk-abh03a:2109_10: kusalākusalābyākatādikāti sabbāpi sattannaṃ sattakānaṃ vasena kusalattikaṃ nissāya hetupaccaye ekūnapaññāsaṃ pucchā.
atk-abh03a:2113_1: Tato paraṃ hetupaccayā ārammaṇapaccayāti dumūlakanayo āraddho.
atk-abh03a:2113_3: hetuavigatadukoti hetupaccayena saddhiṃ tevīsati dukā honti.
atk-abh03a:2113_4: Tesu hetupaccaye viya hetārammaṇadukepi ekūnapaññāsaṃ pucchā,
atk-abh03a:2113_6: Yathā ca hetārammaṇaduke ekūnapaññāsaṃ tathā hetādhipatidukādīsupi.
atk-abh03a:2113_9: hetusamanantaradukoti paṭipāṭiyā tayo duke dassetvā pariyosāne hetuavigataduko dassito,
atk-abh03a:2116_1: Tato paraṃ hetupaccayā ārammaṇapaccayā adhipatipaccayāti timūlakanayo āraddho.
atk-abh03a:2116_2: Tattha hetārammaṇadukena saddhiṃ adhipatipaccayādīsu bāvīsatiyā paccayesu ekamekassa yojanāvasena bāvīsati tikā honti.
atk-abh03a:2116_3: Tesu paṭhamapucchāvasena paṭhamattikañca dutiyattikañca dassetvā pariyosānatiko dassito,
atk-abh03a:2116_6: evaṃ tikesupi ekamekasmiṃ tike ekūnapaññāsaṃ katvā sabbesupi bāvīsatiyā tikesu –
atk-abh03a:2119_1: Tato paraṃ hetupaccayā ārammaṇapaccayā adhipatipaccayā anantarapaccayāti catumūlakanayo āraddho.
atk-abh03a:2119_2: Tattha paṭhamattikena saddhiṃ anantarapaccayādīsu ekavīsatiyā paccayesu ekamekassa yojanāvasena ekavīsati catukkā honti.
atk-abh03a:2119_3: Tesu dve catukke dassetvā sesaṃ saṅkhittaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2119_4: Idhāpi ekamekasmiṃ catukke ekūnapaññāsaṃ katvā sabbesupi ekavīsatiyā catukkesu –
atk-abh03a:2122_0: Tato paraṃ pañcamūlakaṃ ādiṃ katvā yāva sabbamūlakā desanā katā,
atk-abh03a:2122_1: taṃ sabbaṃ saṅkhipitvā heṭṭhā vuttañca upari vattabbañca ekato katvā pāḷiyaṃ “ekamūlakaṃ,
atk-abh03a:2122_9: Pañcamūlake pana paṭhamacatukkena saddhiṃ samanantarapaccayādīsu samavīsatiyā paccayesu ekamekassa yojanāvasena samavīsati pañcakā honti.
atk-abh03a:2123_0: Satāni nava pucchānaṃ, asīti ca punāparā;
atk-abh03a:2125_0: Chamūlake paṭhamapañcakena saddhiṃ sahajātapaccayādīsu ekūnavīsatiyā paccayesu ekamekassa yojanāvasena ekūnavīsati chakkā honti.
atk-abh03a:2128_0: Sattamūlake paṭhamachakkena saddhiṃ aññamaññapaccayādīsu aṭṭhārasasu paccayesu ekamekassa yojanāvasena aṭṭhārasa sattakā honti.
atk-abh03a:2129_0: Satāni aṭṭha pucchānaṃ, dvāsīti ca tatoparā;
atk-abh03a:2131_0: Aṭṭhamūlake paṭhamasattakena saddhiṃ nissayapaccayādīsu sattarasasu paccayesu ekamekassa yojanāvasena sattarasa aṭṭhakā honti.
atk-abh03a:2132_0: Satāni aṭṭha pucchānaṃ, tettiṃsā ca tatoparā;
atk-abh03a:2134_0: Navamūlake paṭhamaaṭṭhakena saddhiṃ upanissayapaccayādīsu soḷasasu paccayesu ekamekassa yojanāvasena soḷasa navakā honti.
atk-abh03a:2137_0: Dasamūlake paṭhamanavakena saddhiṃ purejātapaccayādīsu pannarasasu paccayesu ekamekassa yojanāvasena pannarasa dasakā honti.
atk-abh03a:2140_0: Ekādasamūlake paṭhamadasakena saddhiṃ pacchājātapaccayādīsu cuddasasu paccayesu ekamekassa yojanāvasena cuddasa ekādasakā honti.
atk-abh03a:2141_0: Cha satāni ca pucchānaṃ, chaḷāsīti tatoparā;
atk-abh03a:2143_0: Dvādasamūlake paṭhamaekādasakena saddhiṃ āsevanapaccayādīsu terasasu paccayesu ekamekassa yojanāvasena terasa dvādasakā honti.
atk-abh03a:2144_0: Cha satāni ca pucchānaṃ, sattatiṃsa tatoparā;
atk-abh03a:2146_0: Terasamūlake paṭhamadvādasakena saddhiṃ kammapaccayādīsu dvādasasu paccayesu ekamekassa yojanāvasena dvādasa terasakā honti.
atk-abh03a:2149_0: Cuddasamūlake paṭhamaterasakena saddhiṃ vipākapaccayādīsu ekādasasu paccayesu ekamekassa yojanāvasena ekādasa cuddasakā honti.
atk-abh03a:2150_0: Satāni pañca pucchānaṃ, tiṃsa cātha navāparā;
atk-abh03a:2152_0: Pannarasamūlake paṭhamacuddasakena saddhiṃ āhārapaccayādīsu dasasu paccayesu ekamekassa yojanāvasena dasa pannarasakā honti.
atk-abh03a:2153_0: Satāni cattāri pucchānaṃ, navuti ca tatoparā;
atk-abh03a:2155_0: Soḷasamūlake paṭhamapannarasakena saddhiṃ indriyapaccayādīsu navasu paccayesu ekamekassa yojanāvasena nava soḷasakā honti.
atk-abh03a:2158_0: Sattarasamūlake paṭhamasoḷasakena saddhiṃ jhānapaccayādīsu aṭṭhasu paccayesu ekamekassa yojanāvasena aṭṭha sattarasakā honti.
atk-abh03a:2159_0: Satāni tīṇi pucchānaṃ, navuti dve punāparā;
atk-abh03a:2161_0: Aṭṭhārasamūlake paṭhamasattarasakena saddhiṃ maggapaccayādīsu sattasu paccayesu ekamekassa yojanāvasena satta aṭṭhārasakā honti.
atk-abh03a:2164_0: Ekūnavīsatimūlake paṭhamaaṭṭhārasakena saddhiṃ sampayuttapaccayādīsu chasu paccayesu ekamekassa yojanāvasena cha ekūnavīsatikā honti.
atk-abh03a:2165_0: Dve satā navuti ceva, catasso ca punāparā;
atk-abh03a:2167_0: Vīsatimūlake paṭhamaekūnavīsatikena saddhiṃ vippayuttapaccayādīsu pañcasu paccayesu ekamekassa yojanāvasena pañcavīsatikā honti.
atk-abh03a:2168_0: Dve satā honti pucchānaṃ, cattālīsā ca pañca ca;
atk-abh03a:2170_0: Ekavīsatimūlake paṭhamavīsatikena saddhiṃ atthipaccayādīsu catūsu paccayesu ekamekassa yojanāvasena cattāro ekavīsatikā honti.
atk-abh03a:2171_0: Sataṃ chanavuti ceva, pucchā honti sampiṇḍitā;
atk-abh03a:2173_0: Dvāvīsatimūlake paṭhamaekavīsatikena saddhiṃ natthipaccayādīsu tīsu paccayesu ekamekassa yojanāvasena tayo dvāvīsatikā honti.
atk-abh03a:2176_0: Tevīsatimūlake paṭhamadvāvīsatikena saddhiṃ dvīsu vigatāvigatapaccayesu ekamekassa yojanāvasena dve tevīsatikā honti.
atk-abh03a:2179_2: Tattha ekūnapaññāsameva pucchā hontīti sabbāpetā hetupaccayapadameva gahetvā ekamūlakādīnaṃ sabbamūlakapariyosānānaṃ
atk-abh03a:2179_3: vasena satthārā devaparisati vitthārato vibhattā pucchā idha saṅkhepena dassitā.
atk-abh03a:2180_1: ekamūlakanayasmiñhi ekādasa satāni chasattati ca pucchā āgatā.
atk-abh03a:2180_2: Hetupaccayanaye teneva mūlakena ekūnapaññāsaṃ katvā imasmiṃ hetupaccayamūlake gahetabbā,
atk-abh03a:2180_26: sabbamūlake ekūnapaññāsāti evaṃ hetupadaṃ ādiṃ katvā vibhattesu ekamūlakādīsu –
atk-abh03a:2181_0: Cuddaseva sahassāni, puna satta satāni ca;
atk-abh03a:2183_1: Evaṃ hetupaccayaṃ ādiṃ katvā ekamūlakato paṭṭhāya yāva sabbamūlakanayā pucchābhedaṃ dassetvā idāni ārammaṇapaccayaṃ
atk-abh03a:2183_2: ādiṃ katvā dassetuṃ siyā kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjeyya ārammaṇapaccayā hetupaccayātiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:2183_3: Tattha ārammaṇapaccayā hetupaccayāti ettāvatā ārammaṇapaccayaṃ ādiṃ katvā hetupaccayapariyosāno ekamūlakanayo dassito.
atk-abh03a:2183_4: Tato paraṃ ārammaṇapaccayā adhipatipaccayāti dukamūlakaṃ āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2183_5: Tattha imaṃ paṭhamadukañceva ārammaṇāvigatadukañca dassetvā sesaṃ saṅkhittaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2183_6: Ārammaṇapaccayā hetupaccayāti ayaṃ osānadukopi na dassito.
atk-abh03a:2183_9: Tato paraṃ ārammaṇapaccayavasena tikamūlakādayo adassetvāva adhipatipaccayaṃ ādiṃ katvā ekakādayo dassetuṃ adhipatipaccayā,
atk-abh03a:2183_14: taṃ ekamūlakavasena vā sabbamūlakavasena vā veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2184_1: Tato paraṃ avigatapaccayaṃ ādiṃ katvā dumūlakameva dassetuṃ –
atk-abh03a:2184_5: avigatādhipatidukoti paṭipāṭiyā tayo duke vatvā pariyosāne ca avigatavigataduko eko duko dassito.
atk-abh03a:2184_9: avigatapaccayā hetupaccayā anantarapaccayā”ti evaṃ paṭipāṭiyā tayo tike vatvā “avigatapaccayā hetupaccayā vigatapaccayā”ti pariyosānattiko vutto.
atk-abh03a:2184_10: Tato avigatapaccayavaseneva catumūlakaṃ dassetuṃ “avigatapaccayā hetupaccayā ārammaṇapaccayā adhipatipaccayā,
atk-abh03a:2184_11: avigatapaccayā hetupaccayā ārammaṇapaccayā anantarapaccayā”ti dve catukke vatvā “vigatapaccayā”ti padaṃ uddharitvā ṭhapitaṃ,
atk-abh03a:2184_17: Tasmā yathā hetupaccayaṃ ādiṃ katvā hetuādipadavasena ekamūlake ekādasa pucchāsatāni chasattati ca pucchā…pe…
atk-abh03a:2184_19: evaṃ ārammaṇapaccayādīsupi ekamekaṃ ādiṃ katvā ārammaṇādipadavasena ekamekassa padassa ekamūlake ekādasa pucchāsatāni chasattati ca pucchā…pe…
atk-abh03a:2184_20: sabbamūlake ekūnapaññāsāti ekekassa padassa ekamūlakādibhede sattasatādhikāni cuddasa pucchā sahassāni honti.
atk-abh03a:2184_21: Tāsaṃ sabbesupi catuvīsatiyā paccayesu ayaṃ gaṇanaparicchedo –
atk-abh03a:2187_0: Yathā ca kusalattikassa, evaṃ vedanāttikādīnampīti sabbesupi dvāvīsatiyā tikesu –
atk-abh03a:2191_0: Dukesu pana “siyā hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetudhammo uppajjeyya hetupaccayā”ti evaṃ hetuṃ paṭicca hetu,
atk-abh03a:2191_2: hetuṃ paṭicca hetu ca nahetu ca,
atk-abh03a:2191_5: nahetuṃ paṭicca hetu ca nahetu ca,
atk-abh03a:2191_8: hetuñca nahetuñca paṭicca hetu ca nahetu cāti ekamekasmiṃ duke hetupaccayādīsu ekamekasmiṃ paccaye nava pucchā honti.
atk-abh03a:2191_9: Tāsu hetupaccayaṃ ādiṃ katvā ekamūlake dvesatāni soḷasa ca pucchā honti.
atk-abh03a:2191_10: Tāsu hetupaccayasseva aññena asammissā nava pucchā gahetabbā,
atk-abh03a:2192_0: Tāsaṃ dukamūlakādīsu tevīsatiyā vāresu ekekaṃ navakaṃ apanetvā yāva sabbamūlakā ayaṃ gaṇanaparicchedo –
atk-abh03a:2192_1: dukamūlake tāva ekamūlake dassitesu dvīsu soḷasādhikesu pucchāsatesu nava apanetvā dvesatāni satta ca pucchā honti,
atk-abh03a:2192_3: Evaṃ purimapurimato nava nava apanetvā catumūlake ekūnanavutisataṃ,
atk-abh03a:2192_24: Yathā panetāni hetupaccayavasena ekamūlake soḷasādhikāni dve pucchāsatāni…pe…
atk-abh03a:2192_26: evaṃ ārammaṇapaccayādīsupi ekamekaṃ ādiṃ katvā ārammaṇādipadavasena ekekassa padassa ekamūlake soḷasādhikāni dve pucchāsatāni…pe…
atk-abh03a:2192_27: sabbamūlake navāti ekekassa padassa ekamūlakādibhede dve pucchā sahassāni sattasatāni ca pucchā honti.
atk-abh03a:2192_28: Tāsaṃ sabbesupi catuvīsatiyā paccayesu ayaṃ gaṇanaparicchedo –
atk-abh03a:2195_0: Yathā ca hetudukassa, evaṃ sahetukadukādīnampīti sabbasmimpi dukasate –
atk-abh03a:2197_0: Asīti ca sahassāni, pucchā dukasate vidū.
atk-abh03a:2198_0: Ayaṃ tāva suddhike tikapaṭṭhāne ceva dukapaṭṭhāne ca pucchānaṃ gaṇanaparicchedo.
atk-abh03a:2199_0: Yaṃ pana tato paraṃ dvāvīsati tike gahetvā dukasate pakkhipitvā dukatikapaṭṭhānaṃ nāma desitaṃ,
atk-abh03a:2199_1: tattha “siyā hetuṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu kusalo dhammo uppajjeyya hetupaccayā”ti evaṃ dvāvīsatiyā
atk-abh03a:2199_2: tikesu ekekaṃ tikaṃ dukānaṃ satena satena saddhiṃ yojetvā dassetabbānaṃ pucchānaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayena
atk-abh03a:2199_3: sabbesaṃ ekamūlakādīnaṃ vasena gahetvā paricchedo veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:2200_0: Yampi tato paraṃ dukasataṃ gahetvā dvāvīsatiyā tikesu pakkhipitvā tikadukapaṭṭhānaṃ nāma desitaṃ,
atk-abh03a:2200_1: tatthāpi “siyā kusalaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo hetudhammo uppajjeyya hetupaccayā”ti evaṃ dukasate
atk-abh03a:2200_2: ekekaṃ dukaṃ dvāvīsatiyā tikehi saddhiṃ yojetvā dassetabbānaṃ pucchānaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayena sabbesaṃ ekamūlakādīnaṃ
atk-abh03a:2201_0: Yampi tato paraṃ tike tikesuyeva pakkhipitvā tikatikapaṭṭhānaṃ nāma desitaṃ,
atk-abh03a:2201_1: tatthāpi “siyā kusalaṃ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto
atk-abh03a:2201_2: dhammo uppajjeyya hetupaccayā”ti evaṃ dvāvīsatiyā tikesu ekekaṃ tikaṃ sesehi ekavīsatiyā tikehi saddhiṃ
atk-abh03a:2201_3: yojetvā dassetabbānaṃ pucchānaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayena sabbesaṃ ekamūlakādīnaṃ vasena gahetvā paricchedo
atk-abh03a:2202_0: Yampi tato paraṃ duke dukesuyeva pakkhipitvā dukadukapaṭṭhānaṃ nāma desitaṃ,
atk-abh03a:2202_1: tatthāpi “siyā hetuṃ sahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu sahetuko dhammo uppajjeyya hetupaccayā”ti evaṃ dukasate
atk-abh03a:2202_2: ekekaṃ dukaṃ sesehi navanavutiyā dukehi saddhiṃ yojetvā dassetabbānaṃ pucchānaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayena sabbesaṃ
atk-abh03a:2202_4: Tathāgatena hi sabbampetaṃ pabhedaṃ dassetvāva devaparisāya dhammo desito,
atk-abh03a:2202_5: dhammasenāpatissa pana tena “ajja idañcidañca desita”nti saṅkhipitvā nayadassanamatteneva desanā akkhātā.
atk-abh03a:2202_7: so therena pavattitanayeneva saṅgītikāle saṅgahaṃ āropito.
atk-abh03a:2203_0: Taṃ panassa saṅkhepanayaṃ dassetuṃ tikañca paṭṭhānavaranti ayaṃ gāthā ṭhapitā.
atk-abh03a:2203_8: Cha anulomamhi nayā sugambhīrāti ete tikapaṭṭhānādayo suṭṭhu gambhīrā cha nayā anulomamhi veditabbāti.
atk-abh03a:2203_11: Tattha “kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo dhammo”ti evaṃ abhidhammamātikāpadehi saṅgahitānaṃ dhammānaṃ anulomadesanāvasena pavattaṃ dhammānulomaṃ nāma.
atk-abh03a:2203_12: “Hetupaccayā ārammaṇapaccayā”ti evaṃ catuvīsatiyā paccayānaṃ anulomadesanāvasena pavattaṃ paccayānulomaṃ nāma.
atk-abh03a:2204_1: cha anulomamhi nayā sugambhīrā”ti ayaṃ gāthā dhammānulomaṃ sandhāya vuttā.
atk-abh03a:2204_2: Idha pana ayaṃ gāthā tasmiṃ dhammānulome paccayānulomaṃ sandhāya vuttā.
atk-abh03a:2204_3: Tasmā “cha anulomamhi nayā sugambhīrā”ti aṭṭhakathāgāthāya dhammānulome tikapaṭṭhānādayo cha nayā sugambhīrāti evamattho veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:2204_4: Imasmiṃ panokāse “hetupaccayā ārammaṇapaccayā”ti evaṃ pavatte paccayānulome ete dhammānulome tikapaṭṭhānādayo
atk-abh03a:2204_6: Tesu anulome tikapaṭṭhāne kusalattikamattasseva vasena ayaṃ imasmiṃ paṭiccavārassa paṇṇattivāre saṅkhipitvā pucchāpabhedo dassito.
atk-abh03a:2204_7: Sesesu pana tikesu sesapaṭṭhānesu ca ekāpi pucchā na dassitā.
atk-abh03a:2204_8: Tato paresu pana sahajātavārādīsu kusalattikassāpi vasena pucchaṃ anuddharitvā labbhamānakavasena vissajjanameva dassitaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2204_9: “Cha anulomamhi nayā sugambhīrā”ti vacanato pana imasmiṃ paccayānulome chapi ete paṭṭhānanayā pucchāvasena uddharitvā dassetabbā.
atk-abh03a:2206_2: Taṃ dassetuṃ siyā kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjeyya na hetupaccayātiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2206_5: evaṃ paccanīyepi nahetupaccayo vitthāretabbo”ti vatvā puna pariyosāne “yathā anulome ekekassa padassa ekamūlakaṃ,
atk-abh03a:2207_1: cha paccanīyamhi nayā sugambhīrāti etthāpi dve paccanīyāni –
atk-abh03a:2207_3: Tattha “kusalā dhammā”ti evaṃ abhidhammamātikāpadehi saṅgahitānaṃ dhammānaṃ “na kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca
atk-abh03a:2207_4: na kusalo dhammo”ti paccanīyadesanāvasena pavattaṃ dhammapaccanīyaṃ nāma.
atk-abh03a:2207_5: “Nahetupaccayā nārammaṇapaccayā”ti evaṃ catuvīsatiyā paccayānaṃ paccanīyadesanāvasena pavattaṃ paccayapaccanīyaṃ nāma.
atk-abh03a:2207_7: cha paccanīyamhi nayā sugambhīrā”ti ayaṃ gāthā dhammapaccanīyaṃ sandhāya vuttā.
atk-abh03a:2207_8: Idha pana ayaṃ gāthā dhammānulomeyeva paccayapaccanīyaṃ sandhāya vuttā.
atk-abh03a:2207_9: Tasmā “cha paccanīyamhi nayā sugambhīrā”ti aṭṭhakathāgāthāya dhammapaccanīye tikapaṭṭhānādayo cha nayā sugambhīrāti evamattho veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:2207_10: Imasmiṃ panokāse na hetupaccayā nārammaṇapaccayāti evaṃ pavatte paccayapaccanīye ete dhammānulomeyeva
atk-abh03a:2207_11: tikapaṭṭhānādayo cha nayā sugambhīrāti evamattho veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:2208_0: Tesu anulomatikapaṭṭhāneyeva kusalattikamattassa vasena ayaṃ imasmiṃ paṭiccavārassa paṇṇattivāre saṅkhipitvā pucchāpabhedo dassito.
atk-abh03a:2208_1: Sesesu pana tikesu sesapaṭṭhānesu ca ekāpi pucchā na dassitā.
atk-abh03a:2208_2: Tato paresu pana sahajātavārādīsu kusalattikassāpi vasena pucchaṃ anuddharitvā labbhamānakavasena vissajjanameva dassitaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2208_3: “Cha paccanīyamhi nayā sugambhīrā”ti vacanato pana imasmiṃ paccayapaccanīye chapi ete paṭṭhānanayā pucchāvasena uddharitvā dassetabbā.
atk-abh03a:2210_2: Taṃ dassetuṃ siyā kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjeyya hetupaccayā naārammaṇapaccayātiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2210_4: hetupaccayā naavigatapaccayā”ti hetupadassa sesesu tevīsatiyā paccayesu ekekena saddhiṃ yojanāvasena
atk-abh03a:2210_6: Tesu ekekasmiṃ ekūnapaññāsaṃ katvā sattavīsādhikāni ekādasa pucchāsatāni honti.
atk-abh03a:2210_7: Dumūlake pana hetārammaṇapadānaṃ sesesu dvāvīsatiyā paccayesu ekekena saddhiṃ yojanāvasena dvāvīsati
atk-abh03a:2210_8: anulomapaccanīyānīti evaṃ anulome vuttesu sabbesu ekamūlakādīsu ekekaṃ padaṃ parihāpetvā avasesānaṃ vasena
atk-abh03a:2210_10: Ekamūlakādīsu cettha yā pucchā pāḷiyaṃ āgatā,
atk-abh03a:2211_1: cha anulomapaccanīyamhi nayā sugambhīrāti ettha pana heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva dve anulomapaccanīyāni –
atk-abh03a:2211_3: Tattha “kusalā dhammā”ti evaṃ abhidhammamātikāpadehi saṅgahitānaṃ dhammānaṃ “kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca
atk-abh03a:2211_4: na kusalo dhammo”ti anulomapaccanīyadesanāvasena pavattaṃ dhammānulomapaccanīyaṃ nāma.
atk-abh03a:2211_5: “Hetupaccayā naārammaṇapaccayā”ti evaṃ catuvīsatiyā paccayesu labbhamānapadānaṃ anulomapaccanīyadesanāvasena pavattaṃ paccayānulomapaccanīyaṃ nāma.
atk-abh03a:2211_7: cha anulomapaccanīyamhi nayā sugambhīrā”ti ayaṃ gāthā dhammānulomapaccanīyaṃ sandhāya vuttā.
atk-abh03a:2211_8: Idha pana ayaṃ gāthā dhammānulomeyeva paccayānulomapaccanīyaṃ sandhāya vuttā.
atk-abh03a:2211_9: Tasmā “cha anulomapaccanīyamhi nayā sugambhīrā”ti aṭṭhakathāgāthāya dhammānulomapaccanīye tikapaṭṭhānādayo cha nayā sugambhīrāti evamattho veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:2211_10: Imasmiṃ panokāse hetupaccayā nārammaṇapaccayāti evaṃ pavatte paccayānulomapaccanīye ete dhammānulomeyeva
atk-abh03a:2211_11: tikapaṭṭhānādayo cha nayā sugambhīrāti evamattho veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:2212_0: Tesu anulome tikapaṭṭhāneyeva kusalattikamattassa vasena ayaṃ imasmiṃ paṭiccavārassa paṇṇattivāre saṅkhipitvā pucchāpabhedo dassito.
atk-abh03a:2212_1: Sesesu pana tikesu sesapaṭṭhānesu ca ekāpi pucchā na dassitā.
atk-abh03a:2212_2: Tato paresu pana sahajātavārādīsu kusalattikassāpi vasena pucchaṃ anuddharitvā labbhamānakavasena vissajjanameva dassitaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2212_3: “Cha anulomapaccanīyamhi nayā sugambhīrā”ti vacanato pana imasmiṃ paccayānulomapaccanīye chapi ete paṭṭhānanayā pucchāvasena uddharitvā dassetabbā.
atk-abh03a:2214_2: Taṃ dassetuṃ siyā kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjeyya nahetupaccayā ārammaṇapaccayātiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2214_4: Ekamūlakādīsu cettha yā pucchā pāḷiyaṃ āgatā,
atk-abh03a:2215_1: cha paccanīyānulomamhi nayā sugambhīrāti etthāpi heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva dve paccayānulomāni –
atk-abh03a:2215_3: Tattha “kusalā dhammā”ti evaṃ abhidhammamātikāpadehi saṅgahitānaṃ dhammānaṃ “nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca
atk-abh03a:2215_4: kusalo dhammo”ti paccanīyānulomadesanāvasena pavattaṃ dhammapaccanīyānulomaṃ nāma.
atk-abh03a:2215_5: “Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇapaccayā”ti evaṃ catuvīsatiyā paccayesu labbhamānapadānaṃ paccayapaccanīyānulomadesanāvasena
atk-abh03a:2215_8: cha paccanīyānulomamhi nayā sugambhīrā”ti ayaṃ gāthā dhammapaccanīyānulomaṃ sandhāya vuttā.
atk-abh03a:2215_9: Idha pana ayaṃ gāthā dhammānulomeyeva paccayapaccanīyānulomaṃ sandhāya vuttā.
atk-abh03a:2215_10: Tasmā “cha paccanīyānulomamhi nayā sugambhīrā”ti aṭṭhakathāya dhammapaccanīyānulome tikapaṭṭhānādayo cha nayā sugambhīrāti evamattho veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:2215_11: Imasmiṃ panokāse nahetupaccayā ārammaṇapaccayāti evaṃ pavatte paccayapaccanīyānulome ete dhammānulomeyeva
atk-abh03a:2215_12: tikapaṭṭhānādayo cha nayā sugambhīrāti evamattho veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:2216_0: Tesu anulomatikapaṭṭhāneyeva kusalattikamattassapi vasena ayaṃ imasmiṃ paṭiccavārassa paṇṇattivāre saṅkhipitvā pucchāpabhedo dassito.
atk-abh03a:2216_1: Sesesu pana tikesu sesapaṭṭhānesu ca ekāpi pucchā na dassitā.
atk-abh03a:2216_2: Tato paresu pana sahajātavārādīsu kusalattikassapi vasena pucchaṃ anuddharitvā labbhamānakavasena vissajjanameva dassitaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2216_3: “Cha paccanīyānulomamhi nayā sugambhīrā”ti vacanato pana imasmiṃ paccayapaccanīyānulome chapi ete paṭṭhānanayā pucchāvasena uddharitvā dassetabbā.
atk-abh03a:2222_1: Idāni yā etā paṇṇattivāre kusalattikaṃ nissāya hetupaccayādivasena ekūnapaññāsaṃ ādiṃ katvā nayamattaṃ dassentena aparimāṇā pucchā dassitā.
atk-abh03a:2222_2: Tattha kusalākusalādīnaṃ sahuppattiyā abhāvato yā pucchā “kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo dhammo uppajjati
atk-abh03a:2222_5: tāyeva vissajjetuṃ ayaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayātiādinā nayena paṭiccavārassa niddesavāro āraddho.
atk-abh03a:2223_1: sace imā hetupaccayādivasena ekūnapaññāsaṃ pucchā sabbaso vissajjanaṃ na labhanti,
atk-abh03a:2223_6: Tathā dassiyamānā pana sabbesu tikadukapaṭṭhānādīsu ekekasmiṃ tike, duke, dukatike, tikaduke, tikatike,
atk-abh03a:2223_7: dukaduke ca saṅkhepaṃ akatvā dassetabbāyeva bhaveyyuṃ. Kasmā?
atk-abh03a:2223_10: Dhammānulomapaccanīye ca tikapaṭṭhāne vitakkattikapītittikānaṃ vissajjane sabbāpetā vissajjanaṃ labhanti,
atk-abh03a:2223_11: tasmā ukkaṭṭhaparicchedena ekekasmiṃ tike yattakāhi pucchāhi bhavitabbaṃ sabbā kusalattike dassitā.
atk-abh03a:2223_12: Evaṃ dassitāsu hi yā tattha vissajjanaṃ na labhanti,
atk-abh03a:2223_14: tā vuccamānā sakkā sukhena vijānitunti sukhena vijānanatthaṃ sabbāpi kusalattike dassitā.
atk-abh03a:2224_0: Tattha kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭiccāti catubhūmakakusaladhammesu vedanākkhandhādibhedaṃ ekaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca
atk-abh03a:2224_2: tena saddhiṃ ekato uppattibhāvaṃ upagantvāti attho.
atk-abh03a:2224_3: Kusalo dhammoti catubhūmakakusaladhammesuyeva saññākkhandhādibhedo eko dhammo.
atk-abh03a:2224_4: Uppajjatīti uppādato yāva nirodhagamanā uddhaṃ pajjati,
atk-abh03a:2224_7: uppādādayo tayopi khaṇe pāpuṇātīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-abh03a:2225_0: Evaṃ “uppajjeyyā”ti pucchāya “uppajjatī”ti vissajjanaṃ vatvā idāni yaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca yo dhammo uppajjati,
atk-abh03a:2225_1: taṃ dhammaṃ khandhavasena dassetuṃ kusalaṃ ekaṃ khandhantiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:2225_2: Tattha ekanti vedanādīsu catūsu yaṃkiñci ekaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2225_3: Tayo khandhāti yo yo paccayabhāvena gahito,
atk-abh03a:2225_4: taṃ taṃ ṭhapetvā avasesā tayo khandhā.
atk-abh03a:2225_5: Tayo khandheti vedanādīsu yo eko khandho uppajjatīti gahito,
atk-abh03a:2225_7: Dve khandheti vedanāsaññādukādīsu chasu dukesu yekeci dve khandhe paṭicca.
atk-abh03a:2225_8: Dve khandhāti ye ye paccayabhāvena gahitā,
atk-abh03a:2225_9: te te ṭhapetvā avasesā dve khandhā kusalahetunā hetupaccayabhāvaṃ sādhentena uppajjantīti attho.
atk-abh03a:2226_0: Yasmā pana eko khandho ekasseva dvinnaṃyeva vā,
atk-abh03a:2226_1: dve vā pana ekasseva paccayo nāma natthi,
atk-abh03a:2226_4: dve khandhe paṭicca eko khandho”ti na vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2226_5: Kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato dhammo uppajjatītiādīsupi vuttanayeneva attho veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:2226_6: Cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpanti idaṃ paṭiccatthassa sahajātatthattā yaṃ kusalena sahajātañceva hetupaccayañca labhati,
atk-abh03a:2227_1: rūpena saddhiṃ anuppattito āruppavipākañca na gahetabbaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2227_2: Paṭisandhikkhaṇeti kaṭattārūpasaṅkhātassa abyākatassa abyākataṃ paṭicca uppattidassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2227_5: vatthuṃ paṭicca khandhāti idaṃ kaṭattārūpaggahaṇena vatthumhi gahitepi vatthuṃ paṭicca khandhānaṃ uppattidassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2228_0: Ekaṃ mahābhūtantiādi rūpābyākataṃ paṭicca rūpābyākatassa uppattidassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2228_1: Ekaṃ khandhantiādīsu vuttanayeneva panettha atthayojanā veditabbā.
atk-abh03a:2228_2: Evaṃ rūpābyākatamhi bhūte paṭicca bhūtānaṃ uppattiṃ vatvā idāni bhūte paṭicca upādārūpānaṃ uppattiṃ dassetuṃ
atk-abh03a:2228_7: Yañhi heṭṭhā “cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpa”nti dassitaṃ,
atk-abh03a:2228_8: taṃ na kevalaṃ khandheyeva ca paṭicca uppajjati,
atk-abh03a:2228_9: mahābhūtepi pana paṭicca uppajjatīti dassanatthamidaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2229_0: Kusale khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭiccāti ettha cittasamuṭṭhānāva mahābhūtā gahitā.
atk-abh03a:2229_1: Cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpanti ettha pana bhūtarūpampi upādārūpampi gahitaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2229_2: “Ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ paṭicca tayo mahābhūtā”tiādinā nayena hi bhūtarūpampi khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca uppajjati.
atk-abh03a:2229_8: Iminā upāyena ārammaṇapaccayādīsupi pucchāvissajjanānaṃ attho veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:2230_1: Ārammaṇapaccaye tāva rūpassa ārammaṇapaccayavasena anuppattito tāsu navasu rūpamissakā pahāya tissova pucchā vissajjitā.
atk-abh03a:2230_2: Teneva ca kāraṇena “vatthuṃ paṭicca khandhā”ti vatvā “khandhe paṭicca vatthū”ti na vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2232_0: 56. Anantarasamantaresupi rūpaṃ na labbhatīti ārammaṇapaccaye viya tissova pucchā.
atk-abh03a:2233_2: Heṭṭhā pana paccayavibhaṅge “okkantikkhaṇe”ti āgataṃ tampi iminā saddhiṃ atthato ekaṃ,
atk-abh03a:2233_4: Apica “tiṇṇaṃ sannipātā gabbhassa avakkanti hotī”ti vacanato okkantīti pañcavokārapaṭisandhiyāvetaṃ nāmaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2233_6: Idha pana “kaṭattā ca rūpa”ntiādivacanato pañcavokārapaṭisandhiyeva adhippetā.
atk-abh03a:2233_7: Sā hi rūpassapi arūpassapi paccayabhāvañceva paccayuppannabhāvañca saṅgaṇhāti,
atk-abh03a:2233_9: Bāhiraṃ ekaṃ mahābhūtanti anindriyabaddhesu pathavīpāsāṇādīsu mahābhūtaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2233_10: Paccayavibhaṅgavārasmiñhi cattāro mahābhūtāti ajjhattikañca bāhirañca ekato katvā gahitaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2233_13: tasmā sabbaṃ vibhajitvā dassento “bāhiraṃ ekaṃ mahābhūta”ntiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:2233_14: Asaññasattānaṃ ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ paṭiccāti dvisantatisamuṭṭhānabhūtavasena vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2233_15: Mahābhūte paṭicca kaṭattārūpanti idaṃ pana kammasamuṭṭhānavaseneva vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2234_2: vatthuṃ paṭicca khandhāti catunnampi khandhānaṃ ekato vatthunā aññamaññapaccayataṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2235_2: tasmā yā heṭṭhā paccayavibhaṅgavāre cakkhāyatanādīnaṃ nissayapaccayatā dassitā,
atk-abh03a:2235_4: Cakkhāyatanādīni hi purejātāni hutvā paccayā honti,
atk-abh03a:2236_1: Upanissayapaccaye rūpassa upanissayapaccayābhāvā tīṇeva vissajjanāni labbhanti,
atk-abh03a:2236_3: Tattha kiñcāpi na sabbe kusalākusalābyākatā ārammaṇūpanissayaṃ labhanti,
atk-abh03a:2237_1: Purejātapaccaye vatthuṃ purejātapaccayāti vatthuṃ paṭicca vatthunā purejātapaccayataṃ sādhentena uppajjantīti attho.
atk-abh03a:2237_2: Vipākābyākataṃ ekaṃ khandhanti ettha yaṃ vipākābyākatassa vatthu okkantikkhaṇe sahajātapaccayo hoti,
atk-abh03a:2237_4: Yepi kusalādayo āruppe purejātapaccayaṃ na labhanti,
atk-abh03a:2237_6: Ārammaṇaṃ pana niyamato purejātapaccayabhāvaṃ na labhati.
atk-abh03a:2237_12: “Vipākābyākataṃ ekaṃ khandha”nti desanāya ca sabbāpi viññāṇadhātuyo gahitā,
atk-abh03a:2238_2: tasmā “uppajjati pacchājātapaccayā”ti evaṃ vattabbo ekadhammopi natthīti pacchājātapaccayavasena vissajjanaṃ na kataṃ.
atk-abh03a:2239_1: Āsevanapaccaye kāmaṃ sabbā kiriyā āsevanapaccayaṃ na labhanti,
atk-abh03a:2240_8: Sesaṃ na ekantato kammasamuṭṭhānattā upādārūpanti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2241_1: Vipākapaccaye kusalākusalaṃ kiriyañca na labbhatīti abyākatavaseneva vissajjanaṃ kataṃ.
atk-abh03a:2241_4: Upādārūpanti tadavasesaṃ tasmiṃ samaye vijjamānakaṃ upādārūpaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2242_1: Āhārapaccaye sabbesampi kusalādīnaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānarūpassa ca arūpāhāravasena uppatti veditabbā,
atk-abh03a:2242_6: Paccayavibhaṅgavāre āhārapaṭipāṭiyā paṭhamaṃ kabaḷīkāro āhāro dassito,
atk-abh03a:2242_7: idha pana kusalaṃ dhammanti pucchāvasena paṭhamaṃ arūpāhārā dassitāti veditabbā.
atk-abh03a:2243_1: Indriyapaccaye paccayavibhaṅge indriyapaṭipāṭiyā paṭhamaṃ cakkhundriyādīni dassitāni,
atk-abh03a:2243_2: idha pana kusalādipucchāvasena paṭhamaṃ arūpindriyānaṃ paccayatā dassitā.
atk-abh03a:2246_1: Vippayuttapaccaye vatthuṃ vippayuttapaccayāti vatthuṃ paṭicca vippayuttapaccayā,
atk-abh03a:2246_5: Khandhā vatthuṃ vippayuttapaccayāti vatthuṃ paṭicca khandhā vippayuttapaccayā.
atk-abh03a:2246_7: Cittasamuṭṭhānarūpaṃ khandhe vippayuttapaccayāti khandhe paṭicca vippayuttapaccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ
atk-abh03a:2246_11: Ekaṃ mahābhūtantiādi rūpābyākatassa paccayabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2248_5: Ime tevīsati paccayāti saṅkhipitvā dassitānaṃ vasenetaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2248_8: Ayaṃ hetupaccayaṃ ādiṃ katvā ekamūlake paccayānulome paṭiccavārassa kusalattikavissajjane atthavaṇṇanā.
atk-abh03a:2250_1: Idāni ye ettha hetupaccayādīsu ekekasmiṃ paccaye vissajjanavārā laddhā,
atk-abh03a:2250_2: te gaṇanavasena dassetuṃ hetuyā navātiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2250_3: Tattha hetuyā navāti hetupaccaye nava pucchāvissajjanavārā honti.
atk-abh03a:2251_4: Dvādasasu hi paccayesu nava navāti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2251_12: Āsevanapaccaye vipākāni ceva vīthicittāni ca na labbhanti.
atk-abh03a:2251_18: ekaṃ ekakanti sabbesupi tevīsatiyā paccayesu ekūnacattālīsādhikaṃ vārasataṃ hoti,
atk-abh03a:2252_1: Evaṃ hetupaccayādike ekamūlake gaṇanaṃ dassetvā ito paresu dumūlakādīsu vitthāradesanaṃ saṅkhipitvā ekamūlake
atk-abh03a:2252_2: dassitāya desanāya labbhamānagaṇanaññeva ādāya vāraparicchedaṃ dassetuṃ dumūlake tāva hetupaccayā ārammaṇe
atk-abh03a:2252_5: bahugaṇanopi paccayo abahugaṇanena saddhiṃ yutto tena samānagaṇanova hoti.
atk-abh03a:2252_7: Hetuārammaṇaduke ārammaṇe vuttāni tīṇeva vissajjanāni labbhantīti attho.
atk-abh03a:2252_8: Samānagaṇano pana samānagaṇanena saddhiṃ yutto aparihīnagaṇanova hoti.
atk-abh03a:2252_11: Vipāke ekanti hetuvipākaduke vipāke vuttaṃ ekameva vissajjanaṃ labbhatīti evaṃ tāva dumūlake vāraparicchedo veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:2253_4: Hetārammaṇādhipati tike ārammaṇe vuttāni tīṇeva vissajjanāni labbhantīti attho.
atk-abh03a:2254_2: tasmā āsevanapaccayā kamme tīṇīti vatvā vipākaṃ aparāmasitvā āhāre tīṇīti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2254_11: tasmā taṃ pahāya vipākavasena gaṇanāya dassanatthaṃ anantarāyeva “hetupaccayā…pe…
atk-abh03a:2254_12: vipākapaccayā āhāre eka”nti ekaṃ nayaṃ dassetvā pacchā tevīsatimūlakova dassito.
atk-abh03a:2254_13: Etesu pana dvīsu tevīsatimūlakesu kiñcāpi ekasmiṃ vipākapaccayo natthi,
atk-abh03a:2254_17: Tesu sāsevane āsevanassa vasena sabbattha tīṇeva vissajjanāni,
atk-abh03a:2254_18: savipāke vipākapaccayassa vasena ekamevāti ayaṃ hetupaccayaṃ ādiṃ katvā ekamūlakādīsu gaṇanā.
atk-abh03a:2255_0: Yaṃ panetaṃ hetumūlakānantaraṃ “ārammaṇe ṭhitena sabbattha tīṇeva pañhā”ti vuttaṃ,
atk-abh03a:2255_1: taṃ ārammaṇapaccayaṃ ādiṃ katvā ekamūlakepi dumūlakādīsupi sabbattha ārammaṇapade ceva ārammaṇena saddhiṃ
atk-abh03a:2255_3: tattha tayova pañhā hontīti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2255_4: Vipākapade pana vipākapadena saddhiṃ sesapaccayayojanāsu ca ekova pañho hotīti.
atk-abh03a:2255_5: Iti yaṃ heṭṭhā avocumha “bahugaṇanopi paccayo abahugaṇanena saddhiṃ yutto tena samānagaṇano hotī”ti,
atk-abh03a:2256_1: Idāni ye ārammaṇādīnaṃ paccayānaṃ vasena ekamūlakādayo dassetabbā,
atk-abh03a:2256_2: tesu ekamūlako tāva hetuekamūlakeneva sadisoti ekasmimpi paccaye na dassito.
atk-abh03a:2256_3: Ārammaṇapaccayavasena pana dumūlake gaṇanaṃ dassetuṃ ārammaṇapaccayā hetuyā tīṇi,
atk-abh03a:2256_7: avigate tīṇī”ti vattabbe ye hetupaccayādayo paccayā bahugaṇanā,
atk-abh03a:2256_8: tesaṃ ūnataragaṇanehi ca samānagaṇanehi ca saddhiṃ saṃsandane yā gaṇanā labbhati,
atk-abh03a:2256_9: taṃ dassetuṃ ārammaṇapaccayassa purimabhāge ṭhitampi hetupaccayaṃ pacchimabhāgeva ṭhapetvā “ārammaṇapaccayā hetuyā tīṇī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2256_11: ārammaṇapaccayo yena yena bahutaragaṇanena vā samānagaṇanena vā paccayena saddhiṃ dukatikādibhedaṃ gacchati,
atk-abh03a:2256_13: Vipākapaccayena pana saddhiṃ saṃsandane ekameva labbhati,
atk-abh03a:2256_14: taṃ vipākapaccayādikāya gaṇanāya āvi bhavissatīti idha na dassitaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2256_16: timūlakādīsupi esāva gaṇanāti ārammaṇapaccayavasena timūlakādayo na vitthāritā.
atk-abh03a:2257_0: Idāni adhipatipaccayādivasena dumūlakādīsu gaṇanaṃ dassetuṃ adhipatipaccayā hetuyā navātiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2257_4: Iti yo yo paccayo ādimhi tiṭṭhati,
atk-abh03a:2257_5: tena tena saddhiṃ samānagaṇanānaṃ saṃsandane ādimhi ṭhitassa vasena gaṇanā hoti.
atk-abh03a:2257_6: Tena pana saddhiṃ ūnataragaṇanānaṃ saṃsandane ūnataragaṇanānaṃyeva vasena gaṇanā hotīti veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:2257_7: Yathā ca ārammaṇapaccayavasena evaṃ adhipatipaccayavasenāpi tato paresaṃ anantarādīnaṃ vasenāpi timūlakādayo na vitthāritā.
atk-abh03a:2257_9: Teneva vuttaṃ “ekekaṃ paccayaṃ mūlakaṃ kātuna sajjhāyamaggena gaṇetabbā”ti.
atk-abh03a:2261_1: Paccayapaccanīyaṃ pana yasmā kusalapade na labbhati kusaladhammassa hetupaccayena vinā anuppattito,
atk-abh03a:2261_3: Tattha nahetupaccayāti hetupaccayapaṭikkhepo hetupaccayaṃ vinā aññena paccayena uppajjatīti attho.
atk-abh03a:2261_4: Vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato mohoti ayañhi sampayuttadhammānañceva cittasamuṭṭhānarūpassa ca sayaṃ hetupaccayo hoti,
atk-abh03a:2261_5: aññassa pana sampayuttahetuno abhāvā na hetupaccayā uppajjatīti ṭhapetvā hetupaccayaṃ sesehi attano anurūpapaccayehi uppajjati.
atk-abh03a:2262_1: Naadhipatipaccaye kāmaṃ adhipatipi attanā saddhiṃ dutiyassa adhipatino abhāvā naadhipatipaccayaṃ labhati,
atk-abh03a:2262_4: Chandādīsu pana aññataraṃ adhipatiṃ akatvā kusalādīnaṃ uppattikāle sabbepi kusalādayo nirādhipatino.
atk-abh03a:2262_5: Tasmā mohaṃ viya visuṃ adhipatimattameva anuddharitvā sabbasaṅgāhikavasena esā “ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā”tiādikā desanā katāti veditabbā.
atk-abh03a:2263_8: Sahajātanissayaatthiavigatapaccayepi hi paccakkhāya ekopi rūpārūpadhammo nuppajjati,
atk-abh03a:2264_1: Naaññamaññapaccayavibhaṅge paṭisandhikkhaṇe vipākābyākate khandhe paṭicca kaṭattārūpanti hadayavatthuvajjaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2265_3: Arūpaṃ pana kiñcāpi ārammaṇūpanissayapakatūpanissaye na labheyya,
atk-abh03a:2267_6: Pāḷi pana idhāpi naadhipatipaccaye vitthāritavasena veditabbā.
atk-abh03a:2268_1: Nakammapaccaye vipākacetanā nānākkhaṇikakammapaccayaṃ labhatīti na gahitā.
atk-abh03a:2269_1: Najhānapaccaye pañcaviññāṇadhammā ceva ekaccañca rūpaṃ paccayuppannaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2269_2: Pañcaviññāṇasmiñhi vedanā ca cittekaggatā ca dubbalattā upanijjhānalakkhaṇaṃ na pāpuṇantīti jhānapaccaye na gahitā.
atk-abh03a:2272_1: Dumūlake nahetupaccayā nārammaṇe ekanti ettha kiñcāpi bahugaṇanena saddhiṃ ūnataragaṇanassa saṃsandane
atk-abh03a:2272_3: Nārammaṇavasena pana arūpadhammānaṃ parihīnattā abyākataṃ paṭicca rūpābyākatassa uppattiṃ sandhāya “eka”nti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2272_5: Dveti vuttaṭṭhāne pana nahetuyā laddhavasena vāradvayaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2273_1: Timūlakādīsu pana sabbesu nārammaṇapaccayassa aparihīnattā ekameva vissajjananti ayaṃ paccanīye nahetupaccayaṃ ādiṃ katvā ekamūlakādīsu gaṇanā.
atk-abh03a:2274_1: Nārammaṇapaccayādayo pana ekamūlake tāva purimena sadisattā idhāpi na dassitāyeva.
atk-abh03a:2274_4: Nādhipatiyā pañcāti nārammaṇapaccaye laddhavasena veditabbāti evaṃ sabbasaṃsandanesu ūnataragaṇanasseva paccayassa vasena gaṇanā veditabbā.
atk-abh03a:2274_10: Iminā pana lakkhaṇena sabbesu dumūlakādīsu “ayaṃ paccayo mūlaṃ,
atk-abh03a:2274_13: ayaṃ sabbamūlako”ti sallakkhetvā ūnataragaṇanassa paccayassa vasena gaṇanā veditabbāti.
atk-abh03a:2277_1: Idāni anulomapaccanīye gaṇanaṃ dassetuṃ hetupaccayā nārammaṇe pañcātiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2277_2: Tattha hetādhipatimaggapaccayesu anulomato ṭhitesu sahajātādayo cattāro sabbaṭṭhānikapaccayā,
atk-abh03a:2277_3: āhārindriyajhānamaggapaccayā cattāroti ime aṭṭha paccanīyato na labbhanti.
atk-abh03a:2277_4: Hetupaccayādivasena hi uppajjamāno dhammo ime aṭṭha paccaye alabhanto nāma natthi.
atk-abh03a:2277_5: Ārammaṇaanantarasamanantaraupanissayasampayuttanatthivigatapaccayesu pana anulomato ṭhitesu arūpaṭṭhānikā paccanīkato na labbhanti.
atk-abh03a:2277_6: Na hi ārammaṇapaccayādīhi uppajjamānā anantarasamanantarapaccayādayo na labhanti.
atk-abh03a:2277_9: Etesañhi paccayānaṃ vasena uppajjamāno sabbaṭṭhānike alabhanto nāma natthi.
atk-abh03a:2277_11: Evaṃ sesesu anulomato ṭhitesu ye ca labbhanti,
atk-abh03a:2277_13: te sallakkhetvā sabbesupi dumūlakādīsu nayesu tesaṃ tesaṃ paccayānaṃ saṃsandane ūnataragaṇanānaṃyeva vasena gaṇanā veditabbāti.
atk-abh03a:2280_1: Idāni paccanīyānulome gaṇanaṃ dassetuṃ nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe dvetiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2280_2: Tattha hetumhi paccanīkato ṭhite ṭhapetvā adhipatiṃ avasesā anulomato labbhanti.
atk-abh03a:2280_3: Pacchājāto pana anulomato sabbattheva na labbhati,
atk-abh03a:2280_5: tesu purejātañca āsevanañca ṭhapetvā avasesesu sattasu paccanīkato ṭhitesu sesā arūpaṭṭhānikā anulomato na labbhanti.
atk-abh03a:2280_9: sabbavipāko ca saddhiṃ kiriyamanodhātuyā āsevanato anuppajjamānopi anantarādayo labhati,
atk-abh03a:2281_0: Purejātapacchājātaāsevanavipākavippayuttesu paccanīkato ṭhitesu ekaṃ ṭhapetvā avasesā anulomato labbhanti.
atk-abh03a:2281_1: Kammapaccaye paccanīkato ṭhite ṭhapetvā vipākapaccayaṃ avasesā anulomato labbhanti.
atk-abh03a:2281_2: Āhārindriyesu paccanīkato ṭhitesu ṭhapetvā sabbaṭṭhānike ceva aññamaññakammāhārindriyapaccaye ca avasesā anulomato na labbhanti,
atk-abh03a:2281_6: Maggapaccaye paccanīkato ṭhite hetādhipatipaccayā anulomato na labbhanti.
atk-abh03a:2281_7: Vippayuttapaccaye paccanīkato ṭhite purejātapaccayaṃ ṭhapetvā avasesā anulomato labbhanti.
atk-abh03a:2281_8: Evaṃ tesu tesu paccayesu paccanīkato ṭhitesu ye ye anulomato na labbhanti,
atk-abh03a:2281_9: te te ñatvā tesaṃ tesaṃ paccayānaṃ saṃsandane ūnataragaṇanānaṃ vasena gaṇanā veditabbā.
atk-abh03a:2282_1: Dumūlakādīsu ca nayesu yaṃ yaṃ paccayaṃ ādiṃ katvā ye ye dukādayo dassitā,
atk-abh03a:2282_2: te te labbhamānālabbhamānapaccayavasena yathā yathā dassitā,
atk-abh03a:2282_4: Tattha yaṃ nahetuvasena dumūlakādayo naye dassentena nahetupaccayā nārammaṇapaccayā…pe…
atk-abh03a:2282_5: nāsevanapaccayāti vatvā “yāva āsevanā sabbaṃ sadisa”nti vuttaṃ. Tassa,
atk-abh03a:2282_7: Yaṃ pana “nakamme gaṇite pañca gaṇhātī”ti sīhaḷabhāsāya likhitaṃ,
atk-abh03a:2282_9: nahetupaccayaṃ ādiṃ katvā nakammapaccayāti evaṃ nakammapaccayena ghaṭite sahajāte ekanti evaṃ dassitā pañceva paccayā anulomato labbhanti,
atk-abh03a:2282_11: Evaṃ aññesupi evarūpesu ṭhānesu byañjanaṃ anādiyitvā adhippetatthoyeva gahetabbo.
atk-abh03a:2282_12: Evarūpañhi byañjanaṃ attano saññānibandhanatthaṃ porāṇehi sakasakabhāsāya likhitaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2283_0: Apica imasmiṃ paccanīyānulome paccayuppannadhammesupi atthi dhammo kammapaccayaṃ labhati,
atk-abh03a:2283_2: So asaññesu ceva pañcavokāre pavatte ca rūpajīvitindriyavasena veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:2283_12: Ahetuke adhipatipaccayo natthīti imesampi pakiṇṇakānaṃ vasenettha gaṇanavāro asammohato veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:2284_1: nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe dveti ettha tāva ahetukamoho ceva ahetukavipākakiriyā ca paccayuppannaṃ,
atk-abh03a:2285_1: Nārammaṇamūlake hetuyā pañcāti rūpameva sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2285_2: Tañhi kusalaṃ akusalaṃ abyākataṃ kusalābyākataṃ akusalābyākatañcāti pañca koṭṭhāse paṭicca uppajjati.
atk-abh03a:2285_4: Aññamaññe ekanti bhūtarūpāni ceva vatthuñca sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2286_1: Nādhipatimūlake hetuyā navāti anulome hetumhi vuttāneva.
atk-abh03a:2286_3: Timūlake dveti heṭṭhā nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe vuttasadisāneva.
atk-abh03a:2287_1: Napurejātamūlake hetuyā sattāti heṭṭhā “āruppe kusalaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭiccā”tiādinā nayena purejāte dassitāneva.
atk-abh03a:2287_4: Tasmā kusalaṃ akusalaṃ abyākatañca paṭicca uppattiṃ sandhāya tīṇīti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2287_5: Iminā nayena “ekaṃ dve tīṇi pañca satta navā”ti āgataṭṭhānesu gaṇanā veditabbā.
atk-abh03a:2287_6: “Cattāri cha aṭṭhā”ti imā pana tisso gaṇanā natthevāti.
atk-abh03a:2291_1: Sahajātavāre kusalaṃ dhammaṃ sahajātoti kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca tena sahajāto hutvāti attho.
atk-abh03a:2291_4: sahajātattaṃ nāma paṭiccatta”nti idaṃ ubhinnampi etesaṃ vārānaṃ atthato ninnānākaraṇabhāvadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2291_7: “Cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe cā”tiādīsu hi asahajātampi paṭicca uppajjatīti vuccati.
atk-abh03a:2291_8: Sahajātampi ca upādārūpaṃ bhūtarūpassa paccayo na hoti.
atk-abh03a:2291_10: sahajātavārena ca paṭiccāti vuttassa sahajātabhāvaṃ niyametuṃ ubhopete vuttā.
atk-abh03a:2291_11: Apica tathā bujjhanakānaṃ ajjhāsayavasena desanāvilāsena niruttipaṭisambhidāppabhedajānanavasena cāpi ete ubhopi vuttāti.
atk-abh03a:2294_1: Paccayavāre kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayāti kusaladhamme patiṭṭhito hutvā kusalaṃ dhammaṃ nissayaṭṭhena paccayaṃ katvāti attho.
atk-abh03a:2294_2: Kusalaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayāti kusalaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ nissayapaccayaṃ katvā tayo khandhā uppajjanti hetupaccayāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-abh03a:2294_4: Vatthuṃ paccayā vipākābyākatā kiriyābyākatā khandhāti idaṃ pañcavokāre pavattivasena vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2294_5: Pañcavokāre pavattiyañhi khandhānaṃ purejātaṃ vatthu nissayapaccayo hoti.
atk-abh03a:2294_6: Paṭiccaṭṭhassa pana sahajātaṭṭhattā paṭiccavāre esa nayo na labbhatīti paṭisandhiyaṃ sahajātameva vatthuṃ sandhāya “vatthuṃ paṭicca khandhā”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2294_7: Kusalaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā tayo khandhātiādīsupi imināva nayena attho veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:2295_0: Abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā kusalo ca abyākato cāti kusalābyākatānaṃ hetupaccayavasena ekato uppattiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2295_2: cittasamuṭṭhāne ca mahābhūte nissāya cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ upādārūpaṃ hetupaccayavasena ekato uppajjati.
atk-abh03a:2295_3: Iti paccayabhūtassa abyākatassa nānattepi paccayuppannānaṃ hetupaccayavasena ekato uppattiṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2295_5: Evaṃ imasmiṃ hetupaccaye sahajātañca purejātañca nissayaṭṭhena paccayaṃ katvā sattarasa pañhā vissajjitā.
atk-abh03a:2295_6: Tattha khandhā ceva bhūtā ca sahajātavasena,
atk-abh03a:2295_10: Ye panete ettha sattarasa pañhā vissajjitā,
atk-abh03a:2295_11: tesu ekādike ekāvasāne vissajjane kusalādīsu ekapaccayato eko paccayuppanno.
atk-abh03a:2296_2: Yaṃ panetaṃ ārammaṇapaccaye vatthuṃ paccayā khandhāti vuttaṃ,
atk-abh03a:2296_4: Cakkhuviññāṇādīni abyākataṃ nissāya ārammaṇapaccayena uppajjantānaṃ pabhedadassanatthaṃ vuttāni.
atk-abh03a:2296_5: Puna vatthuṃ paccayāti pavatte vipākakiriyābyākatānaṃ uppattidassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2296_7: Evaṃ imasmiṃ ārammaṇapaccaye sahajātañca purejātañca paccayaṃ katvā satta pañhā vissajjitā.
atk-abh03a:2299_1: Aññamaññapaccaye ca yathā ārammaṇapaccayā evanti vissajjanasamataṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2302_1: Kammapaccaye tīṇīti kusalaṃ paccayā kusalo abyākato kusalābyākato cāti evaṃ tīṇi veditabbāni.
atk-abh03a:2303_1: Vippayuttapaccaye khandhe vippayuttapaccayāti khandhe nissāya vippayuttapaccayā uppajjantīti attho.
atk-abh03a:2303_2: Khandhā vatthuṃ vippayuttapaccayāti khandhā vatthuṃ nissāya vippayuttapaccayā uppajjantīti attho.
atk-abh03a:2304_1: Idāni yathāladdhāni vissajjanāni gaṇanavasena dassetuṃ hetuyā sattarasātiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:2304_4: kusalena kusalābyākatanti evaṃ kusalavasena ekādikāni ekāvasānāni dve,
atk-abh03a:2306_5: ekaṃ ekakanti te sabbe sādhukaṃ sallakkhetvā parato dukatikādivasena paccayasaṃsandane ūnataragaṇanassa vasena gaṇanā veditabbā.
atk-abh03a:2306_6: Sakkā hi imāya gaṇanāya dukamūlādīsu vāraparicchede jānitunti puna “kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā kusalo dhammo”ti
atk-abh03a:2306_7: anāmasitvā gaṇanavaseneva vāraparicchedaṃ dassetuṃ hetupaccayā ārammaṇe sattātiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2307_0: Tattha kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ārammaṇapaccayā.
atk-abh03a:2307_1: Kusalaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā tayo khandhāti iminā nayena ārammaṇe laddhavissajjanāni vitthāretabbāni.
atk-abh03a:2308_1: Paccanīye pana kusalaṃ na labbhatīti akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayāti akusalameva ādiṃ katvā vissajjanaṃ āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2309_1: Yaṃ panetaṃ paccanīye laddhavissajjanaparicchedaṃ gaṇanato dassetuṃ nahetuyā cattārītiādi vuttaṃ,
atk-abh03a:2309_5: Tesaṃ vasena dukatikādīsu paccayasaṃsandane gaṇanā veditabbā.
atk-abh03a:2309_6: Yo hi paccayo sattarasa vissajjanāni labhati,
atk-abh03a:2309_9: Evaṃ sesesupi adhikaparicchedaṃ ṭhapetvā samasamā ūnatarā ca labbhantīti.
atk-abh03a:2310_0: Ettha ca adhikatarā na labbhantīti ayamettha niyamo.
atk-abh03a:2310_1: Samasamā pana ūnatarā ca atthā virodhe sati labbhanti.
atk-abh03a:2310_4: nārammaṇe pañcannaṃ āgatattā nahetuvasena cattārīti vattabbaṃ siyā,
atk-abh03a:2310_5: nārammaṇena saddhiṃ ghaṭitattā pana ārammaṇadhammo virujjhatīti akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā akusalo dhammo,
atk-abh03a:2310_7: akusalañca abyākatañca dhammaṃ paccayā akusaloti tīṇi vissajjanāni parihīnāni.
atk-abh03a:2310_8: Abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā abyākatoti rūpavasena ekameva vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2310_9: Evaṃ sabbattha viruddhāviruddhaṃ ñatvā labbhamānaparicchedo veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:2311_0: Nānantare ekanti ahetukacittasamuṭṭhānassa ceva sesarūpassa ca vasena abyākatena abyākataṃ.
atk-abh03a:2311_2: Napurejāte dveti idhāpi nahetuvasena cattārīti vattabbaṃ siyā,
atk-abh03a:2311_3: napurejātena saddhiṃ ghaṭitattā pana abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā akusalo,
atk-abh03a:2311_4: akusalañca abyākatañca dhammaṃ paccayā akusaloti vatthupurejātavasena dve vissajjanāni parihīnāni.
atk-abh03a:2311_5: Āruppe pana ahetukamohassa ahetukakiriyassa ca vasena dve vuttāni.
atk-abh03a:2311_7: Nonatthi novigatesu ekanti sabbassa rūpassa vasena abyākatena abyākataṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2312_1: Nārammaṇamūlake pana naadhipatiyā pañcāti nārammaṇe laddhāneva.
atk-abh03a:2312_2: Nakamme ekanti ettha cittasamuṭṭhānañca kaṭattārūpañca aggahetvā sesarūpavasena abyākatena abyākataṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2313_2: Napacchājāte sattarasāti imānipi tattha laddhāni sattaraseva.
atk-abh03a:2313_4: Imināva nayamattadassanena sabbattha āgatānāgataṃ labbhamānālabbhamānañca veditabbanti.
atk-abh03a:2315_1: Imināyeva pana lakkhaṇena anulomaṃ purato katvā anulomapaccanīye paccanīyaṃ purato katvā paccanīyānulome
atk-abh03a:2318_1: Nissayavāre kusalaṃ dhammaṃ nissāyāti kusalaṃ dhammaṃ patiṭṭhaṭṭhena nissayaṃ katvāti attho.
atk-abh03a:2318_4: nissayattaṃ nāma paccayatta”nti idaṃ ubhinnampi etesaṃ vārānaṃ atthato ninnānākaraṇabhāvadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2318_5: Atthato hi etepi paṭiccasahajātā viya ninnānākaraṇā.
atk-abh03a:2318_7: Avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārātiādīsu hi anissāya vattamānaṃ nānākkhaṇikampi “paccayā uppajjatī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2318_8: Aññamaññaṃ allīyitvā ṭhitakaṭṭhādīsu ca ekaṃ ekassa nissayapaccayo na hoti,
atk-abh03a:2318_9: tathā upādārūpaṃ mahābhūtassa nissayapaccayo na hotiyeva.
atk-abh03a:2318_10: Iti paccayavārena nissayapaccayabhāvaṃ nissayavārena ca paccayāti vuttassa sahajātapurejātabhāvaṃ niyametuṃ ubhopete vuttā.
atk-abh03a:2318_11: Apica tathā bujjhanakānaṃ ajjhāsayavasena desanāvilāsena niruttipaṭisambhidāpabhedajānanavasena cāpi ete ubhopi vuttāti.
atk-abh03a:2321_1: Saṃsaṭṭhavāre kusalaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭhoti kusalaṃ dhammaṃ ekuppādādilakkhaṇena sampayogaṭṭhena paccayaṃ katvāti attho.
atk-abh03a:2321_2: Kusalaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhoti kusalaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ sampayuttapaccayaṃ katvā tayo khandhā uppajjanti hetupaccayāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-abh03a:2321_4: Imasmiṃ pana hetupaccaye arūpadhammasseva sampayogaṭṭhena paccayaṃ katvā tayo pañhā vissajjitā.
atk-abh03a:2322_1: Idāni yathāladdhāni vissajjanāni gaṇanavasena dassetuṃ hetuyā tīṇītiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2322_5: Ekake pana abyākatena abyākatameva labbhatīti evamettha bāvīsatiyā paccayesu tīṇi,
atk-abh03a:2322_8: Tasmā tīṇi ekanti imesaññeva vasena dukatikādīsu paccayasaṃsandane yattha vipākapaccayo pavisati;
atk-abh03a:2323_1: Paccanīye pana kusalaṃ na labbhatīti akusalameva ādiṃ katvā vissajjanaṃ kataṃ,
atk-abh03a:2324_1: Yaṃ panettha paccanīye vissajjanaparicchedaṃ gaṇanato dassetuṃ nahetuyā dvetiādi vuttaṃ,
atk-abh03a:2324_2: tattha dve tīṇi ekanti tayo paricchedā.
atk-abh03a:2324_3: Tesaṃ vasena dukatikādīsu paccayasaṃsandane gaṇanā veditabbā.
