atk-abh03a:2528_10: tesu tesu ṭhānesu dassitanayānurūpena tassā vitthāro veditabboti.
atk-abh03a:2531_0: Tikadukapaṭṭhānepi kusalaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayāti pañhāmattuddhāravaseneva desanā katā.
atk-abh03a:2531_1: Tattha yathā heṭṭhā hetudukena saddhiṃ kusalapadaṃ yojetvā sabbapaccayavasena sabbavāresu saṅkhepato desanā katā,
atk-abh03a:2531_2: evamidha kusalattikena saddhiṃ hetupadaṃ yojetvā sabbapaccayavasena sabbavāresu saṅkhepato desanā katā.
atk-abh03a:2531_4: evaṃ nahetupadampi kusalattikena saddhiṃ yojetvā kusalattikahetudukaṃ niṭṭhāpitaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2531_5: Tato paraṃ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ hetuṃ dhammantiādinā nayena vedanāttikahetudukādīni ekavīsati tikadukāni dassitāni.
atk-abh03a:2532_0: Evaṃ bāvīsatiyā tikehi saddhiṃ hetudukaṃ yojetvā puna tehiyeva saddhiṃ sahetukadukādayo saraṇadukapariyosānā labbhamānavasena sabbadukā yojitā.
atk-abh03a:2532_1: Idhāpi yaṃ yaṃ padaṃ yojanaṃ na gacchati,
atk-abh03a:2532_3: Evaṃ dukasataṃ gahetvā dvāvīsatiyā tikesu pakkhipitvā tikadukapaṭṭhānaṃ nāma desitaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2532_4: Tatrāpi yena yena nayena pāḷi saṅkhittā,
atk-abh03a:2535_0: Tikatikapaṭṭhānepi kusalaṃ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto
atk-abh03a:2535_1: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayāti pañhuddhāravaseneva saṅkhepato desanā katā.
atk-abh03a:2535_3: vedanāttikādayo ca kusalattikenāti evaṃ tikesuyeva tikā pakkhittā.
atk-abh03a:2535_4: Yena yena ca padena saddhiṃ yaṃ yaṃ padaṃ yojanaṃ na gacchati,
atk-abh03a:2535_5: taṃ taṃ hāpetvā labbhamānavaseneva sabbapaccayesu vārā ca gaṇananayā ca dassitā,
atk-abh03a:2535_6: tasmā te sādhukaṃ pāḷiṃ upaparikkhitvā veditabbā.
atk-abh03a:2535_8: vedanāttikādayo ca tena saddhiṃ yojetvā veditabbā;
atk-abh03a:2535_10: Sesā ca tehi saddhiṃ yojetvā veditabbāti.
atk-abh03a:2538_0: Dukadukapaṭṭhānepi hetusahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetusahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayāti pañhuddhāravaseneva saṅkhepato desanā katā.
atk-abh03a:2538_4: sesā ca tehi saddhiṃ paṭipāṭiyā yojetabbā.
atk-abh03a:2538_5: Idañhi dukadukapaṭṭhānaṃ nāma ‘dukesuyeva duke pakkhipitvā’ desitaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2538_6: Tenettha sabbadukehi saddhiṃ sabbadukānaṃ yojanā veditabbā.
atk-abh03a:2538_8: Yena yena ca padena saddhiṃ yaṃ yaṃ padaṃ yojanaṃ na gacchati,
atk-abh03a:2545_2: Paccayavasena panettha ekekasmiṃ paṭṭhāne anulomādayo cattāro cattāro nayāti ekena pariyāyena catuvīsatinayapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ
atk-abh03a:2547_1: Idāni kusalādīnaṃ padānaṃ paṭikkhepavasena dhammānaṃ paccanīyatāya laddhanāmaṃ paccanīyapaṭṭhānaṃ dassetuṃ
atk-abh03a:2547_2: nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayātiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2547_3: Tattha nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭiccāti kusalassa paccayabhāvaṃ vāreti.
atk-abh03a:2547_4: Nakusalo dhammo uppajjatīti kusalassa uppattiṃ vāreti,
atk-abh03a:2547_5: tasmā “akusalābyākataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca akusalābyākatā tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpa”nti evamādinā nayenettha pañhaṃ vissajjitabbaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2547_6: Tasmiṃ tasmiṃ paccaye laddhagaṇanā pana pāḷiyaṃ vuttāyeva.
atk-abh03a:2547_9: Tasmā sabbamettha heṭṭhā vuttanayānusārena pāḷiṃ upaparikkhitvā veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2553_2: Paccayavasena panettha ekekasmiṃ paṭṭhāne anulomādayo cattāro cattāro nayāti ekena pariyāyena catuvīsatinayapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ
atk-abh03a:2556_1: Idāni kusalādīsu dhammesu paccayadhammaṃ appaṭikkhipitvā paccayuppannassa kusalādibhāvapaṭikkhepavasena
atk-abh03a:2556_2: dhammānaṃ anulomapaccanīyatāya laddhanāmaṃ anulomapaccanīyapaṭṭhānaṃ dassetuṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca
atk-abh03a:2556_3: na kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayātiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2556_4: Tattha kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭiccāti kusalassa paccayabhāvaṃ anujānāti.
atk-abh03a:2556_5: Na kusalo dhammo uppajjatīti kusalasseva uppattiṃ vāreti.
atk-abh03a:2556_6: Tasmā “kusale khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpa”ntiādinā nayena vissajjanaṃ dassitaṃ,
atk-abh03a:2556_7: taṃ sabbaṃ pāḷiṃ oloketvā sādhukaṃ sallakkhetabbaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2556_10: yo ca yesaṃ vissajjanānaṃ yesu paccayesu gaṇanaparicchedo,
atk-abh03a:2562_0: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttagāthāya dīpitā dhammānulomapaccanīyapaṭṭhāne cha nayā niddiṭṭhā honti.
atk-abh03a:2562_1: Paccayavasena panettha ekekasmiṃ paṭṭhāne anulomādayo cattāro cattāro nayāti ekena pariyāyena catuvīsatinayapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ
atk-abh03a:2565_1: Idāni kusalādīsu dhammesu paccayadhammaṃ paṭikkhipitvā paccayuppannassa kusalādibhāvaṃ appaṭikkhepavasena
atk-abh03a:2565_2: dhammānaṃ paccanīyānulomatāya laddhanāmaṃ paccanīyānulomapaṭṭhānaṃ dassetuṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca
atk-abh03a:2565_4: Tattha nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭiccāti kusalassa paccayabhāvaṃ vāreti.
atk-abh03a:2565_5: Akusalo dhammo uppajjatīti akusalassa uppattiṃ anujānāti.
atk-abh03a:2565_7: tañca sahajātapaccayaṃ katvā uppajjamāno kusalo nāma natthi,
atk-abh03a:2565_9: Tattha “akusalaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā”ti evaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca vissajjanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2565_10: Abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayāti ayaṃ pana pañho “vipākābyākataṃ kiriyābyākataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ
atk-abh03a:2565_11: paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpa”nti vissajjitova.
atk-abh03a:2565_12: Iti sabbapañhesu avissajjitassa atthānurūpaṃ vissajjitassa ca pāḷiāgatameva vissajjanaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2565_13: Ekekasmiñca tikaduke vārappabhedapaccayagaṇanavidhānaṃ sabbaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayānusāreneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2571_2: Paccayavasena panettha ekekasmiṃ paṭṭhāne anulomādayo cattāro cattāro nayāti ekena pariyāyena catuvīsatinayapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ
atk-abh03a:2573_0: Evaṃ dhammānulomādivasena catūsu vāresu ekekasmiṃ catuvīsatiyā catuvīsatiyā nayānaṃ vasena channavuti nayā honti.
atk-abh03a:2573_1: Tattha paccayanaye aggahetvā ekekasmiṃ paṭṭhāne tikadukādīnaññeva channaṃ channaṃ nayānaṃ vasenetaṃ catuvīsatinayapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ
atk-abh03a:2573_3: Keci pana “kusalārammaṇo dhammo akusalārammaṇo dhammo”tiādinā nayena ārammaṇamātikaṃ nāma ṭhapetvā “kusalārammaṇo
atk-abh03a:2573_4: dhammo kusalārammaṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo”tiādinā nayena ārammaṇapaṭṭhānaṃ nāma dassetvā
atk-abh03a:2573_5: aparampi phassādīnaṃ vasenapi phassapaṭṭhānaṃ nāma uddharitvā dassenti.
atk-abh03a:2573_6: Taṃ neva pāḷiyaṃ na aṭṭhakathāsu sandissatīti idha na vicāritaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2582_0: Saddhāya samāraddhā, yā aṭṭhakathā mayā tassa.
atk-abh03a:2585_0: Sā evaṃ ajja katā, cuddasamattehi bhāṇavārehi;
atk-abh03a:2587_0: Sanniṭṭhānaṃ pattā yatheva niṭṭhaṃ tathā bahujanassa;
atk-abh03a:2594_0: Yaṃ pattaṃ kusalaṃ tassa, ānubhāvena pāṇino;
atk-abh03a:2598_0: Ciraṃ tiṭṭhatu saddhammo, dhamme hontu sagāravā;
atk-abh03a:2599_0: Sabbepi sattā kālena, sammā devo pavassatu.
atk-abh03a:2601_0: Rājā rakkhatu dhammena, attanova pajaṃ pajanti.
atk-abh03a:2605_4: suppatiṭṭhitabuddhīnaṃ theravaṃsappadīpānaṃ therānaṃ mahāvihāravāsīnaṃ vaṃsālaṅkārabhūtena vipulavisuddhabuddhinā
atk-abh03a:2605_5: buddhaghosoti garūhi gahitanāmadheyyena therena katā ayaṃ sakalassapi abhidhammapiṭakassa aṭṭhakathā –
